Name: Abandoned
Definition: Forsaken, deserted.

Name: Ability
Definition: The quality or state of being able; power to perform, whether physical, moral, intellectual, conventional, or legal; capacity; skill or competence in doing; sufficiency of strength, skill, resources, etc.; -- in the plural, faculty, talent.

Name: Able
Definition: Fit; adapted; suitable.

Name: Aboriginal
Definition: First; original; indigenous; primitive; native; as, the aboriginal tribes of America.

Name: Abortion
Definition: The act of giving premature birth; particularly, the expulsion of the human fetus prematurely, or before it is capable of sustaining life; miscarriage.

Name: About
Definition: Around; all round; on every side of.

Name: Above
Definition: In or to a higher place; higher than; on or over the upper surface; over; -- opposed to below or beneath.

Name: Abroad
Definition: At large; widely; broadly; over a wide space; as, a tree spreads its branches abroad.

Name: Absence
Definition: A state of being absent or withdrawn from a place or from companionship; -- opposed to presence.

Name: Absent
Definition: Being away from a place; withdrawn from a place; not present.

Name: Absolute
Definition: Loosed from any limitation or condition; uncontrolled; unrestricted; unconditional; as, absolute authority, monarchy, sovereignty, an absolute promise or command; absolute power; an absolute monarch.

Name: Absolutely
Definition: In an absolute, independent, or unconditional manner; wholly; positively.

Name: Absorption
Definition: The act or process of absorbing or sucking in anything, or of being absorbed and made to disappear; as, the absorption of bodies in a whirlpool, the absorption of a smaller tribe into a larger.

Name: Abstract
Definition: Withdraw; separate.

Name: Abuse
Definition: To put to a wrong use; to misapply; to misuse; to put to a bad use; to use for a wrong purpose or end; to pervert; as, to abuse inherited gold; to make an excessive use of; as, to abuse one's authority.

Name: Academic
Definition: Alt. of Academical

Name: Academic
Definition: One holding the philosophy of Socrates and Plato; a Platonist.

Name: Academy
Definition: A garden or grove near Athens (so named from the hero Academus), where Plato and his followers held their philosophical conferences; hence, the school of philosophy of which Plato was head.

Name: Accent
Definition: A superior force of voice or of articulative effort upon some particular syllable of a word or a phrase, distinguishing it from the others.

Name: Accept
Definition: To receive with a consenting mind (something offered); as, to accept a gift; -- often followed by of.

Name: Acceptable
Definition: Capable, worthy, or sure of being accepted or received with pleasure; pleasing to a receiver; gratifying; agreeable; welcome; as, an acceptable present, one acceptable to us.

Name: Acceptance
Definition: The act of accepting; a receiving what is offered, with approbation, satisfaction, or acquiescence; esp., favorable reception; approval; as, the acceptance of a gift, office, doctrine, etc.

Name: Access
Definition: A coming to, or near approach; admittance; admission; accessibility; as, to gain access to a prince.

Name: Accessibility
Definition: The quality of being accessible, or of admitting approach; receptibility.

Name: Accessible
Definition: Easy of access or approach; approachable; as, an accessible town or mountain, an accessible person.

Name: Accessory
Definition: Accompanying as a subordinate; aiding in a secondary way; additional; connected as an incident or subordinate to a principal; contributing or contributory; said of persons and things, and, when of persons, usually in a bad sense; as, he was accessory to the riot; accessory sounds in music.

Name: Accident
Definition: Literally, a befalling; an event that takes place without one's foresight or expectation; an undesigned, sudden, and unexpected event; chance; contingency; often, an undesigned and unforeseen occurrence of an afflictive or unfortunate character; a casualty; a mishap; as, to die by an accident.

Name: Accommodate
Definition: To render fit, suitable, or correspondent; to adapt; to conform; as, to accommodate ourselves to circumstances.

Name: Accommodation
Definition: The act of fitting or adapting, or the state of being fitted or adapted; adaptation; adjustment; -- followed by to.

Name: Accomplish
Definition: To complete, as time or distance.

Name: Accomplished
Definition: Completed; effected; established; as, an accomplished fact.

Name: Accordance
Definition: Agreement; harmony; conformity.

Name: According
Definition: Agreeing; in agreement or harmony; harmonious.

Name: Accordingly
Definition: Agreeably; correspondingly; suitably; in a manner conformable.

Name: Account
Definition: A reckoning; computation; calculation; enumeration; a record of some reckoning; as, the Julian account of time.

Name: Accountability
Definition: The state of being accountable; liability to be called on to render an account; accountableness.

Name: Accreditation
Definition: The act of accrediting; as, letters of accreditation.

Name: Accuracy
Definition: The state of being accurate; freedom from mistakes, this exemption arising from carefulness; exact conformity to truth, or to a rule or model; precision; exactness; nicety; correctness; as, the value of testimony depends on its accuracy.

Name: Accurate
Definition: In exact or careful conformity to truth, or to some standard of requirement, the result of care or pains; free from failure, error, or defect; exact; as, an accurate calculator; an accurate measure; accurate expression, knowledge, etc.

Name: Accurately
Definition: In an accurate manner; exactly; precisely; without error or defect.

Name: Accused
Definition: Charged with offense; as, an accused person.

Name: Achieve
Definition: To carry on to a final close; to bring out into a perfected state; to accomplish; to perform; -- as, to achieve a feat, an exploit, an enterprise.

Name: Achievement
Definition: The act of achieving or performing; an obtaining by exertion; successful performance; accomplishment; as, the achievement of his object.

Name: Acid
Definition: Sour, sharp, or biting to the taste; tart; having the taste of vinegar: as, acid fruits or liquors. Also fig.: Sour-tempered.

Name: Acknowledge
Definition: To of or admit the knowledge of; to recognize as a fact or truth; to declare one's belief in; as, to acknowledge the being of a God.

Name: Acne
Definition: A pustular affection of the skin, due to changes in the sebaceous glands.

Name: Acoustic
Definition: Pertaining to the sense of hearing, the organs of hearing, or the science of sounds; auditory.

Name: Acquire
Definition: To gain, usually by one's own exertions; to get as one's own; as, to acquire a title, riches, knowledge, skill, good or bad habits.

Name: Acquisition
Definition: The act or process of acquiring.

Name: Acre
Definition: Any field of arable or pasture land.

Name: Acrobat
Definition: One who practices rope dancing, high vaulting, or other daring gymnastic feats.

Name: Across
Definition: From side to side; athwart; crosswise, or in a direction opposed to the length; quite over; as, a bridge laid across a river.

Name: Acrylic
Definition: Of or containing acryl, the hypothetical radical of which acrolein is the hydride; as, acrylic acid.

Name: Acting
Definition: Operating in any way.

Name: Action
Definition: A process or condition of acting or moving, as opposed to rest; the doing of something; exertion of power or force, as when one body acts on another; the effect of power exerted on one body by another; agency; activity; operation; as, the action of heat; a man of action.

Name: Active
Definition: Having the power or quality of acting; causing change; communicating action or motion; acting; -- opposed to passive, that receives; as, certain active principles; the powers of the mind.

Name: Actively
Definition: In an active manner; nimbly; briskly; energetically; also, by one's own action; voluntarily, not passively.

Name: Activity
Definition: The state or quality of being active; nimbleness; agility; vigorous action or operation; energy; active force; as, an increasing variety of human activities.

Name: Actor
Definition: One who acts, or takes part in any affair; a doer.

Name: Actress
Definition: A female actor or doer.

Name: Actual
Definition: Involving or comprising action; active.

Name: Actually
Definition: Actively.

Name: Acute
Definition: Sharp at the end; ending in a sharp point; pointed; -- opposed to blunt or obtuse; as, an acute angle; an acute leaf.

Name: Adam
Definition: The name given in the Bible to the first man, the progenitor of the human race.

Name: Adaptation
Definition: The act or process of adapting, or fitting; or the state of being adapted or fitted; fitness.

Name: Adapter
Definition: One who adapts.

Name: Adaptive
Definition: Suited, given, or tending, to adaptation; characterized by adaptation; capable of adapting.

Name: Addiction
Definition: The state of being addicted; devotion; inclination.

Name: Addition
Definition: The act of adding two or more things together; -- opposed to subtraction or diminution.

Name: Additional
Definition: Added; supplemental; in the way of an addition.

Name: Additionally
Definition: By way of addition.

Name: Address
Definition: To aim; to direct.

Name: Adequate
Definition: Equal to some requirement; proportionate, or correspondent; fully sufficient; as, powers adequate to a great work; an adequate definition.

Name: Adjacent
Definition: Lying near, close, or contiguous; neighboring; bordering on; as, a field adjacent to the highway.

Name: Adjust
Definition: To make exact; to fit; to make correspondent or conformable; to bring into proper relations; as, to adjust a garment to the body, or things to a standard.

Name: Adjustable
Definition: Capable of being adjusted.

Name: Adjustment
Definition: The act of adjusting, or condition of being adjusted; act of bringing into proper relations; regulation.

Name: Administration
Definition: The act of administering; government of public affairs; the service rendered, or duties assumed, in conducting affairs; the conducting of any office or employment; direction; management.

Name: Administrative
Definition: Pertaining to administration; administering; executive; as, an administrative body, ability, or energy.

Name: Administrator
Definition: One who administers affairs; one who directs, manages, executes, or dispenses, whether in civil, judicial, political, or ecclesiastical affairs; a manager.

Name: Admission
Definition: The act or practice of admitting.

Name: Admit
Definition: To suffer to enter; to grant entrance, whether into a place, or into the mind, or consideration; to receive; to take; as, they were into his house; to admit a serious thought into the mind; to admit evidence in the trial of a cause.

Name: Admitted
Definition: Received as true or valid; acknowledged.

Name: Adobe
Definition: An unburnt brick dried in the sun; also used as an adjective, as, an adobe house, in Texas or New Mexico.

Name: Adolescent
Definition: Growing; advancing from childhood to maturity.

Name: Adopt
Definition: To take by choice into relationship, as, child, heir, friend, citizen, etc.; esp. to take voluntarily (a child of other parents) to be in the place of, or as, one's own child.

Name: Adopted
Definition: Taken by adoption; taken up as one's own; as, an adopted son, citizen, country, word.

Name: Adoption
Definition: The act of adopting, or state of being adopted; voluntary acceptance of a child of other parents to be the same as one's own child.

Name: Adrian
Definition: Pertaining to the Adriatic Sea; as, Adrian billows.

Name: Adult
Definition: Having arrived at maturity, or to full size and strength; matured; as, an adult person or plant; an adult ape; an adult age.

Name: Advance
Definition: To bring forward; to move towards the van or front; to make to go on.

Name: Advanced
Definition: In the van or front.

Name: Advancement
Definition: The act of advancing, or the state of being advanced; progression; improvement; furtherance; promotion to a higher place or dignity; as, the advancement of learning.

Name: Advantage
Definition: Any condition, circumstance, opportunity, or means, particularly favorable to success, or to any desired end; benefit; as, the enemy had the advantage of a more elevated position.

Name: Adventure
Definition: That which happens without design; chance; hazard; hap; hence, chance of danger or loss.

Name: Adverse
Definition: Acting against, or in a contrary direction; opposed; contrary; opposite; conflicting; as, adverse winds; an adverse party; a spirit adverse to distinctions of caste.

Name: Advert
Definition: To turn the mind or attention; to refer; to take heed or notice; -- with to; as, he adverted to what was said.

Name: Advertise
Definition: To give notice to; to inform or apprise; to notify; to make known; hence, to warn; -- often followed by of before the subject of information; as, to advertise a man of his loss.

Name: Advertisement
Definition: The act of informing or notifying; notification.

Name: Advertiser
Definition: One who, or that which, advertises.

Name: Advice
Definition: An opinion recommended or offered, as worthy to be followed; counsel.

Name: Advise
Definition: To give advice to; to offer an opinion, as worthy or expedient to be followed; to counsel; to warn.

Name: Advisory
Definition: Having power to advise; containing advice; as, an advisory council; their opinion is merely advisory.

Name: Advocacy
Definition: The act of pleading for or supporting; work of advocating; intercession.

Name: Advocate
Definition: One who pleads the cause of another. Specifically: One who pleads the cause of another before a tribunal or judicial court; a counselor.

Name: Aerial
Definition: Of or pertaining to the air, or atmosphere; inhabiting or frequenting the air; produced by or found in the air; performed in the air; as, aerial regions or currents.

Name: Affair
Definition: That which is done or is to be done; matter; concern; as, a difficult affair to manage; business of any kind, commercial, professional, or public; -- often in the plural.

Name: Affect
Definition: To act upon; to produce an effect or change upon.

Name: Affected
Definition: Regarded with affection; beloved.

Name: Affecting
Definition: Moving the emotions; fitted to excite the emotions; pathetic; touching; as, an affecting address; an affecting sight.

Name: Affiliate
Definition: To adopt; to receive into a family as a son; hence, to bring or receive into close connection; to ally.

Name: Affiliation
Definition: Adoption; association or reception as a member in or of the same family or society.

Name: Afford
Definition: To give forth; to supply, yield, or produce as the natural result, fruit, or issue; as, grapes afford wine; olives afford oil; the earth affords fruit; the sea affords an abundant supply of fish.

Name: Affordable
Definition: That may be afforded.

Name: Afraid
Definition: Impressed with fear or apprehension; in fear; apprehensive.

Name: African
Definition: Of or pertaining to Africa.

Name: After
Definition: Next; later in time; subsequent; succeeding; as, an after period of life.

Name: Afternoon
Definition: The part of the day which follows noon, between noon and evening.

Name: Afterwards
Definition: Alt. of Afterward

Name: Again
Definition: In return, back; as, bring us word again.

Name: Against
Definition: Abreast; opposite to; facing; towards; as, against the mouth of a river; -- in this sense often preceded by over.

Name: Aged
Definition: Old; having lived long; having lived almost to or beyond the usual time allotted to that species of being; as, an aged man; an aged oak.

Name: Agency
Definition: The faculty of acting or of exerting power; the state of being in action; action; instrumentality.

Name: Agent
Definition: Acting; -- opposed to patient, or sustaining, action.

Name: Aggregate
Definition: To bring together; to collect into a mass or sum.

Name: Aggressive
Definition: Tending or disposed to aggress; characterized by aggression; making assaults; unjustly attacking; as, an aggressive policy, war, person, nation.

Name: Agree
Definition: In good part; kindly.

Name: Agreement
Definition: State of agreeing; harmony of opinion, statement, action, or character; concurrence; concord; conformity; as, a good agreement subsists among the members of the council.

Name: Agricultural
Definition: Of or pertaining to agriculture; connected with, or engaged in, tillage; as, the agricultural class; agricultural implements, wages, etc.

Name: Agriculture
Definition: The art or science of cultivating the ground, including the harvesting of crops, and the rearing and management of live stock; tillage; husbandry; farming.

Name: Ahead
Definition: In or to the front; in advance; onward.

Name: Alan
Definition: A wolfhound.

Name: Alarm
Definition: A summons to arms, as on the approach of an enemy.

Name: Album
Definition: A white tablet on which anything was inscribed, as a list of names, etc.

Name: Alcohol
Definition: An impalpable powder.

Name: Alert
Definition: Watchful; vigilant; active in vigilance.

Name: Algebra
Definition: That branch of mathematics which treats of the relations and properties of quantity by means of letters and other symbols. It is applicable to those relations that are true of every kind of magnitude.

Name: Algorithm
Definition: The art of calculating by nine figures and zero.

Name: Alias
Definition: Otherwise; otherwise called; -- a term used in legal proceedings to connect the different names of any one who has gone by two or more, and whose true name is for any cause doubtful; as, Smith, alias Simpson.

Name: Alien
Definition: Not belonging to the same country, land, or government, or to the citizens or subjects thereof; foreign; as, alien subjects, enemies, property, shores.

Name: Align
Definition: To adjust or form to a line; to range or form in line; to bring into line; to aline.

Name: Alignment
Definition: The act of adjusting to a line; arrangement in a line or lines; the state of being so adjusted; a formation in a straight line; also, the line of adjustment; esp., an imaginary line to regulate the formation of troops or of a squadron.

Name: Alike
Definition: Having resemblance or similitude; similar; without difference.

Name: Alive
Definition: Having life, in opposition to dead; living; being in a state in which the organs perform their functions; as, an animal or a plant which is alive.

Name: Allah
Definition: The name of the Supreme Being, in use among the Arabs and the Mohammedans generally.

Name: Alliance
Definition: The state of being allied; the act of allying or uniting; a union or connection of interests between families, states, parties, etc., especially between families by marriage and states by compact, treaty, or league; as, matrimonial alliances; an alliance between church and state; an alliance between France and England.

Name: Allied
Definition: United; joined; leagued; akin; related. See Ally.

Name: Allocation
Definition: The act of putting one thing to another; a placing; disposition; arrangement.

Name: Allow
Definition: To praise; to approve of; hence, to sanction.

Name: Allowance
Definition: Approval; approbation.

Name: Alloy
Definition: Any combination or compound of metals fused together; a mixture of metals; for example, brass, which is an alloy of copper and zinc. But when mercury is one of the metals, the compound is called an amalgam.

Name: Almost
Definition: Nearly; well nigh; all but; for the greatest part.

Name: Alone
Definition: Quite by one's self; apart from, or exclusive of, others; single; solitary; -- applied to a person or thing.

Name: Along
Definition: By the length; in a line with the length; lengthwise.

Name: Alpha
Definition: The first letter in the Greek alphabet, answering to A, and hence used to denote the beginning.

Name: Alphabetical
Definition: Pertaining to, furnished with, expressed by, or in the order of, the letters of the alphabet; as, alphabetic characters, writing, languages, arrangement.

Name: Alpine
Definition: Of or pertaining to the Alps, or to any lofty mountain; as, Alpine snows; Alpine plants.

Name: Already
Definition: Prior to some specified time, either past, present, or future; by this time; previously.

Name: Also
Definition: In like manner; likewise.

Name: Alter
Definition: To make otherwise; to change in some respect, either partially or wholly; to vary; to modify.

Name: Alternate
Definition: Being or succeeding by turns; one following the other in succession of time or place; by turns first one and then the other; hence, reciprocal.

Name: Alternative
Definition: Offering a choice of two things.

Name: Alternatively
Definition: In the manner of alternatives, or that admits the choice of one out of two things.

Name: Although
Definition: Grant all this; be it that; supposing that; notwithstanding; though.

Name: Alto
Definition: Formerly the part sung by the highest male, or counter-tenor, voices; now the part sung by the lowest female, or contralto, voices, between in tenor and soprano. In instrumental music it now signifies the tenor.

Name: Aluminium
Definition: The metallic base of alumina. This metal is white, but with a bluish tinge, and is remarkable for its resistance to oxidation, and for its lightness, having a specific gravity of about 2.6. Atomic weight 27.08. Symbol Al.

Name: Always
Definition: At all times; ever; perpetually; throughout all time; continually; as, God is always the same.

Name: Amateur
Definition: A person attached to a particular pursuit, study, or science as to music or painting; esp. one who cultivates any study or art, from taste or attachment, without pursuing it professionally.

Name: Amazing
Definition: Causing amazement; very wonderful; as, amazing grace.

Name: Amazon
Definition: One of a fabulous race of female warriors in Scythia; hence, a female warrior.

Name: Ambassador
Definition: Alt. of Embassador

Name: Amber
Definition: A yellowish translucent resin resembling copal, found as a fossil in alluvial soils, with beds of lignite, or on the seashore in many places. It takes a fine polish, and is used for pipe mouthpieces, beads, etc., and as a basis for a fine varnish. By friction, it becomes strongly electric.

Name: Ambient
Definition: Encompassing on all sides; circumfused; investing.

Name: Amend
Definition: To change or modify in any way for the better

Name: Amendment
Definition: An alteration or change for the better; correction of a fault or of faults; reformation of life by quitting vices.

Name: American
Definition: Of or pertaining to America; as, the American continent: American Indians.

Name: Among
Definition: Alt. of Amongst

Name: Amongst
Definition: Mixed or mingled; surrounded by.

Name: Amount
Definition: To go up; to ascend.

Name: Amplifier
Definition: One who or that which amplifies.

Name: Analysis
Definition: A resolution of anything, whether an object of the senses or of the intellect, into its constituent or original elements; an examination of the component parts of a subject, each separately, as the words which compose a sentence, the tones of a tune, or the simple propositions which enter into an argument. It is opposed to synthesis.

Name: Analyst
Definition: One who analyzes; formerly, one skilled in algebraical geometry; now commonly, one skilled in chemical analysis.

Name: Analytical
Definition: Of or pertaining to analysis; resolving into elements or constituent parts; as, an analytical experiment; analytic reasoning; -- opposed to synthetic.

Name: Analyze
Definition: To subject to analysis; to resolve (anything complex) into its elements; to separate into the constituent parts, for the purpose of an examination of each separately; to examine in such a manner as to ascertain the elements or nature of the thing examined; as, to analyze a fossil substance; to analyze a sentence or a word; to analyze an action to ascertain its morality.

Name: Anatomy
Definition: The art of dissecting, or artificially separating the different parts of any organized body, to discover their situation, structure, and economy; dissection.

Name: Anchor
Definition: A iron instrument which is attached to a ship by a cable (rope or chain), and which, being cast overboard, lays hold of the earth by a fluke or hook and thus retains the ship in a particular station.

Name: Ancient
Definition: Old; that happened or existed in former times, usually at a great distance of time; belonging to times long past; specifically applied to the times before the fall of the Roman empire; -- opposed to modern; as, ancient authors, literature, history; ancient days.

Name: Angel
Definition: A messenger.

Name: Anger
Definition: Trouble; vexation; also, physical pain or smart of a sore, etc.

Name: Angle
Definition: The inclosed space near the point where two lines meet; a corner; a nook.

Name: Angola
Definition: A fabric made from the wool of the Angora goat.

Name: Angry
Definition: Troublesome; vexatious; rigorous.

Name: Animal
Definition: An organized living being endowed with sensation and the power of voluntary motion, and also characterized by taking its food into an internal cavity or stomach for digestion; by giving carbonic acid to the air and taking oxygen in the process of respiration; and by increasing in motive power or active aggressive force with progress to maturity.

Name: Animated
Definition: Endowed with life; full of life or spirit; indicating animation; lively; vigorous.

Name: Animation
Definition: The act of animating, or giving life or spirit; the state of being animate or alive.

Name: Anime
Definition: Of a different tincture from the animal itself; -- said of the eyes of a rapacious animal.

Name: Anna
Definition: An East Indian money of account, the sixteenth of a rupee, or about 2/ cents.

Name: Annex
Definition: To join or attach; usually to subjoin; to affix; to append; -- followed by to.

Name: Anniversary
Definition: Returning with the year, at a stated time; annual; yearly; as, an anniversary feast.

Name: Annotation
Definition: A note, added by way of comment, or explanation; -- usually in the plural; as, annotations on ancient authors, or on a word or a passage.

Name: Announce
Definition: To give public notice, or first notice of; to make known; to publish; to proclaim.

Name: Announcement
Definition: The act of announcing, or giving notice; that which announces; proclamation; publication.

Name: Annoying
Definition: That annoys; molesting; vexatious.

Name: Annual
Definition: Of or pertaining to a year; returning every year; coming or happening once in the year; yearly.

Name: Annually
Definition: Yearly; year by year.

Name: Anonymous
Definition: Nameless; of unknown name; also, of unknown or unavowed authorship; as, an anonymous benefactor; an anonymous pamphlet or letter.

Name: Another
Definition: One more, in addition to a former number; a second or additional one, similar in likeness or in effect.

Name: Answer
Definition: To speak in defense against; to reply to in defense; as, to answer a charge; to answer an accusation.

Name: Antenna
Definition: A movable, articulated organ of sensation, attached to the heads of insects and Crustacea. There are two in the former, and usually four in the latter. They are used as organs of touch, and in some species of Crustacea the cavity of the ear is situated near the basal joint. In insects, they are popularly called horns, and also feelers. The term in also applied to similar organs on the heads of other arthropods and of annelids.

Name: Anthropology
Definition: The science of the structure and functions of the human body.

Name: Anti
Definition: A prefix meaning against, opposite or opposed to, contrary, or in place of; -- used in composition in many English words. It is often shortened to ant-; as, antacid, antarctic.

Name: Antique
Definition: Old; ancient; of genuine antiquity; as, an antique statue. In this sense it usually refers to the flourishing ages of Greece and Rome.

Name: Anxiety
Definition: Concern or solicitude respecting some thing or event, future or uncertain, which disturbs the mind, and keeps it in a state of painful uneasiness.

Name: Anybody
Definition: Any one out of an indefinite number of persons; anyone; any person.

Name: Anyone
Definition: One taken at random rather than by selection; anybody. [Commonly written as two words.]

Name: Anything
Definition: Any object, act, state, event, or fact whatever; thing of any kind; something or other; aught; as, I would not do it for anything.

Name: Anyway
Definition: Alt. of Anyways

Name: Anywhere
Definition: In any place.

Name: Apart
Definition: Separately, in regard to space or company; in a state of separation as to place; aside.

Name: Apartment
Definition: A room in a building; a division in a house, separated from others by partitions.

Name: Apollo
Definition: A deity among the Greeks and Romans. He was the god of light and day (the

Name: Apparatus
Definition: Things provided as means to some end.

Name: Apparel
Definition: External clothing; vesture; garments; dress; garb; external habiliments or array.

Name: Apparent
Definition: Capable of being seen, or easily seen; open to view; visible to the eye; within sight or view.

Name: Apparently
Definition: Visibly.

Name: Appeal
Definition: To make application for the removal of (a cause) from an inferior to a superior judge or court for a rehearing or review on account of alleged injustice or illegality in the trial below. We say, the cause was appealed from an inferior court.

Name: Appear
Definition: To come or be in sight; to be in view; to become visible.

Name: Appearance
Definition: The act of appearing or coming into sight; the act of becoming visible to the eye; as, his sudden appearance surprised me.

Name: Appendix
Definition: Something appended or added; an appendage, adjunct, or concomitant.

Name: Apple
Definition: The fleshy pome or fruit of a rosaceous tree (Pyrus malus) cultivated in numberless varieties in the temperate zones.

Name: Appliance
Definition: The act of applying; application; [Obs.] subservience.

Name: Applicable
Definition: Capable of being applied; fit or suitable to be applied; having relevance; as, this observation is applicable to the case under consideration.

Name: Applicant
Definition: One who apples for something; one who makes request; a petitioner.

Name: Application
Definition: The act of applying or laying on, in a literal sense; as, the application of emollients to a diseased limb.

Name: Apply
Definition: To lay or place; to put or adjust (one thing to another); -- with to; as, to apply the hand to the breast; to apply medicaments to a diseased part of the body.

Name: Appointment
Definition: The act of appointing; designation of a person to hold an office or discharge a trust; as, he erred by the appointment of unsuitable men.

Name: Appraisal
Definition: A valuation by an authorized person; an appraisement.

Name: Appreciate
Definition: To set a price or value on; to estimate justly; to value.

Name: Appreciation
Definition: A just valuation or estimate of merit, worth, weight, etc.; recognition of excellence.

Name: Approach
Definition: To come or go near, in place or time; to draw nigh; to advance nearer.

Name: Appropriate
Definition: Set apart for a particular use or person. Hence: Belonging peculiarly; peculiar; suitable; fit; proper.

Name: Approval
Definition: Approbation; sanction.

Name: Approve
Definition: To show to be real or true; to prove.

Name: Approximate
Definition: Approaching; proximate; nearly resembling.

Name: Approximately
Definition: With approximation; so as to approximate; nearly.

Name: April
Definition: The fourth month of the year.

Name: Aqua
Definition: Water; -- a word much used in pharmacy and the old chemistry, in various signification, determined by the word or words annexed.

Name: Aquarium
Definition: An artificial pond, or a globe or tank (usually with glass sides), in which living specimens of aquatic animals or plants are kept.

Name: Aquatic
Definition: Pertaining to water; growing in water; living in, swimming in, or frequenting the margins of waters; as, aquatic plants and fowls.

Name: Arab
Definition: One of a swarthy race occupying Arabia, and numerous in Syria, Northern Africa, etc.

Name: Arabic
Definition: Of or pertaining to Arabia or the Arabians.

Name: Arbitrary
Definition: Depending on will or discretion; not governed by any fixed rules; as, an arbitrary decision; an arbitrary punishment.

Name: Arbitration
Definition: The hearing and determination of a cause between parties in controversy, by a person or persons chosen by the parties.

Name: Arbor
Definition: A kind of latticework formed of, or covered with, vines, branches of trees, or other plants, for shade; a bower.

Name: Arcade
Definition: A series of arches with the columns or piers which support them, the spandrels above, and other necessary appurtenances; sometimes open, serving as an entrance or to give light; sometimes closed at the back (as in the cut) and forming a decorative feature.

Name: Arch
Definition: Any part of a curved line.

Name: Arch
Definition: Chief; eminent; greatest; principal.

Name: Architect
Definition: A person skilled in the art of building; one who understands architecture, or makes it his occupation to form plans and designs of buildings, and to superintend the artificers employed.

Name: Architectural
Definition: Of or pertaining to the art of building; conformed to the rules of architecture.

Name: Architecture
Definition: The art or science of building; especially, the art of building houses, churches, bridges, and other structures, for the purposes of civil life; -- often called civil architecture.

Name: Archive
Definition: The place in which public records or historic documents are kept.

Name: Arctic
Definition: Pertaining to, or situated under, the northern constellation called the Bear; northern; frigid; as, the arctic pole, circle, region, ocean; an arctic expedition, night, temperature.

Name: Area
Definition: Any plane surface, as of the floor of a room or church, or of the ground within an inclosure; an open space in a building.

Name: Arena
Definition: The area in the central part of an amphitheater, in which the gladiators fought and other shows were exhibited; -- so called because it was covered with sand.

Name: Argue
Definition: To invent and offer reasons to support or overthrow a proposition, opinion, or measure; to use arguments; to reason.

Name: Argument
Definition: Proof; evidence.

Name: Arise
Definition: To come up from a lower to a higher position; to come above the horizon; to come up from one's bed or place of repose; to mount; to ascend; to rise; as, to arise from a kneeling posture; a cloud arose; the sun ariseth; he arose early in the morning.

Name: Armed
Definition: Furnished with weapons of offense or defense; furnished with the means of security or protection.

Name: Armor
Definition: Defensive arms for the body; any clothing or covering worn to protect one's person in battle.

Name: Arms
Definition: Instruments or weapons of offense or defense.

Name: Army
Definition: A collection or body of men armed for war, esp. one organized in companies, battalions, regiments, brigades, and divisions, under proper officers.

Name: Around
Definition: In a circle; circularly; on every side; round.

Name: Arrange
Definition: To put in proper order; to dispose (persons, or parts) in the manner intended, or best suited for the purpose; as, troops arranged for battle.

Name: Arrangement
Definition: The act of arranging or putting in an orderly condition; the state of being arranged or put in order; disposition in suitable form.

Name: Array
Definition: Order; a regular and imposing arrangement; disposition in regular lines; hence, order of battle; as, drawn up in battle array.

Name: Arrest
Definition: To stop; to check or hinder the motion or action of; as, to arrest the current of a river; to arrest the senses.

Name: Arrival
Definition: The act of arriving, or coming; the act of reaching a place from a distance, whether by water (as in its original sense) or by land.

Name: Arrive
Definition: To come to the shore or bank. In present usage: To come in progress by water, or by traveling on land; to reach by water or by land; -- followed by at (formerly sometimes by to), also by in and from.

Name: Arrow
Definition: A missile weapon of offense, slender, pointed, and usually feathered and barbed, to be shot from a bow.

Name: Arthritis
Definition: Any inflammation of the joints, particularly the gout.

Name: Article
Definition: A distinct portion of an instrument, discourse, literary work, or any other writing, consisting of two or more particulars, or treating of various topics; as, an article in the Constitution. Hence: A clause in a contract, system of regulations, treaty, or the like; a term, condition, or stipulation in a contract; a concise statement; as, articles of agreement.

Name: Artificial
Definition: Made or contrived by art; produced or modified by human skill and labor, in opposition to natural; as, artificial heat or light, gems, salts, minerals, fountains, flowers.

Name: Artist
Definition: One who practices some mechanic art or craft; an artisan.

Name: Artistic
Definition: Alt. of Artistical

Name: Asbestos
Definition: A variety of amphibole or of pyroxene, occurring in long and delicate fibers, or in fibrous masses or seams, usually of a white, gray, or green-gray color. The name is also given to a similar variety of serpentine.

Name: Ascii
Definition: Alt. of Ascians

Name: Asian
Definition: Of or pertaining to Asia; Asiatic.

Name: Aside
Definition: On, or to, one side; out of a straight line, course, or direction; at a little distance from the rest; out of the way; apart.

Name: Asking
Definition: The act of inquiring or requesting; a petition; solicitation.

Name: Aspect
Definition: The act of looking; vision; gaze; glance.

Name: Assault
Definition: A violent onset or attack with physical means, as blows, weapons, etc.; an onslaught; the rush or charge of an attacking force; onset; as, to make assault upon a man, a house, or a town.

Name: Assembly
Definition: A company of persons collected together in one place, and usually for some common purpose, esp. for deliberation and legislation, for worship, or for social entertainment.

Name: Assess
Definition: To value; to make a valuation or official estimate of for the purpose of taxation.

Name: Assessment
Definition: The act of assessing; the act of determining an amount to be paid; as, an assessment of damages, or of taxes; an assessment of the members of a club.

Name: Asset
Definition: Any article or separable part of one's assets.

Name: Assets
Definition: Property of a deceased person, subject by law to the payment of his debts and legacies; -- called assets because sufficient to render the executor or administrator liable to the creditors and legatees, so far as such goods or estate may extend.

Name: Assign
Definition: To appoint; to allot; to apportion; to make over.

Name: Assignment
Definition: An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use; or for a particular time, as of a cause or causes in court.

Name: Assist
Definition: To give support to in some undertaking or effort, or in time of distress; to help; to aid; to succor.

Name: Assistance
Definition: The act of assisting; help; aid; furtherance; succor; support.

Name: Assistant
Definition: Helping; lending aid or support; auxiliary.

Name: Associate
Definition: To join with one, as a friend, companion, partner, or confederate; as, to associate others with us in business, or in an enterprise.

Name: Associated
Definition: Joined as a companion; brought into association; accompanying; combined.

Name: Association
Definition: The act of associating, or state of being associated; union; connection, whether of persons of things.

Name: Assume
Definition: To take to or upon one's self; to take formally and demonstratively; sometimes, to appropriate or take unjustly.

Name: Assumed
Definition: Supposed.

Name: Assuming
Definition: Pretentious; taking much upon one's self; presumptuous.

Name: Assumption
Definition: The act of assuming, or taking to or upon one's self; the act of taking up or adopting.

Name: Assurance
Definition: The act of assuring; a declaration tending to inspire full confidence; that which is designed to give confidence.

Name: Assure
Definition: To make sure or certain; to render confident by a promise, declaration, or other evidence.

Name: Assured
Definition: Made sure; safe; insured; certain; indubitable; not doubting; bold to excess.

Name: Asthma
Definition: A disease, characterized by difficulty of breathing (due to a spasmodic contraction of the bronchi), recurring at intervals, accompanied with a wheezing sound, a sense of constriction in the chest, a cough, and expectoration.

Name: Astrology
Definition: In its etymological signification, the science of the stars; among the ancients, synonymous with astronomy; subsequently, the art of judging of the influences of the stars upon human affairs, and of foretelling events by their position and aspects.

Name: Astronomy
Definition: Astrology.

Name: Asylum
Definition: A sanctuary or place of refuge and protection, where criminals and debtors found shelter, and from which they could not be forcibly taken without sacrilege.

Name: Athletic
Definition: Of or pertaining to athletes or to the exercises practiced by them; as, athletic games or sports.

Name: Athletics
Definition: The art of training by athletic exercises; the games and sports of athletes.

Name: Atlanta
Definition: A genus of small glassy heteropod mollusks found swimming at the surface in mid ocean. See Heteropod.

Name: Atlantic
Definition: Of or pertaining to Mt. Atlas in Libya, and hence applied to the ocean which lies between Europe and Africa on the east and America on the west; as, the Atlantic Ocean (called also the Atlantic); the Atlantic basin; the Atlantic telegraph.

Name: Atlas
Definition: One who sustains a great burden.

Name: Atmosphere
Definition: The whole mass of aeriform fluid surrounding the earth; -- applied also to the gaseous envelope of any celestial orb, or other body; as, the atmosphere of Mars.

Name: Atmospheric
Definition: Alt. of Atmospherical

Name: Atom
Definition: An ultimate indivisible particle of matter.

Name: Atomic
Definition: Alt. of Atomical

Name: Attach
Definition: To bind, fasten, tie, or connect; to make fast or join; as, to attach one thing to another by a string, by glue, or the like.

Name: Attachment
Definition: The act attaching, or state of being attached; close adherence or affection; fidelity; regard; an/ passion of affection that binds a person; as, an attachment to a friend, or to a party.

Name: Attack
Definition: To fall upon with force; to assail, as with force and arms; to assault.

Name: Attempt
Definition: To make trial or experiment of; to try; to endeavor to do or perform (some action); to assay; as, to attempt to sing; to attempt a bold flight.

Name: Attend
Definition: To direct the attention to; to fix the mind upon; to give heed to; to regard.

Name: Attendance
Definition: Attention; regard; careful application.

Name: Attention
Definition: The act or state of attending or heeding; the application of the mind to any object of sense, representation, or thought; notice; exclusive or special consideration; earnest consideration, thought, or regard; obedient or affectionate heed; the supposed power or faculty of attending.

Name: Attitude
Definition: The posture, action, or disposition of a figure or a statue.

Name: Attorney
Definition: A substitute; a proxy; an agent.

Name: Attract
Definition: To draw to, or cause to tend to; esp. to cause to approach, adhere, or combine; or to cause to resist divulsion, separation, or decomposition.

Name: Attraction
Definition: An invisible power in a body by which it draws anything to itself; the power in nature acting mutually between bodies or ultimate particles, tending to draw them together, or to produce their cohesion or combination, and conversely resisting separation.

Name: Attractive
Definition: Having the power or quality of attracting or drawing; as, the attractive force of bodies.

Name: Attribute
Definition: To ascribe; to consider (something) as due or appropriate (to); to refer, as an effect to a cause; to impute; to assign; to consider as belonging (to).

Name: Auburn
Definition: Flaxen-colored.

Name: Auction
Definition: A public sale of property to the highest bidder, esp. by a person licensed and authorized for the purpose; a vendue.

Name: Audience
Definition: The act of hearing; attention to sounds.

Name: Audit
Definition: An audience; a hearing.

Name: Auditor
Definition: A hearer or listener.

Name: August
Definition: Of a quality inspiring mingled admiration and reverence; having an aspect of solemn dignity or grandeur; sublime; majestic; having exalted birth, character, state, or authority.

Name: Aurora
Definition: The rising light of the morning; the dawn of day; the redness of the sky just before the sun rises.

Name: Austin
Definition: Augustinian; as, Austin friars.

Name: Australian
Definition: Of or pertaining to Australia.

Name: Authentic
Definition: Having a genuine original or authority, in opposition to that which is false, fictitious, counterfeit, or apocryphal; being what it purports to be; genuine; not of doubtful origin; real; as, an authentic paper or register.

Name: Author
Definition: The beginner, former, or first mover of anything; hence, the efficient cause of a thing; a creator; an originator.

Name: Authority
Definition: Legal or rightful power; a right to command or to act; power exercised buy a person in virtue of his office or trust; dominion; jurisdiction; authorization; as, the authority of a prince over subjects, and of parents over children; the authority of a court.

Name: Authorization
Definition: The act of giving authority or legal power; establishment by authority; sanction or warrant.

Name: Authorized
Definition: Possessed of or endowed with authority; as, an authorized agent.

Name: Automatic
Definition: Alt. of Automatical

Name: Automatically
Definition: In an automatic manner.

Name: Autumn
Definition: The third season of the year, or the season between summer and winter, often called

Name: Availability
Definition: The quality of being available; availableness.

Name: Available
Definition: Having sufficient power, force, or efficacy, for the object; effectual; valid; as, an available plea.

Name: Avatar
Definition: The descent of a deity to earth, and his incarnation as a man or an animal; -- chiefly associated with the incarnations of Vishnu.

Name: Avenue
Definition: A way or opening for entrance into a place; a passage by which a place may by reached; a way of approach or of exit.

Name: Average
Definition: That service which a tenant owed his lord, to be done by the work beasts of the tenant, as the carriage of wheat, turf, etc.

Name: Aviation
Definition: The art or science of flying.

Name: Avoid
Definition: To empty.

Name: Award
Definition: To give by sentence or judicial determination; to assign or apportion, after careful regard to the nature of the case; to adjudge; as, the arbitrators awarded damages to the complainant.

Name: Aware
Definition: Watchful; vigilant or on one's guard against danger or difficulty.

Name: Away
Definition: From a place; hence.

Name: Awesome
Definition: Causing awe; appalling; awful; as, an awesome sight.

Name: Awful
Definition: Oppressing with fear or horror; appalling; terrible; as, an awful scene.

Name: Axis
Definition: The spotted deer (Cervus axis or Axis maculata) of India, where it is called hog deer and parrah (Moorish name).

Name: Babe
Definition: An infant; a young child of either sex; a baby.

Name: Baby
Definition: An infant or young child of either sex; a babe.

Name: Bachelor
Definition: A man of any age who has not been married.

Name: Back
Definition: A large shallow vat; a cistern, tub, or trough, used by brewers, distillers, dyers, picklers, gluemakers, and others, for mixing or cooling wort, holding water, hot glue, etc.

Name: Backed
Definition: Having a back; fitted with a back; as, a backed electrotype or stereotype plate.  Used in composition; as, broad-backed; hump-backed.

Name: Background
Definition: Ground in the rear or behind, or in the distance, as opposed to the foreground, or the ground in front.

Name: Backing
Definition: The act of moving backward, or of putting or moving anything backward.

Name: Bacon
Definition: The back and sides of a pig salted and smoked; formerly, the flesh of a pig salted or fresh.

Name: Bacterial
Definition: Of or pertaining to bacteria.

Name: Badge
Definition: A distinctive mark, token, sign, or cognizance, worn on the person; as, the badge of a society; the badge of a policeman.

Name: Badly
Definition: In a bad manner; poorly; not well; unskillfully; imperfectly; unfortunately; grievously; so as to cause harm; disagreeably; seriously.

Name: Bailey
Definition: The outer wall of a feudal castle.

Name: Baker
Definition: One whose business it is to bake bread, biscuit, etc.

Name: Baking
Definition: The act or process of cooking in an oven, or of drying and hardening by heat or cold.

Name: Balance
Definition: An apparatus for weighing.

Name: Bald
Definition: Destitute of the natural or common covering on the head or top, as of hair, feathers, foliage, trees, etc.; as, a bald head; a bald oak.

Name: Ball
Definition: Any round or roundish body or mass; a sphere or globe; as, a ball of twine; a ball of snow.

Name: Ballet
Definition: An artistic dance performed as a theatrical entertainment, or an interlude, by a number of persons, usually women. Sometimes, a scene accompanied by pantomime and dancing.

Name: Balloon
Definition: A bag made of silk or other light material, and filled with hydrogen gas or heated air, so as to rise and float in the atmosphere; especially, one with a car attached for aerial navigation.

Name: Ballot
Definition: Originally, a ball used for secret voting. Hence: Any printed or written ticket used in voting.

Name: Banana
Definition: A perennial herbaceous plant of almost treelike size (Musa sapientum); also, its edible fruit. See Musa.

Name: Bank
Definition: A bench; a high seat, or seat of distinction or judgment; a tribunal or court.

Name: Band
Definition: A fillet, strap, or any narrow ligament with which a thing is encircled, or fastened, or by which a number of things are tied, bound together, or confined; a fetter.

Name: Bang
Definition: To beat, as with a club or cudgel; to treat with violence; to handle roughly.

Name: Bank
Definition: A mound, pile, or ridge of earth, raised above the surrounding level; hence, anything shaped like a mound or ridge of earth; as, a bank of clouds; a bank of snow.

Name: Banking
Definition: The business of a bank or of a banker.

Name: Bankruptcy
Definition: The state of being actually or legally bankrupt.

Name: Banner
Definition: A kind of flag attached to a spear or pike by a crosspiece, and used by a chief as his standard in battle.

Name: Baptist
Definition: One who administers baptism; -- specifically applied to John, the forerunner of Christ.

Name: Barbados
Definition: Alt. of Barbadoes

Name: Barbara
Definition: The first word in certain mnemonic lines which represent the various forms of the syllogism. It indicates a syllogism whose three propositions are universal affirmatives.

Name: Bare
Definition: Without clothes or covering; stripped of the usual covering; naked; as, his body is bare; the trees are bare.

Name: Barely
Definition: Without covering; nakedly.

Name: Bargain
Definition: An agreement between parties concerning the sale of property; or a contract by which one party binds himself to transfer the right to some property for a consideration, and the other party binds himself to receive the property and pay the consideration.

Name: Barn
Definition: A covered building used chiefly for storing grain, hay, and other productions of a farm. In the United States a part of the barn is often used for stables.

Name: Barrel
Definition: A round vessel or cask, of greater length than breadth, and bulging in the middle, made of staves bound with hoops, and having flat ends or heads.

Name: Barrier
Definition: A carpentry obstruction, stockade, or other obstacle made in a passage in order to stop an enemy.

Name: Barry
Definition: Divided into bars; -- said of the field.

Name: Base
Definition: Of little, or less than the usual, height; of low growth; as, base shrubs.

Name: Baseball
Definition: A game of ball, so called from the bases or bounds ( four in number) which designate the circuit which each player must endeavor to make after striking the ball.

Name: Based
Definition: Having a base, or having as a base; supported; as, broad-based.

Name: Basement
Definition: The outer wall of the ground story of a building, or of a part of that story, when treated as a distinct substructure. ( See Base, n., 3 (a).) Hence: The rooms of a ground floor, collectively.

Name: Basic
Definition: Relating to a base; performing the office of a base in a salt.

Name: Basin
Definition: A hollow vessel or dish, to hold water for washing, and for various other uses.

Name: Basis
Definition: The foundation of anything; that on which a thing rests.

Name: Basket
Definition: A vessel made of osiers or other twigs, cane, rushes, splints, or other flexible material, interwoven.

Name: Bass
Definition: An edible, spiny-finned fish, esp. of the genera Roccus, Labrax, and related genera. There are many species.

Name: Batch
Definition: The quantity of bread baked at one time.

Name: Bath
Definition: The act of exposing the body, or part of the body, for purposes of cleanliness, comfort, health, etc., to water, vapor, hot air, or the like; as, a cold or a hot bath; a medicated bath; a steam bath; a hip bath.

Name: Batman
Definition: A weight used in the East, varying according to the locality; in Turkey, the greater batman is about 157 pounds, the lesser only a fourth of this; at Aleppo and Smyrna, the batman is 17 pounds.

Name: Battery
Definition: The act of battering or beating.

Name: Battle
Definition: Fertile. See Battel, a.

Name: Beach
Definition: Pebbles, collectively; shingle.

Name: Beam
Definition: Any large piece of timber or iron long in proportion to its thickness, and prepared for use.

Name: Bean
Definition: A name given to the seed of certain leguminous herbs, chiefly of the genera Faba, Phaseolus, and Dolichos; also, to the herbs.

Name: Bear
Definition: To support or sustain; to hold up.

Name: Bearing
Definition: The manner in which one bears or conducts one's self; mien; behavior; carriage.

Name: Beast
Definition: Any living creature; an animal; -- including man, insects, etc.

Name: Beat
Definition: To strike repeatedly; to lay repeated blows upon; as, to beat one's breast; to beat iron so as to shape it; to beat grain, in order to force out the seeds; to beat eggs and sugar; to beat a drum.

Name: Beautiful
Definition: Having the qualities which constitute beauty; pleasing to the sight or the mind.

Name: Beauty
Definition: An assemblage or graces or properties pleasing to the eye, the ear, the intellect, the aesthetic faculty, or the moral sense.

Name: Beaver
Definition: An amphibious rodent, of the genus Castor.

Name: Became
Definition: imp. of Become.

Name: Because
Definition: By or for the cause that; on this account that; for the reason that.

Name: Become
Definition: To pass from one state to another; to enter into some state or condition, by a change from another state, or by assuming or receiving new properties or qualities, additional matter, or a new character.

Name: Becoming
Definition: Appropriate or fit; congruous; suitable; graceful; befitting.

Name: Bedding
Definition: A bed and its furniture; the materials of a bed, whether for man or beast; bedclothes; litter.

Name: Bedroom
Definition: A room or apartment intended or used for a bed; a lodging room.

Name: Beef
Definition: An animal of the genus Bos, especially the common species, B. taurus, including the bull, cow, and ox, in their full grown state; esp., an ox or cow fattened for food.

Name: Been
Definition: The past participle of Be. In old authors it is also the pr. tense plural of Be. See 1st Bee.

Name: Beer
Definition: A fermented liquor made from any malted grain, but commonly from barley malt, with hops or some other substance to impart a bitter flavor.

Name: Before
Definition: In front of; preceding in space; ahead of; as, to stand before the fire; before the house.

Name: Begin
Definition: To have or commence an independent or first existence; to take rise; to commence.

Name: Beginner
Definition: One who begins or originates anything. Specifically: A young or inexperienced practitioner or student; a tyro.

Name: Beginning
Definition: The act of doing that which begins anything; commencement of an action, state, or space of time; entrance into being or upon a course; the first act, effort, or state of a succession of acts or states.

Name: Begun
Definition: p. p. of Begin.

Name: Behalf
Definition: Advantage; favor; stead; benefit; interest; profit; support; defense; vindication.

Name: Behavior
Definition: Manner of behaving, whether good or bad; mode of conducting one's self; conduct; deportment; carriage; -- used also of inanimate objects; as, the behavior of a ship in a storm; the behavior of the magnetic needle.

Name: Behind
Definition: On the side opposite the front or nearest part; on the back side of; at the back of; on the other side of; as, behind a door; behind a hill.

Name: Being
Definition: Existing.

Name: Belief
Definition: Assent to a proposition or affirmation, or the acceptance of a fact, opinion, or assertion as real or true, without immediate personal knowledge; reliance upon word or testimony; partial or full assurance without positive knowledge or absolute certainty; persuasion; conviction; confidence; as, belief of a witness; the belief of our senses.

Name: Believe
Definition: To exercise belief in; to credit upon the authority or testimony of another; to be persuaded of the truth of, upon evidence furnished by reasons, arguments, and deductions of the mind, or by circumstances other than personal knowledge; to regard or accept as true; to place confidence in; to think; to consider; as, to believe a person, a statement, or a doctrine.

Name: Bell
Definition: A hollow metallic vessel, usually shaped somewhat like a cup with a flaring mouth, containing a clapper or tongue, and giving forth a ringing sound on being struck.

Name: Belle
Definition: A young lady of superior beauty and attractions; a handsome lady, or one who attracts notice in society; a fair lady.

Name: Belly
Definition: That part of the human body which extends downward from the breast to the thighs, and contains the bowels, or intestines; the abdomen.

Name: Belong
Definition: To be the property of; as, Jamaica belongs to Great Britain.

Name: Below
Definition: Under, or lower in place; beneath not so high; as, below the moon; below the knee.

Name: Belt
Definition: That which engirdles a person or thing; a band or girdle; as, a lady's belt; a sword belt.

Name: Bench
Definition: A long seat, differing from a stool in its greater length.

Name: Bend
Definition: To strain or move out of a straight line; to crook by straining; to make crooked; to curve; to make ready for use by drawing into a curve; as, to bend a bow; to bend the knee.

Name: Beneath
Definition: Lower in place, with something directly over or on; under; underneath; hence, at the foot of.

Name: Beneficial
Definition: Conferring benefits; useful; profitable; helpful; advantageous; serviceable; contributing to a valuable end; -- followed by to.

Name: Benefit
Definition: An act of kindness; a favor conferred.

Name: Benjamin
Definition: A kind of upper coat for men.

Name: Bent
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Bend.

Name: Berlin
Definition: A four-wheeled carriage, having a sheltered seat behind the body and separate from it, invented in the 17th century, at Berlin.

Name: Berry
Definition: Any small fleshy fruit, as the strawberry, mulberry, huckleberry, etc.

Name: Beside
Definition: At the side of; on one side of.

Name: Besides
Definition: Alt. of Beside

Name: Beside
Definition: On one side.

Name: Besides
Definition: Over and above; separate or distinct from; in addition to; other than; else than. See Beside, prep., 3, and Syn. under Beside.

Name: Best
Definition: Having good qualities in the highest degree; most good, kind, desirable, suitable, etc.; most excellent; as, the best man; the best road; the best cloth; the best abilities.

Name: Better
Definition: Having good qualities in a greater degree than another; as, a better man; a better physician; a better house; a better air.

Name: Betty
Definition: A short bar used by thieves to wrench doors open.

Name: Between
Definition: In the space which separates; betwixt; as, New York is between Boston and Philadelphia.

Name: Beverage
Definition: Liquid for drinking; drink; -- usually applied to drink artificially prepared and of an agreeable flavor; as, an intoxicating beverage.

Name: Beyond
Definition: On the further side of; in the same direction as, and further on or away than.

Name: Bias
Definition: A weight on the side of the ball used in the game of bowls, or a tendency imparted to the ball, which turns it from a straight line.

Name: Bible
Definition: A book.

Name: Biblical
Definition: Pertaining to, or derived from, the Bible; as, biblical learning; biblical authority.

Name: Bibliographic
Definition: Alt. of Bibliographical

Name: Bibliography
Definition: A history or description of books and manuscripts, with notices of the different editions, the times when they were printed, etc.

Name: Bicycle
Definition: A light vehicle having two wheels one behind the other. It has a saddle seat and is propelled by the rider's feet acting on cranks or levers.

Name: Bidder
Definition: One who bids or offers a price.

Name: Bidding
Definition: Command; order; a proclamation or notifying.

Name: Bigger
Definition: compar. of Big.

Name: Biggest
Definition: superl. of Big.

Name: Bike
Definition: A nest of wild bees, wasps, or ants; a swarm.

Name: Bill
Definition: A beak, as of a bird, or sometimes of a turtle or other animal.

Name: Billing
Definition: Caressing; kissing.

Name: Billion
Definition: According to the French and American method of numeration, a thousand millions, or 1,000,000,000; according to the English method, a million millions, or  1,000,000,000,000. See Numeration.

Name: Billy
Definition: A club; esp., a policeman's club.

Name: Binary
Definition: Compounded or consisting of two things or parts; characterized by two (things).

Name: Bind
Definition: To tie, or confine with a cord, band, ligature, chain, etc.; to fetter; to make fast; as, to bind grain in bundles; to bind a prisoner.

Name: Binding
Definition: That binds; obligatory.

Name: Biography
Definition: The written history of a person's life.

Name: Biological
Definition: Of or relating to biology.

Name: Biology
Definition: The science of life; that branch of knowledge which treats of living matter as distinct from matter which is not living; the study of living tissue. It has to do with the origin, structure, development, function, and distribution of animals and plants.

Name: Bird
Definition: Orig., a chicken; the young of a fowl; a young eaglet; a nestling; and hence, a feathered flying animal (see 2).

Name: Birth
Definition: The act or fact of coming into life, or of being born; -- generally applied to human beings; as, the birth of a son.

Name: Birthday
Definition: The day in which any person is born; day of origin or commencement.

Name: Bishop
Definition: A spiritual overseer, superintendent, or director.

Name: Bite
Definition: To seize with the teeth, so that they enter or nip the thing seized; to lacerate, crush, or wound with the teeth; as, to bite an apple; to bite a crust; the dog bit a man.

Name: Bizarre
Definition: Odd in manner or appearance; fantastic; whimsical; extravagant; grotesque.

Name: Black
Definition: Destitute of light, or incapable of reflecting it; of the color of soot or coal; of the darkest or a very dark color, the opposite of white; characterized by such a color; as, black cloth; black hair or eyes.

Name: Blackberry
Definition: The fruit of several species of bramble (Rubus); also, the plant itself. Rubus fruticosus is the blackberry of England; R. villosus and R. Canadensis are the high blackberry and low blackberry of the United States. There are also other kinds.

Name: Blacks
Definition: The name of a kind of in used in copperplate printing, prepared from the charred husks of the grape, and residue of the wine press.

Name: Blade
Definition: Properly, the leaf, or flat part of the leaf, of any plant, especially of gramineous plants. The term is sometimes applied to the spire of grasses.

Name: Blame
Definition: To censure; to express disapprobation of; to find fault with; to reproach.

Name: Blank
Definition: Of a white or pale color; without color.

Name: Blanket
Definition: A heavy, loosely woven fabric, usually of wool, and having a nap, used in bed clothing; also, a similar fabric used as a robe; or any fabric used as a cover for a horse.

Name: Blast
Definition: A violent gust of wind.

Name: Bleeding
Definition: Emitting, or appearing to emit, blood or sap, etc.; also, expressing anguish or compassion.

Name: Blend
Definition: To mix or mingle together; esp. to mingle, combine, or associate so that the separate things mixed, or the line of demarcation, can not be distinguished. Hence: To confuse; to confound.

Name: Bless
Definition: To make or pronounce holy; to consecrate

Name: Blessed
Definition: Hallowed; consecrated; worthy of blessing or adoration; heavenly; holy.

Name: Blind
Definition: Destitute of the sense of seeing, either by natural defect or by deprivation; without sight.

Name: Blink
Definition: To wink; to twinkle with, or as with, the eye.

Name: Block
Definition: A piece of wood more or less bulky; a solid mass of wood, stone, etc., usually with one or more plane, or approximately plane, faces; as, a block on which a butcher chops his meat; a block by which to mount a horse; children's playing blocks, etc.

Name: Blocking
Definition: The act of obstructing, supporting, shaping, or stamping with a block or blocks.

Name: Blond
Definition: Alt. of Blonde

Name: Blonde
Definition: Of a fair color; light-colored; as, blond hair; a blond complexion.

Name: Blood
Definition: The fluid which circulates in the principal vascular system of animals, carrying nourishment to all parts of the body, and bringing away waste products to be excreted. See under Arterial.

Name: Bloom
Definition: A blossom; the flower of a plant; an expanded bud; flowers, collectively.

Name: Blow
Definition: To flower; to blossom; to bloom.

Name: Blue
Definition: Having the color of the clear sky, or a hue resembling it, whether lighter or darker; as, the deep, blue sea; as blue as a sapphire; blue violets.

Name: Board
Definition: A piece of timber sawed thin, and of considerable length and breadth as compared with the thickness, -- used for building, etc.

Name: Boat
Definition: A small open vessel, or water craft, usually moved by cars or paddles, but often by a sail.

Name: Boating
Definition: The act or practice of rowing or sailing, esp. as an amusement; carriage in boats.

Name: Bobby
Definition: A nickname for a policeman; -- from Sir Robert Peel, who remodeled the police force. See Peeler.

Name: Body
Definition: The material organized substance of an animal, whether living or dead, as distinguished from the spirit, or vital principle; the physical person.

Name: Bold
Definition: Forward to meet danger; venturesome; daring; not timorous or shrinking from risk; brave; courageous.

Name: Bold
Definition: To make bold or daring.

Name: Bolt
Definition: A shaft or missile intended to be shot from a crossbow or catapult, esp. a short, stout, blunt-headed arrow; a quarrel; an arrow, or that which resembles an arrow; a dart.

Name: Bomb
Definition: A great noise; a hollow sound.

Name: Bond
Definition: That which binds, ties, fastens, or confines, or by which anything is fastened or bound, as a cord, chain, etc.; a band; a ligament; a shackle or a manacle.

Name: Bone
Definition: The hard, calcified tissue of the skeleton of vertebrate animals, consisting very largely of calcic carbonate, calcic phosphate, and gelatine; as, blood and bone.

Name: Bonus
Definition: A premium given for a loan, or for a charter or other privilege granted to a company; as the bank paid a bonus for its charter.

Name: Book
Definition: A collection of sheets of paper, or similar material, blank, written, or printed, bound together; commonly, many folded and bound sheets containing continuous printing or writing.

Name: Bookmark
Definition: Something placed in a book to guide in finding a particular page or passage; also, a label in a book to designate the owner; a bookplate.

Name: Bookstore
Definition: A store where books are kept for sale; -- called in England a bookseller's shop.

Name: Boom
Definition: A long pole or spar, run out for the purpose of extending the bottom of a particular sail; as, the jib boom, the studding-sail boom, etc.

Name: Boost
Definition: To lift or push from behind (one who is endeavoring to climb); to push up; hence, to assist in overcoming obstacles, or in making advancement.

Name: Boot
Definition: Remedy; relief; amends; reparation; hence, one who brings relief.

Name: Booth
Definition: A house or shed built of boards, boughs, or other slight materials, for temporary occupation.

Name: Boots
Definition: A servant at a hotel or elsewhere, who cleans and blacks the boots and shoes.

Name: Booty
Definition: That which is seized by violence or obtained by robbery, especially collective spoil taken in war; plunder; pillage.

Name: Border
Definition: The outer part or edge of anything, as of a garment, a garden, etc.; margin; verge; brink.

Name: Boring
Definition: The act or process of one who, or that which, bores; as, the boring of cannon; the boring of piles and ship timbers by certain marine mollusks.

Name: Born
Definition: Brought forth, as an animal; brought into life; introduced by birth.

Name: Borough
Definition: In England, an incorporated town that is not a city; also, a town that sends members to parliament; in Scotland, a body corporate, consisting of the inhabitants of a certain district, erected by the sovereign, with a certain jurisdiction; in America, an incorporated town or village, as in Pennsylvania and Connecticut.

Name: Boss
Definition: Any protuberant part; a round, swelling part or body; a knoblike process; as, a boss of wood.

Name: Boston
Definition: A game at cards, played by four persons, with two packs of fifty-two cards each; -- said to be so called from Boston, Massachusetts, and to have been invented by officers of the French army in America during the Revolutionary war.

Name: Both
Definition: The one and the other; the two; the pair, without exception of either.

Name: Bother
Definition: To annoy; to trouble; to worry; to perplex. See Pother.

Name: Bottle
Definition: A hollow vessel, usually of glass or earthenware (but formerly of leather), with a narrow neck or mouth, for holding liquids.

Name: Bottom
Definition: The lowest part of anything; the foot; as, the bottom of a tree or well; the bottom of a hill, a lane, or a page.

Name: Bought
Definition: A flexure; a bend; a twist; a turn; a coil, as in a rope; as the boughts of a serpent.

Name: Boulder
Definition: Same as Bowlder.

Name: Boulevard
Definition: Originally, a bulwark or rampart of fortification or fortified town.

Name: Bound
Definition: The external or limiting line, either real or imaginary, of any object or space; that which limits or restrains, or within which something is limited or restrained; limit; confine; extent; boundary.

Name: Boundary
Definition: That which indicates or fixes a limit or extent, or marks a bound, as of a territory; a bounding or separating line; a real or imaginary limit.

Name: Bouquet
Definition: A nosegay; a bunch of flowers.

Name: Bowl
Definition: A concave vessel of various forms (often approximately hemispherical), to hold liquids, etc.

Name: Boulder
Definition: A large stone, worn smooth or rounded by the action of water; a large pebble.

Name: Bowling
Definition: The act of playing at or rolling bowls, or of rolling the ball at cricket; the game of bowls or of tenpins.

Name: Boxing
Definition: The act of inclosing (anything) in a box, as for storage or transportation.

Name: Bracelet
Definition: An ornamental band or ring, for the wrist or the arm; in modern times, an ornament encircling the wrist, worn by women or girls.

Name: Bracket
Definition: An architectural member, plain or ornamental, projecting from a wall or pier, to support weight falling outside of the same; also, a decorative feature seeming to discharge such an office.

Name: Brad
Definition: A thin nail, usually small, with a slight projection at the top on one side instead of a head; also, a small wire nail, with a flat circular head; sometimes, a small, tapering, square-bodied finishing nail, with a countersunk head.

Name: Brain
Definition: The whitish mass of soft matter (the center of the nervous system, and the seat of consciousness and volition) which is inclosed in the cartilaginous or bony cranium of vertebrate animals. It is simply the anterior termination of the spinal cord, and is developed from three embryonic vesicles, whose cavities are connected with the central canal of the cord; the cavities of the vesicles become the central cavities, or ventricles, and the walls thicken unequally and become the three segments, the fore-, mid-, and hind-brain.

Name: Brake
Definition: imp. of Break.

Name: Branch
Definition: A shoot or secondary stem growing from the main stem, or from a principal limb or bough of a tree or other plant.

Name: Brand
Definition: A burning piece of wood; or a stick or piece of wood partly burnt, whether burning or after the fire is extinct.

Name: Brass
Definition: An alloy (usually yellow) of copper and zinc, in variable proportion, but often containing two parts of copper to one part of zinc. It sometimes contains tin, and rarely other metals.

Name: Brave
Definition: Bold; courageous; daring; intrepid; -- opposed to cowardly; as, a brave man; a brave act.

Name: Brazilian
Definition: Of or pertaining to Brazil.

Name: Breach
Definition: The act of breaking, in a figurative sense.

Name: Bread
Definition: To spread.

Name: Break
Definition: To strain apart; to sever by fracture; to divide with violence; as, to break a rope or chain; to break a seal; to break an axle; to break rocks or coal; to break a lock.

Name: Breakdown
Definition: The act or result of breaking down, as of a carriage; downfall.

Name: Breakfast
Definition: The first meal in the day, or that which is eaten at the first meal.

Name: Breast
Definition: The fore part of the body, between the neck and the belly; the chest; as, the breast of a man or of a horse.

Name: Breath
Definition: The air inhaled and exhaled in respiration; air which, in the process of respiration, has parted with oxygen and has received carbonic acid, aqueous vapor, warmth, etc.

Name: Breathing
Definition: Respiration; the act of inhaling and exhaling air.

Name: Breed
Definition: To produce as offspring; to bring forth; to bear; to procreate; to generate; to beget; to hatch.

Name: Breeding
Definition: The act or process of generating or bearing.

Name: Breast
Definition: A torus.

Name: Brick
Definition: A block or clay tempered with water, sand, etc., molded into a regular form, usually rectangular, and sun-dried, or burnt in a kiln, or in a heap or stack called a clamp.

Name: Bridal
Definition: Of or pertaining to a bride, or to wedding; nuptial; as, bridal ornaments; a bridal outfit; a bridal chamber.

Name: Bride
Definition: A woman newly married, or about to be married.

Name: Bridge
Definition: A structure, usually of wood, stone, brick, or iron, erected over a river or other water course, or over a chasm, railroad, etc., to make a passageway from one bank to the other.

Name: Brief
Definition: Short in duration.

Name: Briefly
Definition: Concisely; in few words.

Name: Bright
Definition: Radiating or reflecting light; shedding or having much light; shining; luminous; not dark.

Name: Brilliant
Definition: Sparkling with luster; glittering; very bright; as, a brilliant star.

Name: Bring
Definition: To convey to the place where the speaker is or is to be; to bear from a more distant to a nearer place; to fetch.

Name: Bristol
Definition: A seaport city in the west of England.

Name: Bright
Definition: To be or become overripe, as wheat, barley, or hops.

Name: British
Definition: Of or pertaining to Great Britain or to its inhabitants; -- sometimes restricted to the original inhabitants.

Name: Broad
Definition: Wide; extend in breadth, or from side to side; -- opposed to narrow; as, a broad street, a broad table; an inch broad.

Name: Broadcast
Definition: A casting or throwing seed in all directions, as from the hand in sowing.

Name: Brochure
Definition: A printed and stitched book containing only a few leaves; a pamphlet.

Name: Broke
Definition: To transact business for another.

Name: Broken
Definition: Separated into parts or pieces by violence; divided into fragments; as, a broken chain or rope; a broken dish.

Name: Broker
Definition: One who transacts business for another; an agent.

Name: Bronze
Definition: An alloy of copper and tin, to which small proportions of other metals, especially zinc, are sometimes added. It is hard and sonorous, and is used for statues, bells, cannon, etc., the proportions of the ingredients being varied to suit the particular purposes. The varieties containing the higher proportions of tin are brittle, as in bell metal and speculum metal.

Name: Brook
Definition: A natural stream of water smaller than a river or creek.

Name: Brother
Definition: A male person who has the same father and mother with another person, or who has one of them only. In the latter case he is more definitely called a half brother, or brother of the half blood.

Name: Brown
Definition: Of a dark color, of various shades between black and red or yellow.

Name: Browse
Definition: The tender branches or twigs of trees and shrubs, fit for the food of cattle and other animals; green food.

Name: Browser
Definition: An animal that browses.

Name: Browsing
Definition: Browse; also, a place abounding with shrubs where animals may browse.

Name: Brunette
Definition: A girl or woman with a somewhat brown or dark complexion.

Name: Brush
Definition: An instrument composed of bristles, or other like material, set in a suitable back or handle, as of wood, bone, or ivory, and used for various purposes, as in removing dust from clothes, laying on colors, etc. Brushes have different shapes and names according to their use; as, clothes brush, paint brush, tooth brush, etc.

Name: Brussels
Definition: A city of Belgium, giving its name to a kind of carpet, a kind of lace, etc.

Name: Brutal
Definition: Of or pertaining to a brute; as, brutal nature.

Name: Bubble
Definition: A thin film of liquid inflated with air or gas; as, a soap bubble; bubbles on the surface of a river.
