Name: Buck
Definition: Lye or suds in which cloth is soaked in the operation of bleaching, or in which clothes are washed.

Name: Budget
Definition: A bag or sack with its contents; hence, a stock or store; an accumulation; as, a budget of inventions.

Name: Buffalo
Definition: A species of the genus Bos or Bubalus (B. bubalus), originally from India, but now found in most of the warmer countries of the eastern continent. It is larger and less docile than the common ox, and is fond of marshy places and rivers.

Name: Buffer
Definition: An elastic apparatus or fender, for deadening the jar caused by the collision of bodies; as, a buffer at the end of a railroad car.

Name: Build
Definition: To erect or construct, as an edifice or fabric of any kind; to form by uniting materials into a regular structure; to fabricate; to make; to raise.

Name: Builder
Definition: One who builds; one whose occupation is to build, as a carpenter, a shipwright, or a mason.

Name: Building
Definition: The act of constructing, erecting, or establishing.

Name: Built
Definition: Shape; build; form of structure; as, the built of a ship.

Name: Bulk
Definition: Magnitude of material substance; dimensions; mass; size; as, an ox or ship of great bulk.

Name: Bull
Definition: The male of any species of cattle (Bovidae); hence, the male of any large quadruped, as the elephant; also, the male of the whale.

Name: Bullet
Definition: A small ball.

Name: Bulletin
Definition: A brief statement of facts respecting some passing event, as military operations or the health of some distinguished personage, issued by authority for the information of the public.

Name: Bumper
Definition: A cup or glass filled to the brim, or till the liquor runs over, particularly in drinking a health or toast.

Name: Bunch
Definition: A protuberance; a hunch; a knob or lump; a hump.

Name: Bundle
Definition: A number of things bound together, as by a cord or envelope, into a mass or package convenient for handling or conveyance; a loose package; a roll; as, a bundle of straw or of paper; a bundle of old clothes.

Name: Bunny
Definition: A great collection of ore without any vein coming into it or going out from it.

Name: Burden
Definition: That which is borne or carried; a load.

Name: Bureau
Definition: Originally, a desk or writing table with drawers for papers.

Name: Burke
Definition: To murder by suffocation, or so as to produce few marks of violence, for the purpose of obtaining a body to be sold for dissection.

Name: Burn
Definition: To consume with fire; to reduce to ashes by the action of heat or fire; -- frequently intensified by up: as, to burn up wood.

Name: Burner
Definition: One who, or that which, burns or sets fire to anything.

Name: Burning
Definition: That burns; being on fire; excessively hot; fiery.

Name: Burst
Definition: To fly apart or in pieces; of break open; to yield to force or pressure, especially to a sudden and violent exertion of force, or to pressure from within; to explode; as, the boiler had burst; the buds will burst in spring.

Name: Burton
Definition: A peculiar tackle, formed of two or more blocks, or pulleys, the weight being suspended to a hook block in the bight of the running part.

Name: Bush
Definition: A thicket, or place abounding in trees or shrubs; a wild forest.

Name: Business
Definition: That which busies one, or that which engages the time, attention, or labor of any one, as his principal concern or interest, whether for a longer or shorter time; constant employment; regular occupation; as, the business of life; business before pleasure.

Name: Busy
Definition: Engaged in some business; hard at work (either habitually or only for the time being); occupied with serious affairs; not idle nor at leisure; as, a busy merchant.

Name: Butler
Definition: An officer in a king's or a nobleman's household, whose principal business it is to take charge of the liquors, plate, etc.; the head servant in a large house.

Name: Butter
Definition: An oily, unctuous substance obtained from cream or milk by churning.

Name: Butterfly
Definition: A general name for the numerous species of diurnal Lepidoptera.

Name: Button
Definition: A knob; a small ball; a small, roundish mass.

Name: Buttons
Definition: A boy servant, or page, -- in allusion to the buttons on his livery.

Name: Buyer
Definition: One who buys; a purchaser.

Name: Buzz
Definition: To make a low, continuous, humming or sibilant sound, like that made by bees with their wings. Hence: To utter a murmuring sound; to speak with a low, humming voice.

Name: Cabin
Definition: A cottage or small house; a hut.

Name: Cabinet
Definition: A hut; a cottage; a small house.

Name: Cable
Definition: A large, strong rope or chain, of considerable length, used to retain a vessel at anchor, and for other purposes. It is made of hemp, of steel wire, or of iron links.

Name: Cache
Definition: A hole in the ground, or hiding place, for concealing and preserving provisions which it is inconvenient to carry.

Name: Cadillac
Definition: A large pear, shaped like a flattened top, used chiefly for cooking.

Name: Cafe
Definition: A coffeehouse; a restaurant; also, a room in a hotel or restaurant where coffee and liquors are served.

Name: Cage
Definition: A box or inclosure, wholly or partly of openwork, in wood or metal, used for confining birds or other animals.

Name: Cake
Definition: A small mass of dough baked; especially, a thin loaf from unleavened dough; as, an oatmeal cake; johnnycake.

Name: Calcium
Definition: An elementary substance; a metal which combined with oxygen forms lime. It is of a pale yellow color, tenacious, and malleable. It is a member of the alkaline earth group of elements. Atomic weight 40. Symbol Ca.

Name: Calculate
Definition: To ascertain or determine by mathematical processes, usually by the ordinary rules of arithmetic; to reckon up; to estimate; to compute.

Name: Calculated
Definition: Worked out by calculation; as calculated tables for computing interest; ascertained or conjectured as a result of calculation; as, the calculated place of a planet; the calculated velocity of a cannon ball.

Name: Calculation
Definition: The act or process, or the result, of calculating; computation; reckoning, estimate.

Name: Calculator
Definition: One who computes or reckons: one who estimates or considers the force and effect of causes, with a view to form a correct estimate of the effects.

Name: Calendar
Definition: An orderly arrangement of the division of time, adapted to the purposes of civil life, as years, months, weeks, and days; also, a register of the year with its divisions; an almanac.

Name: Calibration
Definition: The process of estimating the caliber a tube, as of a thermometer tube, in order to graduate it to a scale of degrees; also, more generally, the determination of the true value of the spaces in any graduated instrument.

Name: Call
Definition: To command or request to come or be present; to summon; as, to call a servant.

Name: Calling
Definition: The act of one who calls; a crying aloud, esp. in order to summon, or to attact the attention of, some one.

Name: Calm
Definition: Freedom from motion, agitation, or disturbance; a cessation or absence of that which causes motion or disturbance, as of winds or waves; tranquility; stillness; quiet; serenity.

Name: Came
Definition: imp. of Come.

Name: Camel
Definition: A large ruminant used in Asia and Africa for carrying burdens and for riding. The camel is remarkable for its ability to go a long time without drinking. Its hoofs are small, and situated at the extremities of the toes, and the weight of the animal rests on the callous. The dromedary (Camelus dromedarius) has one bunch on the back, while the Bactrian camel (C. Bactrianus) has two. The llama, alpaca, and vicua, of South America, belong to a related genus (Auchenia).

Name: Camera
Definition: A chamber, or instrument having a chamber.  Specifically: The camera obscura when used in photography. See Camera, and Camera obscura.

Name: Camp
Definition: The ground or spot on which tents, huts, etc., are erected for shelter, as for an army or for lumbermen, etc.

Name: Campaign
Definition: An open field; a large, open plain without considerable hills. SeeChampaign.

Name: Camping
Definition: Lodging in a camp.

Name: Campus
Definition: The principal grounds of a college or school, between the buildings or within the main inclosure; as, the college campus.

Name: Canada
Definition: A British province in North America, giving its name to various plants and animals.

Name: Canadian
Definition: Of or pertaining to Canada.

Name: Canal
Definition: An artificial channel filled with water and designed for navigation, or for irrigating land, etc.

Name: Cancel
Definition: To inclose or surround, as with a railing, or with latticework.

Name: Cancellation
Definition: The act, process, or result of canceling; as, the cansellation of certain words in a contract, or of the contract itself.

Name: Cancer
Definition: A genus of decapod Crustacea, including some of the most common shore crabs of Europe and North America, as the rock crab, Jonah crab, etc. See Crab.

Name: Candidate
Definition: One who offers himself, or is put forward by others, as a suitable person or an aspirant or contestant for an office, privilege, or honor; as, a candidate for the office of governor; a candidate for holy orders; a candidate for scholastic honors.

Name: Candle
Definition: A slender, cylindrical body of tallow, containing a wick composed of loosely twisted linen of cotton threads, and used to furnish light.

Name: Candy
Definition: To conserve or boil in sugar; as, to candy fruits; to candy ginger.

Name: Cannon
Definition: A great gun; a piece of ordnance or artillery; a firearm for discharging heavy shot with great force.

Name: Canon
Definition: A law or rule.

Name: Cant
Definition: A corner; angle; niche.

Name: Canvas
Definition: A strong cloth made of hemp, flax, or cotton; -- used for tents, sails, etc.

Name: Canyon
Definition: The English form of the Spanish word Caon.

Name: Capability
Definition: The quality of being capable; capacity; capableness; esp. intellectual power or ability.

Name: Capable
Definition: Possessing ability, qualification, or susceptibility; having capacity; of sufficient size or strength; as, a room capable of holding a large number; a castle capable of resisting a long assault.

Name: Capacity
Definition: The power of receiving or containing; extent of room or space; passive power; -- used in reference to physical things.

Name: Cape
Definition: A piece or point of land, extending beyond the adjacent coast into the sea or a lake; a promontory; a headland.

Name: Capital
Definition: Of or pertaining to the head.

Name: Capitol
Definition: The temple of Jupiter, at Rome, on the Mona Capitolinus, where the Senate met.

Name: Captain
Definition: A head, or chief officer

Name: Capture
Definition: The act of seizing by force, or getting possession of by superior power or by stratagem; as, the capture of an enemy, a vessel, or a criminal.

Name: Carbon
Definition: An elementary substance, not metallic in its nature, which is present in all organic compounds. Atomic weight 11.97. Symbol C. it is combustible, and forms the base of lampblack and charcoal, and enters largely into mineral coals. In its pure crystallized state it constitutes the diamond, the hardest of known substances, occuring in monometric crystals like the octahedron, etc. Another modification is graphite, or blacklead, and in this it is soft, and occurs in hexagonal prisms or tables. When united with oxygen it forms carbon dioxide, commonly called carbonic acid, or carbonic oxide, according to the proportions of the oxygen; when united with hydrogen, it forms various compounds called hydrocarbons. Compare Diamond, and Graphite.

Name: Card
Definition: A piece of pasteboard, or thick paper, blank or prepared for various uses; as, a playing card; a visiting card; a card of invitation; pl. a game played with cards.

Name: Cardiac
Definition: Pertaining to, resembling, or hear the heart; as, the cardiac arteries; the cardiac, or left, end of the stomach.

Name: Care
Definition: A burdensome sense of responsibility; trouble caused by onerous duties; anxiety; concern; solicitude.

Name: Career
Definition: A race course: the ground run over.

Name: Careful
Definition: Full of care; anxious; solicitous.

Name: Carefully
Definition: In a careful manner.

Name: Cargo
Definition: The lading or freight of a ship or other vessel; the goods, merchandise, or whatever is conveyed in a vessel or boat; load; freight.

Name: Caribbean
Definition: Alt. of Caribbee

Name: Carl
Definition: A rude, rustic man; a churl.

Name: Caroline
Definition: A silver coin once current in some parts of Italy, worth about seven cents.

Name: Carnival
Definition: A festival celebrated with merriment and revelry in Roman Gatholic countries during the week before Lent, esp. at Rome and Naples, during a few days (three to ten) before Lent, ending with Shrove Tuesday.

Name: Carol
Definition: A round dance.

Name: Caroline
Definition: A coin. See Carline.

Name: Carpet
Definition: A heavy woven or felted fabric, usually of wool, but also of cotton, hemp, straw, etc.; esp. a floor covering made in breadths to be sewed together and nailed to the floor, as distinguished from a rug or mat; originally, also, a wrought cover for tables.

Name: Carrier
Definition: One who, or that which, carries or conveys; a messenger.

Name: Carry
Definition: To convey or transport in any manner from one place to another; to bear; -- often with away or off.

Name: Carrying
Definition: The act or business of transporting from one place to another.

Name: Cart
Definition: A common name for various kinds of vehicles, as a Scythian dwelling on wheels, or a chariot.

Name: Carter
Definition: A charioteer.

Name: Cartoon
Definition: A design or study drawn of the full size, to serve as a model for transferring or copying; -- used in the making of mosaics, tapestries, fresco pantings and the like; as, the cartoons of Raphael.

Name: Cartridge
Definition: A complete charge for a firearm, contained in, or held together by, a case, capsule, or shell of metal, pasteboard, or other material.

Name: Case
Definition: A box, sheath, or covering; as, a case for holding goods; a case for spectacles; the case of a watch; the case (capsule) of a cartridge; a case (cover) for a book.

Name: Cash
Definition: A place where money is kept, or where it is deposited and paid out; a money box.

Name: Casino
Definition: A small country house.

Name: Cast
Definition: To send or drive by force; to throw; to fling; to hurl; to impel.

Name: Casting
Definition: The act of one who casts or throws, as in fishing.

Name: Castle
Definition: A fortified residence, especially that of a prince or nobleman; a fortress.

Name: Casual
Definition: Happening or coming to pass without design, and without being foreseen or expected; accidental; fortuitous; coming by chance.

Name: Catalog
Definition: Catalogue.

Name: Catalogue
Definition: A list or enumeration of names, or articles arranged methodically, often in alphabetical order; as, a catalogue of the students of a college, or of books, or of the stars.

Name: Catch
Definition: To lay hold on; to seize, especially with the hand; to grasp (anything) in motion, with the effect of holding; as, to catch a ball.

Name: Category
Definition: One of the highest classes to which the objects of knowledge or thought can be reduced, and by which they can be arranged in a system; an ultimate or undecomposable conception; a predicament.

Name: Cathedral
Definition: The principal church in a diocese, so called because in it the bishop has his official chair (Cathedra) or throne.

Name: Catholic
Definition: Universal or general; as, the catholic faith.

Name: Cattle
Definition: Quadrupeds of the Bovine family; sometimes, also, including all domestic quadrupeds, as sheep, goats, horses, mules, asses, and swine.

Name: Caught
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Catch.

Name: Cause
Definition: That which produces or effects a result; that from which anything proceeds, and without which it would not exist.

Name: Caution
Definition: A careful attention to the probable effects of an act, in order that failure or harm may be avoided; prudence in regard to danger; provident care; wariness.

Name: Cave
Definition: A hollow place in the earth, either natural or artificial; a subterraneous cavity; a cavern; a den.

Name: Cayman
Definition: The south America alligator. See Alligator.

Name: Cedar
Definition: The name of several evergreen trees. The wood is remarkable for its durability and fragrant odor.

Name: Ceiling
Definition: The inside lining of a room overhead; the under side of the floor above; the upper surface opposite to the floor.

Name: Celebrate
Definition: To extol or honor in a solemn manner; as, to celebrate the name of the Most High.

Name: Celebration
Definition: The act, process, or time of celebrating.

Name: Celebrity
Definition: Celebration; solemnization.

Name: Cell
Definition: A very small and close apartment, as in a prison or in a monastery or convent; the hut of a hermit.

Name: Cellular
Definition: Consisting of, or containing, cells; of or pertaining to a cell or cells.

Name: Celtic
Definition: Of or pertaining to the Celts; as, Celtic people, tribes, literature, tongue.

Name: Cement
Definition: Any substance used for making bodies adhere to each other, as mortar, glue, etc.

Name: Cemetery
Definition: A place or ground set apart for the burial of the dead; a graveyard; a churchyard; a necropolis.

Name: Census
Definition: A numbering of the people, and valuation of their estate, for the purpose of imposing taxes, etc.; -- usually made once in five years.

Name: Cent
Definition: A hundred; as, ten per cent, the proportion of ten parts in a hundred.

Name: Center
Definition: A point equally distant from the extremities of a line, figure, or body, or from all parts of the circumference of a circle; the middle point or place.

Name: Centre
Definition: To be placed in a center; to be central.

Name: Center
Definition: Alt. of Centre

Name: Centre
Definition: To place or fix in the center or on a central point.

Name: Central
Definition: Relating to the center; situated in or near the center or middle; containing the center; of or pertaining to the parts near the center; equidistant or equally accessible from certain points.

Name: Century
Definition: A hundred; as, a century of sonnets; an aggregate of a hundred things.

Name: Ceramic
Definition: Of or pertaining to pottery; relating to the art of making earthenware; as, ceramic products; ceramic ornaments for ceilings.

Name: Ceremony
Definition: Ar act or series of acts, often of a symbolical character, prescribed by law, custom, or authority, in the conduct of important matters, as in the performance of religious duties, the transaction of affairs of state, and the celebration of notable events; as, the ceremony of crowning a sovereign; the ceremonies observed in consecrating a church; marriage and baptismal ceremonies.

Name: Certain
Definition: Assured in mind; having no doubts; free from suspicions concerning.

Name: Certainly
Definition: Without doubt or question; unquestionably.

Name: Certificate
Definition: A written testimony to the truth of any fact; as, certificate of good behavior.

Name: Certification
Definition: The act of certifying.

Name: Chain
Definition: A series of links or rings, usually of metal, connected, or fitted into one another, used for various purposes, as of support, of restraint, of ornament, of the exertion and transmission of mechanical power, etc.

Name: Chair
Definition: A movable single seat with a back.

Name: Chairman
Definition: The presiding officer of a committee, or of a public or private meeting, or of any organized body.

Name: Challenge
Definition: An invitation to engage in a contest or controversy of any kind; a defiance; specifically, a summons to fight a duel; also, the letter or message conveying the summons.

Name: Chamber
Definition: A retired room, esp. an upper room used for sleeping; a bedroom; as, the house had four chambers.

Name: Champagne
Definition: A light wine, of several kinds, originally made in the province of Champagne, in France.

Name: Champion
Definition: To furnish with a champion; to attend or defend as champion; to support or maintain; to protect.

Name: Championship
Definition: State of being champion; leadership; supremacy.

Name: Chance
Definition: A supposed material or psychical agent or mode of activity other than a force, law, or purpose; fortune; fate; -- in this sense often personified.

Name: Chancellor
Definition: A judicial court of chancery, which in England and in the United States is distinctively a court with equity jurisdiction.

Name: Change
Definition: To alter; to make different; to cause to pass from one state to another; as, to change the position, character, or appearance of a thing; to change the countenance.

Name: Channel
Definition: The hollow bed where a stream of water runs or may run.

Name: Chaos
Definition: An empty, immeasurable space; a yawning chasm.

Name: Chapel
Definition: A subordinate place of worship

Name: Chapter
Definition: A division of a book or treatise; as, Genesis has fifty chapters.

Name: Char
Definition: Alt. of Charr

Name: Char
Definition: A car; a chariot.

Name: Char
Definition: Alt. of Chare

Name: Char
Definition: To reduce to coal or carbon by exposure to heat; to reduce to charcoal; to burn to a cinder.

Name: Character
Definition: A distinctive mark; a letter, figure, or symbol.

Name: Characteristic
Definition: Pertaining to, or serving to constitute, the character; showing the character, or distinctive qualities or traits, of a person or thing; peculiar; distinctive.

Name: Characterization
Definition: The act or process of characterizing.

Name: Charge
Definition: To lay on or impose, as a load, tax, or burden; to load; to fill.

Name: Charger
Definition: One who, or that which charges.

Name: Charitable
Definition: Full of love and good will; benevolent; kind.

Name: Charity
Definition: Love; universal benevolence; good will.

Name: Charlotte
Definition: A kind of pie or pudding made by lining a dish with slices of bread, and filling it with bread soaked in milk, and baked.

Name: Charm
Definition: A melody; a song.

Name: Charming
Definition: Pleasing the mind or senses in a high degree; delighting; fascinating; attractive.

Name: Chart
Definition: A sheet of paper, pasteboard, or the like, on which information is exhibited, esp. when the information is arranged in tabular form; as, an historical chart.

Name: Charter
Definition: A written evidence in due form of things done or granted, contracts made, etc., between man and man; a deed, or conveyance.

Name: Chase
Definition: To pursue for the purpose of killing or taking, as an enemy, or game; to hunt.

Name: Chassis
Definition: A traversing base frame, or movable railway, along which the carriage of a barbette or casemate gun moves backward and forward. [See Gun carriage.]

Name: Chat
Definition: To talk in a light and familiar manner; to converse without form or ceremony; to gossip.

Name: Cheap
Definition: A bargain; a purchase; cheapness.

Name: Cheat
Definition: An act of deception or fraud; that which is the means of fraud or deception; a fraud; a trick; imposition; imposture.

Name: Check
Definition: A word of warning denoting that the king is in danger; such a menace of a player's king by an adversary's move as would, if it were any other piece, expose it to immediate capture. A king so menaced is said to be in check, and must be made safe at the next move.

Name: Cheese
Definition: The curd of milk, coagulated usually with rennet, separated from the whey, and pressed into a solid mass in a hoop or mold.

Name: Chef
Definition: A chief of head person.

Name: Chemical
Definition: Pertaining to chemistry; characterized or produced by the forces and operations of chemistry; employed in the processes of chemistry; as, chemical changes; chemical combinations.

Name: Chemistry
Definition: That branch of science which treats of the composition of substances, and of the changes which they undergo in consequence of alterations in the constitution of the molecules, which depend upon variations of the number, kind, or mode of arrangement, of the constituent atoms. These atoms are not assumed to be indivisible, but merely the finest grade of subdivision hitherto attained. Chemistry deals with the changes in the composition and constitution of molecules. See Atom, Molecule.

Name: Cherry
Definition: A tree or shrub of the genus Prunus (Which also includes the plum) bearing a fleshy drupe with a bony stone;

Name: Chess
Definition: A game played on a chessboard, by two persons, with two differently colored sets of men, sixteen in each set. Each player has a king, a queen, two bishops, two knights, two castles or rooks, and eight pawns.

Name: Chest
Definition: A large box of wood, or other material, having, like a trunk, a lid, but no covering of skin, leather, or cloth.

Name: Chick
Definition: To sprout, as seed in the ground; to vegetate.

Name: Chicken
Definition: A young bird or fowl, esp. a young barnyard fowl.

Name: Chief
Definition: The head or leader of any body of men; a commander, as of an army; a head man, as of a tribe, clan, or family; a person in authority who directs the work of others; the principal actor or agent.

Name: Child
Definition: A son or a daughter; a male or female descendant, in the first degree; the immediate progeny of human parents; -- in law, legitimate offspring. Used also of animals and plants.

Name: Childhood
Definition: The state of being a child; the time in which persons are children; the condition or time from infancy to puberty.

Name: Children
Definition: pl. of Child.

Name: China
Definition: A country in Eastern Asia.

Name: Chinese
Definition: Of or pertaining to China; peculiar to China.

Name: Chip
Definition: To cut small pieces from; to diminish or reduce to shape, by cutting away a little at a time; to hew.

Name: Chips
Definition: A ship's carpenter.

Name: Chocolate
Definition: A paste or cake composed of the roasted seeds of the Theobroma Cacao ground and mixed with other ingredients, usually sugar, and cinnamon or vanilla.

Name: Choice
Definition: Act of choosing; the voluntary act of selecting or separating from two or more things that which is preferred; the determination of the mind in preferring one thing to another; election.

Name: Choir
Definition: A band or organized company of singers, especially in church service.

Name: Choose
Definition: To make choice of; to select; to take by way of preference from two or more objects offered; to elect; as, to choose the least of two evils.

Name: Chorus
Definition: A band of singers and dancers.

Name: Chose
Definition: A thing; personal property.

Name: Chosen
Definition: Selected from a number; picked out; choice.

Name: Christ
Definition: The Anointed; an appellation given to Jesus, the Savior.  It is synonymous with the Hebrew Messiah.

Name: Christian
Definition: One who believes, or professes or is assumed to believe, in Jesus Christ, and the truth as taught by Him; especially, one whose inward and outward life is conformed to the doctrines of Christ.

Name: Christianity
Definition: The religion of Christians; the system of doctrines and precepts taught by Christ.

Name: Christmas
Definition: An annual church festival (December 25) and in some States a legal holiday, in memory of the birth of Christ, often celebrated by a particular church service, and also by special gifts, greetings, and hospitality.

Name: Chrome
Definition: Same as Chromium.

Name: Chronic
Definition: Relating to time; according to time.

Name: Chronicle
Definition: An historical register or account of facts or events disposed in the order of time.

Name: Chubby
Definition: Like a chub; plump, short, and thick.

Name: Chuck
Definition: To make a noise resembling that of a hen when she calls her chickens; to cluck.

Name: Church
Definition: A building set apart for Christian worship.

Name: Cigarette
Definition: A little cigar; a little fine tobacco rolled in paper for smoking.

Name: Circle
Definition: A plane figure, bounded by a single curve line called its circumference, every part of which is equally distant from a point within it, called the center.

Name: Circuit
Definition: The act of moving or revolving around, or as in a circle or orbit; a revolution; as, the periodical circuit of the earth round the sun.

Name: Circular
Definition: In the form of, or bounded by, a circle; round.

Name: Circulation
Definition: The act of moving in a circle, or in a course which brings the moving body to the place where its motion began.

Name: Circus
Definition: A level oblong space surrounded on three sides by seats of wood, earth, or stone, rising in tiers one above another, and divided lengthwise through the middle by a barrier around which the track or course was laid out. It was used for chariot races, games, and public shows.

Name: Cisco
Definition: The Lake herring (Coregonus Artedi), valuable food fish of the Great Lakes of North America. The name is also applied to C. Hoyi, a related species of Lake Michigan.

Name: Citation
Definition: An official summons or notice given to a person to appear; the paper containing such summons or notice.

Name: Cite
Definition: To call upon officially or authoritatively to appear, as before a court; to summon.

Name: Citizen
Definition: One who enjoys the freedom and privileges of a city; a freeman of a city, as distinguished from a foreigner, or one not entitled to its franchises.

Name: Citizenship
Definition: The state of being a citizen; the status of a citizen.

Name: City
Definition: A large town.

Name: Civic
Definition: Relating to, or derived from, a city or citizen; relating to man as a member of society, or to civil affairs.

Name: Civil
Definition: Pertaining to a city or state, or to a citizen in his relations to his fellow citizens or to the state; within the city or state.

Name: Civilian
Definition: One skilled in the civil law.

Name: Civilization
Definition: The act of civilizing, or the state of being civilized; national culture; refinement.

Name: Claim
Definition: To ask for, or seek to obtain, by virtue of authority, right, or supposed right; to challenge as a right; to demand as due.

Name: Clan
Definition: A tribe or collection of families, united under a chieftain, regarded as having the same common ancestor, and bearing the same surname; as, the clan of Macdonald.

Name: Clarity
Definition: Clearness; brightness; splendor.

Name: Class
Definition: A group of individuals ranked together as possessing common characteristics; as, the different classes of society; the educated class; the lower classes.

Name: Classic
Definition: Alt. of Classical

Name: Classical
Definition: Of or relating to the first class or rank, especially in literature or art.

Name: Classic
Definition: A work of acknowledged excellence and authority, or its author; -- originally used of Greek and Latin works or authors, but now applied to authors and works of a like character in any language.

Name: Classification
Definition: The act of forming into a class or classes; a distibution into groups, as classes, orders, families, etc., according to some common relations or affinities.

Name: Clause
Definition: A separate portion of a written paper, paragraph, or sentence; an article, stipulation, or proviso, in a legal document.

Name: Clay
Definition: A soft earth, which is plastic, or may be molded with the hands, consisting of hydrous silicate of aluminium. It is the result of the wearing down and decomposition, in part, of rocks containing aluminous minerals, as granite. Lime, magnesia, oxide of iron, and other ingredients, are often present as impurities.

Name: Clean
Definition: Free from dirt or filth; as, clean clothes.

Name: Cleaner
Definition: One who, or that which, cleans.

Name: Cleaning
Definition: The act of making clean.

Name: Clear
Definition: Free from opaqueness; transparent; bright; light; luminous; unclouded.

Name: Clearance
Definition: The act of clearing; as, to make a thorough clearance.

Name: Clearing
Definition: The act or process of making clear.

Name: Clearly
Definition: In a clear manner.

Name: Clerk
Definition: A clergyman or ecclesiastic.

Name: Click
Definition: To make a slight, sharp noise (or a succession of such noises), as by gentle striking; to tick.

Name: Client
Definition: A citizen who put himself under the protection of a man of distinction and influence, who was called his patron.

Name: Cliff
Definition: A high, steep rock; a precipice.

Name: Climate
Definition: One of thirty regions or zones, parallel to the equator, into which the surface of the earth from the equator to the pole was divided, according to the successive increase of the length of the midsummer day.

Name: Climb
Definition: To ascend or mount laboriously, esp. by use of the hands and feet.

Name: Climbing
Definition: p. pr. & vb. n. of Climb.

Name: Clinic
Definition: One confined to the bed by sickness.

Name: Clinical
Definition: Alt. of Clinic

Name: Clinic
Definition: Of or pertaining to a bed, especially, a sick bed.

Name: Clip
Definition: To embrace, hence; to encompass.

Name: Clock
Definition: A machine for measuring time, indicating the hour and other divisions by means of hands moving on a dial plate. Its works are moved by a weight or a spring, and it is often so constructed as to tell the hour by the stroke of a hammer on a bell. It is not adapted, like the watch, to be carried on the person.

Name: Close
Definition: To stop, or fill up, as an opening; to shut; as, to close the eyes; to close a door.

Name: Closely
Definition: In a close manner.

Name: Closer
Definition: One who, or that which, closes; specifically, a boot closer. See under Boot.

Name: Closure
Definition: The act of shutting; a closing; as, the closure of a chink.

Name: Cloth
Definition: A fabric made of fibrous material (or sometimes of wire, as in wire cloth); commonly, a woven fabric of cotton, woolen, or linen, adapted to be made into garments; specifically, woolen fabrics, as distinguished from all others.

Name: Clothes
Definition: Covering for the human body; dress; vestments; vesture; -- a general term for whatever covering is worn, or is made to be worn, for decency or comfort.

Name: Clothing
Definition: Garments in general; clothes; dress; raiment; covering.

Name: Cloud
Definition: A collection of visible vapor, or watery particles, suspended in the upper atmosphere.

Name: Cloudy
Definition: Overcast or obscured with clouds; clouded; as, a cloudy sky.

Name: Club
Definition: A heavy staff of wood, usually tapering, and wielded the hand; a weapon; a cudgel.

Name: Cluster
Definition: A number of things of the same kind growing together; a bunch.

Name: Coach
Definition: A large, closed, four-wheeled carriage, having doors in the sides, and generally a front and back seat inside, each for two persons, and an elevated outside seat in front for the driver.

Name: Coal
Definition: A thoroughly charred, and extinguished or still ignited, fragment from wood or other combustible substance; charcoal.

Name: Coalition
Definition: The act of coalescing; union into a body or mass, as of separate bodies or parts; as, a coalition of atoms.

Name: Coast
Definition: The side of a thing.

Name: Coastal
Definition: Of or pertaining to a coast.

Name: Coat
Definition: An outer garment fitting the upper part of the body; especially, such a garment worn by men.

Name: Coating
Definition: A coat or covering; a layer of any substance, as a cover or protection; as, the coating of a retort or vial.

Name: Cocktail
Definition: A beverage made of brandy, whisky, or gin, iced, flavored, and sweetened.

Name: Code
Definition: A body of law, sanctioned by legislation, in which the rules of law to be specifically applied by the courts are set forth in systematic form; a compilation of laws by public authority; a digest.

Name: Coffee
Definition: The

Name: Cognitive
Definition: Knowing, or apprehending by the understanding; as, cognitive power.

Name: Coin
Definition: A quoin; a corner or external angle; a wedge. See Coigne, and Quoin.

Name: Cold
Definition: Deprived of heat, or having a low temperature; not warm or hot; gelid; frigid.

Name: Cole
Definition: A plant of the Brassica or Cabbage genus; esp. that form of B. oleracea called rape and coleseed.

Name: Colin
Definition: The American quail or bobwhite. The name is also applied to other related species. See Bobwhite.

Name: Collaboration
Definition: The act of working together; united labor.

Name: Collapse
Definition: To fall together suddenly, as the sides of a hollow vessel; to close by falling or shrinking together; to have the sides or parts of (a thing) fall in together, or be crushed in together; as, a flue in the boiler of a steam engine sometimes collapses.

Name: Collar
Definition: Something worn round the neck, whether for use, ornament, restraint, or identification; as, the collar of a coat; a lady's collar; the collar of a dog.

Name: Colleague
Definition: A partner or associate in some civil or ecclesiastical office or employment. It is never used of partners in trade or manufactures.

Name: Collect
Definition: To gather into one body or place; to assemble or bring together; to obtain by gathering.

Name: Collected
Definition: Gathered together.

Name: Collectible
Definition: Capable of being collected.

Name: Collection
Definition: The act or process of collecting or of gathering; as, the collection of specimens.

Name: Collective
Definition: Formed by gathering or collecting; gathered into a mass, sum, or body; congregated or aggregated; as, the collective body of a nation.

Name: Collector
Definition: One who collects things which are separate; esp., one who makes a business or practice of collecting works of art, objects in natural history, etc.; as, a collector of coins.

Name: College
Definition: A collection, body, or society of persons engaged in common pursuits, or having common duties and interests, and sometimes, by charter, peculiar rights and privileges; as, a college of heralds; a college of electors; a college of bishops.

Name: Cologne
Definition: A perfumed liquid, composed of alcohol and certain aromatic oils, used in the toilet; -- called also cologne water and eau de cologne.

Name: Colon
Definition: That part of the large intestines which extends from the caecum to the rectum. [See Illust of Digestion.]

Name: Colonial
Definition: Of or pertaining to a colony; as, colonial rights, traffic, wars.

Name: Colony
Definition: A company of people transplanted from their mother country to a remote province or country, and remaining subject to the jurisdiction of the parent state; as, the British colonies in America.

Name: Color
Definition: A property depending on the relations of light to the eye, by which individual and specific differences in the hues and tints of objects are apprehended in vision; as, gay colors; sad colors, etc.

Name: Colored
Definition: Having color; tinged; dyed; painted; stained.

Name: Columbia
Definition: America; the United States; -- a poetical appellation given in honor of Columbus, the discoverer.

Name: Column
Definition: A kind of pillar; a cylindrical or polygonal support for a roof, ceiling, statue, etc., somewhat ornamented, and usually composed of base, shaft, and capital. See Order.

Name: Combat
Definition: To struggle or contend, as with an opposing force; to fight.

Name: Combination
Definition: The act or process of combining or uniting persons and things.

Name: Combine
Definition: To unite or join; to link closely together; to bring into harmonious union; to cause or unite so as to form a homogeneous substance, as by chemical union.

Name: Combined
Definition: United closely; confederated; chemically united.

Name: Come
Definition: To move hitherward; to draw near; to approach the speaker, or some place or person indicated; -- opposed to go.

Name: Comedy
Definition: A dramatic composition, or representation of a bright and amusing character, based upon the foibles of individuals, the manners of society, or the ludicrous events or accidents of life; a play in which mirth predominates and the termination of the plot is happy; -- opposed to tragedy.

Name: Comes
Definition: The answer to the theme (dux) in a fugue.

Name: Comfort
Definition: To make strong; to invigorate; to fortify; to corroborate.

Name: Comfortable
Definition: Strong; vigorous; valiant.

Name: Comic
Definition: Relating to comedy, as distinct from tragedy.

Name: Coming
Definition: Approaching; of the future, especially the near future; the next; as, the coming week or year; the coming exhibition.

Name: Command
Definition: To order with authority; to lay injunction upon; to direct; to bid; to charge.

Name: Commander
Definition: A chief; one who has supreme authority; a leader; the chief officer of an army, or of any division of it.

Name: Comment
Definition: To make remarks, observations, or criticism; especially, to write notes on the works of an author, with a view to illustrate his meaning, or to explain particular passages; to write annotations; -- often followed by on or upon.

Name: Commentary
Definition: A series of comments or annotations; esp., a book of explanations or expositions on the whole or a part of the Scriptures or of some other work.

Name: Commerce
Definition: The exchange or buying and selling of commodities; esp. the exchange of merchandise, on a large scale, between different places or communities; extended trade or traffic.

Name: Commercial
Definition: Of or pertaining to commerce; carrying on or occupied with commerce or trade; mercantile; as, commercial advantages; commercial relations.

Name: Commission
Definition: The act of committing, doing, or performing; the act of perpetrating.

Name: Commissioner
Definition: A person who has a commission or warrant to perform some office, or execute some business, for the government, corporation, or person employing him; as, a commissioner to take affidavits or to adjust claims.

Name: Commit
Definition: To give in trust; to put into charge or keeping; to intrust; to consign; -- used with to, unto.

Name: Commitment
Definition: The act of committing, or putting in charge, keeping, or trust; consignment; esp., the act of committing to prison.

Name: Committee
Definition: One or more persons elected or appointed, to whom any matter or business is referred, either by a legislative body, or by a court, or by any collective body of men acting together.

Name: Commodity
Definition: Convenience; accommodation; profit; benefit; advantage; interest; commodiousness.

Name: Common
Definition: Belonging or relating equally, or similarly, to more than one; as, you and I have a common interest in the property.

Name: Commonly
Definition: Usually; generally; ordinarily; frequently; for the most part; as, confirmed habits commonly continue through life.

Name: Commons
Definition: The mass of the people, as distinguished from the titled classes or nobility; the commonalty; the common people.

Name: Commonwealth
Definition: A state; a body politic consisting of a certain number of men, united, by compact or tacit agreement, under one form of government and system of laws.

Name: Communicate
Definition: To share in common; to participate in.

Name: Communication
Definition: The act or fact of communicating; as, communication of smallpox; communication of a secret.

Name: Communist
Definition: An advocate for the theory or practice of communism.

Name: Community
Definition: Common possession or enjoyment; participation; as, a community of goods.

Name: Compact
Definition: Joined or held together; leagued; confederated.

Name: Companion
Definition: One who accompanies or is in company with another for a longer or shorter period, either from choice or casually; one who is much in the company of, or is associated with, another or others; an associate; a comrade; a consort; a partner.

Name: Company
Definition: The state of being a companion or companions; the act of accompanying; fellowship; companionship; society; friendly intercourse.

Name: Comparable
Definition: Capable of being compared; worthy of comparison.

Name: Comparative
Definition: Of or pertaining to comparison.

Name: Compare
Definition: To examine the character or qualities of, as of two or more persons or things, for the purpose of discovering their resemblances or differences; to bring into comparison; to regard with discriminating attention.

Name: Comparison
Definition: The act of comparing; an examination of two or more objects with the view of discovering the resemblances or differences; relative estimate.

Name: Compatibility
Definition: The quality or power of being compatible or congruous; congruity; as, a compatibility of tempers; a compatibility of properties.

Name: Compatible
Definition: Capable of existing in harmony; congruous; suitable; not repugnant; -- usually followed by with.

Name: Compensation
Definition: The act or principle of compensating.

Name: Compete
Definition: To contend emulously; to seek or strive for the same thing, position, or reward for which another is striving; to contend in rivalry, as for a prize or in business; as, tradesmen compete with one another.

Name: Competent
Definition: Answering to all requirements; adequate; sufficient; suitable; capable; legally qualified; fit.

Name: Competition
Definition: The act of seeking, or endeavoring to gain, what another is endeavoring to gain at the same time; common strife for the same objects; strife for superiority; emulous contest; rivalry, as for approbation, for a prize, or as where two or more persons are engaged in the same business and each seeking patronage; -- followed by for before the object sought, and with before the person or thing competed with.

Name: Competitive
Definition: Of or pertaining to competition; producing competition; competitory; as, a competitive examination.

Name: Compilation
Definition: The act or process of compiling or gathering together from various sources.

Name: Compile
Definition: To put together; to construct; to build.

Name: Compiler
Definition: One who compiles; esp., one who makes books by compilation.

Name: Complaint
Definition: Expression of grief, regret, pain, censure, or resentment; lamentation; murmuring; accusation; fault-finding.

Name: Complement
Definition: That which fills up or completes; the quantity or number required to fill a thing or make it complete.

Name: Complete
Definition: Filled up; with no part or element lacking; free from deficiency; entire; perfect; consummate.

Name: Completely
Definition: In a complete manner; fully.

Name: Completion
Definition: The act or process of making complete; the getting through to the end; as, the completion of an undertaking, an education, a service.

Name: Complex
Definition: Composed of two or more parts; composite; not simple; as, a complex being; a complex idea.

Name: Complexity
Definition: The state of being complex; intricacy; entanglement.

Name: Compliance
Definition: The act of complying; a yielding; as to a desire, demand, or proposal; concession; submission.

Name: Compliant
Definition: Yielding; bending; pliant; submissive.

Name: Complimentary
Definition: Expressive of regard or praise; of the nature of, or containing, a compliment; as, a complimentary remark; a complimentary ticket.

Name: Comply
Definition: To yield assent; to accord; agree, or acquiesce; to adapt one's self; to consent or conform; -- usually followed by with.

Name: Component
Definition: Serving, or helping, to form; composing; constituting; constituent.

Name: Composed
Definition: Free from agitation; calm; sedate; quiet; tranquil; self-possessed.

Name: Composer
Definition: One who composes; an author. Specifically, an author of a piece of music.

Name: Composite
Definition: Made up of distinct parts or elements; compounded; as, a composite language.

Name: Composition
Definition: The act or art of composing, or forming a whole or integral, by placing together and uniting different things, parts, or ingredients.

Name: Compound
Definition: In the East Indies, an inclosure containing a house, outbuildings, etc.

Name: Comprehensive
Definition: Including much; comprising many things; having a wide scope or a full view.

Name: Compressed
Definition: Pressed together; compacted; reduced in volume by pressure.

Name: Compression
Definition: The act of compressing, or state of being compressed.

Name: Compromise
Definition: A mutual agreement to refer matters in dispute to the decision of arbitrators.

Name: Computation
Definition: The act or process of computing; calculation; reckoning.

Name: Compute
Definition: To determine calculation; to reckon; to count.

Name: Computer
Definition: One who computes.

Name: Concentrate
Definition: To bring to, or direct toward, a common center; to unite more closely; to gather into one body, mass, or force; to fix; as, to concentrate rays of light into a focus; to concentrate the attention.

Name: Concentration
Definition: The act or process of concentrating; the process of becoming concentrated, or the state of being concentrated; concentration.

Name: Concept
Definition: An abstract general conception; a notion; a universal.

Name: Conceptual
Definition: Pertaining to conception.

Name: Concern
Definition: To relate or belong to; to have reference to or connection with; to affect the interest of; to be of importance to.

Name: Concerned
Definition: Disturbed; troubled; solicitous; as, to be much concerned for the safety of a friend.

Name: Concerning
Definition: Pertaining to; regarding; having relation to; respecting; as regards.

Name: Concert
Definition: To plan together; to settle or adjust by conference, agreement, or consultation.

Name: Conclude
Definition: To shut up; to inclose.

Name: Conclusion
Definition: The last part of anything; close; termination; end.

Name: Concord
Definition: A state of agreement; harmony; union.

Name: Concrete
Definition: United in growth; hence, formed by coalition of separate particles into one mass; united in a solid form.

Name: Condition
Definition: Mode or state of being; state or situation with regard to external circumstances or influences, or to physical or mental integrity, health, strength, etc.; predicament; rank; position, estate.

Name: Conditional
Definition: Containing, implying, or depending on, a condition or conditions; not absolute; made or granted on certain terms; as, a conditional promise.

Name: Conduct
Definition: The act or method of conducting; guidance; management.

Name: Conference
Definition: The act of comparing two or more things together; comparison.

Name: Confidence
Definition: The act of confiding, trusting, or putting faith in; trust; reliance; belief; -- formerly followed by of, now commonly by in.

Name: Confidential
Definition: Enjoying, or treated with, confidence; trusted in; trustworthy; as, a confidential servant or clerk.

Name: Configuration
Definition: Form, as depending on the relative disposition of the parts of a thing' shape; figure.

Name: Configure
Definition: To arrange or dispose in a certain form, figure, or shape.

Name: Confirm
Definition: To make firm or firmer; to add strength to; to establish; as, health is confirmed by exercise.

Name: Confirmation
Definition: The act of confirming or strengthening; the act of establishing, ratifying, or sanctioning; as, the confirmation of an appointment.

Name: Conflict
Definition: A striking or dashing together; violent collision; as, a conflict of elements or waves.

Name: Confusion
Definition: The state of being mixed or blended so as to produce indistinctness or error; indistinct combination; disorder; tumult.

Name: Congo
Definition: Black tea, of higher grade (finer leaf and less dusty) than the present bohea. See Tea.

Name: Congress
Definition: A meeting of individuals, whether friendly or hostile; an encounter.

Name: Congressional
Definition: Of or pertaining to a congress, especially, to the Congress of the United States; as, congressional debates.

Name: Conjunction
Definition: The act of conjoining, or the state of being conjoined, united, or associated; union; association; league.

Name: Connect
Definition: To join, or fasten together, as by something intervening; to associate; to combine; to unite or link together; to establish a bond or relation between.

Name: Connection
Definition: The act of connecting, or the state of being connected; junction; union; alliance; relationship.

Name: Connector
Definition: One who, or that which, connects

Name: Conscious
Definition: Possessing the faculty of knowing one's own thoughts or mental operations.

Name: Consciousness
Definition: The state of being conscious; knowledge of one's own existence, condition, sensations, mental operations, acts, etc.

Name: Consecutive
Definition: Following in a train; succeeding one another in a regular order; successive; uninterrupted in course or succession; with no interval or break; as, fifty consecutive years.

Name: Consensus
Definition: Agreement; accord; consent.

Name: Consent
Definition: To agree in opinion or sentiment; to be of the same mind; to accord; to concur.

Name: Consequence
Definition: That which follows something on which it depends; that which is produced by a cause; a result.

Name: Consequently
Definition: By consequence; by natural or logical sequence or connection.

Name: Conservation
Definition: The act of preserving, guarding, or protecting; the keeping (of a thing) in a safe or entire state; preservation.

Name: Conservative
Definition: Having power to preserve in a safe of entire state, or from loss, waste, or injury; preservative.

Name: Consider
Definition: To fix the mind on, with a view to a careful examination; to think on with care; to ponder; to study; to meditate on.

Name: Considerable
Definition: Worthy of consideration, borne in mind, or attended to.

Name: Consideration
Definition: The act or process of considering; continuous careful thought; examination; contemplation; deliberation; attention.

Name: Consist
Definition: To stand firm; to be in a fixed or permanent state, as a body composed of parts in union or connection; to hold together; to be; to exist; to subsist; to be supported and maintained.

Name: Consistency
Definition: The condition of standing or adhering together, or being fixed in union, as the parts of a body; existence; firmness; coherence; solidity.

Name: Consistent
Definition: Possessing firmness or fixedness; firm; hard; solid.

Name: Consistently
Definition: In a consistent manner.

Name: Console
Definition: To cheer in distress or depression; to alleviate the grief and raise the spirits of; to relieve; to comfort; to soothe.

Name: Consolidated
Definition: Made solid, hard, or compact; united; joined; solidified.

Name: Consolidation
Definition: The act or process of consolidating, making firm, or uniting; the state of being consolidated; solidification; combination.

Name: Conspiracy
Definition: A combination of men for an evil purpose; an agreement, between two or more persons, to commit a crime in concert, as treason; a plot.

Name: Constant
Definition: Firm; solid; fixed; immovable; -- opposed to fluid.

Name: Constantly
Definition: With constancy; steadily; continually; perseveringly; without cessation; uniformly.

Name: Constitute
Definition: To cause to stand; to establish; to enact.

Name: Constitution
Definition: The act or process of constituting; the action of enacting, establishing, or appointing; enactment; establishment; formation.

Name: Constitutional
Definition: Belonging to, or inherent in, the constitution, or in the structure of body or mind; as, a constitutional infirmity; constitutional ardor or dullness.

Name: Constraint
Definition: The act of constraining, or the state of being constrained; that which compels to, or restrains from, action; compulsion; restraint; necessity.

Name: Construct
Definition: To put together the constituent parts of (something) in their proper place and order; to build; to form; to make; as, to construct an edifice.

Name: Construction
Definition: The process or art of constructing; the act of building; erection; the act of devising and forming; fabrication; composition.

Name: Consult
Definition: To seek the opinion or advice of another; to take counsel; to deliberate together; to confer.

Name: Consultation
Definition: The act of consulting or conferring; deliberation of two or more persons on some matter, with a view to a decision.

Name: Consulting
Definition: That consults.

Name: Consumer
Definition: One who, or that which, consumes; as, the consumer of food.

Name: Consumption
Definition: The act or process of consuming by use, waste, etc.; decay; destruction.

Name: Contact
Definition: A close union or junction of bodies; a touching or meeting.

Name: Contain
Definition: To hold within fixed limits; to comprise; to include; to inclose; to hold.

Name: Container
Definition: One who, or that which, contains.

Name: Contamination
Definition: The act or process of contaminating; pollution; defilement; taint; also, that which contaminates.

Name: Contemporary
Definition: Living, occuring, or existing, at the same time; done in, or belonging to, the same times; contemporaneous.

Name: Content
Definition: Contained within limits; hence, having the desires limited by that which one has; not disposed to repine or grumble; satisfied; contented; at rest.

Name: Contest
Definition: To make a subject of dispute, contention, litigation, or emulation; to contend for; to call in question; to controvert; to oppose; to dispute.

Name: Context
Definition: Knit or woven together; close; firm.

Name: Continent
Definition: Serving to restrain or limit; restraining; opposing.

Name: Continental
Definition: Of or pertaining to a continent.

Name: Continually
Definition: Without cessation; unceasingly; continuously; as, the current flows continually.

Name: Continue
Definition: To remain in a given place or condition; to remain in connection with; to abide; to stay.

Name: Continued
Definition: Having extension of time, space, order of events, exertion of energy, etc.; extended; protracted; uninterrupted; also, resumed after interruption; extending through a succession of issues, session, etc.; as, a continued story.

Name: Continuity
Definition: the state of being continuous; uninterupted connection or succession; close union of parts; cohesion; as, the continuity of fibers.

Name: Continuous
Definition: Without break, cessation, or interruption; without intervening space or time; uninterrupted; unbroken; continual; unceasing; constant; continued; protracted; extended; as, a continuous line of railroad; a continuous current of electricity.

Name: Continuously
Definition: In a continuous maner; without interruption.

Name: Contract
Definition: To draw together or nearer; to reduce to a less compass; to shorten, narrow, or lessen; as, to contract one's sphere of action.

Name: Contractor
Definition: One who contracts; one of the parties to a bargain; one who covenants to do anything for another; specifically, one who contracts to perform work on a rather large scale, at a certain price or rate, as in building houses or making a railroad.

Name: Contrary
Definition: Opposite; in an opposite direction; in opposition; adverse; as, contrary winds.

Name: Contrast
Definition: To stand in opposition; to exhibit difference, unlikeness, or opposition of qualities.

Name: Contribute
Definition: To give or grant i common with others; to give to a common stock or for a common purpose; to furnish or suply in part; to give (money or other aid) for a specified object; as, to contribute food or fuel for the poor.

Name: Contribution
Definition: The act of contributing.

Name: Control
Definition: A duplicate book, register, or account, kept to correct or check another account or register; a counter register.

Name: Controller
Definition: One who, or that which, controls or restraines; one who has power or authority to regulate or control; one who governs.

Name: Controversial
Definition: Relating to, or consisting of, controversy; disputatious; polemical; as, controversial divinity.

Name: Controversy
Definition: Contention; dispute; debate; discussion; agitation of contrary opinions.

Name: Convenience
Definition: Alt. of Conveniency

Name: Convenient
Definition: Fit or adapted; suitable; proper; becoming; appropriate.

Name: Convention
Definition: The act of coming together; the state of being together; union; coalition.

Name: Conventional
Definition: Formed by agreement or compact; stipulated.

Name: Convergence
Definition: Alt. of Convergency

Name: Conversation
Definition: General course of conduct; behavior.

Name: Conversion
Definition: The act of turning or changing from one state or condition to another, or the state of being changed; transmutation; change.

Name: Convert
Definition: To cause to turn; to turn.

Name: Converter
Definition: One who converts; one who makes converts.

Name: Convertible
Definition: Capable of being converted; susceptible of change; transmutable; transformable.

Name: Conviction
Definition: The act of convicting; the act of proving, finding, or adjudging, guilty of an offense.

Name: Cook
Definition: To make the noise of the cuckoo.

Name: Cookbook
Definition: A book of directions and receipts for cooking; a cookery book.

Name: Cool
Definition: Moderately cold; between warm and cold; lacking in warmth; producing or promoting coolness.

Name: Cooler
Definition: That which cools, or abates heat or excitement.

Name: Cooling
Definition: Adapted to cool and refresh; allaying heat.

Name: Cooper
Definition: One who makes barrels, hogsheads, casks, etc.

Name: Cooperation
Definition: The act of cooperating, or of operating together to one end; joint operation; concurrent effort or labor.

Name: Cooperative
Definition: Operating jointly to the same end.

Name: Cooper
Definition: Work done by a cooper in making or repairing barrels, casks, etc.; the business of a cooper.

Name: Coordinate
Definition: Equal in rank or order; not subordinate.

Name: Coordination
Definition: The act of coordinating; the act of putting in the same order, class, rank, dignity, etc.; as, the coordination of the executive, the legislative, and the judicial authority in forming a government; the act of regulating and combining so as to produce harmonious results; harmonious adjustment; as, a coordination of functions.

Name: Cope
Definition: A covering for the head.

Name: Copper
Definition: A common metal of a reddish color, both ductile and malleable, and very tenacious. It is one of the best conductors of heat and electricity. Symbol Cu. Atomic weight 63.3. It is one of the most useful metals in itself, and also in its alloys, brass and bronze.

Name: Copy
Definition: An abundance or plenty of anything.

Name: Copying
Definition: From Copy, v.

Name: Copyright
Definition: The right of an author or his assignee, under statute, to print and publish his literary or artistic work, exclusively of all other persons. This right may be had in maps, charts, engravings, plays, and musical compositions, as well as in books.

Name: Coral
Definition: The hard parts or skeleton of various Anthozoa, and of a few Hydrozoa. Similar structures are also formed by some Bryozoa.

Name: Cord
Definition: A string, or small rope, composed of several strands twisted together.

Name: Core
Definition: A body of individuals; an assemblage.

Name: Cork
Definition: The outer layer of the bark of the cork tree (Quercus Suber), of which stoppers for bottles and casks are made. See Cutose.

Name: Corn
Definition: A thickening of the epidermis at some point, esp. on the toes, by friction or pressure. It is usually painful and troublesome.

Name: Corner
Definition: The point where two converging lines meet; an angle, either external or internal.

Name: Corporate
Definition: Formed into a body by legal enactment; united in an association, and endowed by law with the rights and liabilities of an individual; incorporated; as, a corporate town.

Name: Corporation
Definition: A body politic or corporate, formed and authorized by law to act as a single person, and endowed by law with the capacity of succession; a society having the capacity of transacting business as an individual.

Name: Corps
Definition: The human body, whether living or dead.

Name: Corpus
Definition: A body, living or dead; the corporeal substance of a thing.

Name: Correct
Definition: Set right, or made straight; hence, conformable to truth, rectitude, or propriety, or to a just standard; not faulty or imperfect; free from error; as, correct behavior; correct views.

Name: Correction
Definition: The act of correcting, or making that right which was wrong; change for the better; amendment; rectification, as of an erroneous statement.

Name: Correctly
Definition: In a correct manner; exactly; acurately; without fault or error.

Name: Correlation
Definition: Reciprocal relation; corresponding similarity or parallelism of relation or law; capacity of being converted into, or of giving place to, one another, under certain conditions; as, the correlation of forces, or of zymotic diseases.

Name: Correspondence
Definition: Friendly intercourse; reciprocal exchange of civilities; especially, intercourse between persons by means of letters.

Name: Corresponding
Definition: Answering; conformable; agreeing; suiting; as, corresponding numbers.

Name: Corruption
Definition: The act of corrupting or making putrid, or state of being corrupt or putrid; decomposition or disorganization, in the process of putrefaction; putrefaction; deterioration.

Name: Cosmetic
Definition: Alt. of Cosmetical

Name: Cosmetic
Definition: Any external application intended to beautify and improve the complexion.

Name: Cost
Definition: A rib; a side; a region or coast.

Name: Costa
Definition: A rib of an animal or a human being.

Name: Costume
Definition: Dress in general; esp., the distinctive style of dress of a people, class, or period.

Name: Cottage
Definition: A small house; a cot; a hut.

Name: Cotton
Definition: A soft, downy substance, resembling fine wool, consisting of the unicellular twisted hairs which grow on the seeds of the cotton plant. Long-staple cotton has a fiber sometimes almost two inches long; short-staple, from two thirds of an inch to an inch and a half.

Name: Could
Definition: Was, should be, or would be, able, capable, or susceptible. Used as an auxiliary, in the past tense or in the conditional present.

Name: Council
Definition: An assembly of men summoned or convened for consultation, deliberation, or advice; as, a council of physicians for consultation in a critical case.

Name: Counsel
Definition: Interchange of opinions; mutual advising; consultation.

Name: Count
Definition: To tell or name one by one, or by groups, for the purpose of ascertaining the whole number of units in a collection; to number; to enumerate; to compute; to reckon.

Name: Counter
Definition: A prefix meaning contrary, opposite, in opposition; as, counteract, counterbalance, countercheck. See Counter, adv. & a.

Name: Country
Definition: A tract of land; a region; the territory of an independent nation; (as distinguished from any other region, and with a personal pronoun) the region of one's birth, permanent residence, or citizenship.

Name: County
Definition: An earldom; the domain of a count or earl.

Name: Couple
Definition: That which joins or links two things together; a bond or tie; a coupler.

Name: Coupon
Definition: A certificate of interest due, printed at the bottom of transferable bonds (state, railroad, etc.), given for a term of years, designed to be cut off and presented for payment when the interest is due; an interest warrant.

Name: Courage
Definition: The heart; spirit; temper; disposition.

Name: Courier
Definition: A messenger sent with haste to convey letters or dispatches, usually on public business.

Name: Course
Definition: The act of moving from one point to another; progress; passage.

Name: Court
Definition: An inclosed space; a courtyard; an uncovered area shut in by the walls of a building, or by different building; also, a space opening from a street and nearly surrounded by houses; a blind alley.

Name: Courtesy
Definition: Politeness; civility; urbanity; courtliness.

Name: Cove
Definition: A retired nook; especially, a small, sheltered inlet, creek, or bay; a recess in the shore.

Name: Cover
Definition: To overspread the surface of (one thing) with another; as, to cover wood with paint or lacquer; to cover a table with a cloth.

Name: Covered
Definition: Under cover; screened; sheltered; not exposed; hidden.

Name: Covering
Definition: Anything which covers or conceals, as a roof, a screen, a wrapper, clothing, etc.

Name: Cowboy
Definition: A cattle herder; a drover; specifically, one of an adventurous class of herders and drovers on the plains of the Western and Southwestern United States.

Name: Crack
Definition: To break or burst, with or without entire separation of the parts; as, to crack glass; to crack nuts.

Name: Cradle
Definition: A bed or cot for a baby, oscillating on rockers or swinging on pivots; hence, the place of origin, or in which anything is nurtured or protected in the earlier period of existence; as, a cradle of crime; the cradle of liberty.

Name: Craft
Definition: Strength; might; secret power.

Name: Craps
Definition: A gambling game with dice.

Name: Crash
Definition: To break in pieces violently; to dash together with noise and violence.

Name: Crawford
Definition: A Crawford peach; a well-known freestone peach, with yellow flesh, first raised by Mr. William Crawford, of New Jersey.

Name: Crazy
Definition: Characterized by weakness or feebleness; decrepit; broken; falling to decay; shaky; unsafe.

Name: Cream
Definition: The rich, oily, and yellowish part of milk, which, when the milk stands unagitated, rises, and collects on the surface. It is the part of milk from which butter is obtained.

Name: Create
Definition: Created; composed; begotten.

Name: Creation
Definition: The act of creating or causing to exist. Specifically, the act of bringing the universe or this world into existence.

Name: Creative
Definition: Having the power to create; exerting the act of creation.

Name: Creature
Definition: Anything created; anything not self-existent; especially, any being created with life; an animal; a man.

Name: Credit
Definition: Reliance on the truth of something said or done; belief; faith; trust; confidence.

Name: Creek
Definition: A small inlet or bay, narrower and extending further into the land than a cove; a recess in the shore of the sea, or of a river.

Name: Crest
Definition: A tuft, or other excrescence or natural ornament, growing on an animal's head; the comb of a cock; the swelling on the head of a serpent; the lengthened feathers of the crown or nape of bird, etc.

Name: Crew
Definition: The Manx shearwater.

Name: Cricket
Definition: An orthopterous insect of the genus Gryllus, and allied genera. The males make chirping, musical notes by rubbing together the basal parts of the veins of the front wings.

Name: Crime
Definition: Any violation of law, either divine or human; an omission of a duty commanded, or the commission of an act forbidden by law.

Name: Criminal
Definition: Guilty of crime or sin.

Name: Crisis
Definition: The point of time when it is to be decided whether any affair or course of action must go on, or be modified or terminate; the decisive moment; the turning point.

Name: Criterion
Definition: A standard of judging; any approved or established rule or test, by which facts, principles opinions, and conduct are tried in forming a correct judgment respecting them.

Name: Critical
Definition: Qualified to criticise, or pass judgment upon, literary or artistic productions.

Name: Criticism
Definition: The rules and principles which regulate the practice of the critic; the art of judging with knowledge and propriety of the beauties and faults of a literary performance, or of a production in the fine arts; as, dramatic criticism.

Name: Crop
Definition: The pouchlike enlargement of the gullet of birds, serving as a receptacle for food; the craw.

Name: Cross
Definition: A gibbet, consisting of two pieces of timber placed transversely upon one another, in various forms, as a T, or +, with the horizontal piece below the upper end of the upright, or as an X. It was anciently used in the execution of criminals.

Name: Crossing
Definition: The act by which anything is crossed; as, the crossing of the ocean.

Name: Crowd
Definition: To push, to press, to shove.

Name: Crown
Definition: p. p. of Crow.

Name: Crucial
Definition: Having the form of a cross; appertaining to a cross; cruciform; intersecting; as, crucial ligaments; a crucial incision.

Name: Crude
Definition: In its natural state; not cooked or prepared by fire or heat; undressed; not altered, refined, or prepared for use by any artificial process; raw; as, crude flesh.

Name: Cruise
Definition: To sail back and forth on the ocean; to sail, as for the potection of commerce, in search of an enemy, for plunder, or for pleasure.

Name: Crystal
Definition: The regular form which a substance tends to assume in solidifying, through the inherent power of cohesive attraction. It is bounded by plane surfaces, symmetrically arranged, and each species of crystal has fixed axial ratios. See Crystallization.

Name: Cube
Definition: A regular solid body, with six equal square sides.

Name: Cubic
Definition: Alt. of Cubical

Name: Cubic
Definition: A curve of the third degree.

Name: Cuisine
Definition: The kitchen or cooking department.

Name: Cult
Definition: Attentive care; homage; worship.

Name: Cultural
Definition: Of or pertaining to culture.

Name: Culture
Definition: The act or practice of cultivating, or of preparing the earth for seed and raising crops by tillage; as, the culture of the soil.

Name: Cumulative
Definition: Composed of parts in a heap; forming a mass; aggregated.

Name: Cure
Definition: Care, heed, or attention.

Name: Curious
Definition: Difficult to please or satisfy; solicitous to be correct; careful; scrupulous; nice; exact.

Name: Currency
Definition: A continued or uninterrupted course or flow like that of a stream; as, the currency of time.

Name: Current
Definition: Running or moving rapidly.

Name: Currently
Definition: In a current manner; generally; commonly; as, it is currently believed.

Name: Curriculum
Definition: A race course; a place for running.

Name: Cursor
Definition: Any part of a mathematical instrument that moves or slides backward and forward upon another part.

Name: Curve
Definition: Bent without angles; crooked; curved; as, a curve line; a curve surface.

Name: Custody
Definition: A keeping or guarding; care, watch, inspection, for keeping, preservation, or security.

Name: Custom
Definition: Frequent repetition of the same act; way of acting common to many; ordinary manner; habitual practice; usage; method of doing or living.

Name: Customer
Definition: One who collect customs; a toll gatherer.

Name: Cute
Definition: Clever; sharp; shrewd; ingenious; cunning.

Name: Cutting
Definition: The act or process of making an incision, or of severing, felling, shaping, etc.

Name: Cycle
Definition: An imaginary circle or orbit in the heavens; one of the celestial spheres.

Name: Cycling
Definition: The act, art, or practice, of riding a cycle, esp. a bicycle or tricycle.

Name: Cylinder
Definition: A solid body which may be generated by the rotation of a parallelogram round one its sides; or a body of rollerlike form, of which the longitudinal section is oblong, and the cross section is circular.

Name: Cyprus
Definition: A thin, transparent stuff, the same as, or corresponding to, crape. It was either white or black, the latter being most common, and used for mourning.

Name: Czech
Definition: One of the Czechs.

Name: Daddy
Definition: Diminutive of Dad.

Name: Daily
Definition: Happening, or belonging to, each successive day; diurnal; as, daily labor; a daily bulletin.

Name: Dairy
Definition: The place, room, or house where milk is kept, and converted into butter or cheese.

Name: Daisy
Definition: A genus of low herbs (Bellis), belonging to the family Compositae. The common English and classical daisy is B. prennis, which has a yellow disk and white or pinkish rays.

Name: Dale
Definition: A low place between hills; a vale or valley.

Name: Damage
Definition: Injury or harm to person, property, or reputation; an inflicted loss of value; detriment; hurt; mischief.

Name: Dame
Definition: A mistress of a family, who is a lady; a woman in authority; especially, a lady.

Name: Dance
Definition: To move with measured steps, or to a musical accompaniment; to go through, either alone or in company with others, with a regulated succession of movements, (commonly) to the sound of music; to trip or leap rhythmically.

Name: Dancing
Definition: from Dance.

Name: Danger
Definition: Authority; jurisdiction; control.

Name: Dangerous
Definition: Attended or beset with danger; full of risk; perilous; hazardous; unsafe.

Name: Daniel
Definition: A Hebrew prophet distinguished for sagacity and ripeness of judgment in youth; hence, a sagacious and upright judge.

Name: Danish
Definition: Belonging to the Danes, or to their language or country.

Name: Dare
Definition: To have adequate or sufficient courage for any purpose; to be bold or venturesome; not to be afraid; to venture.

Name: Dark
Definition: Destitute, or partially destitute, of light; not receiving, reflecting, or radiating light; wholly or partially black, or of some deep shade of color; not light-colored; as, a dark room; a dark day; dark cloth; dark paint; a dark complexion.

Name: Darkness
Definition: The absence of light; blackness; obscurity; gloom.

Name: Dash
Definition: To throw with violence or haste; to cause to strike violently or hastily; -- often used with against.

Name: Date
Definition: The fruit of the date palm; also, the date palm itself.

Name: Daughter
Definition: The female offspring of the human species; a female child of any age; -- applied also to the lower animals.

Name: Dawn
Definition: To begin to grow light in the morning; to grow light; to break, or begin to appear; as, the day dawns; the morning dawns.

Name: Dead
Definition: Deprived of life; -- opposed to alive and living; reduced to that state of a being in which the organs of motion and life have irrevocably ceased to perform their functions; as, a dead tree; a dead man.

Name: Deadly
Definition: Capable of causing death; mortal; fatal; destructive; certain or likely to cause death; as, a deadly blow or wound.

Name: Deaf
Definition: Wanting the sense of hearing, either wholly or in part; unable to perceive sounds; hard of hearing; as, a deaf man.

Name: Deal
Definition: A part or portion; a share; hence, an indefinite quantity, degree, or extent, degree, or extent; as, a deal of time and trouble; a deal of cold.

Name: Dealer
Definition: One who deals; one who has to do, or has concern, with others; esp., a trader, a trafficker, a shopkeeper, a broker, or a merchant; as, a dealer in dry goods; a dealer in stocks; a retail dealer.

Name: Dealing
