Definition: The act of one who deals; distribution of anything, as of cards to the players; method of business; traffic; intercourse; transaction; as, to have dealings with a person.

Name: Dean
Definition: A dignitary or presiding officer in certain ecclesiastical and lay bodies; esp., an ecclesiastical dignitary, subordinate to a bishop.

Name: Dear
Definition: Bearing a high price; high-priced; costly; expensive.

Name: Death
Definition: The cessation of all vital phenomena without capability of resuscitation, either in animals or plants.

Name: Debate
Definition: To engage in combat for; to strive for.

Name: Debt
Definition: That which is due from one person to another, whether money, goods, or services; that which one person is bound to pay to another, or to perform for his benefit; thing owed; obligation; liability.

Name: Debut
Definition: A beginning or first attempt; hence, a first appearance before the public, as of an actor or public speaker.

Name: Decade
Definition: A group or division of ten; esp., a period of ten years; a decennium; as, a decade of years or days; a decade of soldiers; the second decade of Livy.

Name: December
Definition: The twelfth and last month of the year, containing thirty-one days. During this month occurs the winter solstice.

Name: Decent
Definition: Suitable in words, behavior, dress, or ceremony; becoming; fit; decorous; proper; seemly; as, decent conduct; decent language.

Name: Decide
Definition: To cut off; to separate.

Name: Decided
Definition: Free from ambiguity; unequivocal; unmistakable; unquestionable; clear; evident; as, a decided advantage.

Name: Decimal
Definition: Of or pertaining to decimals; numbered or proceeding by tens; having a tenfold increase or decrease, each unit being ten times the unit next smaller; as, decimal notation; a decimal coinage.

Name: Decision
Definition: Cutting off; division; detachment of a part.

Name: Deck
Definition: To cover; to overspread.

Name: Declaration
Definition: The act of declaring, or publicly announcing; explicit asserting; undisguised token of a ground or side taken on any subject; proclamation; exposition; as, the declaration of an opinion; a declaration of war, etc.

Name: Declare
Definition: To make clear; to free from obscurity.

Name: Decline
Definition: To bend, or lean downward; to take a downward direction; to bend over or hang down, as from weakness, weariness, despondency, etc.; to condescend.

Name: Declined
Definition: Declinate.

Name: Decorative
Definition: Suited to decorate or embellish; adorning.

Name: Decrease
Definition: To grow less, -- opposed to increase; to be diminished gradually, in size, degree, number, duration, etc., or in strength, quality, or excellence; as, they days decrease in length from June to December.

Name: Deep
Definition: Extending far below the surface; of great perpendicular dimension (measured from the surface downward, and distinguished from high, which is measured upward); far to the bottom; having a certain depth; as, a deep sea.

Name: Deeply
Definition: At or to a great depth; far below the surface; as, to sink deeply.

Name: Deer
Definition: Any animal; especially, a wild animal.

Name: Default
Definition: A failing or failure; omission of that which ought to be done; neglect to do what duty or law requires; as, this evil has happened through the governor's default.

Name: Defeat
Definition: To undo; to disfigure; to destroy.

Name: Defend
Definition: To ward or fend off; to drive back or away; to repel.

Name: Defendant
Definition: Serving, or suitable, for defense; defensive.

Name: Defense
Definition: Alt. of Defence

Name: Defence
Definition: The act of defending, or the state of being defended; protection, as from violence or danger.

Name: Defense
Definition: To furnish with defenses; to fortify.

Name: Defensive
Definition: Serving to defend or protect; proper for defense; opposed to offensive; as, defensive armor.

Name: Deficit
Definition: Deficiency in amount or quality; a falling short; lack; as, a deficit in taxes, revenue, etc.

Name: Define
Definition: To fix the bounds of; to bring to a termination; to end.

Name: Definitely
Definition: In a definite manner; with precision; precisely; determinately.

Name: Definition
Definition: The act of defining; determination of the limits; as, a telescope accurate in definition.

Name: Degree
Definition: A step, stair, or staircase.

Name: Delaware
Definition: An American grape, with compact bunches of small, amber-colored berries, sweet and of a good flavor.

Name: Delay
Definition: A putting off or deferring; procrastination; lingering inactivity; stop; detention; hindrance.

Name: Delegation
Definition: The act of delegating, or investing with authority to act for another; the appointment of a delegate or delegates.

Name: Delete
Definition: To blot out; to erase; to expunge; to dele; to omit.

Name: Delicious
Definition: Affording exquisite pleasure; delightful; most sweet or grateful to the senses, especially to the taste; charming.

Name: Delight
Definition: A high degree of gratification of mind; a high- wrought state of pleasurable feeling; lively pleasure; extreme satisfaction; joy.

Name: Deliver
Definition: To set free from restraint; to set at liberty; to release; to liberate, as from control; to give up; to free; to save; to rescue from evil actual or feared; -- often with from or out of; as, to deliver one from captivity, or from fear of death.

Name: Delivery
Definition: The act of delivering from restraint; rescue; release; liberation; as, the delivery of a captive from his dungeon.

Name: Dell
Definition: A small, retired valley; a ravine.

Name: Delta
Definition: A tract of land shaped like the letter delta (/), especially when the land is alluvial and inclosed between two or more mouths of a river; as, the delta of the Ganges, of the Nile, or of the Mississippi.

Name: Demand
Definition: To ask or call for with authority; to claim or seek from, as by authority or right; to claim, as something due; to call for urgently or peremptorily; as, to demand a debt; to demand obedience.

Name: Democracy
Definition: Government by the people; a form of government in which the supreme power is retained and directly exercised by the people.

Name: Democrat
Definition: One who is an adherent or advocate of democracy, or government by the people.

Name: Democratic
Definition: Pertaining to democracy; favoring democracy, or constructed upon the principle of government by the people.

Name: Demonstrate
Definition: To point out; to show; to exhibit; to make evident.

Name: Demonstration
Definition: The act of demonstrating; an exhibition; proof; especially, proof beyond the possibility of doubt; indubitable evidence, to the senses or reason.

Name: Denial
Definition: The act of gainsaying, refusing, or disowning; negation; -- the contrary of affirmation.

Name: Dense
Definition: Having the constituent parts massed or crowded together; close; compact; thick; containing much matter in a small space; heavy; opaque; as, a dense crowd; a dense forest; a dense fog.

Name: Density
Definition: The quality of being dense, close, or thick; compactness; -- opposed to rarity.

Name: Dental
Definition: Of or pertaining to the teeth or to dentistry; as, dental surgery.

Name: Deny
Definition: To declare not to be true; to gainsay; to contradict; -- opposed to affirm, allow, or admit.

Name: Department
Definition: Act of departing; departure.

Name: Departmental
Definition: Pertaining to a department or division.

Name: Departure
Definition: Division; separation; putting away.

Name: Depend
Definition: To hang down; to be sustained by being fastened or attached to something above.

Name: Dependence
Definition: The act or state of depending; state of being dependent; a hanging down or from; suspension from a support.

Name: Dependent
Definition: Hanging down; as, a dependent bough or leaf.

Name: Deployment
Definition: The act of deploying; a spreading out of a body of men in order to extend their front.

Name: Deposit
Definition: To lay down; to place; to put; to let fall or throw down (as sediment); as, a crocodile deposits her eggs in the sand; the waters deposited a rich alluvium.

Name: Depot
Definition: A place of deposit for the storing of goods; a warehouse; a storehouse.

Name: Depression
Definition: The act of depressing.

Name: Depth
Definition: The quality of being deep; deepness; perpendicular measurement downward from the surface, or horizontal measurement backward from the front; as, the depth of a river; the depth of a body of troops.

Name: Deputy
Definition: One appointed as the substitute of another, and empowered to act for him, in his name or his behalf; a substitute in office; a lieutenant; a representative; a delegate; a vicegerent; as, the deputy of a prince, of a sheriff, of a township, etc.

Name: Derby
Definition: A race for three-old horses, run annually at Epsom (near London), for the Derby stakes. It was instituted by the 12th Earl of Derby, in 1780.

Name: Descending
Definition: Of or pertaining to descent; moving downwards.

Name: Describe
Definition: To represent by drawing; to draw a plan of; to delineate; to trace or mark out; as, to describe a circle by the compasses; a torch waved about the head in such a way as to describe a circle.

Name: Description
Definition: The act of describing; a delineation by marks or signs.

Name: Desert
Definition: That which is deserved; the reward or the punishment justly due; claim to recompense, usually in a good sense; right to reward; merit.

Name: Deserve
Definition: To earn by service; to be worthy of (something due, either good or evil); to merit; to be entitled to; as, the laborer deserves his wages; a work of value deserves praise.

Name: Design
Definition: To draw preliminary outline or main features of; to sketch for a pattern or model; to delineate; to trace out; to draw.

Name: Designation
Definition: The act of designating; a pointing out or showing; indication.

Name: Designer
Definition: One who designs, marks out, or plans; a contriver.

Name: Designing
Definition: Intriguing; artful; scheming; as, a designing man.

Name: Desirable
Definition: Worthy of desire or longing; fitted to excite desire or a wish to possess; pleasing; agreeable.

Name: Desire
Definition: To long for; to wish for earnestly; to covet.

Name: Desk
Definition: A table, frame, or case, usually with sloping top, but often with flat top, for the use writers and readers. It often has a drawer or repository underneath.

Name: Desperate
Definition: Without hope; given to despair; hopeless.

Name: Despite
Definition: Malice; malignity; spite; malicious anger; contemptuous hate.

Name: Destination
Definition: The act of destining or appointing.

Name: Destiny
Definition: That to which any person or thing is destined; predetermined state; condition foreordained by the Divine or by human will; fate; lot; doom.

Name: Destroy
Definition: To unbuild; to pull or tear down; to separate virulently into its constituent parts; to break up the structure and organic existence of; to demolish.

Name: Destruction
Definition: The act of destroying; a tearing down; a bringing to naught; subversion; demolition; ruin; slaying; devastation.

Name: Detail
Definition: A minute portion; one of the small parts; a particular; an item; -- used chiefly in the plural; as, the details of a scheme or transaction.

Name: Detect
Definition: Detected.

Name: Detection
Definition: The act of detecting; the laying open what was concealed or hidden; discovery; as, the detection of a thief; the detection of fraud, forgery, or a plot.

Name: Detective
Definition: Fitted for, or skilled in, detecting; employed in detecting crime or criminals; as, a detective officer.

Name: Detector
Definition: One who, or that which, detects; a detecter.

Name: Determination
Definition: The act of determining, or the state of being determined.

Name: Determine
Definition: To fix the boundaries of; to mark off and separate.

Name: Determined
Definition: Decided; resolute.

Name: Develop
Definition: To free from that which infolds or envelops; to unfold; to lay open by degrees or in detail; to make visible or known; to disclose; to produce or give forth; as, to develop theories; a motor that develops 100 horse power.

Name: Developer
Definition: One who, or that which, develops.

Name: Development
Definition: The act of developing or disclosing that which is unknown; a gradual unfolding process by which anything is developed, as a plan or method, or an image upon a photographic plate; gradual advancement or growth through a series of progressive changes; also, the result of developing, or a developed state.

Name: Developmental
Definition: Pertaining to, or characteristic of, the process of development; as, the developmental power of a germ.

Name: Deviant
Definition: Deviating.

Name: Deviation
Definition: The act of deviating; a wandering from the way; variation from the common way, from an established rule, etc.; departure, as from the right course or the path of duty.

Name: Device
Definition: That which is devised, or formed by design; a contrivance; an invention; a project; a scheme; often, a scheme to deceive; a stratagem; an artifice.

Name: Devil
Definition: The Evil One; Satan, represented as the tempter and spiritual of mankind.

Name: Devon
Definition: One of a breed of hardy cattle originating in the country of Devon, England. Those of pure blood have a deep red color. The small, longhorned variety, called North Devons, is distinguished by the superiority of its working oxen.

Name: Devoted
Definition: Consecrated to a purpose; strongly attached; zealous; devout; as, a devoted admirer.

Name: Diabetes
Definition: A disease which is attended with a persistent, excessive discharge of urine. Most frequently the urine is not only increased in quantity, but contains saccharine matter, in which case the disease is generally fatal.

Name: Diagnosis
Definition: The art or act of recognizing the presence of disease from its signs or symptoms, and deciding as to its character; also, the decision arrived at.

Name: Diagnostic
Definition: Pertaining to, or furnishing, a diagnosis; indicating the nature of a disease.

Name: Diagram
Definition: A figure or drawing made to illustrate a statement, or facilitate a demonstration; a plan.

Name: Dial
Definition: An instrument, formerly much used for showing the time of day from the shadow of a style or gnomon on a graduated arc or surface; esp., a sundial; but there are lunar and astral dials. The style or gnomon is usually parallel to the earth's axis, but the dial plate may be either horizontal or vertical.

Name: Dialogue
Definition: A conversation between two or more persons; particularly, a formal conservation in theatrical performances or in scholastic exercises.

Name: Diameter
Definition: Any right line passing through the center of a figure or body, as a circle, conic section, sphere, cube, etc., and terminated by the opposite boundaries; a straight line which bisects a system of parallel chords drawn in a curve.

Name: Diamond
Definition: A precious stone or gem excelling in brilliancy and beautiful play of prismatic colors, and remarkable for extreme hardness.

Name: Diana
Definition: The daughter of Jupiter and Latona; a virgin goddess who presided over hunting, chastity, and marriage; -- identified with the Greek goddess Artemis.

Name: Diary
Definition: A register of daily events or transactions; a daily record; a journal; a blank book dated for the record of daily memoranda; as, a diary of the weather; a physician's diary.

Name: Dice
Definition: Small cubes used in gaming or in determining by chance; also, the game played with dice. See Die, n.

Name: Dictionary
Definition: A book containing the words of a language, arranged alphabetically, with explanations of their meanings; a lexicon; a vocabulary; a wordbook.

Name: Diet
Definition: Course of living or nourishment; what is eaten and drunk habitually; food; victuals; fare.

Name: Dietary
Definition: Pertaining to diet, or to the rules of diet.

Name: Differ
Definition: To be or stand apart; to disagree; to be unlike; to be distinguished; -- with from.

Name: Difference
Definition: The act of differing; the state or measure of being different or unlike; distinction; dissimilarity; unlikeness; variation; as, a difference of quality in paper; a difference in degrees of heat, or of light; what is the difference between the innocent and the guilty?

Name: Different
Definition: Distinct; separate; not the same; other.

Name: Differential
Definition: Relating to or indicating a difference; creating a difference; discriminating; special; as, differential characteristics; differential duties; a differential rate.

Name: Differently
Definition: In a different manner; variously.

Name: Difficult
Definition: Hard to do or to make; beset with difficulty; attended with labor, trouble, or pains; not easy; arduous.

Name: Difficulty
Definition: The state of being difficult, or hard to do; hardness; arduousness; -- opposed to easiness or facility; as, the difficulty of a task or enterprise; a work of difficulty.

Name: Digest
Definition: To distribute or arrange methodically; to work over and classify; to reduce to portions for ready use or application; as, to digest the laws, etc.

Name: Digit
Definition: One of the terminal divisions of a limb appendage; a finger or toe.

Name: Digital
Definition: Of or performance to the fingers, or to digits; done with the fingers; as, digital compression; digital examination.

Name: Dimension
Definition: Measure in a single line, as length, breadth, height, thickness, or circumference; extension; measurement; -- usually, in the plural, measure in length and breadth, or in length, breadth, and thickness; extent; size; as, the dimensions of a room, or of a ship; the dimensions of a farm, of a kingdom.

Name: Dimensional
Definition: Pertaining to dimension.

Name: Dining
Definition: from Dine, a.

Name: Dinner
Definition: The principal meal of the day, eaten by most people about midday, but by many (especially in cities) at a later hour.

Name: Diploma
Definition: A letter or writing, usually under seal, conferring some privilege, honor, or power; a document bearing record of a degree conferred by a literary society or educational institution.

Name: Direct
Definition: Straight; not crooked, oblique, or circuitous; leading by the short or shortest way to a point or end; as, a direct line; direct means.

Name: Direction
Definition: The act of directing, of aiming, regulating, guiding, or ordering; guidance; management; superintendence; administration; as, the direction o/ public affairs or of a bank.

Name: Directive
Definition: Having power to direct; tending to direct, guide, or govern; showing the way.

Name: Directly
Definition: In a direct manner; in a straight line or course.

Name: Director
Definition: One who, or that which, directs; one who regulates, guides, or orders; a manager or superintendent.

Name: Directory
Definition: Containing directions; enjoining; instructing; directorial.

Name: Dirt
Definition: Any foul of filthy substance, as excrement, mud, dust, etc.; whatever, adhering to anything, renders it foul or unclean; earth; as, a wagonload of dirt.

Name: Dirty
Definition: Defiled with dirt; foul; nasty; filthy; not clean or pure; serving to defile; as, dirty hands; dirty water; a dirty white.

Name: Disability
Definition: State of being disabled; deprivation or want of ability; absence of competent physical, intellectual, or moral power, means, fitness, and the like.

Name: Disable
Definition: Lacking ability; unable.

Name: Disagree
Definition: To fail to accord; not to agree; to lack harmony; to differ; to be unlike; to be at variance.

Name: Disappointed
Definition: Defeated of expectation or hope; balked; as, a disappointed person or hope.

Name: Disaster
Definition: An unpropitious or baleful aspect of a planet or star; malevolent influence of a heavenly body; hence, an ill portent.

Name: Disc
Definition: A flat round plate

Name: Discharge
Definition: To relieve of a charge, load, or burden; to empty of a load or cargo; to unburden; to unload; as, to discharge a vessel.

Name: Disciplinary
Definition: Pertaining to discipline; intended for discipline; corrective; belonging to a course of training.

Name: Discipline
Definition: The treatment suited to a disciple or learner; education; development of the faculties by instruction and exercise; training, whether physical, mental, or moral.

Name: Disclaimer
Definition: One who disclaims, disowns, or renounces.

Name: Disclose
Definition: To unclose; to open; -- applied esp. to eggs in the sense of to hatch.

Name: Disclosure
Definition: The act of disclosing, uncovering, or revealing; bringing to light; exposure.

Name: Discount
Definition: To deduct from an account, debt, charge, and the like; to make an abatement of; as, merchants sometimes discount five or six per cent for prompt payment of bills.

Name: Discover
Definition: To uncover.

Name: Discovery
Definition: The action of discovering; exposure to view; laying open; showing; as, the discovery of a plot.

Name: Discrete
Definition: Separate; distinct; disjunct.

Name: Discretion
Definition: Disjunction; separation.

Name: Discrimination
Definition: The act of discriminating, distinguishing, or noting and marking differences.

Name: Discuss
Definition: To break to pieces; to shatter.

Name: Discussion
Definition: The act or process of discussing by breaking up, or dispersing, as a tumor, or the like.

Name: Disease
Definition: Lack of ease; uneasiness; trouble; vexation; disquiet.

Name: Dish
Definition: A vessel, as a platter, a plate, a bowl, used for serving up food at the table.

Name: Disk
Definition: A discus; a quoit.

Name: Disorder
Definition: Want of order or regular disposition; lack of arrangement; confusion; disarray; as, the troops were thrown into disorder; the papers are in disorder.

Name: Dispatch
Definition: To dispose of speedily, as business; to execute quickly; to make a speedy end of; to finish; to perform.

Name: Display
Definition: To unfold; to spread wide; to expand; to stretch out; to spread.

Name: Displayed
Definition: Unfolded; expanded; exhibited conspicuously or ostentatiously.

Name: Disposal
Definition: The act of disposing, or disposing of, anything; arrangement; orderly distribution; a putting in order; as, the disposal of the troops in two lines.

Name: Disposition
Definition: The act of disposing, arranging, ordering, regulating, or transferring; application; disposal; as, the disposition of a man's property by will.

Name: Dispute
Definition: To contend in argument; to argue against something maintained, upheld, or claimed, by another; to discuss; to reason; to debate; to altercate; to wrangle.

Name: Distance
Definition: The space between two objects; the length of a line, especially the shortest line joining two points or things that are separate; measure of separation in place.

Name: Distant
Definition: Separated; having an intervening space; at a distance; away.

Name: Distinct
Definition: Distinguished; having the difference marked; separated by a visible sign; marked out; specified.

Name: Distinction
Definition: A marking off by visible signs; separation into parts; division.

Name: Distinguished
Definition: Marked; special.

Name: Distribute
Definition: To divide among several or many; to deal out; to apportion; to allot.

Name: Distribution
Definition: The act of distributing or dispensing; the act of dividing or apportioning among several or many; apportionment; as, the distribution of an estate among heirs or children.

Name: District
Definition: Rigorous; stringent; harsh.

Name: Dive
Definition: To plunge into water head foremost; to thrust the body under, or deeply into, water or other fluid.

Name: Diverse
Definition: Different; unlike; dissimilar; distinct; separate.

Name: Diversity
Definition: A state of difference; dissimilitude; unlikeness.

Name: Divide
Definition: To part asunder (a whole); to sever into two or more parts or pieces; to sunder; to separate into parts.

Name: Divided
Definition: Parted; disunited; distributed.

Name: Dividend
Definition: A sum of money to be divided and distributed; the share of a sum divided that falls to each individual; a distribute sum, share, or percentage; -- applied to the profits as appropriated among shareholders, and to assets as apportioned among creditors; as, the dividend of a bank, a railway corporation, or a bankrupt estate.

Name: Divine
Definition: Of or belonging to God; as, divine perfections; the divine will.

Name: Diving
Definition: That dives or is used or diving.

Name: Division
Definition: The act or process of diving anything into parts, or the state of being so divided; separation.

Name: Divorce
Definition: A legal dissolution of the marriage contract by a court or other body having competent authority. This is properly a divorce, and called, technically, divorce a vinculo matrimonii.

Name: Dock
Definition: A genus of plants (Rumex), some species of which are well-known weeds which have a long taproot and are difficult of extermination.

Name: Doctor
Definition: A teacher; one skilled in a profession, or branch of knowledge learned man.

Name: Doctrine
Definition: Teaching; instruction.

Name: Document
Definition: That which is taught or authoritatively set forth; precept; instruction; dogma.

Name: Documentary
Definition: Pertaining to written evidence; contained or certified in writing.

Name: Dodge
Definition: To start suddenly aside, as to avoid a blow or a missile; to shift place by a sudden start.

Name: Does
Definition: The 3d pers. sing. pres. of Do.

Name: Doing
Definition: Anything done; a deed; an action good or bad; hence, in the plural, conduct; behavior. See Do.

Name: Doll
Definition: A child's puppet; a toy baby for a little girl.

Name: Dollar
Definition: A silver coin of the United States containing 371.25 grains of silver and 41.25 grains of alloy, that is, having a total weight of 412.5 grains.

Name: Domain
Definition: Dominion; empire; authority.

Name: Dome
Definition: A building; a house; an edifice; -- used chiefly in poetry.

Name: Domestic
Definition: Of or pertaining to one's house or home, or one's household or family; relating to home life; as, domestic concerns, life, duties, cares, happiness, worship, servants.

Name: Dominant
Definition: Ruling; governing; prevailing; controlling; predominant; as, the dominant party, church, spirit, power.

Name: Dominican
Definition: Of or pertaining to St. Dominic (Dominic de Guzman), or to the religions communities named from him.

Name: Donate
Definition: To give; to bestow; to present; as, to donate fifty thousand dollars to a college.

Name: Donation
Definition: The act of giving or bestowing; a grant.

Name: Done
Definition: p. p. from Do, and formerly the infinitive.

Name: Donna
Definition: A lady; madam; mistress; -- the title given a lady in Italy.

Name: Donor
Definition: One who gives or bestows; one who confers anything gratuitously; a benefactor.

Name: Doom
Definition: Judgment; judicial sentence; penal decree; condemnation.

Name: Door
Definition: An opening in the wall of a house or of an apartment, by which to go in and out; an entrance way.

Name: Dose
Definition: The quantity of medicine given, or prescribed to be taken, at one time.

Name: Double
Definition: Twofold; multiplied by two; increased by its equivalent; made twice as large or as much, etc.

Name: Doubt
Definition: To waver in opinion or judgment; to be in uncertainty as to belief respecting anything; to hesitate in belief; to be undecided as to the truth of the negative or the affirmative proposition; to b e undetermined.

Name: Down
Definition: Fine, soft, hairy outgrowth from the skin or surface of animals or plants, not matted and fleecy like wool

Name: Dozen
Definition: A collection of twelve objects; a tale or set of twelve; with or without of before the substantive which follows.

Name: Draft
Definition: Pertaining to, or used for, drawing or pulling (as vehicles, loads, etc.). Same as Draught.

Name: Drag
Definition: A confection; a comfit; a drug.

Name: Dragon
Definition: A fabulous animal, generally represented as a monstrous winged serpent or lizard, with a crested head and enormous claws, and regarded as very powerful and ferocious.

Name: Drain
Definition: To draw off by degrees; to cause to flow gradually out or off; hence, to cause the exhaustion of.

Name: Drainage
Definition: A draining; a gradual flowing off of any liquid; also, that which flows out of a drain.

Name: Drama
Definition: A composition, in prose or poetry, accommodated to action, and intended to exhibit a picture of human life, or to depict a series of grave or humorous actions of more than ordinary interest, tending toward some striking result. It is commonly designed to be spoken and represented by actors on the stage.

Name: Dramatic
Definition: Alt. of Dramatical

Name: Dramatically
Definition: In a dramatic manner; theatrically; vividly.

Name: Draw
Definition: To cause to move continuously by force applied in advance of the thing moved; to pull along; to haul; to drag; to cause to follow.

Name: Drawing
Definition: The act of pulling, or attracting.

Name: Dream
Definition: The thoughts, or series of thoughts, or imaginary transactions, which occupy the mind during sleep; a sleeping vision.

Name: Dress
Definition: To direct; to put right or straight; to regulate; to order.

Name: Dressing
Definition: Dress; raiment; especially, ornamental habiliment or attire.

Name: Drill
Definition: To pierce or bore with a drill, or a with a drill; to perforate; as, to drill a hole into a rock; to drill a piece of metal.

Name: Drilling
Definition: The act of piercing with a drill.

Name: Drink
Definition: To swallow anything liquid, for quenching thirst or other purpose; to imbibe; to receive or partake of, as if in satisfaction of thirst; as, to drink from a spring.

Name: Drinking
Definition: The act of one who drinks; the act of imbibing.

Name: Drive
Definition: To impel or urge onward by force in a direction away from one, or along before one; to push forward; to compel to move on; to communicate motion to; as, to drive cattle; to drive a nail; smoke drives persons from a room.

Name: Driver
Definition: One who, or that which, drives; the person or thing that urges or compels anything else to move onward.

Name: Driving
Definition: Having great force of impulse; as, a driving wind or storm.

Name: Drop
Definition: The quantity of fluid which falls in one small spherical mass; a liquid globule; a minim; hence, also, the smallest easily measured portion of a fluid; a small quantity; as, a drop of water.

Name: Drove
Definition: A collection of cattle driven, or cattle collected for driving; a number of animals, as oxen, sheep, or swine, driven in a body.

Name: Drug
Definition: To drudge; to toil laboriously.

Name: Drum
Definition: An instrument of percussion, consisting either of a hollow cylinder, over each end of which is stretched a piece of skin or vellum, to be beaten with a stick; or of a metallic hemisphere (kettledrum) with a single piece of skin to be so beaten; the common instrument for marking time in martial music; one of the pair of tympani in an orchestra, or cavalry band.

Name: Drunk
Definition: Intoxicated with, or as with, strong drink; inebriated; drunken; -- never used attributively, but always predicatively; as, the man is drunk (not, a drunk man).

Name: Dual
Definition: Expressing, or consisting of, the number two; belonging to two; as, the dual number of nouns, etc. , in Greek.

Name: Duck
Definition: A pet; a darling.

Name: Dude
Definition: A kind of dandy; especially, one characterized by an ultrafashionable style of dress and other affectations.

Name: Duke
Definition: A leader; a chief; a prince.

Name: Dumb
Definition: Destitute of the power of speech; unable; to utter articulate sounds; as, the dumb brutes.

Name: Dump
Definition: A thick, ill-shapen piece; a clumsy leaden counter used by boys in playing chuck farthing.

Name: Duplicate
Definition: Double; twofold.

Name: Durable
Definition: Able to endure or continue in a particular condition; lasting; not perishable or changeable; not wearing out or decaying soon; enduring; as, durable cloth; durable happiness.

Name: Duration
Definition: The state or quality of lasting; continuance in time; the portion of time during which anything exists.

Name: Durham
Definition: One or a breed of short-horned cattle, originating in the county of Durham, England. The Durham cattle are noted for their beef-producing quality.

Name: During
Definition: In the time of; as long as the action or existence of; as, during life; during the space of a year.

Name: Dust
Definition: Fine, dry particles of earth or other matter, so comminuted that they may be raised and wafted by the wind; that which is crumbled too minute portions; fine powder; as, clouds of dust; bone dust.

Name: Dutch
Definition: Pertaining to Holland, or to its inhabitants.

Name: Duty
Definition: That which is due; payment.

Name: Dying
Definition: In the act of dying; destined to death; mortal; perishable; as, dying bodies.

Name: Dynamic
Definition: Alt. of Dynamical

Name: Dynamics
Definition: That branch of mechanics which treats of the motion of bodies (kinematics) and the action of forces in producing or changing their motion (kinetics). Dynamics is held by some recent writers to include statics and not kinematics.

Name: Each
Definition: Every one of the two or more individuals composing a number of objects, considered separately from the rest. It is used either with or without a following noun; as, each of you or each one of you.

Name: Eagle
Definition: Any large, rapacious bird of the Falcon family, esp. of the genera Aquila and Haliaeetus. The eagle is remarkable for strength, size, graceful figure, keenness of vision, and extraordinary flight. The most noted species are the golden eagle (Aquila chrysaetus); the imperial eagle of Europe (A. mogilnik / imperialis); the American bald eagle (Haliaeetus leucocephalus); the European sea eagle (H. albicilla); and the great harpy eagle (Thrasaetus harpyia). The figure of the eagle, as the king of birds, is commonly used as an heraldic emblem, and also for standards and emblematic devices. See Bald eagle, Harpy, and Golden eagle.

Name: Earl
Definition: A nobleman of England ranking below a marquis, and above a viscount. The rank of an earl corresponds to that of a count (comte) in France, and graf in Germany. Hence the wife of an earl is still called countess. See Count.

Name: Early
Definition: Soon; in good season; seasonably; betimes; as, come early.

Name: Earn
Definition: To merit or deserve, as by labor or service; to do that which entitles one to (a reward, whether the reward is received or not).

Name: Earning
Definition: That which is earned; wages gained by work or services; money earned; -- used commonly in the plural.

Name: Earth
Definition: The globe or planet which we inhabit; the world, in distinction from the sun, moon, or stars. Also, this world as the dwelling place of mortals, in distinction from the dwelling place of spirits.

Name: Earthquake
Definition: A shaking, trembling, or concussion of the earth, due to subterranean causes, often accompanied by a rumbling noise. The wave of shock sometimes traverses half a hemisphere, destroying cities and many thousand lives; -- called also earthdin, earthquave, and earthshock.

Name: Ease
Definition: Satisfaction; pleasure; hence, accommodation; entertainment.

Name: Easily
Definition: With ease; without difficulty or much effort; as, this task may be easily performed; that event might have been easily foreseen.

Name: East
Definition: The point in the heavens where the sun is seen to rise at the equinox, or the corresponding point on the earth; that one of the four cardinal points of the compass which is in a direction at right angles to that of north and south, and which is toward the right hand of one who faces the north; the point directly opposite to the west.

Name: Easter
Definition: An annual church festival commemorating Christ's resurrection, and occurring on Sunday, the second day after Good Friday. It corresponds to the pasha or passover of the Jews, and most nations still give it this name under the various forms of pascha, pasque, paque, or pask.

Name: Eastern
Definition: Situated or dwelling in the east; oriental; as, an eastern gate; Eastern countries.

Name: Easy
Definition: At ease; free from pain, trouble, or constraint

Name: Eating
Definition: The act of tasking food; the act of consuming or corroding.

Name: Ebony
Definition: A hard, heavy, and durable wood, which admits of a fine polish or gloss. The usual color is black, but it also occurs red or green.

Name: Echo
Definition: A sound reflected from an opposing surface and repeated to the ear of a listener; repercussion of sound; repetition of a sound.

Name: Eclipse
Definition: An interception or obscuration of the light of the sun, moon, or other luminous body, by the intervention of some other body, either between it and the eye, or between the luminous body and that illuminated by it. A lunar eclipse is caused by the moon passing through the earth's shadow; a solar eclipse, by the moon coming between the sun and the observer. A satellite is eclipsed by entering the shadow of its primary. The obscuration of a planet or star by the moon or a planet, though of the nature of an eclipse, is called an occultation. The eclipse of a small portion of the sun by Mercury or Venus is called a transit of the planet.

Name: Economic
Definition: Alt. of Economical

Name: Economics
Definition: The science of household affairs, or of domestic management.

Name: Economy
Definition: The management of domestic affairs; the regulation and government of household matters; especially as they concern expense or disbursement; as, a careful economy.

Name: Eden
Definition: The garden where Adam and Eve first dwelt; hence, a delightful region or residence.

Name: Edge
Definition: The thin cutting side of the blade of an instrument; as, the edge of an ax, knife, sword, or scythe. Hence, figuratively, that which cuts as an edge does, or wounds deeply, etc.

Name: Edit
Definition: To superintend the publication of; to revise and prepare for publication; to select, correct, arrange, etc., the matter of, for publication; as, to edit a newspaper.

Name: Edition
Definition: A literary work edited and published, as by a certain editor or in a certain manner; as, a good edition of Chaucer; Chalmers' edition of Shakespeare.

Name: Editor
Definition: One who edits; esp., a person who prepares, superintends, revises, and corrects a book, magazine, or newspaper, etc., for publication.

Name: Editorial
Definition: Of or pertaining to an editor; written or sanctioned by an editor; as, editorial labors; editorial remarks.

Name: Educated
Definition: Formed or developed by education; as, an educated man.

Name: Education
Definition: The act or process of educating; the result of educating, as determined by the knowledge skill, or discipline of character, acquired; also, the act or process of training by a prescribed or customary course of study or discipline; as, an education for the bar or the pulpit; he has finished his education.

Name: Educational
Definition: Of or pertaining to education.

Name: Effect
Definition: Execution; performance; realization; operation; as, the law goes into effect in May.

Name: Effective
Definition: Having the power to produce an effect or effects; producing a decided or decisive effect; efficient; serviceable; operative; as, an effective force, remedy, speech; the effective men in a regiment.

Name: Effectively
Definition: With effect; powerfully; completely; thoroughly.

Name: Effectiveness
Definition: The quality of being effective.

Name: Efficiency
Definition: The quality of being efficient or producing an effect or effects; efficient power; effectual agency.

Name: Efficient
Definition: Causing effects; producing results; that makes the effect to be what it is; actively operative; not inactive, slack, or incapable; characterized by energetic and useful activity; as, an efficient officer, power.

Name: Efficiently
Definition: With effect; effectively.

Name: Effort
Definition: An exertion of strength or power, whether physical or mental, in performing an act or aiming at an object; more or less strenuous endeavor; struggle directed to the accomplishment of an object; as, an effort to scale a wall.

Name: Egyptian
Definition: Pertaining to Egypt, in Africa.

Name: Eight
Definition: An island in a river; an ait.

Name: Either
Definition: One of two; the one or the other; -- properly used of two things, but sometimes of a larger number, for any one.

Name: Elder
Definition: Older; more aged, or existing longer.

Name: Elderly
Definition: Somewhat old; advanced beyond middle age; bordering on old age; as, elderly people.

Name: Elect
Definition: Chosen; taken by preference from among two or more.

Name: Election
Definition: The act of choosing; choice; selection.

Name: Electric
Definition: Alt. of Electrical

Name: Electrical
Definition: Pertaining to electricity; consisting of, containing, derived from, or produced by, electricity; as, electric power or virtue; an electric jar; electric effects; an electric spark.

Name: Electric
Definition: A nonconductor of electricity, as amber, glass, resin, etc., employed to excite or accumulate electricity.

Name: Electricity
Definition: A power in nature, a manifestation of energy, exhibiting itself when in disturbed equilibrium or in activity by a circuit movement, the fact of direction in which involves polarity, or opposition of properties in opposite directions; also, by attraction for many substances, by a law involving attraction between surfaces of unlike polarity, and repulsion between those of like; by exhibiting accumulated polar tension when the circuit is broken; and by producing heat, light, concussion, and often chemical changes when the circuit passes between the poles or through any imperfectly conducting substance or space. It is generally brought into action by any disturbance of molecular equilibrium, whether from a chemical, physical, or mechanical, cause.

Name: Electro
Definition: An electrotype.

Name: Electron
Definition: Amber; also, the alloy of gold and silver, called electrum.

Name: Elegant
Definition: Very choice, and hence, pleasing to good taste; characterized by grace, propriety, and refinement, and the absence of every thing offensive; exciting admiration and approbation by symmetry, completeness, freedom from blemish, and the like; graceful; tasteful and highly attractive; as, elegant manners; elegant style of composition; an elegant speaker; an elegant structure.

Name: Element
Definition: One of the simplest or essential parts or principles of which anything consists, or upon which the constitution or fundamental powers of anything are based.

Name: Elementary
Definition: Having only one principle or constituent part; consisting of a single element; simple; uncompounded; as, an elementary substance.

Name: Elephant
Definition: A mammal of the order Proboscidia, of which two living species, Elephas Indicus and E. Africanus, and several fossil species, are known. They have a proboscis or trunk, and two large ivory tusks proceeding from the extremity of the upper jaw, and curving upwards. The molar teeth are large and have transverse folds. Elephants are the largest land animals now existing.

Name: Elevation
Definition: The act of raising from a lower place, condition, or quality to a higher; -- said of material things, persons, the mind, the voice, etc.; as, the elevation of grain; elevation to a throne; elevation of mind, thoughts, or character.

Name: Eleven
Definition: Ten and one added; as, eleven men.

Name: Eligibility
Definition: The quality of being eligible; eligibleness; as, the eligibility of a candidate; the eligibility of an offer of marriage.

Name: Eligible
Definition: That may be selected; proper or qualified to be chosen; legally qualified to be elected and to hold office.

Name: Eliminate
Definition: To put out of doors; to expel; to discharge; to release; to set at liberty.

Name: Elimination
Definition: The act of expelling or throwing off

Name: Elite
Definition: A choice or select body; the flower; as, the elite of society.

Name: Else
Definition: Other; one or something beside; as, Who else is coming? What else shall I give? Do you expect anything else?

Name: Elsewhere
Definition: In any other place; as, these trees are not to be found elsewhere.

Name: Embassy
Definition: The public function of an ambassador; the charge or business intrusted to an ambassador or to envoys; a public message to; foreign court concerning state affairs; hence, any solemn message.

Name: Emerald
Definition: A precious stone of a rich green color, a variety of beryl. See Beryl.

Name: Emergency
Definition: Sudden or unexpected appearance; an unforeseen occurrence; a sudden occasion.

Name: Emission
Definition: The act of sending or throwing out; the act of sending forth or putting into circulation; issue; as, the emission of light from the sun; the emission of heat from a fire; the emission of bank notes.

Name: Emotional
Definition: Pertaining to, or characterized by, emotion; excitable; easily moved; sensational; as, an emotional nature.

Name: Emperor
Definition: The sovereign or supreme monarch of an empire; -- a title of dignity superior to that of king; as, the emperor of Germany or of Austria; the emperor or Czar of Russia.

Name: Emphasis
Definition: A particular stress of utterance, or force of voice, given in reading and speaking to one or more words whose signification the speaker intends to impress specially upon his audience.

Name: Empire
Definition: Supreme power; sovereignty; sway; dominion.

Name: Empirical
Definition: Pertaining to, or founded upon, experiment or experience; depending upon the observation of phenomena; versed in experiments.

Name: Employ
Definition: To inclose; to infold.

Name: Employee
Definition: One employed by another.

Name: Employer
Definition: One who employs another; as, an employer of workmen.

Name: Employment
Definition: The act of employing or using; also, the state of being employed.

Name: Empty
Definition: Containing nothing; not holding or having anything within; void of contents or appropriate contents; not filled; -- said of an inclosure, as a box, room, house, etc.; as, an empty chest, room, purse, or pitcher; an empty stomach; empty shackles.

Name: Enable
Definition: To give strength or ability to; to make firm and strong.

Name: Enclosure
Definition: Inclosure. See Inclosure.

Name: Encounter
Definition: To come against face to face; to meet; to confront, either by chance, suddenly, or deliberately; especially, to meet in opposition or with hostile intent; to engage in conflict with; to oppose; to struggle with; as, to encounter a friend in traveling; two armies encounter each other; to encounter obstacles or difficulties, to encounter strong evidence of a truth.

Name: Encourage
Definition: To give courage to; to inspire with courage, spirit, or hope; to raise, or to increase, the confidence of; to animate; enhearten; to incite; to help forward; -- the opposite of discourage.

Name: Encouraging
Definition: Furnishing ground to hope; inspiriting; favoring.

Name: Encyclopedia
Definition: Alt. of Encyclopaedia

Name: Ending
Definition: Termination; concluding part; result; conclusion; destruction; death.

Name: Endless
Definition: Without end; having no end or conclusion; perpetual; interminable; -- applied to length, and to duration; as, an endless line; endless time; endless bliss; endless praise; endless clamor.

Name: Endorsement
Definition: Same as Indorsement.

Name: Enemy
Definition: One hostile to another; one who hates, and desires or attempts the injury of, another; a foe; an adversary; as, an enemy of or to a person; an enemy to truth, or to falsehood.

Name: Energy
Definition: Internal or inherent power; capacity of acting, operating, or producing an effect, whether exerted or not; as, men possessing energies may suffer them to lie inactive.

Name: Enforcement
Definition: The act of enforcing; compulsion.

Name: Engage
Definition: To put under pledge; to pledge; to place under obligations to do or forbear doing something, as by a pledge, oath, or promise; to bind by contract or promise.

Name: Engaged
Definition: Occupied; employed; busy.

Name: Engagement
Definition: The act of engaging, pledging, enlisting, occupying, or entering into contest.

Name: Engaging
Definition: Tending to draw the attention or affections; attractive; as, engaging manners or address.

Name: Engine
Definition: (Pronounced, in this sense, ////.) Natural capacity; ability; skill.

Name: Engineer
Definition: A person skilled in the principles and practice of any branch of engineering. See under Engineering, n.

Name: Engineering
Definition: Originally, the art of managing engines; in its modern and extended sense, the art and science by which the mechanical properties of matter are made useful to man in structures and machines; the occupation and work of an engineer.

Name: English
Definition: Of or pertaining to England, or to its inhabitants, or to the present so-called Anglo-Saxon race.

Name: Enhance
Definition: To raise or lift up; to exalt.

Name: Enhancement
Definition: The act of increasing, or state of being increased; augmentation; aggravation; as, the enhancement of value, price, enjoyments, crime.

Name: Enjoy
Definition: To take pleasure or satisfaction in the possession or experience of; to feel or perceive with pleasure; to be delighted with; as, to enjoy the dainties of a feast; to enjoy conversation.

Name: Enlarge
Definition: To make larger; to increase in quantity or dimensions; to extend in limits; to magnify; as, the body is enlarged by nutrition; to enlarge one's house.

Name: Enlargement
Definition: The act of increasing in size or bulk, real or apparent; the state of being increased; augmentation; further extension; expansion.

Name: Enormous
Definition: Exceeding the usual rule, norm, or measure; out of due proportion; inordinate; abnormal.

Name: Enough
Definition: Satisfying desire; giving content; adequate to meet the want; sufficient; -- usually, and more elegantly, following the noun to which it belongs.

Name: Enrollment
Definition: The act of enrolling; registration.

Name: Ensemble
Definition: The whole; all the parts taken together.

Name: Ensure
Definition: To make sure. See Insure.

Name: Enter
Definition: To come or go into; to pass into the interior of; to pass within the outer cover or shell of; to penetrate; to pierce; as, to enter a house, a closet, a country, a door, etc.; the river enters the sea.

Name: Enterprise
Definition: That which is undertaken; something attempted to be performed; a work projected which involves activity, courage, energy, and the like; a bold, arduous, or hazardous attempt; an undertaking; as, a manly enterprise; a warlike enterprise.

Name: Entertaining
Definition: Affording entertainment; pleasing; amusing; diverting.

Name: Entertainment
Definition: The act of receiving as host, or of amusing, admitting, or cherishing; hospitable reception; also, reception or treatment, in general.

Name: Entire
Definition: Complete in all parts; undivided; undiminished; whole; full and perfect; not deficient; as, the entire control of a business; entire confidence, ignorance.

Name: Entirely
Definition: In an entire manner; wholly; completely; fully; as, the trace is entirely lost.

Name: Entity
Definition: A real being, whether in thought (as an ideal conception) or in fact; being; essence; existence.

Name: Entrance
Definition: The act of entering or going into; ingress; as, the entrance of a person into a house or an apartment; hence, the act of taking possession, as of property, or of office; as, the entrance of an heir upon his inheritance, or of a magistrate into office.

Name: Entrepreneur
Definition: One who creates a product on his own account; whoever undertakes on his own account an industrial enterprise in which workmen are employed.

Name: Entry
Definition: The act of entering or passing into or upon; entrance; ingress; hence, beginnings or first attempts; as, the entry of a person into a house or city; the entry of a river into the sea; the entry of air into the blood; an entry upon an undertaking.

Name: Envelope
Definition: Alt. of Envelop

Name: Environment
Definition: Act of environing; state of being environed.

Name: Enzyme
Definition: An unorganized or unformed ferment, in distinction from an organized or living ferment; a soluble, or chemical, ferment. Ptyalin, pepsin, diastase, and rennet are good examples of enzymes.

Name: Epic
Definition: Narrated in a grand style; pertaining to or designating a kind of narrative poem, usually called an heroic poem, in which real or fictitious events, usually the achievements of some hero, are narrated in an elevated style.

Name: Episode
Definition: A separate incident, story, or action, introduced for the purpose of giving a greater variety to the events related; an incidental narrative, or digression, separable from the main subject, but naturally arising from it.

Name: Equal
Definition: Agreeing in quantity, size, quality, degree, value, etc.; having the same magnitude, the same value, the same degree, etc.; -- applied to number, degree, quantity, and intensity, and to any subject which admits of them; neither inferior nor superior, greater nor less, better nor worse; corresponding; alike; as, equal quantities of land, water, etc. ; houses of equal size; persons of equal stature or talents; commodities of equal value.

Name: Equality
Definition: The condition or quality of being equal; agreement in quantity or degree as compared; likeness in bulk, value, rank, properties, etc.; as, the equality of two bodies in length or thickness; an equality of rights.

Name: Equally
Definition: In an equal manner or degree in equal shares or proportion; with equal and impartial justice; without difference; alike; evenly; justly; as, equally taxed, furnished, etc.

Name: Equation
Definition: A making equal; equal division; equality; equilibrium.

Name: Equilibrium
Definition: Equality of weight or force; an equipoise or a state of rest produced by the mutual counteraction of two or more forces.

Name: Equipment
Definition: The act of equipping, or the state of being equipped, as for a voyage or expedition.

Name: Equity
Definition: Equality of rights; natural justice or right; the giving, or desiring to give, to each man his due, according to reason, and the law of God to man; fairness in determination of conflicting claims; impartiality.

Name: Equivalent
Definition: Equal in wortir or value, force, power, effect, import, and the like; alike in significance and value; of the same import or meaning.

Name: Eric
Definition: A recompense formerly given by a murderer to the relatives of the murdered person.

Name: Error
Definition: A wandering; a roving or irregular course.

Name: Escape
Definition: To flee from and avoid; to be saved or exempt from; to shun; to obtain security from; as, to escape danger.

Name: Especially
Definition: In an especial manner; chiefly; particularly; peculiarly; in an uncommon degree.

Name: Essay
Definition: An effort made, or exertion of body or mind, for the performance of anything; a trial; attempt; as, to make an essay to benefit a friend.

Name: Essence
Definition: The constituent elementary notions which constitute a complex notion, and must be enumerated to define it; sometimes called the nominal essence.

Name: Essential
Definition: Belonging to the essence, or that which makes an object, or class of objects, what it is.

Name: Establish
Definition: To make stable or firm; to fix immovably or firmly; to set (a thing) in a place and make it stable there; to settle; to confirm.

Name: Establishment
Definition: The act of establishing; a ratifying or ordaining; settlement; confirmation.

Name: Estate
Definition: Settled condition or form of existence; state; condition or circumstances of life or of any person; situation.

Name: Estimate
Definition: To judge and form an opinion of the value of, from imperfect data, -- either the extrinsic (money), or intrinsic (moral), value; to fix the worth of roughly or in a general way; as, to estimate the value of goods or land; to estimate the worth or talents of a person.

Name: Estimation
Definition: The act of estimating.

Name: Eternal
Definition: Without beginning or end of existence; always existing.

Name: Ethical
Definition: Of, or belonging to, morals; treating of the moral feelings or duties; containing percepts of morality; moral; as, ethic discourses or epistles; an ethical system; ethical philosophy.

Name: Ethics
Definition: The science of human duty; the body of rules of duty drawn from this science; a particular system of principles and rules concerting duty, whether true or false; rules of practice in respect to a single class of human actions; as, political or social ethics; medical ethics.

Name: Ethnic
Definition: Alt. of Ethnical

Name: Ethnic
Definition: A heathen; a pagan.

Name: European
Definition: Of or pertaining to Europe, or to its inhabitants.

Name: Eval
Definition: Relating to time or duration.

Name: Evaluate
Definition: To fix the value of; to rate; to appraise.

Name: Evaluation
Definition: Valuation; appraisement.

Name: Evanescence
Definition: The act or state of vanishing away; disappearance; as, the evanescence of vapor, of a dream, of earthly plants or hopes.

Name: Even
Definition: Evening. See Eve, n. 1.

Name: Evening
Definition: The latter part and close of the day, and the beginning of darkness or night; properly, the decline of the day, or of the sum.

Name: Event
Definition: That which comes, arrives, or happens; that which falls out; any incident, good or bad.

Name: Eventually
Definition: In an eventual manner; finally; ultimately.

Name: Ever
Definition: At any time; at any period or point of time.

Name: Every
Definition: All the parts which compose a whole collection or aggregate number, considered in their individuality, all taken separately one by one, out of an indefinite bumber.

Name: Everybody
Definition: Every person.

Name: Everyday
Definition: Used or fit for every day; common; usual; as, an everyday suit or clothes.

Name: Everyone
Definition: Everybody; -- commonly separated, every one.

Name: Everything
Definition: Whatever pertains to the subject under consideration; all things.

Name: Everywhere
Definition: In every place; in all places; hence, in every part; throughly; altogether.

Name: Evidence
Definition: That which makes evident or manifest; that which furnishes, or tends to furnish, proof; any mode of proof; the ground of belief or judgement; as, the evidence of our senses; evidence of the truth or falsehood of a statement.

Name: Evident
Definition: Clear to the vision; especially, clear to the understanding, and satisfactory to the judgment; as, the figure or color of a body is evident to the senses; the guilt of an offender can not always be made evident.

Name: Evil
Definition: Having qualities tending to injury and mischief; having a nature or properties which tend to badness; mischievous; not good; worthless or deleterious; poor; as, an evil beast; and evil plant; an evil crop.

Name: Evolution
Definition: The act of unfolding or unrolling; hence, in the process of growth; development; as, the evolution of a flower from a bud, or an animal from the egg.

Name: Exact
Definition: Precisely agreeing with a standard, a fact, or the truth; perfectly conforming; neither exceeding nor falling short in any respect; true; correct; precise; as, the clock keeps exact time; he paid the exact debt; an exact copy of a letter; exact accounts.

Name: Exactly
Definition: In an exact manner; precisely according to a rule, standard, or fact; accurately; strictly; correctly; nicely.

Name: Examination
Definition: The act of examining, or state of being examined; a careful search, investigation, or inquiry; scrutiny by study or experiment.

Name: Examine
Definition: To test by any appropriate method; to inspect carefully with a view to discover the real character or state of; to subject to inquiry or inspection of particulars for the purpose of obtaining a fuller insight into the subject of examination, as a material substance, a fact, a reason, a cause, the truth of a statement; to inquire or search into; to explore; as, to examine a mineral; to examine a ship to know whether she is seaworthy; to examine a proposition, theory, or question.

Name: Examining
Definition: Having power to examine; appointed to examine; as, an examining committee.

Name: Example
Definition: One or a portion taken to show the character or quality of the whole; a sample; a specimen.

Name: Exceed
Definition: To go beyond; to proceed beyond the given or supposed limit or measure of; to outgo; to surpass; -- used both in a good and a bad sense; as, one man exceeds another in bulk, stature, weight, power, skill, etc.; one offender exceeds another in villainy; his rank exceeds yours.

Name: Excel
Definition: To go beyond or surpass in good qualities or laudable deeds; to outdo or outgo, in a good sense.

Name: Excellence
Definition: The quality of being excellent; state of possessing good qualities in an eminent degree; exalted merit; superiority in virtue.

Name: Excellent
Definition: Excelling; surpassing others in some good quality or the sum of qualities; of great worth; eminent, in a good sense; superior; as, an excellent man, artist, citizen, husband, discourse, book, song, etc.; excellent breeding, principles, aims, action.

Name: Except
Definition: To take or leave out (anything) from a number or a whole as not belonging to it; to exclude; to omit.

Name: Exception
Definition: The act of excepting or excluding; exclusion; restriction by taking out something which would otherwise be included, as in a class, statement, rule.

Name: Exceptional
Definition: Forming an exception; not ordinary; uncommon; rare; hence, better than the average; superior.

Name: Excerpt
Definition: To select; to extract; to cite; to quote.

Name: Excess
Definition: The state of surpassing or going beyond limits; the being of a measure beyond sufficiency, necessity, or duty; that which exceeds what is usual or prover; immoderateness; superfluity; superabundance; extravagance; as, an excess of provisions or of light.

Name: Excessive
Definition: Characterized by, or exhibiting, excess; overmuch.

Name: Exchange
Definition: The act of giving or taking one thing in return for another which is regarded as an equivalent; as, an exchange of cattle for grain.

Name: Excitement
Definition: The act of exciting, or the state of being roused into action, or of having increased action; impulsion; agitation; as, an excitement of the people.

Name: Exciting
Definition: Calling or rousing into action; producing excitement; as, exciting events; an exciting story.

Name: Exclude
Definition: To shut out; to hinder from entrance or admission; to debar from participation or enjoyment; to deprive of; to except; -- the opposite to admit; as, to exclude a crowd from a room or house; to exclude the light; to exclude one nation from the ports of another; to exclude a taxpayer from the privilege of voting.

Name: Exclusion
Definition: The act of excluding, or of shutting out, whether by thrusting out or by preventing admission; a debarring; rejection; prohibition; the state of being excluded.

Name: Exclusive
Definition: Having the power of preventing entrance; debarring from participation or enjoyment; possessed and enjoyed to the exclusion of others; as, exclusive bars; exclusive privilege; exclusive circles of society.

Name: Excuse
Definition: To free from accusation, or the imputation of fault or blame; to clear from guilt; to release from a charge; to justify by extenuating a fault; to exculpate; to absolve; to acquit.

Name: Execute
Definition: To follow out or through to the end; to carry out into complete effect; to complete; to finish; to effect; to perform.

Name: Execution
Definition: The act of executing; a carrying into effect or to completion; performance; achievement; consummation; as, the execution of a plan, a work, etc.

Name: Executive
Definition: Designed or fitted for execution, or carrying into effect; as, executive talent; qualifying for, concerned with, or pertaining to, the execution of the laws or the conduct of affairs; as, executive power or authority; executive duties, officer, department, etc.

Name: Exempt
Definition: Cut off; set apart.

Name: Exemption
Definition: The act of exempting; the state of being exempt; freedom from any charge, burden, evil, etc., to which others are subject; immunity; privilege; as, exemption of certain articles from seizure; exemption from military service; exemption from anxiety, suffering, etc.

Name: Exercise
Definition: The act of exercising; a setting in action or practicing; employment in the proper mode of activity; exertion; application; use; habitual activity; occupation, in general; practice.

Name: Exhaust
Definition: To draw or let out wholly; to drain off completely; as, to exhaust the water of a well; the moisture of the earth is exhausted by evaporation.

Name: Exhibit
Definition: To hold forth or present to view; to produce publicly, for inspection; to show, especially in order to attract notice to what is interesting; to display; as, to exhibit commodities in a warehouse, a picture in a gallery.

Name: Exhibition
Definition: The act of exhibiting for inspection, or of holding forth to view; manifestation; display.

Name: Exist
Definition: To be as a fact and not as a mode; to have an actual or real being, whether material or spiritual.

Name: Existence
Definition: The state of existing or being; actual possession of being; continuance in being; as, the existence of body and of soul in union; the separate existence of the soul; immortal existence.

Name: Exit
Definition: He (or she ) goes out, or retires from view; as, exit Macbeth.

Name: Exotic
Definition: Introduced from a foreign country; not native; extraneous; foreign; as, an exotic plant; an exotic term or word.

Name: Expand
Definition: To lay open by extending; to open wide; to spread out; to diffuse; as, a flower expands its leaves.

Name: Expanding
Definition: That expands, or may be expanded; extending; spreading; enlarging.

Name: Expansion
Definition: The act of expanding or spreading out; the condition of being expanded; dilation; enlargement.

Name: Expect
Definition: To wait for; to await.

Name: Expenditure
Definition: The act of expending; a laying out, as of money; disbursement.

Name: Expense
Definition: A spending or consuming; disbursement; expenditure.

Name: Expensive
Definition: Occasioning expense; calling for liberal outlay; costly; dear; liberal; as, expensive dress; an expensive house or family.

Name: Experience
Definition: Trial, as a test or experiment.

Name: Experienced
Definition: Taught by practice or by repeated observations; skillful or wise by means of trials, use, or observation; as, an experienced physician, workman, soldier; an experienced eye.

Name: Experiment
Definition: Atrial or special observation, made to confirm or disprove something doubtful; esp., one under conditions determined by the experimenter; an act or operation undertaken in order to discover some unknown principle or effect, or to test, establish, or illustrate some suggest or known truth; practical test; poof.

Name: Experimental
Definition: Pertaining to experiment; founded on, or derived from, experiment or trial; as, experimental science; given to, or skilled in, experiment; as, an experimental philosopher.

Name: Expert
Definition: Taught by use, practice, or experience, experienced; having facility of operation or performance from practice; knowing and ready from much practice; clever; skillful; as, an expert surgeon; expert in chess or archery.

Name: Expiration
Definition: The act of expiring

Name: Explain
Definition: To flatten; to spread out; to unfold; to expand.

Name: Explanation
Definition: The act of explaining, expounding, or interpreting; the act of clearing from obscurity and making intelligible; as, the explanation of a passage in Scripture, or of a contract or treaty.

Name: Explicit
Definition: A word formerly used (as finis is now) at the conclusion of a book to indicate the end.

Name: Explicitly
Definition: In an explicit manner; clearly; plainly; without disguise or reservation of meaning; not by inference or implication; as, he explicitly avows his intention.

Name: Exploration
Definition: The act of exploring, penetrating, or ranging over for purposes of discovery, especially of geographical discovery; examination; as, the exploration of unknown countries

Name: Explore
Definition: To seek for or after; to strive to attain by search; to look wisely and carefully for.

Name: Explorer
Definition: One who explores; also, an apparatus with which one explores, as a diving bell.

Name: Explosion
Definition: The act of exploding; detonation; a chemical action which causes the sudden formation of a great volume of expanded gas; as, the explosion of gunpowder, of fire damp,etc.

Name: Export
Definition: To carry away; to remove.

Name: Exposure
Definition: The act of exposing or laying open, setting forth, laying bare of protection, depriving of care or concealment, or setting out to reprobation or contempt.

Name: Express
Definition: Exactly representing; exact.

Name: Expression
Definition: The act of expressing; the act of forcing out by pressure; as, the expression of juices or oils; also, of extorting or eliciting; as, a forcible expression of truth.

Name: Extend
Definition: To stretch out; to prolong in space; to carry forward or continue in length; as, to extend a line in surveying; to extend a cord across the street.

Name: Extension
Definition: The act of extending or the state of being extended; a stretching out; enlargement in breadth or continuation of length; increase; augmentation; expansion.

Name: Extensive
Definition: Having wide extent; of much superficial extent; expanded; large; broad; wide; comprehensive; as, an extensive farm; an extensive lake; an extensive sphere of operations; extensive benevolence; extensive greatness.

Name: Extent
Definition: Extended.

Name: Exterior
Definition: External; outward; pertaining to that which is external; -- opposed to interior; as, the exterior part of a sphere.

Name: External
Definition: Outward; exterior; relating to the outside, as of a body; being without; acting from without; -- opposed to internal; as, the external form or surface of a body.

Name: Extra
Definition: Beyond what is due, usual, expected, or necessary; additional; supernumerary; also, extraordinarily good; superior; as, extra work; extra pay.

Name: Extract
Definition: To draw out or forth; to pull out; to remove forcibly from a fixed position, as by traction or suction, etc.; as, to extract a tooth from its socket, a stump from the earth, a splinter from the finger.

Name: Extraction
Definition: The act of extracting, or drawing out; as, the extraction of a tooth, of a bone or an arrow from the body, of a stump from earth, of a passage from a book, of an essence or tincture.

Name: Extraordinary
Definition: Beyond or out of the common order or method; not usual, customary, regular, or ordinary; as, extraordinary evils; extraordinary remedies.

Name: Extreme
Definition: At the utmost point, edge, or border; outermost; utmost; farthest; most remote; at the widest limit.

Name: Extremely
Definition: In an extreme manner or state; in the utmost degree; to the utmost point; exceedingly; as, extremely hot or cold.

Name: Eyed
Definition: Heaving (such or so many) eyes; -- used in composition; as sharp-eyed; dull-eyed; sad-eyed; ox-eyed Juno; myriad-eyed.

Name: Fabric
Definition: The structure of anything; the manner in which the parts of a thing are united; workmanship; texture; make; as cloth of a beautiful fabric.

Name: Fabulous
Definition: Feigned, as a story or fable; related in fable; devised; invented; not real; fictitious; as, a fabulous description; a fabulous hero.

Name: Face
Definition: The exterior form or appearance of anything; that part which presents itself to the view; especially, the front or upper part or surface; that which particularly offers itself to the view of a spectator.

Name: Faced
Definition: Having (such) a face, or (so many) faces; as, smooth-faced, two-faced.

Name: Facial
Definition: Of or pertaining to the face; as, the facial artery, vein, or nerve.

Name: Facilitate
Definition: To make easy or less difficult; to free from difficulty or impediment; to lessen the labor of; as, to facilitate the execution of a task.

Name: Facility
Definition: The quality of being easily performed; freedom from difficulty; ease; as, the facility of an operation.

Name: Facing
Definition: A covering in front, for ornament or other purpose; an exterior covering or sheathing; as, the facing of an earthen slope, sea wall, etc. , to strengthen it or to protect or adorn the exposed surface.

Name: Fact
Definition: A doing, making, or preparing.

Name: Factor
Definition: One who transacts business for another; an agent; a substitute; especially, a mercantile agent who buys and sells goods and transacts business for others in commission; a commission merchant or consignee. He may be a home factor or a foreign factor. He may buy and sell in his own name, and he is intrusted with the possession and control of the goods; and in these respects he differs from a broker.

Name: Factory
Definition: A house or place where factors, or commercial agents, reside, to transact business for their employers.

Name: Faculty
Definition: Ability to act or perform, whether inborn or cultivated; capacity for any natural function; especially, an original mental power or capacity for any of the well-known classes of mental activity; psychical or soul capacity; capacity for any of the leading kinds of soul activity, as knowledge, feeling, volition; intellectual endowment or gift; power; as, faculties of the mind or the soul.

Name: Fail
Definition: To be wanting; to fall short; to be or become deficient in any measure or degree up to total absence; to cease to be furnished in the usual or expected manner, or to be altogether cut off from supply; to be lacking; as, streams fail; crops fail.

Name: Failing
Definition: A failing short; a becoming deficient; failure; deficiency; imperfection; weakness; lapse; fault; infirmity; as, a mental failing.

Name: Failure
Definition: Cessation of supply, or total defect; a failing; deficiency; as, failure of rain; failure of crops.

Name: Fair
Definition: Free from spots, specks, dirt, or imperfection; unblemished; clean; pure.

Name: Fairly
Definition: In a fair manner; clearly; openly; plainly; fully; distinctly; frankly.

Name: Fairy
Definition: Enchantment; illusion.

Name: Faith
Definition: Belief; the assent of the mind to the truth of what is declared by another, resting solely and implicitly on his authority and veracity; reliance on testimony.

Name: Fake
Definition: One of the circles or windings of a cable or hawser, as it lies in a coil; a single turn or coil.

Name: Fall
Definition: To Descend, either suddenly or gradually; particularly, to descend by the force of gravity; to drop; to sink; as, the apple falls; the tide falls; the mercury falls in the barometer.

Name: Fallen
Definition: Dropped; prostrate; degraded; ruined; decreased; dead.

Name: Falling
Definition: from Fall, v. i.

Name: False
Definition: Uttering falsehood; unveracious; given to deceit; dishnest; as, a false witness.

Name: Fame
Definition: Public report or rumor.

Name: Familiar
Definition: Of or pertaining to a family; domestic.

Name: Family
Definition: The collective body of persons who live in one house, and under one head or manager; a household, including parents, children, and servants, and, as the case may be, lodgers or boarders.

Name: Famous
Definition: Celebrated in fame or public report; renowned; mach talked of; distinguished in story; -- used in either a good or a bad sense, chiefly the former; often followed by for; as, famous for erudition, for eloquence, for military skill; a famous pirate.

Name: Fancy
Definition: The faculty by which the mind forms an image or a representation of anything perceived before; the power of combining and modifying such objects into new pictures or images; the power of readily and happily creating and recalling such objects for the purpose of amusement, wit, or embellishment; imagination.

Name: Fantastic
Definition: Existing only in imagination; fanciful; imaginary; not real; chimerical.

Name: Fantasy
Definition: Fancy; imagination; especially, a whimsical or fanciful conception; a vagary of the imagination; whim; caprice; humor.

Name: Fare
Definition: To go; to pass; to journey; to travel.

Name: Farm
Definition: The rent of land, -- originally paid by reservation of part of its products.

Name: Farmer
Definition: One who farms

Name: Farming
Definition: Pertaining to agriculture; devoted to, adapted to, or engaged in, farming; as, farming tools; farming land; a farming community.

Name: Fashion
Definition: The make or form of anything; the style, shape, appearance, or mode of structure; pattern, model; as, the fashion of the ark, of a coat, of a house, of an altar, etc.; workmanship; execution.

Name: Fast
Definition: To abstain from food; to omit to take nourishment in whole or in part; to go hungry.

Name: Faster
Definition: One who abstains from food.

Name: Fatal
Definition: Proceeding from, or appointed by, fate or destiny; necessary; inevitable.

Name: Fate
Definition: A fixed decree by which the order of things is prescribed; the immutable law of the universe; inevitable necessity; the force by which all existence is determined and conditioned.

Name: Father
Definition: One who has begotten a child, whether son or daughter; a generator; a male parent.

Name: Fatty
Definition: Containing fat, or having the qualities of fat; greasy; gross; as, a fatty substance.

Name: Fault
Definition: Defect; want; lack; default.

Name: Favor
Definition: Kind regard; propitious aspect; countenance; friendly disposition; kindness; good will.

Name: Favorite
Definition: A person or thing regarded with peculiar favor; one treated with partiality; one preferred above others; especially, one unduly loved, trusted, and enriched with favors by a person of high rank or authority.

Name: Fear
Definition: A variant of Fere, a mate, a companion.

Name: Feat
Definition: An act; a deed; an exploit.

Name: Feature
Definition: The make, form, or outward appearance of a person; the whole turn or style of the body; esp., good appearance.

Name: Featured
Definition: Shaped; fashioned.

Name: February
Definition: The second month in the year, said to have been introduced into the Roman calendar by Numa. In common years this month contains twenty-eight days; in the bissextile, or leap year, it has twenty-nine days.

Name: Federal
Definition: Pertaining to a league or treaty; derived from an agreement or covenant between parties, especially between nations; constituted by a compact between parties, usually governments or their representatives.

Name: Federation
Definition: The act of uniting in a league; confederation.

Name: Feed
