Definition: To give food to; to supply with nourishment; to satisfy the physical huger of.

Name: Feeding
Definition: the act of eating, or of supplying with food; the process of fattening.

Name: Feel
Definition: To perceive by the touch; to take cognizance of by means of the nerves of sensation distributed all over the body, especially by those of the skin; to have sensation excited by contact of (a thing) with the body or limbs.

Name: Feeling
Definition: Possessing great sensibility; easily affected or moved; as, a feeling heart.

Name: Feet
Definition: Fact; performance.

Name: Fell
Definition: imp. of Fall.

Name: Fellow
Definition: A companion; a comrade; an associate; a partner; a sharer.

Name: Fellowship
Definition: The state or relation of being or associate.

Name: Felt
Definition: imp. & p. p. / a. from Feel.

Name: Female
Definition: An individual of the sex which conceives and brings forth young, or (in a wider sense) which has an ovary and produces ova.

Name: Fence
Definition: That which fends off attack or danger; a defense; a protection; a cover; security; shield.

Name: Fence
Definition: To fend off danger from; to give security to; to protect; to guard.

Name: Ferry
Definition: To carry or transport over a river, strait, or other narrow water, in a boat.

Name: Festival
Definition: Pertaining to a fest; festive; festal; appropriate to a festival; joyous; mirthful.

Name: Fetish
Definition: A material object supposed among certain African tribes to represent in such a way, or to be so connected with, a supernatural being, that the possession of it gives to the possessor power to control that being.

Name: Fetish
Definition: Alt. of Fetishistic

Name: Fever
Definition: A diseased state of the system, marked by increased heat, acceleration of the pulse, and a general derangement of the functions, including usually, thirst and loss of appetite.  Many diseases, of which fever is the most prominent symptom, are denominated fevers; as, typhoid fever; yellow fever.

Name: Fiber
Definition: Alt. of Fibre

Name: Fibre
Definition: One of the delicate, threadlike portions of which the tissues of plants and animals are in part constituted; as, the fiber of flax or of muscle.

Name: Fiction
Definition: The act of feigning, inventing, or imagining; as, by a mere fiction of the mind.

Name: Field
Definition: Cleared land; land suitable for tillage or pasture; cultivated ground; the open country.

Name: Fifteen
Definition: Five and ten; one more than fourteen.

Name: Fifth
Definition: Next in order after the fourth; -- the ordinal of five.

Name: Fifty
Definition: Five times ten; as, fifty men.

Name: Fight
Definition: To strive or contend for victory, with armies or in single combat; to attempt to defeat, subdue, or destroy an enemy, either by blows or weapons; to contend in arms; -- followed by with or against.

Name: Fighter
Definition: One who fights; a combatant; a warrior.

Name: Fighting
Definition: Qualified for war; fit for battle.

Name: Figure
Definition: The form of anything; shape; outline; appearance.

Name: Figured
Definition: Adorned with figures; marked with figures; as, figured muslin.

Name: File
Definition: An orderly succession; a line; a row

Name: Filing
Definition: A fragment or particle rubbed off by the act of filing; as, iron filings.

Name: Fill
Definition: One of the thills or shafts of a carriage.

Name: Filling
Definition: That which is used to fill a cavity or any empty space, or to supply a deficiency; as, filling for a cavity in a tooth, a depression in a roadbed, the space between exterior and interior walls of masonry, the pores of open-grained wood, the space between the outer and inner planks of a vessel, etc.

Name: Film
Definition: A thin skin; a pellicle; a membranous covering, causing opacity; hence, any thin, slight covering.

Name: Filter
Definition: Any porous substance, as cloth, paper, sand, or charcoal, through which water or other liquid may passed to cleanse it from the solid or impure matter held in suspension; a chamber or device containing such substance; a strainer; also, a similar device for purifying air.

Name: Final
Definition: Pertaining to the end or conclusion; last; terminating; ultimate; as, the final day of a school term.

Name: Finally
Definition: At the end or conclusion; ultimately; lastly; as, the contest was long, but the Romans finally conquered.

Name: Finance
Definition: The income of a ruler or of a state; revennue; public money; sometimes, the income of an individual; often used in the plural for funds; available money; resources.

Name: Financial
Definition: Pertaining to finance.

Name: Find
Definition: To meet with, or light upon, accidentally; to gain the first sight or knowledge of, as of something new, or unknown; hence, to fall in with, as a person.

Name: Finder
Definition: One who, or that which, finds; specifically (Astron.), a small telescope of low power and large field of view, attached to a larger telescope, for the purpose of finding an object more readily.

Name: Finding
Definition: That which is found, come upon, or provided; esp. (pl.), that which a journeyman artisan finds or provides for himself; as tools, trimmings, etc.

Name: Fine
Definition: Finished; brought to perfection; refined; hence, free from impurity; excellent; superior; elegant; worthy of admiration; accomplished; beautiful.

Name: Finger
Definition: One of the five terminating members of the hand; a digit; esp., one of the four extermities of the hand, other than the thumb.

Name: Finish
Definition: To arrive at the end of; to bring to an end; to put an end to; to make an end of; to terminate.

Name: Finished
Definition: Polished to the highest degree of excellence; complete; perfect; as, a finished poem; a finished education.

Name: Finishing
Definition: The act or process of completing or perfecting; the final work upon or ornamentation of a thing.

Name: Finite
Definition: Having a limit; limited in quantity, degree, or capacity; bounded; -- opposed to infinite; as, finite number; finite existence; a finite being; a finite mind; finite duration.

Name: Finnish
Definition: Of or pertaining to Finland, to the Finns, or to their language.

Name: Fire
Definition: The evolution of light and heat in the combustion of bodies; combustion; state of ignition.

Name: Fireplace
Definition: The part a chimney appropriated to the fire; a hearth; -- usually an open recess in a wall, in which a fire may be built.

Name: Firm
Definition: Fixed; hence, closely compressed; compact; substantial; hard; solid; -- applied to the matter of bodies; as, firm flesh; firm muscles, firm wood.

Name: Firms
Definition: The principal rafters of a roof, especially a pair of rafters taken together.

Name: First
Definition: Preceding all others of a series or kind; the ordinal of one; earliest; as, the first day of a month; the first year of a reign.

Name: Fiscal
Definition: Pertaining to the public treasury or revenue.

Name: Fish
Definition: A counter, used in various games.

Name: Fisher
Definition: One who fishes.

Name: Fishing
Definition: The act, practice, or art of one who fishes.

Name: Fist
Definition: The hand with the fingers doubled into the palm; the closed hand, especially as clinched tightly for the purpose of striking a blow.

Name: Fitness
Definition: The state or quality of being fit; as, the fitness of measures or laws; a person's fitness for office.

Name: Fitting
Definition: Anything used in fitting up

Name: Five
Definition: Four and one added; one more than four.

Name: Fixed
Definition: Securely placed or fastened; settled; established; firm; imovable; unalterable.

Name: Flag
Definition: To hang loose without stiffness; to bend down, as flexible bodies; to be loose, yielding, limp.

Name: Flame
Definition: A stream of burning vapor or gas, emitting light and heat; darting or streaming fire; a blaze; a fire.

Name: Flash
Definition: To burst or break forth with a sudden and transient flood of flame and light; as, the lighting flashes vividly; the powder flashed.

Name: Flashing
Definition: The creation of an artifical flood by the sudden letting in of a body of water; -- called also flushing.

Name: Flat
Definition: Having an even and horizontal surface, or nearly so, without prominences or depressions; level without inclination; plane.

Name: Flavor
Definition: That quality of anything which affects the smell; odor; fragrances; as, the flavor of a rose.

Name: Fleece
Definition: The entire coat of wood that covers a sheep or other similar animal; also, the quantity shorn from a sheep, or animal, at one time.

Name: Fleet
Definition: To sail; to float.

Name: Flesh
Definition: The aggregate of the muscles, fat, and other tissues which cover the framework of bones in man and other animals; especially, the muscles.

Name: Flex
Definition: To bend; as, to flex the arm.

Name: Flexibility
Definition: The state or quality of being flexible; flexibleness; pliancy; pliability; as, the flexibility of strips of hemlock, hickory, whalebone or metal, or of rays of light.

Name: Flexible
Definition: Capable of being flexed or bent; admitting of being turned, bowed, or twisted, without breaking; pliable; yielding to pressure; not stiff or brittle.

Name: Flight
Definition: The act or flying; a passing through the air by the help of wings; volitation; mode or style of flying.

Name: Flip
Definition: A mixture of beer, spirit, etc., stirred and heated by a hot iron.

Name: Float
Definition: Anything which floats or rests on the surface of a fluid, as to sustain weight, or to indicate the height of the surface, or mark the place of, something.

Name: Floating
Definition: Buoyed upon or in a fluid; a, the floating timbers of a wreck; floating motes in the air.

Name: Flood
Definition: A great flow of water; a body of moving water; the flowing stream, as of a river; especially, a body of water, rising, swelling, and overflowing land not usually thus covered; a deluge; a freshet; an inundation.

Name: Floor
Definition: The bottom or lower part of any room; the part upon which we stand and upon which the movables in the room are supported.

Name: Flooring
Definition: A platform; the bottom of a room; a floor; pavement. See Floor, n.

Name: Floppy
Definition: Having a tendency to flop or flap; as, a floppy hat brim.

Name: Floral
Definition: Pertaining to Flora, or to flowers; made of flowers; as, floral games, wreaths.

Name: Florence
Definition: An ancient gold coin of the time of Edward III., of six shillings sterling value.

Name: Florist
Definition: A cultivator of, or dealer in, flowers.

Name: Flour
Definition: The finely ground meal of wheat, or of any other grain; especially, the finer part of meal separated by bolting; hence, the fine and soft powder of any substance; as, flour of emery; flour of mustard.

Name: Flow
Definition: imp. sing. of Fly, v. i.

Name: Flower
Definition: In the popular sense, the bloom or blossom of a plant; the showy portion, usually of a different color, shape, and texture from the foliage.

Name: Fluid
Definition: Having particles which easily move and change their relative position without a separation of the mass, and which easily yield to pressure; capable of flowing; liquid or gaseous.

Name: Flush
Definition: To flow and spread suddenly; to rush; as, blood flushes into the face.

Name: Flux
Definition: The act of flowing; a continuous moving on or passing by, as of a flowing stream; constant succession; change.

Name: Flyer
Definition: One that uses wings.

Name: Flying
Definition: Moving in the air with, or as with, wings; moving lightly or rapidly; intended for rapid movement.

Name: Foam
Definition: The white substance, consisting of an aggregation of bubbles, which is formed on the surface of liquids, or in the mouth of an animal, by violent agitation or fermentation; froth; spume; scum; as, the foam of the sea.

Name: Focal
Definition: Belonging to,or concerning, a focus; as, a focal point.

Name: Focus
Definition: A point in which the rays of light meet, after being reflected or refrcted, and at which the image is formed; as, the focus of a lens or mirror.

Name: Fold
Definition: To lap or lay in plaits or folds; to lay one part over another part of; to double; as, to fold cloth; to fold a letter.

Name: Folder
Definition: One who, or that which, folds; esp., a flat, knifelike instrument used for folding paper.

Name: Folding
Definition: The act of making a fold or folds; also, a fold; a doubling; a plication.

Name: Folk
Definition: Alt. of Folks

Name: Folks
Definition: In Anglo-Saxon times, the people of a group of townships or villages; a community; a tribe.

Name: Follow
Definition: To go or come after; to move behind in the same path or direction; hence, to go with (a leader, guide, etc.); to accompany; to attend.

Name: Following
Definition: One's followers, adherents, or dependents, collectively.

Name: Font
Definition: A complete assortment of printing type of one size, including a due proportion of all the letters in the alphabet, large and small, points, accents, and whatever else is necessary for printing with that variety of types; a fount.

Name: Food
Definition: What is fed upon; that which goes to support life by being received within, and assimilated by, the organism of an animal or a plant; nutriment; aliment; especially, what is eaten by animals for nourishment.

Name: Fool
Definition: A compound of gooseberries scalded and crushed, with cream; -- commonly called gooseberry fool.

Name: Foot
Definition: The terminal part of the leg of man or an animal; esp., the part below the ankle or wrist; that part of an animal upon which it rests when standing, or moves. See Manus, and Pes.

Name: Football
Definition: An inflated ball to be kicked in sport, usually made in India rubber, or a bladder incased in Leather.

Name: Forbidden
Definition: Prohibited; interdicted.

Name: Force
Definition: To stuff; to lard; to farce.

Name: Forced
Definition: Done or produced with force or great labor, or by extraordinary exertion; hurried; strained; produced by unnatural effort or pressure; as, a forced style; a forced laugh.

Name: Ford
Definition: A place in a river, or other water, where it may be passed by man or beast on foot, by wading.

Name: Forecast
Definition: To plan beforehand; to scheme; to project.

Name: Foreign
Definition: Outside; extraneous; separated; alien; as, a foreign country; a foreign government.

Name: Forest
Definition: An extensive wood; a large tract of land covered with trees; in the United States, a wood of native growth, or a tract of woodland which has never been cultivated.

Name: Forestry
Definition: The art of forming or of cultivating forests; the management of growing timber.

Name: Forever
Definition: Through eternity; through endless ages, eternally.

Name: Forge
Definition: A place or establishment where iron or other metals are wrought by heating and hammering; especially, a furnace, or a shop with its furnace, etc., where iron is heated and wrought; a smithy.

Name: Forget
Definition: To lose the remembrance of; to let go from the memory; to cease to have in mind; not to think of; also, to lose the power of; to cease from doing.

Name: Forgot
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Forget.

Name: Forgotten
Definition: p. p. of Forget.

Name: Fork
Definition: An instrument consisting of a handle with a shank terminating in two or more prongs or tines, which are usually of metal, parallel and slightly curved; -- used from piercing, holding, taking up, or pitching anything.

Name: Form
Definition: The shape and structure of anything, as distinguished from the material of which it is composed; particular disposition or arrangement of matter, giving it individuality or distinctive character; configuration; figure; external appearance.

Name: Formal
Definition: Belonging to the form, shape, frame, external appearance, or organization of a thing.

Name: Formation
Definition: The act of giving form or shape to anything; a forming; a shaping.

Name: Formed
Definition: Arranged, as stars in a constellation; as, formed stars.

Name: Former
Definition: One who forms; a maker; a creator.

Name: Formerly
Definition: In time past, either in time immediately preceding or at any indefinite distance; of old; heretofore.

Name: Forming
Definition: The act or process of giving form or shape to anything; as, in shipbuilding, the exact shaping of partially shaped timbers.

Name: Formula
Definition: A prescribed or set form; an established rule; a fixed or conventional method in which anything is to be done, arranged, or said.

Name: Fort
Definition: A strong or fortified place; usually, a small fortified place, occupied only by troops, surrounded with a ditch, rampart, and parapet, or with palisades, stockades, or other means of defense; a fortification.

Name: Forth
Definition: Forward; onward in time, place, or order; in advance from a given point; on to end; as, from that day forth; one, two, three, and so forth.

Name: Fortune
Definition: The arrival of something in a sudden or unexpected manner; chance; accident; luck; hap; also, the personified or deified power regarded as determining human success, apportioning happiness and unhappiness, and distributing arbitrarily or fortuitously the lots of life.

Name: Forty
Definition: Four times ten; thirty-nine and one more.

Name: Forum
Definition: A market place or public place in Rome, where causes were judicially tried, and orations delivered to the people.

Name: Forward
Definition: An agreement; a covenant; a promise.

Name: Forward
Definition: Near, or at the fore part; in advance of something else; as, the forward gun in a ship, or the forward ship in a fleet.

Name: Forwarding
Definition: The act of one who forwards; the act or occupation of transmitting merchandise or other property for others.

Name: Fossil
Definition: Dug out of the earth; as, fossil coal; fossil salt.

Name: Foster
Definition: To feed; to nourish; to support; to bring up.

Name: Foster
Definition: One who, or that which, fosters.

Name: Fought
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Fight.

Name: Foul
Definition: A bird.

Name: Found
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Find.

Name: Foundation
Definition: The act of founding, fixing, establishing, or beginning to erect.

Name: Founder
Definition: One who founds, establishes, and erects; one who lays a foundation; an author; one from whom anything originates; one who endows.

Name: Fountain
Definition: A spring of water issuing from the earth.

Name: Four
Definition: One more than three; twice two.

Name: Fourth
Definition: Next in order after the third; the ordinal of four.

Name: Fraction
Definition: The act of breaking, or state of being broken, especially by violence.

Name: Fragrance
Definition: Alt. of Fragrancy

Name: Frame
Definition: To construct by fitting and uniting the several parts of the skeleton of any structure; specifically, in woodwork, to put together by cutting parts of one member to fit parts of another. See Dovetail, Halve, v. t., Miter, Tenon, Tooth, Tusk, Scarf, and Splice.

Name: Framework
Definition: The work of framing, or the completed work; the frame or constructional part of anything; as, the framework of society.

Name: Framing
Definition: The act, process, or style of putting together a frame, or of constructing anything; a frame; that which frames.

Name: Franchise
Definition: Exemption from constraint or oppression; freedom; liberty.

Name: Frank
Definition: A pigsty.

Name: Franklin
Definition: An English freeholder, or substantial householder.

Name: Fraud
Definition: Deception deliberately practiced with a view to gaining an unlawful or unfair advantage; artifice by which the right or interest of another is injured; injurious stratagem; deceit; trick.

Name: Fred
Definition: Peace; -- a word used in composition, especially in proper names; as, Alfred; Frederic.

Name: Free
Definition: Exempt from subjection to the will of others; not under restraint, control, or compulsion; able to follow one's own impulses, desires, or inclinations; determining one's own course of action; not dependent; at liberty.

Name: Freedom
Definition: The state of being free; exemption from the power and control of another; liberty; independence.

Name: Freely
Definition: In a free manner; without restraint or compulsion; abundantly; gratuitously.

Name: Freeze
Definition: A frieze.

Name: Freight
Definition: That with which anything in fraught or laden for transportation; lading; cargo, especially of a ship, or a car on a railroad, etc.; as, a freight of cotton; a full freight.

Name: French
Definition: Of or pertaining to France or its inhabitants.

Name: Frequency
Definition: The condition of returning frequently; occurrence often repeated; common occurence; as, the frequency of crimes; the frequency of miracles.

Name: Frequent
Definition: Often to be met with; happening at short intervals; often repeated or occurring; as, frequent visits.

Name: Frequently
Definition: At frequent or short intervals; many times; often; repeatedly; commonly.

Name: Fresh
Definition: Possessed of original life and vigor; new and strong; unimpaired; sound.

Name: Friday
Definition: The sixth day of the week, following Thursday and preceding Saturday.

Name: Fridge
Definition: To rub; to fray.

Name: Friend
Definition: One who entertains for another such sentiments of esteem, respect, and affection that he seeks his society aud welfare; a wellwisher; an intimate associate; sometimes, an attendant.

Name: Friendly
Definition: Having the temper and disposition of a friend; disposed to promote the good of another; kind; favorable.

Name: Friendship
Definition: The state of being friends; friendly relation, or attachment, to a person, or between persons; affection arising from mutual esteem and good will; friendliness; amity; good will.

Name: Frog
Definition: An amphibious animal of the genus Rana and related genera, of many species. Frogs swim rapidly, and take long leaps on land. Many of the species utter loud notes in the springtime.

Name: From
Definition: Out of the neighborhood of; lessening or losing proximity to; leaving behind; by reason of; out of; by aid of; -- used whenever departure, setting out, commencement of action, being, state, occurrence, etc., or procedure, emanation, absence, separation, etc., are to be expressed. It is construed with, and indicates, the point of space or time at which the action, state, etc., are regarded as setting out or beginning; also, less frequently, the source, the cause, the occasion, out of which anything proceeds; -- the aritithesis and correlative of to; as, it, is one hundred miles from Boston to Springfield; he took his sword from his side; light proceeds from the sun; separate the coarse wool from the fine; men have all sprung from Adam, and often go from good to bad, and from bad to worse; the merit of an action depends on the principle from which it proceeds; men judge of facts from personal knowledge, or from testimony.

Name: Front
Definition: The forehead or brow, the part of the face above the eyes; sometimes, also, the whole face.

Name: Frontier
Definition: That part of a country which fronts or faces another country or an unsettled region; the marches; the border, confine, or extreme part of a country, bordering on another country; the border of the settled and cultivated part of a country; as, the frontier of civilization.

Name: Frost
Definition: The act of freezing; -- applied chiefly to the congelation of water; congelation of fluids.

Name: Frozen
Definition: Congealed with cold; affected by freezing; as, a frozen brook.

Name: Fruit
Definition: Whatever is produced for the nourishment or enjoyment of man or animals by the processes of vegetable growth, as corn, grass, cotton, flax, etc.; -- commonly used in the plural.

Name: Fuel
Definition: Any matter used to produce heat by burning; that which feeds fire; combustible matter used for fires, as wood, coal, peat, etc.

Name: Full
Definition: Filled up, having within its limits all that it can contain; supplied; not empty or vacant; -- said primarily of hollow vessels, and hence of anything else; as, a cup full of water; a house full of people.

Name: Fully
Definition: In a full manner or degree; completely; entirely; without lack or defect; adequately; satisfactorily; as, to be fully persuaded of the truth of a proposition.

Name: Function
Definition: The act of executing or performing any duty, office, or calling; per formance.

Name: Functional
Definition: Pertaining to, or connected with, a function or duty; official.

Name: Fund
Definition: An aggregation or deposit of resources from which supplies are or may be drawn for carrying on any work, or for maintaining existence.

Name: Fundamental
Definition: Pertaining to the foundation or basis; serving for the foundation. Hence: Essential, as an element, principle, or law; important; original; elementary; as, a fundamental truth; a fundamental axiom.

Name: Funded
Definition: Existing in the form of bonds bearing regular interest; as, funded debt.

Name: Funding
Definition: Providing a fund for the payment of the interest or principal of a debt.

Name: Funeral
Definition: The solemn rites used in the disposition of a dead human body, whether such disposition be by interment, burning, or otherwise; esp., the ceremony or solemnization of interment; obsequies; burial; -- formerly used in the plural.

Name: Funk
Definition: An offensive smell; a stench.

Name: Funky
Definition: Pertaining to, or characterized by, great fear, or funking.

Name: Funny
Definition: Droll; comical; amusing; laughable.

Name: Furniture
Definition: That with which anything is furnished or supplied; supplies; outfit; equipment.

Name: Further
Definition: To a greater distance; in addition; moreover. See Farther.

Name: Furthermore
Definition: or conj. Moreover; besides; in addition to what has been said.

Name: Fusion
Definition: The act or operation of melting or rendering fluid by heat; the act of melting together; as, the fusion of metals.

Name: Fast
Definition: The shaft of a column, or trunk of pilaster.

Name: Future
Definition: That is to be or come hereafter; that will exist at any time after the present; as, the next moment is future, to the present.

Name: Fuzzy
Definition: Not firmly woven; that ravels.

Name: Gage
Definition: A pledge or pawn; something laid down or given as a security for the performance of some act by the person depositing it, and forfeited by nonperformance; security.

Name: Gain
Definition: A square or beveled notch cut out of a girder, binding joist, or other timber which supports a floor beam, so as to receive the end of the floor beam.

Name: Galaxy
Definition: The Milky Way; that luminous tract, or belt, which is seen at night stretching across the heavens, and which is composed of innumerable stars, so distant and blended as to be distinguishable only with the telescope. The term has recently been used for remote clusters of stars.

Name: Gale
Definition: A strong current of air; a wind between a stiff breeze and a hurricane. The most violent gales are called tempests.

Name: Gallery
Definition: A long and narrow corridor, or place for walking; a connecting passageway, as between one room and another; also, a long hole or passage excavated by a boring or burrowing animal.

Name: Game
Definition: Crooked; lame; as, a game leg.

Name: Gaming
Definition: The act or practice of playing games for stakes or wagers; gambling.

Name: Gamma
Definition: The third letter (/, / = Eng. G) of the Greek alphabet.

Name: Gang
Definition: To go; to walk.

Name: Garbage
Definition: Offal, as the bowels of an animal or fish; refuse animal or vegetable matter from a kitchen; hence, anything worthless, disgusting, or loathsome.

Name: Garden
Definition: A piece of ground appropriated to the cultivation of herbs, fruits, flowers, or vegetables.

Name: Gardening
Definition: The art of occupation of laying out and cultivating gardens; horticulture.

Name: Garlic
Definition: A plant of the genus Allium (A. sativum is the cultivated variety), having a bulbous root, a very strong smell, and an acrid, pungent taste. Each root is composed of several lesser bulbs, called cloves of garlic, inclosed in a common membranous coat, and easily separable.

Name: Gasoline
Definition: A highly volatile mixture of fluid hydrocarbons, obtained from petroleum, as also by the distillation of bituminous coal. It is used in making air gas, and in giving illuminating power to water gas. See Carburetor.

Name: Gate
Definition: A large door or passageway in the wall of a city, of an inclosed field or place, or of a grand edifice, etc.; also, the movable structure of timber, metal, etc., by which the passage can be closed.

Name: Gateway
Definition: A passage through a fence or wall; a gate; also, a frame, arch, etc., in which a gate in hung, or a structure at an entrance or gate designed for ornament or defense.

Name: Gather
Definition: To bring together; to collect, as a number of separate things, into one place, or into one aggregate body; to assemble; to muster; to congregate.

Name: Gathering
Definition: The act of collecting or bringing together.

Name: Gauge
Definition: To measure or determine with a gauge.

Name: Gave
Definition: imp. of Give.

Name: Gazette
Definition: A newspaper; a printed sheet published periodically; esp., the official journal published by the British government, and containing legal and state notices.

Name: Gear
Definition: Clothing; garments; ornaments.

Name: Gender
Definition: Kind; sort.

Name: Genealogy
Definition: An account or history of the descent of a person or family from an ancestor; enumeration of ancestors and their children in the natural order of succession; a pedigree.

Name: General
Definition: Relating to a genus or kind; pertaining to a whole class or order; as, a general law of animal or vegetable economy.

Name: Generally
Definition: In general; commonly; extensively, though not universally; most frequently.

Name: Generate
Definition: To beget; to procreate; to propagate; to produce (a being similar to the parent); to engender; as, every animal generates its own species.

Name: Generation
Definition: The act of generating or begetting; procreation, as of animals.

Name: Generator
Definition: One who, or that which, generates, begets, causes, or produces.

Name: Generic
Definition: Alt. of Generical

Name: Generous
Definition: Of honorable birth or origin; highborn.

Name: Genesis
Definition: The act of producing, or giving birth or origin to anything; the process or mode of originating; production; formation; origination.

Name: Genetic
Definition: Same as Genetical.

Name: Geneva
Definition: The chief city of Switzerland.

Name: Genius
Definition: A good or evil spirit, or demon, supposed by the ancients to preside over a man's destiny in life; a tutelary deity; a supernatural being; a spirit, good or bad.  Cf. Jinnee.

Name: Genre
Definition: A style of painting, sculpture, or other imitative art, which illustrates everyday life and manners.

Name: Gentle
Definition: Well-born; of a good family or respectable birth, though not noble.

Name: Gentleman
Definition: A man well born; one of good family; one above the condition of a yeoman.

Name: Gently
Definition: In a gentle manner.

Name: Genuine
Definition: Belonging to, or proceeding from, the original stock; native; hence, not counterfeit, spurious, false, or adulterated; authentic; real; natural; true; pure; as, a genuine text; a genuine production; genuine materials.

Name: Geographic
Definition: Alt. of Geographical

Name: Geographical
Definition: Of or pertaining to geography.

Name: Geography
Definition: The science which treats of the world and its inhabitants; a description of the earth, or a portion of the earth, including its structure, fetures, products, political divisions, and the people by whom it is inhabited.

Name: Geological
Definition: Of or pertaining to geology, or the science of the earth.

Name: Geology
Definition: The science which treats: (a) Of the structure and mineral constitution of the globe; structural geology. (b) Of its history as regards rocks, minerals, rivers, valleys, mountains, climates, life, etc.; historical geology. (c) Of the causes and methods by which its structure, features, changes, and conditions have been produced; dynamical geology. See Chart of The Geological Series.

Name: Geometry
Definition: That branch of mathematics which investigates the relations, properties, and measurement of solids, surfaces, lines, and angles; the science which treats of the properties and relations of magnitudes; the science of the relations of space.

Name: George
Definition: A figure of St. George (the patron saint of England) on horseback, appended to the collar of the Order of the Garter. See Garter.

Name: German
Definition: Nearly related; closely akin.

Name: Getting
Definition: The act of obtaining or acquiring; acquisition.

Name: Ghost
Definition: The spirit; the soul of man.

Name: Giant
Definition: A man of extraordinari bulk and stature.

Name: Gift
Definition: Anything given; anything voluntarily transferred by one person to another without compensation; a present; an offering.

Name: Guide
Definition: The leather strap by which the shield of a knight was slung across the shoulder, or across the neck and shoulder.

Name: Girl
Definition: A young person of either sex; a child.

Name: Give
Definition: To bestow without receiving a return; to confer without compensation; to impart, as a possession; to grant, as authority or permission; to yield up or allow.

Name: Given
Definition: p. p. & a. from Give, v.

Name: Gives
Definition: Fetters.

Name: Giving
Definition: The act of bestowing as a gift; a conferring or imparting.

Name: Glad
Definition: Pleased; joyous; happy; cheerful; gratified; -- opposed to sorry, sorrowful, or unhappy; -- said of persons, and often followed by of, at, that, or by the infinitive, and sometimes by with, introducing the cause or reason.

Name: Glance
Definition: A sudden flash of light or splendor.

Name: Glass
Definition: A hard, brittle, translucent, and commonly transparent substance, white or colored, having a conchoidal fracture, and made by fusing together sand or silica with lime, potash, soda, or lead oxide. It is used for window panes and mirrors, for articles of table and culinary use, for lenses, and various articles of ornament.

Name: Glen
Definition: A secluded and narrow valley; a dale; a depression between hills.

Name: Globe
Definition: A round or spherical body, solid or hollow; a body whose surface is in every part equidistant from the center; a ball; a sphere.

Name: Glory
Definition: Praise, honor, admiration, or distinction, accorded by common consent to a person or thing; high reputation; honorable fame; renown.

Name: Glossary
Definition: A collection of glosses or explanations of words and passages of a work or author; a partial dictionary of a work, an author, a dialect, art, or science, explaining archaic, technical, or other uncommon words.

Name: Glow
Definition: To shine with an intense or white heat; to give forth vivid light and heat; to be incandescent.

Name: Glucose
Definition: A variety of sugar occurring in nature very abundantly, as in ripe grapes, and in honey, and produced in great quantities from starch, etc., by the action of heat and acids. It is only about half as sweet as cane sugar. Called also dextrose, grape sugar, diabetic sugar, and starch sugar. See Dextrose.

Name: Gnome
Definition: An imaginary being, supposed by the Rosicrucians to inhabit the inner parts of the earth, and to be the guardian of mines, quarries, etc.

Name: Goal
Definition: The mark set to bound a race, and to or around which the constestants run, or from which they start to return to it again; the place at which a race or a journey is to end.

Name: Goat
Definition: A hollow-horned ruminant of the genus Capra, of several species and varieties, esp. the domestic goat (C. hircus), which is raised for its milk, flesh, and skin.

Name: Going
Definition: The act of moving in any manner; traveling; as, the going is bad.

Name: Gold
Definition: Alt. of Goolde

Name: Gold
Definition: A metallic element, constituting the most precious metal used as a common commercial medium of exchange. It has a characteristic yellow color, is one of the heaviest substances known (specific gravity 19.32), is soft, and very malleable and ductile. It is quite unalterable by heat, moisture, and most corrosive agents, and therefore well suited for its use in coin and jewelry. Symbol Au (Aurum). Atomic weight 196.7.

Name: Golden
Definition: Made of gold; consisting of gold.

Name: Golf
Definition: A game played with a small ball and a bat or club crooked at the lower end. He who drives the ball into each of a series of small holes in the ground and brings it into the last hole with the fewest strokes is the winner.

Name: Gone
Definition: p. p. of Go.

Name: Good
Definition: Possessing desirable qualities; adapted to answer the end designed; promoting success, welfare, or happiness; serviceable; useful; fit; excellent; admirable; commendable; not bad, corrupt, evil, noxious, offensive, or troublesome, etc.

Name: Guru
Definition: A spiritual teacher, guide, or confessor amoung the Hindoos.

Name: Gore
Definition: Dirt; mud.

Name: Gorgeous
Definition: Imposing through splendid or various colors; showy; fine; magnificent.

Name: Gospel
Definition: Glad tidings; especially, the good news concerning Christ, the Kingdom of God, and salvation.

Name: Gossip
Definition: A sponsor; a godfather or a godmother.

Name: Gothic
Definition: Pertaining to the Goths; as, Gothic customs; also, rude; barbarous.

Name: Gotten
Definition: p. p. of Get.

Name: Gourmet
Definition: A connoisseur in eating and drinking; an epicure.

Name: Governance
Definition: Exercise of authority; control; government; arrangement.

Name: Governing
Definition: Holding the superiority; prevalent; controlling; as, a governing wind; a governing party in a state.

Name: Government
Definition: The act of governing; the exercise of authority; the administration of laws; control; direction; regulation; as, civil, church, or family government.

Name: Governmental
Definition: Pertaining to government; made by government; as, governmental duties.

Name: Governor
Definition: One who governs; especially, one who is invested with the supreme executive authority in a State; a chief ruler or magistrate; as, the governor of Pennsylvania.

Name: Grab
Definition: A vessel used on the Malabar coast, having two or three masts.

Name: Grace
Definition: The exercise of love, kindness, mercy, favor; disposition to benefit or serve another; favor bestowed or privilege conferred.

Name: Grade
Definition: A step or degree in any series, rank, quality, order; relative position or standing; as, grades of military rank; crimes of every grade; grades of flour.

Name: Gradually
Definition: In a gradual manner.

Name: Graduate
Definition: To mark with degrees; to divide into regular steps, grades, or intervals, as the scale of a thermometer, a scheme of punishment or rewards, etc.

Name: Graduated
Definition: Marked with, or divided into, degrees; divided into grades.

Name: Graduation
Definition: The act of graduating, or the state of being graduated; as, graduation of a scale; graduation at a college; graduation in color; graduation by evaporation; the graduation of a bird's tail, etc.

Name: Grain
Definition: A single small hard seed; a kernel, especially of  those plants, like wheat, whose seeds are used for food.

Name: Grammar
Definition: The science which treats of the principles of language; the study of forms of speech, and their relations to one another; the art concerned with the right use aud application of the rules of a language, in speaking or writing.

Name: Grand
Definition: Of large size or extent; great; extensive; hence, relatively great; greatest; chief; principal; as, a grand mountain; a grand army; a grand mistake.

Name: Granny
Definition: A grandmother; a grandam; familiarly, an old woman.

Name: Grant
Definition: To give over; to make conveyance of; to give the possession or title of; to convey; -- usually in answer to petition.

Name: Graphic
Definition: Alt. of Graphical

Name: Graphical
Definition: Of or pertaining to the arts of painting and drawing.

Name: Graphics
Definition: The art or the science of drawing; esp. of drawing according to mathematical rules, as in perspective, projection, and the like.

Name: Grass
Definition: Popularly: Herbage; the plants which constitute the food of cattle and other beasts; pasture.

Name: Grateful
Definition: Having a due sense of benefits received; kindly disposed toward one from whom a favor has been received; willing to acknowledge and repay, or give thanks for, benefits; as, a grateful heart.

Name: Gratis
Definition: For nothing; without fee or recompense; freely; gratuitously.

Name: Grave
Definition: To clean, as a vessel's bottom, of barnacles, grass, etc., and pay it over with pitch; -- so called because graves or greaves was formerly used for this purpose.

Name: Gravity
Definition: The state of having weight; beaviness; as, the gravity of lead.

Name: Gray
Definition: White mixed with black, as the color of pepper and salt, or of ashes, or of hair whitened by age; sometimes, a dark mixed color; as, the soft gray eye of a dove.

Name: Great
Definition: Large in space; of much size; big; immense; enormous; expanded; -- opposed to small and little; as, a great house, ship, farm, plain, distance, length.

Name: Greatly
Definition: In a great degree; much.

Name: Greek
Definition: Of or pertaining to Greece or the Greeks; Grecian.

Name: Green
Definition: Having the color of grass when fresh and growing; resembling that color of the solar spectrum which is between the yellow and the blue; verdant; emerald.

Name: Greenhouse
Definition: A house in which tender plants are cultivated and sheltered from the weather.

Name: Greeting
Definition: Expression of kindness or joy; salutation at meeting; a compliment from one absent.

Name: Grew
Definition: imp. of Grow.

Name: Grid
Definition: A grating of thin parallel bars, similar to a gridiron.

Name: Grade
Definition: A harsh scraping or cutting; a grating.

Name: Griffin
Definition: An Anglo-Indian name for a person just arrived from Europe.

Name: Grill
Definition: A gridiron.

Name: Grip
Definition: The griffin.

Name: Grocery
Definition: The commodities sold by grocers, as tea, coffee, spices, etc.; -- in the United States almost always in the plural form, in this sense.

Name: Groove
Definition: A furrow, channel, or long hollow, such as may be formed by cutting, molding, grinding, the wearing force of flowing water, or constant travel; a depressed way; a worn path; a rut.

Name: Gross
Definition: Great; large; bulky; fat; of huge size; excessively large.

Name: Ground
Definition: The surface of the earth; the outer crust of the globe, or some indefinite portion of it.

Name: Group
Definition: A cluster, crowd, or throng; an assemblage, either of persons or things, collected without any regular form or arrangement; as, a group of men or of trees; a group of isles.

Name: Grove
Definition: A smaller group of trees than a forest, and without underwood, planted, or growing naturally as if arranged by art; a wood of small extent.

Name: Grow
Definition: To increase in size by a natural and organic process; to increase in bulk by the gradual assimilation of new matter into the living organism; -- said of animals and vegetables and their organs.

Name: Grown
Definition: p. p. of Grow.

Name: Growth
Definition: The process of growing; the gradual increase of an animal or a vegetable body; the development from a seed, germ, or root, to full size or maturity; increase in size, number, frequency, strength, etc.; augmentation; advancement; production; prevalence or influence; as, the growth of trade; the growth of power; the growth of intemperance.  Idle weeds are fast in growth.

Name: Guarantee
Definition: In law and common usage: A promise to answer for the payment of some debt, or the performance of some duty, in case of the failure of another person, who is, in the first instance, liable to such payment or performance; an engagement which secures or insures another against a contingency; a warranty; a security. Same as Guaranty.

Name: Guard
Definition: To protect from danger; to secure against surprise, attack, or injury; to keep in safety; to defend; to shelter; to shield from surprise or attack; to protect by attendance; to accompany for protection; to care for.

Name: Guardian
Definition: One who guards, preserves, or secures; one to whom any person or thing is committed for protection, security, or preservation from injury; a warden.

Name: Guards
Definition: A body of picked troops; as,

Name: Guess
Definition: To form an opinion concerning, without knowledge or means of knowledge; to judge of at random; to conjecture.

Name: Guest
Definition: A visitor; a person received and entertained in one's house or at one's table; a visitor entertained without pay.

Name: Guidance
Definition: The act or result of guiding; the superintendence or assistance of a guide; direction; government; a leading.

Name: Guide
Definition: To lead or direct in a way; to conduct in a course or path; to pilot; as, to guide a traveler.

Name: Guild
Definition: An association of men belonging to the same class, or engaged in kindred pursuits, formed for mutual aid and protection; a business fraternity or corporation; as, the Stationers' Guild; the Ironmongers' Guild. They were originally licensed by the government, and endowed with special privileges and authority.

Name: Guilty
Definition: Having incurred guilt; criminal; morally delinquent; wicked; chargeable with, or responsible for, something censurable; justly exposed to penalty; -- used with of, and usually followed by the crime, sometimes by the punishment.

Name: Guinea
Definition: A district on the west coast of Africa (formerly noted for its export of gold and slaves) after which the Guinea fowl, Guinea grass, Guinea peach, etc., are named.

Name: Guitar
Definition: A stringed instrument of music resembling the lute or the violin, but larger, and having six strings, three of silk covered with silver wire, and three of catgut, -- played upon with the fingers.

Name: Gulf
Definition: A hollow place in the earth; an abyss; a deep chasm or basin,

Name: Habitat
Definition: The natural abode, locality or region of an animal or plant.

Name: Hack
Definition: A frame or grating of various kinds; as, a frame for drying bricks, fish, or cheese; a rack for feeding cattle; a grating in a mill race, etc.

Name: Hacker
Definition: One who, or that which, hacks. Specifically: A cutting instrument for making notches; esp., one used for notching pine trees in collecting turpentine; a hack.

Name: Hair
Definition: The collection or mass of filaments growing from the skin of an animal, and forming a covering for a part of the head or for any part or the whole of the body.

Name: Hairy
Definition: Bearing or covered with hair; made of or resembling hair; rough with hair; rough with hair; rough with hair; hirsute.

Name: Half
Definition: Consisting of a moiety, or half; as, a half bushel; a half hour; a half dollar; a half view.

Name: Hall
Definition: A building or room of considerable size and stateliness, used for public purposes; as, Westminster Hall, in London.

Name: Halloween
Definition: The evening preceding Allhallows or All Saints' Day.

Name: Halo
Definition: A luminous circle, usually prismatically colored, round the sun or moon, and supposed to be caused by the refraction of light through crystals of ice in the atmosphere. Connected with halos there are often white bands, crosses, or arches, resulting from the same atmospheric conditions.

Name: Hamburg
Definition: A commercial city of Germany, near the mouth of the Elbe.

Name: Hammer
Definition: An instrument for driving nails, beating metals, and the like, consisting of a head, usually of steel or iron, fixed crosswise to a handle.

Name: Hand
Definition: That part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in man and monkeys, and the corresponding part in many other animals; manus; paw. See Manus.

Name: Handbook
Definition: A book of reference, to be carried in the hand; a manual; a guidebook.

Name: Handed
Definition: With hands joined; hand in hand.

Name: Handle
Definition: To touch; to feel with the hand; to use or hold with the hand.

Name: Handling
Definition: A touching, controlling, managing, using, etc., with the hand or hands, or as with the hands. See Handle, v. t.

Name: Handmade
Definition: Manufactured by hand; as, handmade shoes.

Name: Handy
Definition: Performed by the hand.

Name: Hang
Definition: To suspend; to fasten to some elevated point without support from below; -- often used with up or out; as, to hang a coat on a hook; to hang up a sign; to hang out a banner.

Name: Hanging
Definition: Requiring, deserving, or foreboding death by the halter.

Name: Happen
Definition: To come by chance; to come without previous expectation; to fall out.

Name: Happiness
Definition: Good luck; good fortune; prosperity.

Name: Happy
Definition: Favored by hap, luck, or fortune; lucky; fortunate; successful; prosperous; satisfying desire; as, a happy expedient; a happy effort; a happy venture; a happy omen.

Name: Harassment
Definition: The act of harassing, or state of being harassed; worry; annoyance; anxiety.

Name: Harbor
Definition: A station for rest and entertainment; a place of security and comfort; a refuge; a shelter.

Name: Hard
Definition: Not easily penetrated, cut, or separated into parts; not yielding to pressure; firm; solid; compact; -- applied to material bodies, and opposed to soft; as, hard wood; hard flesh; a hard apple.

Name: Harder
Definition: A South African mullet, salted for food.

Name: Hardly
Definition: In a hard or difficult manner; with difficulty.

Name: Hardware
Definition: Ware made of metal, as cutlery, kitchen utensils, and the like; ironmongery.

Name: Harm
Definition: Injury; hurt; damage; detriment; misfortune.

Name: Harmful
Definition: Full of harm; injurious; hurtful; mischievous.

Name: Harmony
Definition: The just adaptation of parts to each other, in any system or combination of things, or in things, or things intended to form a connected whole; such an agreement between the different parts of a design or composition as to produce unity of effect; as, the harmony of the universe.

Name: Harper
Definition: A player on the harp; a minstrel.

Name: Harry
Definition: To strip; to lay waste; as, the Northmen came several times and harried the land.

Name: Hart
Definition: A stag; the male of the red deer. See the Note under Buck.

Name: Hartford
Definition: The Hartford grape, a variety of grape first raised at Hartford, Connecticut, from the Northern fox grape. Its large dark-colored berries ripen earlier than those of most other kinds.

Name: Harvest
Definition: The gathering of a crop of any kind; the ingathering of the crops; also, the season of gathering grain and fruits, late summer or early autumn.

Name: Hash
Definition: That which is hashed or chopped up; meat and vegetables, especially such as have been already cooked, chopped into small pieces and mixed.

Name: Hate
Definition: To have a great aversion to, with a strong desire that evil should befall the person toward whom the feeling is directed; to dislike intensely; to detest; as, to hate one's enemies; to hate hypocrisy.

Name: Have
Definition: To hold in possession or control; to own; as, he has a farm.

Name: Haven
Definition: A bay, recess, or inlet of the sea, or the mouth of a river, which affords anchorage and shelter for shipping; a harbor; a port.

Name: Having
Definition: Possession; goods; estate.

Name: Hawaiian
Definition: Belonging to Hawaii or the Sandwich Islands, or to the people of Hawaii.

Name: Hawk
Definition: One of numerous species and genera of rapacious birds of the family Falconidae. They differ from the true falcons in lacking the prominent tooth and notch of the bill, and in having shorter and less pointed wings. Many are of large size and grade into the eagles. Some, as the goshawk, were formerly trained like falcons. In a more general sense the word is not infrequently applied, also, to true falcons, as the sparrow hawk, pigeon hawk, duck hawk, and prairie hawk.

Name: Hazard
Definition: A game of chance played with dice.

Name: Hazardous
Definition: Exposed to hazard; dangerous; risky.

Name: Head
Definition: The anterior or superior part of an animal, containing the brain, or chief ganglia of the nervous system, the mouth, and in the higher animals, the chief sensory organs; poll; cephalon.

Name: Headed
Definition: Furnished with a head (commonly as denoting intellectual faculties); -- used in composition; as, clear-headed, long-headed, thick-headed; a many-headed monster.

Name: Header
Definition: One who, or that which, heads nails, rivets, etc., esp. a machine for heading.

Name: Heading
Definition: The act or state of one who, or that which, heads; formation of a head.

Name: Headline
Definition: The line at the head or top of a page.

Name: Headquarters
Definition: The quarters or place of residence of any chief officer, as the general in command of an army, or the head of a police force; the place from which orders or instructions are issued; hence, the center of authority or order.

Name: Healing
Definition: Tending to cure; soothing; mollifying; as, the healing art; a healing salve; healing words.

Name: Health
Definition: The state of being hale, sound, or whole, in body, mind, or soul; especially, the state of being free from physical disease or pain.

Name: Healthy
Definition: Being in a state of health; enjoying health; hale; sound; free from disease; as, a healthy chid; a healthy plant.

Name: Hear
Definition: To perceive by the ear; to apprehend or take cognizance of by the ear; as, to hear sounds; to hear a voice; to hear one call.

Name: Heard
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Hear.

Name: Hearing
Definition: The act or power of perceiving sound; perception of sound; the faculty or sense by which sound is perceived; as, my hearing is good.

Name: Heart
Definition: A hollow, muscular organ, which, by contracting rhythmically, keeps up the circulation of the blood.

Name: Heat
Definition: A force in nature which is recognized in various effects, but especially in the phenomena of fusion and evaporation, and which, as manifested in fire, the sun's rays, mechanical action, chemical combination, etc., becomes directly known to us through the sense of feeling. In its nature heat is a mode if motion, being in general a form of molecular disturbance or vibration. It was formerly supposed to be a subtile, imponderable fluid, to which was given the name caloric.

Name: Heater
Definition: One who, or that which, heats.

Name: Heath
Definition: A low shrub (Erica, / Calluna, vulgaris), with minute evergreen leaves, and handsome clusters of pink flowers. It is used in Great Britain for brooms, thatch, beds for the poor, and for heating ovens. It is also called heather, and ling.

Name: Heather
Definition: Heath.

Name: Heating
Definition: That heats or imparts heat; promoting warmth or heat; exciting action; stimulating; as, heating medicines or applications.

Name: Heaven
Definition: The expanse of space surrounding the earth; esp., that which seems to be over the earth like a great arch or dome; the firmament; the sky; the place where the sun, moon, and stars appear; -- often used in the plural in this sense.

Name: Heavily
Definition: In a heavy manner; with great weight; as, to bear heavily on a thing; to be heavily loaded.

Name: Heavy
Definition: Having the heaves.

Name: Hebrew
Definition: An appellative of Abraham or of one of his descendants, esp. in the line of Jacob; an Israelite; a Jew.

Name: Heel
Definition: To lean or tip to one side, as a ship; as, the ship heels aport; the boat heeled over when the squall struck it.

Name: Height
Definition: The condition of being high; elevated position.

Name: Held
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Hold.

Name: Helmet
Definition: A defensive covering for the head. See Casque, Headpiece, Morion, Sallet, and Illust. of Beaver.

Name: Help
Definition: To furnish with strength or means for the successful performance of any action or the attainment of any object; to aid; to assist; as, to help a man in his work; to help one to remember; -- the following infinitive is commonly used without to; as,

Name: Helpful
Definition: Furnishing help; giving aid; assistant; useful; salutary.

Name: Hence
Definition: From this place; away.

Name: Henry
Definition: The unit of electric induction; the induction in a circuit when the electro-motive force induced in this circuit is one volt, while the inducing current varies at the rate of one ampere a second.

Name: Hepatitis
Definition: Inflammation of the liver.

Name: Here
Definition: Of them; their.

Name: Herald
Definition: An officer whose business was to denounce or proclaim war, to challenge to battle, to proclaim peace, and to bear messages from the commander of an army. He was invested with a sacred and inviolable character.

Name: Herb
Definition: A plant whose stem does not become woody and permanent, but dies, at least down to the ground, after flowering.

Name: Herbal
Definition: Of or pertaining to herbs.

Name: Here
Definition: Hair.

Name: Hereby
Definition: By means of this.

Name: Herein
Definition: In this.

Name: Heritage
Definition: That which is inherited, or passes from heir to heir; inheritance.

Name: Hero
Definition: An illustrious man, supposed to be exalted, after death, to a place among the gods; a demigod, as Hercules.

Name: Herself
Definition: An emphasized form of the third person feminine pronoun; -- used as a subject with she; as, she herself will bear the blame; also used alone in the predicate, either in the nominative or objective case; as, it is herself; she blames herself.

Name: Hidden
Definition: from Hide. Concealed; put out of view; secret; not known; mysterious.

Name: Hide
Definition: To conceal, or withdraw from sight; to put out of view; to secrete.

Name: Hierarchy
Definition: Dominion or authority in sacred things.

Name: High
Definition: To hie.

Name: Highland
Definition: Elevated or mountainous land; (often in the pl.) an elevated region or country; as, the Highlands of Scotland.

Name: Highly
Definition: In a high manner, or to a high degree; very much; as, highly esteemed.

Name: Highway
Definition: A road or way open to the use of the public; a main road or thoroughfare.

Name: Hill
Definition: A natural elevation of land, or a mass of earth rising above the common level of the surrounding land; an eminence less than a mountain.

Name: Himself
Definition: An emphasized form of the third person masculine pronoun; -- used as a subject usually with he; as, he himself will bear the blame; used alone in the predicate, either in the nominative or objective case; as, it is himself who saved himself.

Name: Hindu
Definition: A native inhabitant of Hindostan. As an ethnical term it is confined to the Dravidian and Aryan races; as a religious name it is restricted to followers of the Veda.

Name: Hindu
Definition: Same as Hindoo.

Name: Hint
Definition: To bring to mind by a slight mention or remote allusion; to suggest in an indirect manner; as, to hint a suspicion.

Name: Hire
Definition: The price, reward, or compensation paid, or contracted to be paid, for the temporary use of a thing or a place, for personal service, or for labor; wages; rent; pay.

Name: Hispanic
Definition: Of or pertaining to Spain or its language; as, Hispanic words.

Name: Hist
Definition: Hush; be silent; -- a signal for silence.

Name: Historic
Definition: Alt. of Historical

Name: Historical
Definition: Of or pertaining to history, or the record of past events; as, an historical poem; the historic page.

Name: History
Definition: A learning or knowing by inquiry; the knowledge of facts and events, so obtained; hence, a formal statement of such information; a narrative; a description; a written record; as, the history of a patient's case; the history of a legislative bill.

Name: Hobby
Definition: A small, strong-winged European falcon (Falco subbuteo), formerly trained for hawking.

Name: Hockey
Definition: A game in which two parties of players, armed with sticks curved or hooked at the end, attempt to drive any small object (as a ball or a bit of wood) toward opposite goals.

Name: Hold
Definition: The whole interior portion of a vessel below the lower deck, in which the cargo is stowed.

Name: Holder
Definition: One who is employed in the hold of a vessel.

Name: Holding
Definition: The act or state of sustaining, grasping, or retaining.

Name: Hole
Definition: Whole.

Name: Holiday
Definition: A consecrated day; religious anniversary; a day set apart in honor of some person, or in commemoration of some event. See Holyday.

Name: Holland
Definition: A kind of linen first manufactured in Holland; a linen fabric used for window shades, children's garments, etc.; as, brown or unbleached hollands.

Name: Hollow
Definition: Having an empty space or cavity, natural or artificial, within a solid substance; not solid; excavated in the interior; as, a hollow tree; a hollow sphere.

Name: Holly
Definition: Wholly.

Name: Holocaust
Definition: A burnt sacrifice; an offering, the whole of which was consumed by fire, among the Jews and some pagan nations.

Name: Holy
Definition: Set apart to the service or worship of God; hallowed; sacred; reserved from profane or common use; holy vessels; a holy priesthood.

Name: Home
Definition: One's own dwelling place; the house in which one lives; esp., the house in which one lives with his family; the habitual abode of one's family; also, one's birthplace.

Name: Homeless
Definition: Destitute of a home.

Name: Honest
Definition: Decent; honorable; suitable; becoming.

Name: Honey
Definition: A sweet viscid fluid, esp. that collected by bees from flowers of plants, and deposited in the cells of the honeycomb.

Name: Hong
Definition: A mercantile establishment or factory for foreign trade in China, as formerly at Canton; a succession of offices connected by a common passage and used for business or storage.

Name: Honor
Definition: Esteem due or paid to worth; high estimation; respect; consideration; reverence; veneration; manifestation of respect or reverence.

Name: Hood
Definition: State; condition.

Name: Hook
Definition: A piece of metal, or other hard material, formed or bent into a curve or at an angle, for catching, holding, or sustaining anything; as, a hook for catching fish; a hook for fastening a gate; a boat hook, etc.

Name: Hope
Definition: A sloping plain between mountain ridges.

Name: Horizon
Definition: The circle which bounds that part of the earth's surface visible to a spectator from a given point; the apparent junction of the earth and sky.

Name: Horizontal
Definition: Pertaining to, or near, the horizon.

Name: Horn
Definition: A hard, projecting, and usually pointed organ, growing upon the heads of certain animals, esp. of the ruminants, as cattle, goats, and the like. The hollow horns of the Ox family consist externally of true horn, and are never shed.

Name: Horrible
Definition: Exciting, or tending to excite, horror or fear; dreadful; terrible; shocking; hideous; as, a horrible sight; a horrible story; a horrible murder.

Name: Horror
Definition: A bristling up; a rising into roughness; tumultuous movement.

Name: Horse
Definition: A hoofed quadruped of the genus Equus; especially, the domestic horse (E. caballus), which was domesticated in Egypt and Asia at a very early period. It has six broad molars, on each side of each jaw, with six incisors, and two canine teeth, both above and below. The mares usually have the canine teeth rudimentary or wanting. The horse differs from the true asses, in having a long, flowing mane, and the tail bushy to the base. Unlike the asses it has callosities, or chestnuts, on all its legs. The horse excels in strength, speed, docility, courage, and nobleness of character, and is used for drawing, carrying, bearing a rider, and like purposes.

Name: Hose
Definition: Close-fitting trousers or breeches, as formerly worn, reaching to the knee.

Name: Hospital
Definition: A place for shelter or entertainment; an inn.

Name: Hospitality
Definition: The act or practice of one who is hospitable; reception and entertainment of strangers or guests without reward, or with kind and generous liberality.

Name: Host
Definition: The consecrated wafer, believed to be the body of Christ, which in the Mass is offered as a sacrifice; also, the bread before consecration.

Name: Hostel
Definition: An inn.

Name: Hosting
Definition: An encounter; a battle.

Name: Hotel
Definition: A house for entertaining strangers or travelers; an inn or public house, of the better class.

Name: Hour
Definition: The twenty-fourth part of a day; sixty minutes.

Name: Hourly
Definition: Happening or done every hour; occurring hour by hour; frequent; often repeated; renewed hour by hour; continual.

Name: Hours
Definition: Goddess of the seasons, or of the hours of the day.

Name: House
Definition: A structure intended or used as a habitation or shelter for animals of any kind; but especially, a building or edifice for the habitation of man; a dwelling place, a mansion.

Name: Household
Definition: Those who dwell under the same roof and compose a family.

Name: Housing
Definition: The act of putting or receiving under shelter; the state of dwelling in a habitation.

Name: However
Definition: In whetever manner, way, or degree.

Name: Huge
Definition: Very large; enormous; immense; excessive; -- used esp. of material bulk, but often of qualities, extent, etc.; as, a huge ox; a huge space; a huge difference.

Name: Hull
Definition: The outer covering of anything, particularly of a nut or of grain; the outer skin of a kernel; the husk.

Name: Human
Definition: Belonging to man or mankind; having the qualities or attributes of a man; of or pertaining to man or to the race of man; as, a human voice; human shape; human nature; human sacrifices.

Name: Humanitarian
Definition: Pertaining to humanitarians, or to humanitarianism; as, a humanitarian view of Christ's nature.

Name: Humanity
Definition: The quality of being human; the peculiar nature of man, by which he is distinguished from other beings.

Name: Humidity
Definition: Moisture; dampness; a moderate degree of wetness, which is perceptible to the eye or touch; -- used especially of the atmosphere, or of anything which has absorbed moisture from the atmosphere, as clothing.

Name: Humor
Definition: Moisture, especially, the moisture or fluid of animal bodies, as the chyle, lymph, etc.; as, the humors of the eye, etc.

Name: Hundred
Definition: The product of ten mulitplied by ten, or the number of ten times ten; a collection or sum, consisting of ten times ten units or objects; five score. Also, a symbol representing one hundred units, as 100 or C.

Name: Hung
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Hang.

Name: Hungarian
Definition: Of or pertaining to Hungary or to the people of Hungary.

Name: Hungary
Definition: A country in Central Europe, now a part of the Austro-Hungarian Empire.

Name: Hunger
Definition: An uneasy sensation occasioned normally by the want of food; a craving or desire for food.

Name: Hungry
Definition: Feeling hunger; having a keen appetite; feeling uneasiness or distress from want of food; hence, having an eager desire.

Name: Hunt
Definition: To search for or follow after, as game or wild animals; to chase; to pursue for the purpose of catching or killing; to follow with dogs or guns for sport or exercise; as, to hunt a deer.

Name: Hunter
Definition: One who hunts wild animals either for sport or for food; a huntsman.

Name: Hunting
Definition: The pursuit of game or of wild animals.

Name: Hurricane
Definition: A violent storm, characterized by extreme fury and sudden changes of the wind, and generally accompanied by rain, thunder, and lightning; -- especially prevalent in the East and West Indies. Also used figuratively.

Name: Hurt
Definition: A band on a trip-hammer helve, bearing the trunnions.

Name: Husband
Definition: The male head of a household; one who orders the economy of a family.

Name: Hybrid
Definition: The offspring of the union of two distinct species; an animal or plant produced from the mixture of two species. See Mongrel.

Name: Hydraulic
Definition: Of or pertaining to hydraulics, or to fluids in motion; conveying, or acting by, water; as, an hydraulic clock, crane, or dock.

Name: Hydrogen
Definition: A gaseous element, colorless, tasteless, and odorless, the lightest known substance, being fourteen and a half times lighter than air (hence its use in filling balloons), and over eleven thousand times lighter than water. It is very abundant, being an ingredient of water and of many other substances, especially those of animal or vegetable origin. It may by produced in many ways, but is chiefly obtained by the action of acids (as sulphuric) on metals, as zinc, iron, etc. It is very inflammable, and is an ingredient of coal gas and water gas. It is standard of chemical equivalents or combining weights, and also of valence, being the typical monad. Symbol H. Atomic weight 1.

Name: Hygiene
Definition: That department of sanitary science which treats of the preservation of health, esp. of households and communities; a system of principles or rules designated for the promotion of health.

Name: Hypothesis
Definition: A supposition; a proposition or principle which is supposed or taken for granted, in order to draw a conclusion or inference for proof of the point in question; something not proved, but assumed for the purpose of argument, or to account for a fact or an occurrence; as, the hypothesis that head winds detain an overdue steamer.

Name: Hypothetical
Definition: Characterized by, or of the nature of, an hypothesis; conditional; assumed without proof, for the purpose of reasoning and deducing proof, or of accounting for some fact or phenomenon.

Name: Icon
Definition: An image or representation; a portrait or pretended portrait.

Name: Idea
Definition: The transcript, image, or picture of a visible object, that is formed by the mind; also, a similar image of any object whatever, whether sensible or spiritual.

Name: Ideal
Definition: Existing in idea or thought; conceptional; intellectual; mental; as, ideal knowledge.

Name: Identical
Definition: The same; the selfsame; the very same; not different; as, the identical person or thing.

Name: Identification
Definition: The act of identifying, or proving to be the same; also, the state of being identified.

Name: Identify
Definition: To make to be the same; to unite or combine in such a manner as to make one; to treat as being one or having the same purpose or effect; to consider as the same in any relation.

Name: Identity
Definition: The state or quality of being identical, or the same; sameness.

Name: Idle
Definition: Of no account; useless; vain; trifling; unprofitable; thoughtless; silly; barren.

Name: Idol
Definition: An image or representation of anything.

Name: Ignore
Definition: To be ignorant of or not acquainted with.

Name: Illegal
Definition: Not according to, or authorized by, law; specif., contrary to, or in violation of, human law; unlawful; illicit; hence, immoral; as, an illegal act; illegal trade; illegal love.

Name: Illinois
Definition: A tribe of North American Indians, which formerly occupied the region between the Wabash and Mississippi rivers.

Name: Illness
Definition: The condition of being ill, evil, or bad; badness; unfavorableness.

Name: Illustration
Definition: The act of illustrating; the act of making clear and distinct; education; also, the state of being illustrated, or of being made clear and distinct.

Name: Image
Definition: An imitation, representation, or similitude of any person, thing, or act, sculptured, drawn, painted, or otherwise made perceptible to the sight; a visible presentation; a copy; a likeness; an effigy; a picture; a semblance.

Name: Imagination
Definition: The imagine-making power of the mind; the power to create or reproduce ideally an object of sense previously perceived; the power to call up mental imagines.

Name: Imagine
Definition: To form in the mind a notion or idea of; to form a mental image of; to conceive; to produce by the imagination.

Name: Immediate
Definition: Not separated in respect to place by anything intervening; proximate; close; as, immediate contact.

Name: Immediately
Definition: In an immediate manner; without intervention of any other person or thing; proximately; directly; -- opposed to mediately; as, immediately contiguous.

Name: Immigration
Definition: The act of immigrating; the passing or coming into a country for the purpose of permanent residence.

Name: Immune
Definition: Exempt; protected by inoculation.

Name: Impact
Definition: To drive close; to press firmly together: to wedge into a place.

Name: Imperial
Definition: Of or pertaining to an empire, or to an emperor; as, an imperial government; imperial authority or edict.

Name: Implement
Definition: That which fulfills or supplies a want or use; esp., an instrument, toll, or utensil, as supplying a requisite to an end; as, the implements of trade, of husbandry, or of war.

Name: Implied
Definition: Virtually involved or included; involved in substance; inferential; tacitly conceded; -- the correlative of express, or expressed. See Imply.

Name: Import
Definition: To bring in from abroad; to introduce from without; especially, to bring (wares or merchandise) into a place or country from a foreign country, in the transactions of commerce; -- opposed to export. We import teas from China, coffee from Brasil, etc.

Name: Importance
Definition: The quality or state of being important; consequence; weight; moment; significance.

Name: Important
Definition: Full of, or burdened by, import; charged with great interests; restless; anxious.

Name: Importantly
Definition: In an important manner.

Name: Impose
Definition: To lay on; to set or place; to put; to deposit.

Name: Impossible
Definition: Not possible; incapable of being done, of existing, etc.; unattainable in the nature of things, or by means at command; insuperably difficult under the circumstances; absurd or impracticable; not feasible.

Name: Impression
Definition: The act of impressing, or the state of being impressed; the communication of a stamp, mold, style, or character, by external force or by influence.

Name: Impressive
Definition: Making, or tending to make, an impression; having power to impress; adapted to excite attention and feeling, to touch the sensibilities, or affect the conscience; as, an impressive discourse; an impressive scene.

Name: Improve
Definition: To disprove or make void; to refute.

Name: Improvement
Definition: The act of improving; advancement or growth; promotion in desirable qualities; progress toward what is better; melioration; as, the improvement of the mind, of land, roads, etc.

Name: Improving
Definition: Tending to improve, beneficial; growing better.

Name: Inappropriate
Definition: Not instrument (to); not appropriate; unbecoming; unsuitable; not specially fitted; -- followed by to or for.

Name: Incentive
Definition: Inciting; encouraging or moving; rousing to action; stimulative.

Name: Inch
Definition: An island; -- often used in the names of small islands off the coast of Scotland, as in Inchcolm, Inchkeith, etc.

Name: Incidence
Definition: A falling on or upon; an incident; an event.

Name: Incident
Definition: Falling or striking upon, as a ray of light upon a reflecting surface.

Name: Include
Definition: To confine within; to hold; to contain; to shut up; to inclose; as, the shell of a nut includes the kernel; a pearl is included in a shell.

Name: Included
Definition: Inclosed; confined.

Name: Inclusion
Definition: The act of including, or the state of being included; limitation; restriction; as, the lines of inclusion of his policy.

Name: Inclusive
Definition: Inclosing; encircling; surrounding.

Name: Income
Definition: A coming in; entrance; admittance; ingress; infusion.

Name: Incoming
Definition: Coming in; accruing.

Name: Incomplete
Definition: Not complete; not filled up; not finished; not having all its parts, or not having them all adjusted; imperfect; defective.

Name: Incorporate
Definition: Not consisting of matter; not having a material body; incorporeal; spiritual.

Name: Incorporated
Definition: United in one body; formed into a corporation; made a legal entity.

Name: Incorrect
Definition: Not correct; not according to a copy or model, or to established rules; inaccurate; faulty.

Name: Increase
Definition: To become greater or more in size, quantity, number, degree, value, intensity, power, authority, reputation, wealth; to grow; to augment; to advance; -- opposed to decrease.

Name: Increasingly
Definition: More and more.

Name: Incredible
Definition: Not credible; surpassing belief; too extraordinary and improbable to admit of belief; unlikely; marvelous; fabulous.

Name: Indeed
Definition: In reality; in truth; in fact; verily; truly; -- used in a variety of sense. Esp.: (a) Denoting emphasis; as, indeed it is so. (b) Denoting concession or admission; as, indeed, you are right. (c) Denoting surprise; as, indeed, is it you? Its meaning is not intrinsic or fixed, but depends largely on the form of expression which it accompanies.

Name: Independence
Definition: The state or quality of being independent; freedom from dependence; exemption from reliance on, or control by, others; self-subsistence or maintenance; direction of one's own affairs without interference.

Name: Independent
Definition: Not dependent; free; not subject to control by others; not relying on others; not subordinate; as, few men are wholly independent.

Name: Independently
Definition: In an independent manner; without control.

Name: Index
Definition: That which points out; that which shows, indicates, manifests, or discloses.

Name: India
Definition: A country in Southern Asia; the two peninsulas of Hither and Farther India; in a restricted sense, Hither India, or Hindostan.

Name: Indian
Definition: Of or pertaining to India proper; also to the East Indies, or, sometimes, to the West Indies.

Name: Indicate
Definition: To point out; to discover; to direct to a knowledge of; to show; to make known.

Name: Indicated
Definition: Shown; denoted; registered; measured.

Name: Indication
Definition: Act of pointing out or indicating.

Name: Indicator
Definition: One who, or that which, shows or points out; as, a fare indicator in a street car.

Name: Indigenous
Definition: Native; produced, growing, or living, naturally in a country or climate; not exotic; not imported.

Name: Indirect
Definition: Not direct; not straight or rectilinear; deviating from a direct line or course; circuitous; as, an indirect road.

Name: Individual
Definition: Not divided, or not to be divided; existing as one entity, or distinct being or object; single; one; as, an individual man, animal, or city.

Name: Individually
Definition: In an individual manner or relation; as individuals; separately; each by itself.

Name: Indoor
Definition: Done or being within doors; within a house or institution; domestic; as, indoor work.

Name: Induction
