Definition: The act or process of inducting or bringing in; introduction; entrance; beginning; commencement.

Name: Industrial
Definition: Consisting in industry; pertaining to industry, or the arts and products of industry; concerning those employed in labor, especially in manual labor, and their wages, duties, and rights.

Name: Industry
Definition: Habitual diligence in any employment or pursuit, either bodily or mental; steady attention to business; assiduity; -- opposed to sloth and idleness; as, industry pays debts, while idleness or despair will increase them.

Name: Inexpensive
Definition: Not expensive; cheap.

Name: Infant
Definition: A child in the first period of life, beginning at his birth; a young babe; sometimes, a child several years of age.

Name: Infection
Definition: The act or process of infecting.

Name: Infectious
Definition: Having qualities that may infect; communicable or caused by infection; pestilential; epidemic; as, an infectious fever; infectious clothing; infectious air; infectious vices.

Name: Infinite
Definition: Unlimited or boundless, in time or space; as, infinite duration or distance.

Name: Inflation
Definition: The act or process of inflating, or the state of being inflated, as with air or gas; distention; expansion; enlargement.

Name: Influence
Definition: A flowing in or upon; influx.

Name: Inform
Definition: Without regular form; shapeless; ugly; deformed.

Name: Informal
Definition: Not in the regular, usual, or established form; not according to official, conventional, prescribed, or customary forms or rules; irregular; hence, without ceremony; as, an informal writting, proceeding, or visit.

Name: Information
Definition: The act of informing, or communicating knowledge or intelligence.

Name: Informative
Definition: Having power to inform, animate, or vivify.

Name: Informed
Definition: Unformed or ill-formed; deformed; shapeless.

Name: Infringement
Definition: The act of infringing; breach; violation; nonfulfillment; as, the infringement of a treaty, compact, law, or constitution.

Name: Initial
Definition: Of or pertaining to the beginning; marking the commencement; incipient; commencing; as, the initial symptoms of a disease.

Name: Initially
Definition: In an initial or incipient manner or degree; at the beginning.

Name: Initiative
Definition: Serving to initiate; inceptive; initiatory; introductory; preliminary.

Name: Injection
Definition: The act of injecting or throwing in; -- applied particularly to the forcible throwing in of a liquid, or aeriform body, by means of a syringe, pump, etc.

Name: Injury
Definition: Any damage or violation of, the person, character, feelings, rights, property, or interests of an individual; that which injures, or occasions wrong, loss, damage, or detriment; harm; hurt; loss; mischief; wrong; evil; as, his health was impaired by a severe injury; slander is an injury to the character.

Name: Inner
Definition: Further in; interior; internal; not outward; as, an spirit or its phenomena.

Name: Innocent
Definition: Not harmful; free from that which can injure; innoxious; innocuous; harmless; as, an innocent medicine or remedy.

Name: Innovation
Definition: The act of innovating; introduction of something new, in customs, rites, etc.

Name: Innovative
Definition: Characterized by, or introducing, innovations.

Name: Inquire
Definition: To ask a question; to seek for truth or information by putting queries.

Name: Inquiry
Definition: The act of inquiring; a seeking for information by asking questions; interrogation; a question or questioning.

Name: Insert
Definition: To set within something; to put or thrust in; to introduce; to cause to enter, or be included, or contained; as, to insert a scion in a stock; to insert a letter, word, or passage in a composition; to insert an advertisement in a newspaper.

Name: Inserted
Definition: Situated upon, attached to, or growing out of, some part; -- said especially of the parts of the flower; as, the calyx, corolla, and stamens of many flowers are inserted upon the receptacle.

Name: Insertion
Definition: The act of inserting; as, the insertion of scions in stocks; the insertion of words or passages in writings.

Name: Inside
Definition: Within the sides of; in the interior; contained within; as, inside a house, book, bottle, etc.

Name: Insight
Definition: A sight or view of the interior of anything; a deep inspection or view; introspection; -- frequently used with into.

Name: Inspector
Definition: One who inspects, views, or oversees; one to whom the supervision of any work is committed; one who makes an official view or examination, as a military or civil officer; a superintendent; a supervisor; an overseer.

Name: Inspiration
Definition: The act of inspiring or breathing in; breath; specif. (Physiol.), the drawing of air into the lungs, accomplished in mammals by elevation of the chest walls and flattening of the diaphragm; -- the opposite of expiration.

Name: Inspired
Definition: Breathed in; inhaled.

Name: Install
Definition: To set in a seat; to give a place to; establish (one) in a place.

Name: Installation
Definition: The act of installing or giving possession of an office, rank, or order, with the usual rites or ceremonies; as, the installation of an ordained minister in a parish.

Name: Instance
Definition: The act or quality of being instant or pressing; urgency; solicitation; application; suggestion; motion.

Name: Instant
Definition: Pressing; urgent; importunate; earnest.

Name: Instantly
Definition: Without the least delay or interval; at once; immediately.

Name: Instead
Definition: In the place or room; -- usually followed by of.

Name: Institute
Definition: Established; organized; founded.

Name: Institution
Definition: The act or process of instituting; as: (a) Establishment; foundation; enactment; as, the institution of a school.

Name: Institutional
Definition: Pertaining to, or treating of, institutions; as, institutional legends.

Name: Instruction
Definition: The act of instructing, teaching, or furnishing with knowledge; information.

Name: Instructional
Definition: Pertaining to, or promoting, instruction; educational.

Name: Instructor
Definition: One who instructs; one who imparts knowledge to another; a teacher.

Name: Instrument
Definition: That by means of which any work is performed, or result is effected; a tool; a utensil; an implement; as, the instruments of a mechanic; astronomical instruments.

Name: Instrumental
Definition: Acting as an instrument; serving as a means; contributing to promote; conductive; helpful; serviceable; as, he was instrumental in conducting the business.

Name: Instrumentation
Definition: The act of using or adapting as an instrument; a series or combination of instruments; means; agency.

Name: Insulation
Definition: The act of insulating, or the state of being insulated; detachment from other objects; isolation.

Name: Insurance
Definition: The act of insuring, or assuring, against loss or damage by a contingent event; a contract whereby, for a stipulated consideration, called premium, one party undertakes to indemnify or guarantee another against loss by certain specified risks.  Cf. Assurance, n., 6.

Name: Intake
Definition: The place where water or air is taken into a pipe or conduit; -- opposed to outlet.

Name: Integer
Definition: A complete entity; a whole number, in contradistinction to a fraction or a mixed number.

Name: Integral
Definition: Lacking nothing of completeness; complete; perfect; uninjured; whole; entire.

Name: Integrate
Definition: To form into one whole; to make entire; to complete; to renew; to restore; to perfect.

Name: Integration
Definition: The act or process of making whole or entire.

Name: Integrity
Definition: The state or quality of being entire or complete; wholeness; entireness; unbroken state; as, the integrity of an empire or territory.

Name: Intellectual
Definition: Belonging to, or performed by, the intellect; mental; as, intellectual powers, activities, etc.

Name: Intelligence
Definition: The act or state of knowing; the exercise of the understanding.

Name: Intelligent
Definition: Endowed with the faculty of understanding or reason; as, man is an intelligent being.

Name: Intend
Definition: To stretch' to extend; to distend.

Name: Intended
Definition: Made tense; stretched out; extended; forcible; violent.

Name: Intense
Definition: Strained; tightly drawn; kept on the stretch; strict; very close or earnest; as, intense study or application; intense thought.

Name: Intensity
Definition: The state or quality of being intense; intenseness; extreme degree; as, intensity of heat, cold, mental application, passion, etc.

Name: Intensive
Definition: Stretched; admitting of intension, or increase of degree; that can be intensified.

Name: Intent
Definition: Closely directed; strictly attentive; bent; -- said of the mind, thoughts, etc.; as, a mind intent on self-improvement.

Name: Intention
Definition: A stretching or bending of the mind toward of the mind toward an object; closeness of application; fixedness of attention; earnestness.

Name: Inter
Definition: To deposit and cover in the earth; to bury; to inhume; as, to inter a dead body.

Name: Interact
Definition: A short act or piece between others, as in a play; an interlude; hence, intermediate employment or time.

Name: Interaction
Definition: Intermediate action.

Name: Interest
Definition: To engage the attention of; to awaken interest in; to excite emotion or passion in, in behalf of a person or thing; as, the subject did not interest him; to interest one in charitable work.

Name: Interested
Definition: Having the attention engaged; having emotion or passion excited; as, an interested listener.

Name: Interesting
Definition: Engaging the attention; exciting, or adapted to excite, interest, curiosity, or emotion; as, an interesting story; interesting news.

Name: Interference
Definition: The act or state of interfering; as, the stoppage of a machine by the interference of some of its parts; a meddlesome interference in the business of others.

Name: Interim
Definition: The meantime; time intervening; interval between events, etc.

Name: Interior
Definition: Being within any limits, inclosure, or substance; inside; internal; inner; -- opposed to exterior, or superficial; as, the interior apartments of a house; the interior surface of a hollow ball.

Name: Intermediate
Definition: Lying or being in the middle place or degree, or between two extremes; coming or done between; intervening; interposed; interjacent; as, an intermediate space or time; intermediate colors.

Name: Internal
Definition: Inward; interior; being within any limit or surface; inclosed; -- opposed to external; as, the internal parts of a body, or of the earth.

Name: International
Definition: Between or among nations; pertaining to the intercourse of nations; participated in by two or more nations; common to, or affecting, two or more nations.

Name: Internationally
Definition: In an international manner; from an international point of view.

Name: Interpretation
Definition: The act of interpreting; explanation of what is obscure; translation; version; construction; as, the interpretation of a foreign language, of a dream, or of an enigma.

Name: Intersection
Definition: The act, state, or place of intersecting.

Name: Interstate
Definition: Pertaining to the mutual relations of States; existing between, or including, different States; as, interstate commerce.

Name: Interval
Definition: A space between things; a void space intervening between any two objects; as, an interval between two houses or hills.

Name: Intervention
Definition: The act of intervening; interposition.

Name: Interview
Definition: A mutual sight or view; a meeting face to face; usually, a formal or official meeting for consultation; a conference; as, the secretary had an interview with the President.

Name: Intimate
Definition: Innermost; inward; internal; deep-seated; hearty.

Name: Into
Definition: To the inside of; within. It is used in a variety of applications.

Name: Introduce
Definition: To lead or bring in; to conduct or usher in; as, to introduce a person into a drawing-room.

Name: Introduction
Definition: The act of introducing, or bringing to notice.

Name: Introductory
Definition: Serving to introduce something else; leading to the main subject or business; preliminary; prefatory; as, introductory proceedings; an introductory discourse.

Name: Invalid
Definition: Of no force, weight, or cogency; not valid; weak.

Name: Invasion
Definition: The act of invading; the act of encroaching upon the rights or possessions of another; encroachment; trespass.

Name: Invention
Definition: The act of finding out or inventing; contrivance or construction of that which has not before existed; as, the invention of logarithms; the invention of the art of printing.

Name: Inventory
Definition: An account, catalogue, or schedule, made by an executor or administrator, of all the goods and chattels, and sometimes of the real estate, of a deceased person; a list of the property of which a person or estate is found to be possessed; hence, an itemized list of goods or valuables, with their estimated worth; specifically, the annual account of stock taken in any business.

Name: Invest
Definition: To put garments on; to clothe; to dress; to array; -- opposed to divest. Usually followed by with, sometimes by in; as, to invest one with a robe.

Name: Investigate
Definition: To follow up step by step by patient inquiry or observation; to trace or track mentally; to search into; to inquire and examine into with care and accuracy; to find out by careful inquisition; as, to investigate the causes of natural phenomena.

Name: Investigation
Definition: The act of investigating; the process of inquiring into or following up; research; study; inquiry, esp. patient or thorough inquiry or examination; as, the investigations of the philosopher and the mathematician; the investigations of the judge, the moralist.

Name: Investigator
Definition: One who searches diligently into a subject.

Name: Investment
Definition: The act of investing, or the state of being invested.

Name: Investor
Definition: One who invests.

Name: Invisible
Definition: Incapable of being seen; not perceptible by vision; not visible.

Name: Invision
Definition: Want of vision or of the power of seeing.

Name: Invitation
Definition: The act of inviting; solicitation; the requesting of a person's company; as, an invitation to a party, to a dinner, or to visit a friend.

Name: Invite
Definition: To ask; to request; to bid; to summon; to ask to do some act, or go to some place; esp., to ask to an entertainment or visit; to request the company of; as, to invite to dinner, or a wedding, or an excursion.

Name: Invoice
Definition: A written account of the particulars of merchandise shipped or sent to a purchaser, consignee, factor, etc., with the value or prices and charges annexed.

Name: Involve
Definition: To roll or fold up; to wind round; to entwine.

Name: Involved
Definition: Same as Involute.

Name: Involvement
Definition: The act of involving, or the state of being involved.

Name: Iran
Definition: The native name of Persia.

Name: Irish
Definition: Of or pertaining to Ireland or to its inhabitants; produced in Ireland.

Name: Iron
Definition: The most common and most useful metallic element, being of almost universal occurrence, usually in the form of an oxide (as hematite, magnetite, etc.), or a hydrous oxide (as limonite, turgite, etc.). It is reduced on an enormous scale in three principal forms; viz., cast iron, steel, and wrought iron. Iron usually appears dark brown, from oxidation or impurity, but when pure, or on a fresh surface, is a gray or white metal. It is easily oxidized (rusted) by moisture, and is attacked by many corrosive agents. Symbol Fe (Latin Ferrum). Atomic weight 55.9. Specific gravity, pure iron, 7.86; cast iron, 7.1. In magnetic properties, it is superior to all other substances.

Name: Irrigation
Definition: The act or process of irrigating, or the state of being irrigated; especially, the operation of causing water to flow over lands, for nourishing plants.

Name: Islam
Definition: The religion of the Mohammedans; Mohammedanism; Islamism. Their formula of faith is: There is no God but Allah, and Mohammed is his prophet.

Name: Island
Definition: A tract of land surrounded by water, and smaller than a continent.  Cf. Continent.

Name: Isle
Definition: An island.

Name: Isolated
Definition: Placed or standing alone; detached; separated from others.

Name: Isolation
Definition: The act of isolating, or the state of being isolated; insulation; separation; loneliness.

Name: Issue
Definition: The act of passing or flowing out; a moving out from any inclosed place; egress; as, the issue of water from a pipe, of blood from a wound, of air from a bellows, of people from a house.

Name: Italian
Definition: Of or pertaining to Italy, or to its people or language.

Name: Italic
Definition: Relating to Italy or to its people.

Name: Item
Definition: Also; as an additional article.

Name: Itself
Definition: The neuter reciprocal pronoun of It; as, the thing is good in itself; it stands by itself.

Name: Ivory
Definition: The hard, white, opaque, fine-grained substance constituting the tusks of the elephant. It is a variety of dentine, characterized by the minuteness and close arrangement of the tubes, as also by their double flexure. It is used in manufacturing articles of ornament or utility.

Name: Jack
Definition: A large tree, the Artocarpus integrifolia, common in the East Indies, closely allied to the breadfruit, from which it differs in having its leaves entire. The fruit is of great size, weighing from thirty to forty pounds, and through its soft fibrous matter are scattered the seeds, which are roasted and eaten. The wood is of a yellow color, fine grain, and rather heavy, and is much used in cabinetwork. It is also used for dyeing a brilliant yellow.

Name: Jacket
Definition: A short upper garment, extending downward to the hips; a short coat without skirts.

Name: Jacob
Definition: A Hebrew patriarch (son of Isaac, and ancestor of the Jews), who in a vision saw a ladder reaching up to heaven (Gen. xxviii. 12); -- also called Israel.

Name: Jade
Definition: A stone, commonly of a pale to dark green color but sometimes whitish. It is very hard and compact, capable of fine polish, and is used for ornamental purposes and for implements, esp. in Eastern countries and among many early peoples.

Name: Jaguar
Definition: A large and powerful feline animal (Felis onca), ranging from Texas and Mexico to Patagonia. It is usually brownish yellow, with large, dark, somewhat angular rings, each generally inclosing one or two dark spots. It is chiefly arboreal in its habits. Called also the American tiger.

Name: Jail
Definition: A kind of prison; a building for the confinement of persons held in lawful  custody, especially for minor offenses or with reference to some future judicial proceeding.

Name: Jamaica
Definition: One of the West India is islands.

Name: Jane
Definition: A coin of Genoa; any small coin.

Name: January
Definition: The first month of the year, containing thirty-one days.

Name: Japan
Definition: Work varnished and figured in the Japanese manner; also, the varnish or lacquer used in japanning.

Name: Japanese
Definition: Of or pertaining to Japan, or its inhabitants.

Name: Java
Definition: One of the islands of the Malay Archipelago belonging to the Netherlands.

Name: Jean
Definition: A twilled cotton cloth.

Name: Jenny
Definition: A familiar or pet form of the proper name Jane.

Name: Jersey
Definition: The finest of wool separated from the rest; combed wool; also, fine yarn of wool.

Name: Jerusalem
Definition: The chief city of Palestine, intimately associated with the glory of the Jewish nation, and the life and death of Jesus Christ.

Name: Jesse
Definition: Any representation or suggestion of the genealogy of Christ, in decorative art

Name: Jesus
Definition: The Savior; the name of the Son of God as announced by the angel to his parents; the personal name of Our Lord, in distinction from Christ, his official appellation.

Name: Jewel
Definition: An ornament of dress usually made of a precious metal, and having enamel or precious stones as a part of its design.

Name: Jewelry
Definition: The art or trade of a jeweler.

Name: Jewish
Definition: Of or pertaining to the Jews or Hebrews; characteristic of or resembling the Jews or their customs; Israelitish.

Name: Jill
Definition: A young woman; a sweetheart. See Gill.

Name: Jimmy
Definition: A short crowbar used by burglars in breaking open doors.

Name: John
Definition: A proper name of a man.

Name: Johnny
Definition: A familiar diminutive of John.

Name: Join
Definition: To bring together, literally or figuratively; to place in contact; to connect; to couple; to unite; to combine; to associate; to add; to append.

Name: Joint
Definition: The place or part where two things or parts are joined or united; the union of two or more smooth or even surfaces admitting of a close-fitting or junction; junction as, a joint between two pieces of timber; a joint in a pipe.

Name: Joke
Definition: Something said for the sake of exciting a laugh; something witty or sportive (commonly indicating more of hilarity or humor than jest); a jest; a witticism; as, to crack good-natured jokes.

Name: Jordan
Definition: Alt. of Jorden

Name: Joseph
Definition: An outer garment worn in the 18th century; esp., a woman's riding habit, buttoned down the front.

Name: Journal
Definition: Daily; diurnal.

Name: Journalism
Definition: The keeping of a journal or diary.

Name: Journalist
Definition: One who keeps a journal or diary.

Name: Journey
Definition: The travel or work of a day.

Name: Judge
Definition: A public officer who is invested with authority to hear and determine litigated causes, and to administer justice between parties in courts held for that purpose.

Name: Judgment
Definition: The act of judging; the operation of the mind, involving comparison and discrimination, by which a knowledge of the values and relations of thins, whether of moral qualities, intellectual concepts, logical propositions, or material facts, is obtained; as, by careful judgment he avoided the peril; by a series of wrong judgments he forfeited confidence.

Name: Judicial
Definition: Pertaining or appropriate to courts of justice, or to a judge; practiced or conformed to in the administration of justice; sanctioned or ordered by a court; as, judicial power; judicial proceedings; a judicial sale.

Name: Juice
Definition: The characteristic fluid of any vegetable or animal substance; the sap or part which can be expressed from fruit, etc.; the fluid part which separates from meat in cooking.

Name: Julian
Definition: Relating to, or derived from, Julius Caesar.

Name: July
Definition: The seventh month of the year, containing thirty-one days.

Name: Jump
Definition: A kind of loose jacket for men.

Name: Junction
Definition: The act of joining, or the state of being joined; union; combination; coalition; as, the junction of two armies or detachments; the junction of paths.

Name: June
Definition: The sixth month of the year, containing thirty days.

Name: Jungle
Definition: A dense growth of brushwood, grasses, reeds, vines, etc.; an almost impenetrable thicket of trees, canes, and reedy vegetation, as in India, Africa, Australia, and Brazil.

Name: Junior
Definition: Less advanced in age than another; younger.

Name: Junk
Definition: A fragment of any solid substance; a thick piece. See Chunk.

Name: June
Definition: The sister and wife of Jupiter, the queen of heaven, and the goddess who presided over marriage. She corresponds to the Greek Hera.

Name: Jurisdiction
Definition: The legal power, right, or authority of a particular court to hear and determine causes, to try criminals, or to execute justice; judicial authority over a cause or class of causes; as, certain suits or actions, or the cognizance of certain crimes, are within the jurisdiction of a particular court, that is, within the limits of its authority or commission.

Name: Jury
Definition: For temporary use; -- applied to a temporary contrivance.

Name: Just
Definition: Conforming or conformable to rectitude or justice; not doing wrong to any; violating no right or obligation; upright; righteous; honest; true; -- said both of persons and things.

Name: Justice
Definition: The quality of being just; conformity to the principles of righteousness and rectitude in all things; strict performance of moral obligations; practical conformity to human or divine law; integrity in the dealings of men with each other; rectitude; equity; uprightness.

Name: Justify
Definition: To prove or show to be just; to vindicate; to maintain or defend as conformable to law, right, justice, propriety, or duty.

Name: Juvenile
Definition: Young; youthful; as, a juvenile appearance.

Name: Kansas
Definition: A tribe of Indians allied to the Winnebagoes and Osages. They formerly inhabited the region which is now the State of Kansas, but were removed to the Indian Territory.

Name: Karma
Definition: One's acts considered as fixing one's lot in the future existence. (Theos.) The doctrine of fate as the inflexible result of cause and effect; the theory of inevitable consequence.

Name: Kate
Definition: The brambling finch.

Name: Keen
Definition: Sharp; having a fine edge or point; as, a keen razor, or a razor with a keen edge.

Name: Keep
Definition: To care; to desire.

Name: Keeping
Definition: A holding; restraint; custody; guard; charge; care; preservation.

Name: Keno
Definition: A gambling game, a variety of the game of lotto, played with balls or knobs, numbered, and cards also numbered.

Name: Kentucky
Definition: One of the United States.

Name: Kernel
Definition: The essential part of a seed; all that is within the seed walls; the edible substance contained in the shell of a nut; hence, anything included in a shell, husk, or integument; as, the kernel of a nut. See Illust. of Endocarp.

Name: Kevin
Definition: The gazelle.

Name: Keyboard
Definition: The whole arrangement, or one range, of the keys of an organ, typewriter, etc.

Name: Kick
Definition: To strike, thrust, or hit violently with the foot; as, a horse kicks a groom; a man kicks a dog.

Name: Kidney
Definition: A glandular organ which excretes urea and other waste products from the animal body; a urinary gland.

Name: Kill
Definition: A kiln.

Name: Killer
Definition: One who deprives of life; one who, or that which, kills.

Name: Killing
Definition: Literally, that kills; having power to kill; fatal; in a colloquial sense, conquering; captivating; irresistible.

Name: Kind
Definition: Characteristic of the species; belonging to one's nature; natural; native.

Name: King
Definition: A Chinese musical instrument, consisting of resonant stones or metal plates, arranged according to their tones in a frame of wood, and struck with a hammer.

Name: Kingdom
Definition: The rank, quality, state, or attributes of a king; royal authority; sovereign power; rule; dominion; monarchy.

Name: Kingston
Definition: Alt. of Kingstone

Name: Kirk
Definition: A church or the church, in the various senses of the word; esp., the Church of Scotland as distinguished from other reformed churches, or from the Roman Catholic Church.

Name: Kiss
Definition: To salute with the lips, as a mark of affection, reverence, submission, forgiveness, etc.

Name: Kitchen
Definition: A cookroom; the room of a house appropriated to cookery.

Name: Knee
Definition: In man, the joint in the middle part of the leg.

Name: Knife
Definition: An instrument consisting of a thin blade, usually of steel and having a sharp edge for cutting, fastened to a handle, but of many different forms and names for different uses; as, table knife, drawing knife, putty knife, pallet knife, pocketknife, penknife, chopping knife, etc..

Name: Knight
Definition: A young servant or follower; a military attendant.

Name: Knit
Definition: To form into a knot, or into knots; to tie together, as cord; to fasten by tying.

Name: Knitting
Definition: The work of a knitter; the network formed by knitting.

Name: Knock
Definition: To drive or be driven against something; to strike against something; to clash; as, one heavy body knocks against another.

Name: Know
Definition: Knee.

Name: Knowing
Definition: Skilful; well informed; intelligent; as, a knowing man; a knowing dog.

Name: Knowledge
Definition: The act or state of knowing; clear perception of fact, truth, or duty; certain apprehension; familiar cognizance; cognition.

Name: Kodak
Definition: A kind of portable camera.

Name: Label
Definition: A tassel.

Name: Labor
Definition: Physical toil or bodily exertion, especially when fatiguing, irksome, or unavoidable, in distinction from sportive exercise; hard, muscular effort directed to some useful end, as agriculture, manufactures, and like; servile toil; exertion; work.

Name: Laboratory
Definition: The workroom of a chemist; also, a place devoted to experiments in any branch of natural science; as, a chemical, physical, or biological laboratory. Hence, by extension, a place where something is prepared, or some operation is performed; as, the liver is the laboratory of the bile.

Name: Lace
Definition: That which binds or holds, especially by being interwoven; a string, cord, or band, usually one passing through eyelet or other holes, and used in drawing and holding together parts of a garment, of a shoe, of a machine belt, etc.

Name: Lack
Definition: Blame; cause of blame; fault; crime; offense.

Name: Ladder
Definition: A frame usually portable, of wood, metal, or rope, for ascent and descent, consisting of two side pieces to which are fastened cross strips or rounds forming steps.

Name: Laden
Definition: Loaded; freighted; burdened; as, a laden vessel; a laden heart.

Name: Lady
Definition: A woman who looks after the domestic affairs of a family; a mistress; the female head of a household.

Name: Lady
Definition: The day of the annunciation of the Virgin Mary, March 25. See Annunciation.

Name: Lafayette
Definition: The dollar fish.

Name: Lake
Definition: A pigment formed by combining some coloring matter, usually by precipitation, with a metallic oxide or earth, esp. with aluminium hydrate; as, madder lake; Florentine lake; yellow lake, etc.

Name: Lamb
Definition: The young of the sheep.

Name: Lambda
Definition: The name of the Greek letter /, /, corresponding with the English letter L, l.

Name: Lamp
Definition: A thin plate or lamina.

Name: Lance
Definition: A weapon of war, consisting of a long shaft or handle and a steel blade or head; a spear carried by horsemen, and often decorated with a small flag; also, a spear or harpoon used by whalers and fishermen.

Name: Land
Definition: Urine. See Lant.

Name: Landing
Definition: Of, pertaining to or used for, setting, bringing, or going, on shore.

Name: Landscape
Definition: A portion of land or territory which the eye can comprehend in a single view, including all the objects it contains.

Name: Lane
Definition: Alone.

Name: Lang
Definition: Long.

Name: Language
Definition: Any means of conveying or communicating ideas; specifically, human speech; the expression of ideas by the voice; sounds, expressive of thought, articulated by the organs of the throat and mouth.

Name: Large
Definition: Exceeding most other things of like kind in bulk, capacity, quantity, superficial dimensions, or number of constituent units; big; great; capacious; extensive; -- opposed to small; as, a large horse; a large house or room; a large lake or pool; a large jug or spoon; a large vineyard; a large army; a large city.

Name: Largely
Definition: In a large manner.

Name: Larry
Definition: Same as Lorry, or Lorrie.

Name: Last
Definition: Being after all the others, similarly classed or considered, in time, place, or order of succession; following all the rest; final; hindmost; farthest; as, the last year of a century; the last man in a line of soldiers; the last page in a book; his last chance.

Name: Lasting
Definition: Existing or continuing a long while; enduring; as, a lasting good or evil; a lasting color.

Name: Late
Definition: Coming after the time when due, or after the usual or proper time; not early; slow; tardy; long delayed; as, a late spring.

Name: Lately
Definition: Not long ago; recently; as, he has lately arrived from Italy.

Name: Later
Definition: A brick or tile.

Name: Latex
Definition: A milky or colored juice in certain plants in cavities (called latex cells or latex tubes). It contains the peculiar principles of the plants, whether aromatic, bitter, or acid, and in many instances yields caoutchouc upon coagulation.

Name: Latin
Definition: Of or pertaining to Latium, or to the Latins, a people of Latium; Roman; as, the Latin language.

Name: Latitude
Definition: Extent from side to side, or distance sidewise from a given point or line; breadth; width.

Name: Latter
Definition: Later; more recent; coming or happening after something else; -- opposed to former; as, the former and latter rain.

Name: Laugh
Definition: To show mirth, satisfaction, or derision, by peculiar movement of the muscles of the face, particularly of the mouth, causing a lighting up of the face and eyes, and usually accompanied by the emission of explosive or chuckling sounds from the chest and throat; to indulge in laughter.

Name: Laughing
Definition: from Laugh, v. i.

Name: Launch
Definition: To throw, as a lance or dart; to hurl; to let fly.

Name: Laundry
Definition: A laundering; a washing.

Name: Laura
Definition: A number of hermitages or cells in the same neighborhood occupied by anchorites who were under the same superior.

Name: Lawn
Definition: An open space between woods.

Name: Lawsuit
Definition: An action at law; a suit in equity or admiralty; any legal proceeding before a court for the enforcement of a claim.

Name: Lawyer
Definition: One versed in the laws, or a practitioner of law; one whose profession is to conduct lawsuits for clients, or to advise as to prosecution or defence of lawsuits, or as to legal rights and obligations in other matters. It is a general term, comprehending attorneys, counselors, solicitors, barristers, sergeants, and advocates.

Name: Layer
Definition: One who, or that which, lays.

Name: Lazy
Definition: Disinclined to action or exertion; averse to labor; idle; shirking work.

Name: Lead
Definition: One of the elements, a heavy, pliable, inelastic metal, having a bright, bluish color, but easily tarnished. It is both malleable and ductile, though with little tenacity, and is used for tubes, sheets, bullets, etc. Its specific gravity is 11.37. It is easily fusible, forms alloys with other metals, and is an ingredient of solder and type metal. Atomic weight, 206.4. Symbol Pb (L. Plumbum). It is chiefly obtained from the mineral galena, lead sulphide.

Name: Leader
Definition: One who, or that which, leads or conducts; a guide; a conductor.

Name: Leadership
Definition: The office of a leader.

Name: Leading
Definition: Guiding; directing; controlling; foremost; as, a leading motive; a leading man; a leading example.

Name: Leaf
Definition: A colored, usually green, expansion growing from the side of a stem or rootstock, in which the sap for the use of the plant is elaborated under the influence of light; one of the parts of a plant which collectively constitute its foliage.

Name: League
Definition: A measure of length or distance, varying in different countries from about 2.4 to 4.6 English statute miles of 5.280 feet each, and used (as a land measure) chiefly on the continent of Europe, and in the Spanish parts of America. The marine league of England and the United States is equal to three marine, or geographical, miles of 6080 feet each.

Name: Lean
Definition: To conceal.

Name: Learn
Definition: To gain knowledge or information of; to ascertain by inquiry, study, or investigation; to receive instruction concerning; to fix in the mind; to acquire understanding of, or skill; as, to learn the way; to learn a lesson; to learn dancing; to learn to skate; to learn the violin; to learn the truth about something.

Name: Learned
Definition: Of or pertaining to learning; possessing, or characterized by, learning, esp. scholastic learning; erudite; well-informed; as, a learned scholar, writer, or lawyer; a learned book; a learned theory.

Name: Learning
Definition: The acquisition of knowledge or skill; as, the learning of languages; the learning of telegraphy.

Name: Lease
Definition: To gather what harvesters have left behind; to glean.

Name: Leasing
Definition: The act of lying; falsehood; a lie or lies.

Name: Least
Definition: Smallest, either in size or degree; shortest; lowest; most unimportant; as, the least insect; the least mercy; the least space.

Name: Leather
Definition: The skin of an animal, or some part of such skin, tanned, tawed, or otherwise dressed for use; also, dressed hides, collectively.

Name: Leave
Definition: To send out leaves; to leaf; -- often with out.

Name: Leaves
Definition: pl. of Leaf.

Name: Lecture
Definition: The act of reading; as, the lecture of Holy Scripture.

Name: Left
Definition: Of or pertaining to that side of the body in man on which the muscular action of the limbs is usually weaker than on the other side; -- opposed to right, when used in reference to a part of the body; as, the left hand, or arm; the left ear. Also said of the corresponding side of the lower animals.

Name: Legacy
Definition: A gift of property by will, esp. of money or personal property; a bequest. Also Fig.; as, a legacy of dishonor or disease.

Name: Legal
Definition: Created by, permitted by, in conformity with, or relating to, law; as, a legal obligation; a legal standard or test; a legal procedure; a legal claim; a legal trade; anything is legal which the laws do not forbid.

Name: Legally
Definition: In a legal manner.

Name: Legend
Definition: That which is appointed to be read; especially, a chronicle or register of the lives of saints, formerly read at matins, and in the refectories of religious houses.

Name: Legendary
Definition: Of or pertaining to a legend or to legends; consisting of legends; like a legend; fabulous.

Name: Legislation
Definition: The act of legislating; preparation and enactment of laws; the laws enacted.

Name: Legislative
Definition: Making, or having the power to make, a law or laws; lawmaking; -- distinguished from executive; as, a legislative act; a legislative body.

Name: Legislature
Definition: The body of persons in a state or kingdom invested with power to make and repeal laws; a legislative body.

Name: Legitimate
Definition: Accordant with law or with established legal forms and requirements; lawful; as, legitimate government; legitimate rights; the legitimate succession to the throne; a legitimate proceeding of an officer; a legitimate heir.

Name: Leisure
Definition: Freedom from occupation or business; vacant time; time free from employment.

Name: Lemon
Definition: An oval or roundish fruit resembling the orange, and containing a pulp usually intensely acid. It is produced by a tropical tree of the genus Citrus, the common fruit known in commerce being that of the species C. Limonum or C. Medica (var. Limonum). There are many varieties of the fruit, some of which are sweet.

Name: Lender
Definition: One who lends.

Name: Lending
Definition: The act of one who lends.

Name: Length
Definition: The longest, or longer, dimension of any object, in distinction from breadth or width; extent of anything from end to end; the longest line which can be drawn through a body, parallel to its sides; as, the length of a church, or of a ship; the length of a rope or line.

Name: Lens
Definition: A piece of glass, or other transparent substance, ground with two opposite regular surfaces, either both curved, or one curved and the other plane, and commonly used, either singly or combined, in optical instruments, for changing the direction of rays of light, and thus magnifying objects, or otherwise modifying vision. In practice, the curved surfaces are usually spherical, though rarely cylindrical, or of some other figure.

Name: Leon
Definition: A lion.

Name: Lesbian
Definition: Of or pertaining to the island anciently called Lesbos, now Mitylene, in the Grecian Archipelago.

Name: Less
Definition: Unless.

Name: Lesser
Definition: Less; smaller; inferior.

Name: Lesson
Definition: Anything read or recited to a teacher by a pupil or learner; something, as a portion of a book, assigned to a pupil to be studied or learned at one time.

Name: Letter
Definition: One who lets or permits; one who lets anything for hire.

Name: Level
Definition: A line or surface to which, at every point, a vertical or plumb line is perpendicular; a line or surface which is everywhere parallel to the surface of still water; -- this is the true level, and is a curve or surface in which all points are equally distant from the center of the earth, or rather would be so if the earth were an exact sphere.

Name: Levy
Definition: A name formerly given in Pennsylvania, Maryland, and Virginia to the Spanish real of one eighth of a dollar (or 12/ cents), valued at eleven pence when the dollar was rated at 7s. 6d.

Name: Lewis
Definition: Alt. of Lewisson

Name: Liability
Definition: The state of being liable; as, the liability of an insurer; liability to accidents; liability to the law.

Name: Liable
Definition: Bound or obliged in law or equity; responsible; answerable; as, the surety is liable for the debt of his principal.

Name: Liberal
Definition: Free by birth; hence, befitting a freeman or gentleman; refined; noble; independent; free; not servile or mean; as, a liberal ancestry; a liberal spirit; liberal arts or studies.

Name: Liberty
Definition: The state of a free person; exemption from subjection to the will of another claiming ownership of the person or services; freedom; -- opposed to slavery, serfdom, bondage, or subjection.

Name: Librarian
Definition: One who has the care or charge of a library.

Name: Library
Definition: A considerable collection of books kept for use, and not as merchandise; as, a private library; a public library.

Name: License
Definition: Authority or liberty given to do or forbear any act; especially, a formal permission from the proper authorities to perform certain acts or to carry on a certain business, which without such permission would be illegal; a grant of permission; as, a license to preach, to practice medicine, to sell gunpowder or intoxicating liquors.

Name: Licensed
Definition: Having a license; permitted or authorized by license; as, a licensed victualer; a licensed traffic.

Name: Licking
Definition: A lapping with the tongue.

Name: Life
Definition: The state of being which begins with generation, birth, or germination, and ends with death; also, the time during which this state continues; that state of an animal or plant in which all or any of its organs are capable of performing all or any of their functions; -- used of all animal and vegetable organisms.

Name: Lifetime
Definition: The time that life continues.

Name: Lift
Definition: The sky; the atmosphere; the firmament.

Name: Light
Definition: That agent, force, or action in nature by the operation of which upon the organs of sight, objects are rendered visible or luminous.

Name: Lighter
Definition: One who, or that which, lights; as, a lighter of lamps.

Name: Lighting
Definition: A name sometimes applied to the process of annealing metals.

Name: Lightning
Definition: A discharge of atmospheric electricity, accompanied by a vivid flash of light, commonly from one cloud to another, sometimes from a cloud to the earth. The sound produced by the electricity in passing rapidly through the atmosphere constitutes thunder.

Name: Lights
Definition: The lungs of an animal or bird; -- sometimes coarsely applied to the lungs of a human being.

Name: Like
Definition: Having the same, or nearly the same, appearance, qualities, or characteristics; resembling; similar to; similar; alike; -- often with in and the particulars of the resemblance; as, they are like each other in features, complexion, and many traits of character.

Name: Likelihood
Definition: Appearance; show; sign; expression.

Name: Likely
Definition: Worthy of belief; probable; credible; as, a likely story.

Name: Likewise
Definition: In like manner; also; moreover; too. See Also.

Name: Lime
Definition: A thong by which a dog is led; a leash.

Name: Limit
Definition: That which terminates, circumscribes, restrains, or confines; the bound, border, or edge; the utmost extent; as, the limit of a walk, of a town, of a country; the limits of human knowledge or endeavor.

Name: Limitation
Definition: The act of limiting; the state or condition of being limited; as, the limitation of his authority was approved by the council.

Name: Limited
Definition: Confined within limits; narrow; circumscribed; restricted; as, our views of nature are very limited.

Name: Line
Definition: Flax; linen.

Name: Linear
Definition: Of or pertaining to a line; consisting of lines; in a straight direction; lineal.

Name: Link
Definition: A torch made of tow and pitch, or the like.

Name: Lion
Definition: A large carnivorous feline mammal (Felis leo), found in Southern Asia and in most parts of Africa, distinct varieties occurring in the different countries. The adult male, in most varieties, has a thick mane of long shaggy hair that adds to his apparent size, which is less than that of the largest tigers. The length, however, is sometimes eleven feet to the base of the tail. The color is a tawny yellow or yellowish brown; the mane is darker, and the terminal tuft of the tail is black. In one variety, called the maneless lion, the male has only a slight mane.

Name: Liquid
Definition: Flowing freely like water; fluid; not solid.

Name: List
Definition: A line inclosing or forming the extremity of a piece of ground, or field of combat; hence, in the plural (lists), the ground or field inclosed for a race or combat.

Name: Listen
Definition: To give close attention with the purpose of hearing; to give ear; to hearken; to attend.

Name: Listing
Definition: The act or process of one who lists (in any sense of the verb); as, the listing of a door; the listing of a stock at the Stock Exchange.

Name: Lite
Definition: Little.

Name: Literacy
Definition: State of being literate.

Name: Literally
Definition: According to the primary and natural import of words; not figuratively; as, a man and his wife can not be literally one flesh.

Name: Literary
Definition: Of or pertaining to letters or literature; pertaining to learning or learned men; as, literary fame; a literary history; literary conversation.

Name: Literature
Definition: Learning; acquaintance with letters or books.

Name: Litigation
Definition: The act or process of litigating; a suit at law; a judicial contest.

Name: Little
Definition: Small in size or extent; not big; diminutive; -- opposed to big or large; as, a little body; a little animal; a little piece of ground; a little hill; a little distance; a little child.

Name: Live
Definition: To be alive; to have life; to have, as an animal or a plant, the capacity of assimilating matter as food, and to be dependent on such assimilation for a continuance of existence; as, animals and plants that live to a great age are long in reaching maturity.

Name: Lived
Definition: Having life; -- used only in composition; as, long-lived; short-lived.

Name: Liver
Definition: One who, or that which, lives.

Name: Lives
Definition: pl. of Life.

Name: Living
Definition: The state of one who, or that which, lives; lives; life; existence.

Name: Load
Definition: A burden; that which is laid on or put in anything for conveyance; that which is borne or sustained; a weight; as, a heavy load.

Name: Loading
Definition: The act of putting a load on or into.

Name: Loan
Definition: A loanin.

Name: Lobby
Definition: A passage or hall of communication, especially when large enough to serve also as a waiting room. It differs from an antechamber in that a lobby communicates between several rooms, an antechamber to one only; but this distinction is not carefully preserved.

Name: Local
Definition: Of or pertaining to a particular place, or to a definite region or portion of space; restricted to one place or region; as, a local custom.

Name: Locale
Definition: A place, spot, or location.

Name: Locally
Definition: With respect to place; in place; as, to be locally separated or distant.

Name: Locate
Definition: To place; to set in a particular spot or position.

Name: Location
Definition: The act or process of locating.

Name: Locator
Definition: One who locates, or is entitled to locate, land or a mining claim.

Name: Lock
Definition: A tuft of hair; a flock or small quantity of wool, hay, or other like substance; a tress or ringlet of hair.

Name: Lodge
Definition: A shelter in which one may rest; as: (a) A shed; a rude cabin; a hut; as, an Indian's lodge.

Name: Lodging
Definition: The act of one who, or that which, lodges.

Name: Logan
Definition: A rocking or balanced stone.

Name: Logged
Definition: Made slow and heavy in movement; water-logged.

Name: Logging
Definition: The business of felling trees, cutting them into logs, and transporting the logs to sawmills or to market.

Name: Logic
Definition: The science or art of exact reasoning, or of pure and formal thought, or of the laws according to which the processes of pure thinking should be conducted; the science of the formation and application of general notions; the science of generalization, judgment, classification, reasoning, and systematic arrangement; correct reasoning.

Name: Logical
Definition: Of or pertaining to logic; used in logic; as, logical subtilties.

Name: Logistics
Definition: That branch of the military art which embraces the details of moving and supplying armies. The meaning of the word is by some writers extended to include strategy.

Name: Logos
Definition: A word; reason; speech.

Name: London
Definition: The capital city of England.

Name: Lone
Definition: A lane. See Loanin.

Name: Lonely
Definition: Sequestered from company or neighbors; solitary; retired; as, a lonely situation; a lonely cell.

Name: Long
Definition: Drawn out in a line, or in the direction of length; protracted; extended; as, a long line; -- opposed to short, and distinguished from broad or wide.

Name: Longer
Definition: One who longs for anything.

Name: Longitude
Definition: Length; measure or distance along the longest line; -- distinguished from breadth or thickness; as, the longitude of a room; rare now, except in a humorous sense.

Name: Look
Definition: To direct the eyes for the purpose of seeing something; to direct the eyes toward an object; to observe with the eyes while keeping them directed; -- with various prepositions, often in a special or figurative sense. See Phrases below.

Name: Looking
Definition: Having a certain look or appearance; -- often compounded with adjectives; as, good-looking, grand-looking, etc.

Name: Loop
Definition: A mass of iron in a pasty condition gathered into a ball for the tilt hammer or rolls.

Name: Loose
Definition: Unbound; untied; unsewed; not attached, fastened, fixed, or confined; as, the loose sheets of a book.

Name: Lord
Definition: A hump-backed person; -- so called sportively.

Name: Lose
Definition: To part with unintentionally or unwillingly, as by accident, misfortune, negligence, penalty, forfeit, etc.; to be deprived of; as, to lose money from one's purse or pocket, or in business or gaming; to lose an arm or a leg by amputation; to lose men in battle.

Name: Losing
Definition: Given to flattery or deceit; flattering; cozening.

Name: Loss
Definition: The act of losing; failure; destruction; privation; as, the loss of property; loss of money by gaming; loss of health or reputation.

Name: Lost
Definition: Parted with unwillingly or unintentionally; not to be found; missing; as, a lost book or sheep.

Name: Lottery
Definition: A scheme for the distribution of prizes by lot or chance; esp., a gaming scheme in which one or more tickets bearing particular numbers draw prizes, and the rest of tickets are blanks. Fig. : An affair of chance.

Name: Lotus
Definition: A name of several kinds of water lilies; as Nelumbium speciosum, used in religious ceremonies, anciently in Egypt, and to this day in Asia; Nelumbium luteum, the American lotus; and Nymphaea Lotus and N. caerulea, the respectively white-flowered and blue-flowered lotus of modern Egypt, which, with Nelumbium speciosum, are figured on its ancient monuments.

Name: Loud
Definition: Having, making, or being a strong or great sound; noisy; striking the ear with great force; as, a loud cry; loud thunder.

Name: Lounge
Definition: To spend time lazily, whether lolling or idly sauntering; to pass time indolently; to stand, sit, or recline, in an indolent manner.

Name: Love
Definition: A feeling of strong attachment induced by that which delights or commands admiration; preeminent kindness or devotion to another; affection; tenderness; as, the love of brothers and sisters.

Name: Lovely
Definition: Having such an appearance as excites, or is fitted to excite, love; beautiful; charming; very pleasing in form, looks, tone, or manner.

Name: Lover
Definition: One who loves; one who is in love; -- usually limited, in the singular, to a person of the male sex.

Name: Loving
Definition: Affectionate.

Name: Lower
Definition: Compar. of Low, a.

Name: Luck
Definition: That which happens to a person; an event, good or ill, affecting one's interests or happiness, and which is deemed casual; a course or series of such events regarded as occurring by chance; chance; hap; fate; fortune; often, one's habitual or characteristic fortune; as, good, bad, ill, or hard luck. Luck is often used for good luck; as, luck is better than skill.

Name: Lucky
Definition: Favored by luck; fortunate; meeting with good success or good fortune; -- said of persons; as, a lucky adventurer.

Name: Luggage
Definition: That which is lugged; anything cumbrous and heavy to be carried; especially, a traveler's trunks, baggage, etc., or their contents.

Name: Luke
Definition: Moderately warm; not hot; tepid.

Name: Lunch
Definition: A luncheon; specifically, a light repast between breakfast and dinner.

Name: Lung
Definition: An organ for aerial respiration; -- commonly in the plural.

Name: Luxury
Definition: A free indulgence in costly food, dress, furniture, or anything expensive which gratifies the appetites or tastes.

Name: Lyric
Definition: Alt. of Lyrical

Name: Lyric
Definition: A lyric poem; a lyrical composition.

Name: Machine
Definition: In general, any combination of bodies so connected that their relative motions are constrained, and by means of which force and motion may be transmitted and modified, as a screw and its nut, or a lever arranged to turn about a fulcrum or a pulley about its pivot, etc.; especially, a construction, more or less complex, consisting of a combination of moving parts, or simple mechanical elements, as wheels, levers, cams, etc., with their supports and connecting framework, calculated to constitute a prime mover, or to receive force and motion from a prime mover or from another machine, and transmit, modify, and apply them to the production of some desired mechanical effect or work, as weaving by a loom, or the excitation of electricity by an electrical machine.

Name: Machinery
Definition: Machines, in general, or collectively.

Name: Macintosh
Definition: Same as Mackintosh.

Name: Made
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Make.

Name: Madness
Definition: The condition of being mad; insanity; lunacy.

Name: Madonna
Definition: My lady; -- a term of address in Italian formerly used as the equivalent of Madame, but for which Signora is now substituted. Sometimes introduced into English.

Name: Magazine
Definition: A receptacle in which anything is stored, especially military stores, as ammunition, arms, provisions, etc.

Name: Magic
Definition: A comprehensive name for all of the pretended arts which claim to produce effects by the assistance of supernatural beings, or departed spirits, or by a mastery of secret forces in nature attained by a study of occult science, including enchantment, conjuration, witchcraft, sorcery, necromancy, incantation, etc.

Name: Magical
Definition: Pertaining to the hidden wisdom supposed to be possessed by the Magi; relating to the occult powers of nature, and the producing of effects by their agency.

Name: Magnet
Definition: The loadstone; a species of iron ore (the ferrosoferric or magnetic ore, Fe3O4) which has the property of attracting iron and some of its ores, and, when freely suspended, of pointing to the poles; -- called also natural magnet.

Name: Magnetic
Definition: Alt. of Magnetical

Name: Magnetic
Definition: A magnet.

Name: Magnificent
Definition: Doing grand things; admirable in action; displaying great power or opulence, especially in building, way of living, and munificence.

Name: Magnitude
Definition: Extent of dimensions; size; -- applied to things that have length, breath, and thickness.

Name: Maiden
Definition: An unmarried woman; a girl or woman who has not experienced sexual intercourse; a virgin; a maid.

Name: Mail
Definition: A spot.

Name: Mailed
Definition: Protected by an external coat, or covering, of scales or plates.

Name: Mailing
Definition: A farm.

Name: Main
Definition: A hand or match at dice.

Name: Maine
Definition: One of the New England States.

Name: Mainland
Definition: The continent; the principal land; -- opposed to island, or peninsula.

Name: Mainly
Definition: Very strongly; mightily; to a great degree.

Name: Maintain
Definition: To hold or keep in any particular state or condition; to support; to sustain; to uphold; to keep up; not to suffer to fail or decline; as, to maintain a certain degree of heat in a furnace; to maintain a fence or a railroad; to maintain the digestive process or powers of the stomach; to maintain the fertility of soil; to maintain present reputation.

Name: Maintenance
Definition: The act of maintaining; sustenance; support; defense; vindication.

Name: Major
Definition: Greater in number, quantity, or extent; as, the major part of the assembly; the major part of the revenue; the major part of the territory.

Name: Majority
Definition: The quality or condition of being major or greater; superiority.

Name: Make
Definition: A companion; a mate; often, a husband or a wife.

Name: Maker
Definition: One who makes, forms, or molds; a manufacturer; specifically, the Creator.

Name: Making
Definition: The act of one who makes; workmanship; fabrication; construction; as, this is cloth of your own making; the making of peace or war was in his power.

Name: Male
Definition: Evil; wicked; bad.

Name: Mall
Definition: A large heavy wooden beetle; a mallet for driving anything with force; a maul.

Name: Malpractice
Definition: Evil practice; illegal or immoral conduct; practice contrary to established rules; specifically, the treatment of a case by a surgeon or physician in a manner which is contrary to accepted rules and productive of unfavorable results.

Name: Manage
Definition: The handling or government of anything, but esp. of a horse; management; administration. See Manege.

Name: Management
Definition: The act or art of managing; the manner of treating, directing, carrying on, or using, for a purpose; conduct; administration; guidance; control; as, the management of a family or of a farm; the management of state affairs.

Name: Manager
Definition: One who manages; a conductor or director; as, the manager of a theater.

Name: Mandate
Definition: An official or authoritative command; an order or injunction; a commission; a judicial precept.

Name: Mandatory
Definition: Containing a command; preceptive; directory.

Name: Manner
Definition: Mode of action; way of performing or effecting anything; method; style; form; fashion.

Name: Manor
Definition: The land belonging to a lord or nobleman, or so much land as a lord or great personage kept in his own hands, for the use and subsistence of his family.

Name: Manual
Definition: Of or pertaining to the hand; done or made by the hand; as, manual labor; the king's sign manual.

Name: Manually
Definition: By hand.

Name: Manufacture
Definition: The operation of making wares or any products by hand, by machinery, or by other agency.

Name: Manufacturer
Definition: One who manufactures.

Name: Manufacturing
Definition: Employed, or chiefly employed, in manufacture; as, a manufacturing community; a manufacturing town.

Name: Many
Definition: A retinue of servants; a household.

Name: Maple
Definition: A tree of the genus Acer, including about fifty species. A. saccharinum is the rock maple, or sugar maple, from the sap of which sugar is made, in the United States, in great quantities, by evaporation; the red or swamp maple is A. rubrum; the silver maple, A. dasycarpum, having fruit wooly when young; the striped maple, A. Pennsylvanium, called also moosewood. The common maple of Europe is A. campestre, the sycamore maple is A. Pseudo-platanus, and the Norway maple is A. platanoides.

Name: Marble
Definition: A massive, compact limestone; a variety of calcite, capable of being polished and used for architectural and ornamental purposes. The color varies from white to black, being sometimes yellow, red, and green, and frequently beautifully veined or clouded. The name is also given to other rocks of like use and appearance, as serpentine or verd antique marble, and less properly to polished porphyry, granite, etc.

Name: Marc
Definition: The refuse matter which remains after the pressure of fruit, particularly of grapes.

Name: March
Definition: The third month of the year, containing thirty-one days.

Name: Margin
Definition: A border; edge; brink; verge; as, the margin of a river or lake.

Name: Marie
Definition: Marry.

Name: Marine
Definition: Of or pertaining to the sea; having to do with the ocean, or with navigation or naval affairs; nautical; as, marine productions or bodies; marine shells; a marine engine.

Name: Maritime
Definition: Bordering on, or situated near, the ocean; connected with the sea by site, interest, or power; having shipping and commerce or a navy; as, maritime states.

Name: Mark
Definition: A license of reprisals. See Marque.

Name: Marked
Definition: Designated or distinguished by, or as by, a mark; hence; noticeable; conspicuous; as, a marked card; a marked coin; a marked instance.

Name: Marker
Definition: One who or that which marks.

Name: Market
Definition: A meeting together of people, at a stated time and place, for the purpose of traffic (as in cattle, provisions, wares, etc.) by private purchase and sale, and not by auction; as, a market is held in the town every week.

Name: Marketing
Definition: The act of selling or of purchasing in, or as in, a market.

Name: Marking
Definition: The act of one who, or that which, marks; the mark or marks made; arrangement or disposition of marks or coloring; as, the marking of a bird's plumage.

Name: Marriage
Definition: The act of marrying, or the state of being married; legal union of a man and a woman for life, as husband and wife; wedlock; matrimony.

Name: Mars
Definition: The god of war and husbandry.

Name: Marsh
Definition: A tract of soft wet land, commonly covered partially or wholly with water; a fen; a swamp; a morass.

Name: Mart
Definition: A market.

Name: Martial
Definition: Of, pertaining to, or suited for, war; military; as, martial music; a martial appearance.

Name: Martin
Definition: A perforated stone-faced runner for grinding.

Name: Marvel
Definition: That which causes wonder; a prodigy; a miracle.

Name: Mary
Definition: Marrow.

Name: Mask
Definition: A cover, or partial cover, for the face, used for disguise or protection; as, a dancer's mask; a fencer's mask; a ball player's mask.

Name: Mason
Definition: One whose occupation is to build with stone or brick; also, one who prepares stone for building purposes.

Name: Mass
Definition: The sacrifice in the sacrament of the Eucharist, or the consecration and oblation of the host.

Name: Massage
Definition: A rubbing or kneading of the body, especially when performed as a hygienic or remedial measure.

Name: Massive
Definition: Forming, or consisting of, a large mass; compacted; weighty; heavy; massy.

Name: Master
Definition: A vessel having (so many) masts; -- used only in compounds; as, a two-master.

Name: Match
Definition: Anything used for catching and retaining or communicating fire, made of some substance which takes fire readily, or remains burning some time; esp., a small strip or splint of wood dipped at one end in a substance which can be easily ignited by friction, as a preparation of phosphorus or chlorate of potassium.

Name: Mate
Definition: The Paraguay tea, being the dried leaf of the Brazilian holly (Ilex Paraguensis). The infusion has a pleasant odor, with an agreeable bitter taste, and is much used for tea in South America.

Name: Material
Definition: Consisting of matter; not spiritual; corporeal; physical; as, material substance or bodies.

Name: Maternity
Definition: The state of being a mother; the character or relation of a mother.

Name: Math
Definition: A mowing, or that which is gathered by mowing; -- chiefly used in composition; as, an aftermath.

Name: Mathematical
Definition: Of or pertaining to mathematics; according to mathematics; hence, theoretically precise; accurate; as, mathematical geography; mathematical instruments; mathematical exactness.

Name: Mathematics
Definition: That science, or class of sciences, which treats of the exact relations existing between quantities or magnitudes, and of the methods by which, in accordance with these relations, quantities sought are deducible from other quantities known or supposed; the science of spatial and quantitative relations.

Name: Matrix
Definition: The womb.

Name: Matter
Definition: That of which anything is composed; constituent substance; material; the material or substantial part of anything; the constituent elements of conception; that into which a notion may be analyzed; the essence; the pith; the embodiment.

Name: Mattress
Definition: A quilted bed; a bed stuffed with hair, moss, or other suitable material, and quilted or otherwise fastened.

Name: Mature
Definition: Brought by natural process to completeness of growth and development; fitted by growth and development for any function, action, or state, appropriate to its kind; full-grown; ripe.

Name: Maximize
Definition: To increase to the highest degree.

Name: Maximum
Definition: The greatest quantity or value attainable in a given case; or, the greatest value attained by a quantity which first increases and then begins to decrease; the highest point or degree; -- opposed to minimum.

Name: Maybe
Definition: Perhaps; possibly; peradventure.

Name: Mayor
Definition: The chief magistrate of a city or borough; the chief officer of a municipal corporation. In some American cities there is a city court of which the major is chief judge.

Name: Meal
Definition: A part; a fragment; a portion.

Name: Mean
Definition: To have in the mind, as a purpose, intention, etc.; to intend; to purpose; to design; as, what do you mean to do ?

Name: Meaning
Definition: That which is meant or intended; intent; purpose; aim; object; as, a mischievous meaning was apparent.

Name: Meant
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Mean.

Name: Meanwhile
Definition: The intervening time; as, in the meantime (or mean time).

Name: Meanwhile
Definition: In the intervening time; during the interval.

Name: Measure
Definition: A standard of dimension; a fixed unit of quantity or extent; an extent or quantity in the fractions or multiples of which anything is estimated and stated; hence, a rule by which anything is adjusted or judged.

Name: Measured
Definition: Regulated or determined by a standard; hence, equal; uniform; graduated; limited; moderated; as, he walked with measured steps; he expressed himself in no measured terms.

Name: Measurement
Definition: The act or result of measuring; mensuration; as, measurement is required.

Name: Measuring
Definition: Used in, or adapted for, ascertaining measurements, or dividing by measure.

Name: Meat
Definition: Food, in general; anything eaten for nourishment, either by man or beast. Hence, the edible part of anything; as, the meat of a lobster, a nut, or an egg.

Name: Mechanical
Definition: Pertaining to, governed by, or in accordance with, mechanics, or the laws of motion; pertaining to the quantitative relations of force and matter, as distinguished from mental, vital, chemical, etc.; as, mechanical principles; a mechanical theory; mechanical deposits.

Name: Mechanics
Definition: That science, or branch of applied mathematics, which treats of the action of forces on bodies.

Name: Mechanism
Definition: The arrangement or relation of the parts of a machine; the parts of a machine, taken collectively; the arrangement or relation of the parts of anything as adapted to produce an effect; as, the mechanism of a watch; the mechanism of a sewing machine; the mechanism of a seed pod.

Name: Medal
Definition: A piece of metal in the form of a coin, struck with a device, and intended to preserve the remembrance of a notable event or an illustrious person, or to serve as a reward.

Name: Media
Definition: pl. of Medium.

Name: Median
Definition: Being in the middle; running through the middle; as, a median groove.

Name: Medical
Definition: Of, pertaining to, or having to do with, the art of healing disease, or the science of medicine; as, the medical profession; medical services; a medical dictionary; medical jurisprudence.

Name: Medication
Definition: The act or process of medicating.

Name: Medicine
Definition: The science which relates to the prevention, cure, or alleviation of disease.

Name: Medieval
Definition: Alt. of Medievalist

Name: Meditation
Definition: The act of meditating; close or continued thought; the turning or revolving of a subject in the mind; serious contemplation; reflection; musing.

Name: Mediterranean
Definition: Inclosed, or nearly inclosed, with land; as, the Mediterranean Sea, between Europe and Africa.

Name: Medium
Definition: That which lies in the middle, or between other things; intervening body or quantity. Hence, specifically: (a) Middle place or degree; mean.

Name: Meet
Definition: To join, or come in contact with; esp., to come in contact with by approach from an opposite direction; to come upon or against, front to front, as distinguished from contact by following and overtaking.

Name: Meeting
Definition: A coming together; an assembling; as, the meeting of Congress.

Name: Mega
Definition: Alt. of Megalo-

Name: Melissa
Definition: A genus of labiate herbs, including the balm, or bee balm (Melissa officinalis).

Name: Member
Definition: To remember; to cause to remember; to mention.

Name: Membership
Definition: The state of being a member.

Name: Membrane
Definition: A thin layer or fold of tissue, usually supported by a fibrous network, serving to cover or line some part or organ, and often secreting or absorbing certain fluids.

Name: Memorabilia
Definition: Things remarkable and worthy of remembrance or record; also, the record of them.

Name: Memorial
Definition: Serving to preserve remembrance; commemorative; as, a memorial building.

Name: Memory
Definition: The faculty of the mind by which it retains the knowledge of previous thoughts, impressions, or events.

Name: Ment
Definition: p. p. of Menge.

Name: Mental
Definition: Of or pertaining to the chin; genian; as, the mental nerve; the mental region.

Name: Mention
Definition: A speaking or notice of anything, -- usually in a brief or cursory manner. Used especially in the phrase to make mention of.

Name: Mentor
Definition: A wise and faithful counselor or monitor.

Name: Menu
Definition: The details of a banquet; a bill of fare.

Name: Merchandise
Definition: The objects of commerce; whatever is usually bought or sold in trade, or market, or by merchants; wares; goods; commodities.

Name: Merchant
Definition: One who traffics on a large scale, especially with foreign countries; a trafficker; a trader.

Name: Mercury
Definition: A Latin god of commerce and gain; -- treated by the poets as identical with the Greek Hermes, messenger of the gods, conductor of souls to the lower world, and god of eloquence.

Name: Mercy
Definition: Forbearance to inflict harm under circumstances of provocation, when one has the power to inflict it; compassionate treatment of an offender or adversary; clemency.

Name: Mere
Definition: A pool or lake.

Name: Merely
Definition: Purely; unmixedly; absolutely.

Name: Merge
Definition: To cause to be swallowed up; to immerse; to sink; to absorb.

Name: Merger
Definition: One who, or that which, merges.

Name: Merit
Definition: The quality or state of deserving well or ill; desert.

Name: Merry
Definition: Laughingly gay; overflowing with good humor and good spirits; jovial; inclined to laughter or play ; sportive.

Name: Mesa
Definition: A high tableland; a plateau on a hill.

Name: Mesh
Definition: The opening or space inclosed by the threads of a net between knot and knot, or the threads inclosing such a space; network; a net.

Name: Mess
Definition: Mass; church service.

Name: Message
Definition: Any notice, word, or communication, written or verbal, sent from one person to another.

Name: Messenger
Definition: One who bears a message; the bearer of a verbal or written communication, notice, or invitation, from one person to another, or to a public body; specifically, an office servant who bears messages.

Name: Metabolism
Definition: The act or process, by which living tissues or cells take up and convert into their own proper substance the nutritive material brought to them by the blood, or by which they transform their cell protoplasm into simpler substances, which are fitted either for excretion or for some special purpose, as in the manufacture of the digestive ferments. Hence, metabolism may be either constructive (anabolism), or destructive (katabolism).

Name: Metal
Definition: An elementary substance, as sodium, calcium, or copper, whose oxide or hydroxide has basic rather than acid properties, as contrasted with the nonmetals, or metalloids. No sharp line can be drawn between the metals and nonmetals, and certain elements partake of both acid and basic qualities, as chromium, manganese, bismuth, etc.

Name: Metallic
Definition: Of or pertaining to a metal; of the nature of metal; resembling metal; as, a metallic appearance; a metallic alloy.

Name: Meter
Definition: One who, or that which, metes or measures. See Coal-meter.

Name: Method
Definition: An orderly procedure or process; regular manner of doing anything; hence, manner; way; mode; as, a method of teaching languages; a method of improving the mind.

Name: Methodology
Definition: The science of method or arrangement; a treatise on method.

Name: Metric
Definition: Relating to measurement; involving, or proceeding by, measurement.

Name: Metropolitan
Definition: Of or pertaining to the capital or principal city of a country; as, metropolitan luxury.

Name: Mexican
Definition: Of or pertaining to Mexico or its people.

Name: Mice
Definition: pl of Mouse.

Name: Microphone
Definition: An instrument for intensifying and making audible very feeble sounds. It produces its effects by the changes of intensity in an electric current, occasioned by the variations in the contact resistance of conducting bodies, especially of imperfect conductors, under the action of acoustic vibrations.

Name: Middle
Definition: Equally distant from the extreme either of a number of things or of one thing; mean; medial; as, the middle house in a row; a middle rank or station in life; flowers of middle summer; men of middle age.

Name: Midnight
Definition: The middle of the night; twelve o'clock at night.

Name: Might
Definition: imp. of May.

Name: Mighty
Definition: Possessing might; having great power or authority.

Name: Migration
Definition: The act of migrating.

Name: Mild
Definition: Gentle; pleasant; kind; soft; bland; clement; hence, moderate in degree or quality; -- the opposite of harsh, severe, irritating, violent, disagreeable, etc.; -- applied to persons and things; as, a mild disposition; a mild eye; a mild air; a mild medicine; a mild insanity.

Name: Mile
Definition: A certain measure of distance, being equivalent in England and the United States to 320 poles or rods, or 5,280 feet.

Name: Mileage
Definition: An allowance for traveling expenses at a certain rate per mile.

Name: Military
Definition: Of or pertaining to soldiers, to arms, or to war; belonging to, engaged in, or appropriate to, the affairs of war; as, a military parade; military discipline; military bravery; military conduct; military renown.

Name: Milk
Definition: A white fluid secreted by the mammary glands of female mammals for the nourishment of their young, consisting of minute globules of fat suspended in a solution of casein, albumin, milk sugar, and inorganic salts.

Name: Mill
Definition: A money of account of the United States, having the value of the tenth of a cent, or the thousandth of a dollar.

Name: Millennium
Definition: A thousand years; especially, the thousand years mentioned in the twentieth chapter in the twentieth chapter of Revelation, during which holiness is to be triumphant throughout the world. Some believe that, during this period, Christ will reign on earth in person with his saints.

Name: Miller
Definition: One who keeps or attends a flour mill or gristmill.

Name: Million
Definition: The number of ten hundred thousand, or a thousand thousand, -- written 1,000, 000. See the Note under Hundred.

Name: Mime
Definition: A kind of drama in which real persons and events were generally represented in a ridiculous manner.

Name: Mind
Definition: The intellectual or rational faculty in man; the understanding; the intellect; the power that conceives, judges, or reasons; also, the entire spiritual nature; the soul; -- often in distinction from the body.

Name: Mine
Definition: Belonging to me; my. Used as a pronominal to me; my. Used as a pronominal adjective in the predicate; as,

Name: Mineral
Definition: An inorganic species or substance occurring in nature, having a definite chemical composition and usually a distinct crystalline form. Rocks, except certain glassy igneous forms, are either simple minerals or aggregates of minerals.

Name: Miniature
Definition: Originally, a painting in colors such as those in mediaeval manuscripts; in modern times, any very small painting, especially a portrait.

Name: Minimize
Definition: To reduce to the smallest part or proportion possible; to reduce to a minimum.

Name: Minimum
Definition: The least quantity assignable, admissible, or possible, in a given case; hence, a thing of small consequence; -- opposed to maximum.

Name: Mining
Definition: The act or business of making mines or of working them.

Name: Minister
Definition: A servant; a subordinate; an officer or assistant of inferior rank; hence, an agent, an instrument.

Name: Ministry
Definition: The act of ministering; ministration; service.

Name: Minor
Definition: Inferior in bulk, degree, importance, etc.; less; smaller; of little account; as, minor divisions of a body.

Name: Minority
