Definition: The state of being a minor, or under age.

Name: Mint
Definition: The name of several aromatic labiate plants, mostly of the genus Mentha, yielding odoriferous essential oils by distillation. See Mentha.

Name: Minus
Definition: Less; requiring to be subtracted; negative; as, a minus quantity.

Name: Minute
Definition: The sixtieth part of an hour; sixty seconds. (Abbrev. m.; as, 4 h. 30 m.)

Name: Miracle
Definition: A wonder or wonderful thing.

Name: Mirror
Definition: A looking-glass or a speculum; any glass or polished substance that forms images by the reflection of rays of light.

Name: Miscellaneous
Definition: Mixed; mingled; consisting of several things; of diverse sorts; promiscuous; heterogeneous; as, a miscellaneous collection.

Name: Mistake
Definition: To make or form amiss; to spoil in making.

Name: Miss
Definition: A title of courtesy prefixed to the name of a girl or a woman who has not been married. See Mistress, 5.

Name: Missile
Definition: Capable of being thrown; adapted for hurling or to be projected from the hand, or from any instrument or rngine, so as to strike an object at a distance.

Name: Missing
Definition: Absent from the place where it was expected to be found; lost; wanting; not present when called or looked for.

Name: Mission
Definition: The act of sending, or the state of being sent; a being sent or delegated by authority, with certain powers for transacting business; comission.

Name: Mistake
Definition: To take or choose wrongly.

Name: Mistress
Definition: A woman having power, authority, or ownership; a woman who exercises authority, is chief, etc.; the female head of a family, a school, etc.

Name: Mixed
Definition: Formed by mixing; united; mingled; blended. See Mix, v. t. & i.

Name: Mixer
Definition: One who, or that which, mixes.

Name: Mixture
Definition: The act of mixing, or the state of being mixed; as, made by a mixture of ingredients.

Name: Mobile
Definition: Capable of being moved; not fixed in place or condition; movable.

Name: Mobility
Definition: The quality or state of being mobile; as, the mobility of a liquid, of an army, of the populace, of features, of a muscle.

Name: Mode
Definition: Manner of doing or being; method; form; fashion; custom; way; style; as, the mode of speaking; the mode of dressing.

Name: Model
Definition: A miniature representation of a thing, with the several parts in due proportion; sometimes, a facsimile of the same size.

Name: Modeling
Definition: The act or art of making a model from which a work of art is to be executed; the formation of a work of art from some plastic material. Also, in painting, drawing, etc., the expression or indication of solid form.

Name: Moderate
Definition: Kept within due bounds; observing reasonable limits; not excessive, extreme, violent, or rigorous; limited; restrained

Name: Moderator
Definition: One who, or that which, moderates, restrains, or pacifies.

Name: Modern
Definition: Of or pertaining to the present time, or time not long past; late; not ancient or remote in past time; of recent period; as, modern days, ages, or time; modern authors; modern fashions; modern taste; modern practice.

Name: Modification
Definition: The act of modifying, or the state of being modified; a modified form or condition; state as modified; a change; as, the modification of an opinion, or of a machine; the various modifications of light.

Name: Modify
Definition: To change somewhat the form or qualities of; to alter somewhat; as, to modify a contrivance adapted to some mechanical purpose; to modify the terms of a contract.

Name: Modular
Definition: Of or pertaining to mode, modulation, module, or modius; as, modular arrangement; modular accent; modular measure.

Name: Module
Definition: A model or measure.

Name: Moisture
Definition: A moderate degree of wetness.

Name: Mold
Definition: A spot; a blemish; a mole.

Name: Mold
Definition: Alt. of Mould

Name: Mold
Definition: Alt. of Mould

Name: Mold
Definition: Alt. of Mould

Name: Mold
Definition: Alt. of Mould

Name: Mold
Definition: Alt. of Mould

Name: Mold
Definition: Alt. of Mould

Name: Molecular
Definition: Pertaining to, connected with, produced by, or consisting of, molecules; as, molecular forces; molecular groups of atoms, etc.

Name: Moment
Definition: A minute portion of time; a point of time; an instant; as, at thet very moment.

Name: Momentum
Definition: The quantity of motion in a moving body, being always proportioned to the quantity of matter multiplied into the velocity; impetus.

Name: Monday
Definition: The second day of the week; the day following Sunday.

Name: Monetary
Definition: Of or pertaining to money, or consisting of money; pecuniary.

Name: Money
Definition: A piece of metal, as gold, silver, copper, etc., coined, or stamped, and issued by the sovereign authority as a medium of exchange in financial transactions between citizens and with government; also, any number of such pieces; coin.

Name: Monitor
Definition: One who admonishes; one who warns of faults, informs of duty, or gives advice and instruction by way of reproof or caution.

Name: Monkey
Definition: In the most general sense, any one of the Quadrumana, including apes, baboons, and lemurs.

Name: Mono
Definition: The black howler of Central America (Mycetes villosus).

Name: Monster
Definition: Something of unnatural size, shape, or quality; a prodigy; an enormity; a marvel.

Name: Monte
Definition: A favorite gambling game among Spaniards, played with dice or cards.

Name: Month
Definition: One of the twelve portions into which the year is divided; the twelfth part of a year, corresponding nearly to the length of a synodic revolution of the moon, -- whence the name. In popular use, a period of four weeks is often called a month.

Name: Monthly
Definition: Continued a month, or a performed in a month; as, the monthly revolution of the moon.

Name: Mood
Definition: Manner; style; mode; logical form; musical style; manner of action or being. See Mode which is the preferable form).

Name: Moon
Definition: The celestial orb which revolves round the earth; the satellite of the earth; a secondary planet, whose light, borrowed from the sun, is reflected to the earth, and serves to dispel the darkness of night. The diameter of the moon is 2,160 miles, its mean distance from the earth is 240,000 miles, and its mass is one eightieth that of the earth. See Lunar month, under Month.

Name: Moral
Definition: Relating to duty or obligation; pertaining to those intentions and actions of which right and wrong, virtue and vice, are predicated, or to the rules by which such intentions and actions ought to be directed; relating to the practice, manners, or conduct of men as social beings in relation to each other, as respects right and wrong, so far as they are properly subject to rules.

Name: More
Definition: A hill.

Name: Moreover
Definition: Beyond what has been said; further; besides; in addition; furthermore; also; likewise.

Name: Morning
Definition: Pertaining to the first part or early part of the day; being in the early part of the day; as, morning dew; morning light; morning service.

Name: Morocco
Definition: A fine kind of leather, prepared commonly from goatskin (though an inferior kind is made of sheepskin), and tanned with sumac and dyed of various colors; -- said to have been first made by the Moors.

Name: Morris
Definition: A Moorish dance, usually performed by a single dancer, who accompanies the dance with castanets.

Name: Mortality
Definition: The condition or quality of being mortal; subjection to death or to the necessity of dying.

Name: Mortgage
Definition: A conveyance of property, upon condition, as security for the payment of a debt or the preformance of a duty, and to become void upon payment or performance according to the stipulated terms; also, the written instrument by which the conveyance is made.

Name: Moses
Definition: A large flatboat, used in the West Indies for taking freight from shore to ship.

Name: Moss
Definition: A cryptogamous plant of a cellular structure, with distinct stem and simple leaves. The fruit is a small capsule usually opening by an apical lid, and so discharging the spores. There are many species, collectively termed Musci, growing on the earth, on rocks, and trunks of trees, etc., and a few in running water.

Name: Most
Definition: Consisting of the greatest number or quantity; greater in number or quantity than all the rest; nearly all.

Name: Mostly
Definition: For the greatest part; for the most part; chiefly; in the main.

Name: Mother
Definition: A female parent; especially, one of the human race; a woman who has borne a child.

Name: Motion
Definition: The act, process, or state of changing place or position; movement; the passing of a body from one place or position to another, whether voluntary or involuntary; -- opposed to rest.

Name: Motor
Definition: One who, or that which, imparts motion; a source of mechanical power.

Name: Mount
Definition: A mass of earth, or earth and rock, rising considerably above the common surface of the surrounding land; a mountain; a high hill; -- used always instead of mountain, when put before a proper name; as, Mount Washington; otherwise, chiefly in poetry.

Name: Mountain
Definition: A large mass of earth and rock, rising above the common level of the earth or adjacent land; earth and rock forming an isolated peak or a ridge; an eminence higher than a hill; a mount.

Name: Mounted
Definition: Seated or serving on horseback or similarly; as, mounted police; mounted infantry.

Name: Mounting
Definition: The act of one that mounts.

Name: Mouse
Definition: Any one of numerous species of small rodents belonging to the genus Mus and various related genera of the family Muridae.  The common house mouse (Mus musculus) is found in nearly all countries. The American white-footed, or deer, mouse (Hesperomys leucopus) sometimes lives in houses. See Dormouse, Meadow mouse, under Meadow, and Harvest mouse, under Harvest.

Name: Mouth
Definition: The opening through which an animal receives food; the aperture between the jaws or between the lips; also, the cavity, containing the tongue and teeth, between the lips and the pharynx; the buccal cavity.

Name: Move
Definition: To cause to change place or posture in any manner; to set in motion; to carry, convey, draw, or push from one place to another; to impel; to stir; as, the wind moves a vessel; the horse moves a carriage.

Name: Movement
Definition: The act of moving; change of place or posture; transference, by any means, from one situation to another; natural or appropriate motion; progress; advancement; as, the movement of an army in marching or maneuvering; the movement of a wheel or a machine; the party of movement.

Name: Moving
Definition: Changing place or posture; causing motion or action; as, a moving car, or power.

Name: Much
Definition: Great in quantity; long in duration; as, much rain has fallen; much time.

Name: Multiple
Definition: Containing more than once, or more than one; consisting of more than one; manifold; repeated many times; having several, or many, parts.

Name: Municipal
Definition: Of or pertaining to a city or a corporation having the right of administering local government; as, municipal rights; municipal officers.

Name: Municipality
Definition: A municipal district; a borough, city, or incorporated town or village.

Name: Murder
Definition: The offense of killing a human being with malice prepense or aforethought, express or implied; intentional and unlawful homicide.

Name: Murphy
Definition: A potato.

Name: Muscle
Definition: An organ which, by its contraction, produces motion.

Name: Museum
Definition: A repository or a collection of natural, scientific, or literary curiosities, or of works of art.

Name: Music
Definition: The science and the art of tones, or musical sounds, i. e., sounds of higher or lower pitch, begotten of uniform and synchronous vibrations, as of a string at various degrees of tension; the science of harmonical tones which treats of the principles of harmony, or the properties, dependences, and relations of tones to each other; the art of combining tones in a manner to please the ear.

Name: Musical
Definition: Of or pertaining to music; having the qualities of music; or the power of producing music; devoted to music; melodious; harmonious; as, musical proportion; a musical voice; musical instruments; a musical sentence; musical persons.

Name: Musician
Definition: One skilled in the art or science of music; esp., a skilled singer, or performer on a musical instrument.

Name: Must
Definition: To be obliged; to be necessitated; -- expressing either physical or moral necessity; as, a man must eat for nourishment; we must submit to the laws.

Name: Mustang
Definition: The half-wild horse of the plains in Mexico, California, etc. It is small, hardy, and easily sustained.

Name: Mutual
Definition: Reciprocally acting or related; reciprocally receiving and giving; reciprocally given and received; reciprocal; interchanged; as, a mutual love, advantage, assistance, aversion, etc.

Name: Myrtle
Definition: A species of the genus Myrtus, especially Myrtus communis. The common myrtle has a shrubby, upright stem, eight or ten feet high. Its branches form a close, full head, thickly covered with ovate or lanceolate evergreen leaves. It has solitary axillary white or rosy flowers, followed by black several-seeded berries. The ancients considered it sacred to Venus. The flowers, leaves, and berries are used variously in perfumery and as a condiment, and the beautifully mottled wood is used in turning.

Name: Myself
Definition: I or me in person; -- used for emphasis, my own self or person; as I myself will do it; I have done it myself; -- used also instead of me, as the object of the first person of a reflexive verb, without emphasis; as, I will defend myself.

Name: Mysterious
Definition: Of or pertaining to mystery; containing a mystery; difficult or impossible to understand; obscure not revealed or explained; enigmatical; incomprehensible.

Name: Mystery
Definition: A profound secret; something wholly unknown, or something kept cautiously concealed, and therefore exciting curiosity or wonder; something which has not been or can not be explained; hence, specifically, that which is beyond human comprehension.

Name: Myth
Definition: A story of great but unknown age which originally embodied a belief regarding some fact or phenomenon of experience, and in which often the forces of nature and of the soul are personified; an ancient legend of a god, a hero, the origin of a race, etc.; a wonder story of prehistoric origin; a popular fable which is, or has been, received as historical.

Name: Nail
Definition: the horny scale of plate of epidermis at the end of the fingers and toes of man and many apes.

Name: Naked
Definition: Having no clothes on; uncovered; nude; bare; as, a naked body; a naked limb; a naked sword.

Name: Name
Definition: The title by which any person or thing is known or designated; a distinctive specific appellation, whether of an individual or a class.

Name: Namely
Definition: By name; by particular mention; specifically; especially; expressly.

Name: Narrative
Definition: Of or pertaining to narration; relating to the particulars of an event or transaction.

Name: Narrow
Definition: Of little breadth; not wide or broad; having little distance from side to side; as, a narrow board; a narrow street; a narrow hem.

Name: Nasty
Definition: Offensively filthy; very dirty, foul, or defiled; disgusting; nauseous.

Name: Nation
Definition: A part, or division, of the people of the earth, distinguished from the rest by common descent, language, or institutions; a race; a stock.

Name: National
Definition: Of or pertaining to a nation; common to a whole people or race; public; general; as, a national government, language, dress, custom, calamity, etc.

Name: Nationally
Definition: In a national manner or way; as a nation.

Name: Native
Definition: Arising by birth; having an origin; born.

Name: Natural
Definition: Fixed or determined by nature; pertaining to the constitution of a thing; belonging to native character; according to nature; essential; characteristic; not artifical, foreign, assumed, put on, or acquired; as, the natural growth of animals or plants; the natural motion of a gravitating body; natural strength or disposition; the natural heat of the body; natural color.

Name: Naturally
Definition: In a natural manner or way; according to the usual course of things; spontaneously.

Name: Nature
Definition: The existing system of things; the world of matter, or of matter and mind; the creation; the universe.

Name: Naughty
Definition: Having little or nothing.

Name: Naval
Definition: Having to do with shipping; of or pertaining to ships or a navy; consisting of ships; as, naval forces, successes, stores, etc.

Name: Navigate
Definition: To joirney by water; to go in a vessel or ship; to perform the duties of a navigator; to use the waters as a highway or channel for commerce or communication; to sail.

Name: Navigation
Definition: The act of navigating; the act of passing on water in ships or other vessels; the state of being navigable.

Name: Navigator
Definition: One who navigates or sails; esp., one who direct the course of a ship, or one who is skillful in the art of navigation; also, a book which teaches the art of navigation; as, Bowditch's Navigator.

Name: Navy
Definition: A fleet of ships; an assemblage of merchantmen, or so many as sail in company.

Name: Near
Definition: At a little distance, in place, time, manner, or degree; not remote; nigh.

Name: Nearly
Definition: In a near manner; not remotely; closely; intimately; almost.

Name: Necessarily
Definition: In a necessary manner; by necessity; unavoidably; indispensably.

Name: Necessary
Definition: Such as must be; impossible to be otherwise; not to be avoided; inevitable.

Name: Necessity
Definition: The quality or state of being necessary, unavoidable, or absolutely requisite; inevitableness; indispensableness.

Name: Neck
Definition: The part of an animal which connects the head and the trunk, and which, in man and many other animals, is more slender than the trunk.

Name: Necklace
Definition: A string of beads, etc., or any continuous band or chain, worn around the neck as an ornament.

Name: Need
Definition: A state that requires supply or relief; pressing occasion for something; necessity; urgent want.

Name: Needle
Definition: A small instrument of steel, sharply pointed at one end, with an eye to receive a thread, -- used in sewing.

Name: Needs
Definition: Of necessity; necessarily; indispensably; -- often with must, and equivalent to of need.

Name: Negative
Definition: Denying; implying, containing, or asserting denial, negation or refusal; returning the answer no to an inquiry or request; refusing assent; as, a negative answer; a negative opinion; -- opposed to affirmative.

Name: Negotiation
Definition: The act or process of negotiating; a treating with another respecting sale or purchase. etc.

Name: Neighbor
Definition: A person who lives near another; one whose abode is not far off.

Name: Neighbor
Definition: To dwell in the vicinity; to be a neighbor, or in the neighborhood; to be near.

Name: Neighborhood
Definition: The quality or condition of being a neighbor; the state of being or dwelling near; proximity.

Name: Neither
Definition: Not either; not the one or the other.

Name: Nerve
Definition: One of the whitish and elastic bundles of fibers, with the accompanying tissues, which transmit nervous impulses between nerve centers and various parts of the animal body.

Name: Nervous
Definition: possessing nerve; sinewy; strong; vigorous.

Name: Nest
Definition: The bed or receptacle prepared by a fowl for holding her eggs and for hatching and rearing her young.

Name: Network
Definition: A fabric of threads, cords, or wires crossing each other at certain intervals, and knotted or secured at the crossings, thus leaving spaces or meshes between them.

Name: Neural
Definition: relating to the nerves or nervous system; taining to, situated in the region of, or on the side with, the neural, or cerebro-spinal, axis; -- opposed to hemal. As applied to vertebrates, neural is the same as dorsal; as applied to invertebrates it is usually the same as ventral.  Cf. Hemal.

Name: Neutral
Definition: Not engaged on either side; not taking part with or assisting either of two or more contending parties; neuter; indifferent.

Name: Never
Definition: Not ever; not at any time; at no time, whether past, present, or future.

Name: Nevertheless
Definition: Not the less; notwithstanding; in spite of that; yet.

Name: Newfoundland
Definition: An island on the coast of British North America, famed for the fishing grounds in its vicinity.

Name: Newly
Definition: Lately; recently.

Name: News
Definition: A report of recent occurences; information of something that has lately taken place, or of something before unknown; fresh tindings; recent intelligence.

Name: Newspaper
Definition: A sheet of paper printed and distributed, at stated intervals, for conveying intelligence of passing events, advocating opinions, etc.; a public print that circulates news, advertisements, proceedings of legislative bodies, public announcements, etc.

Name: Next
Definition: Nearest in place; having no similar object intervening.

Name: Nice
Definition: Foolish; silly; simple; ignorant; also, weak; effeminate.

Name: Nick
Definition: An evil spirit of the waters.

Name: Nickel
Definition: A bright silver-white metallic element. It is of the iron group, and is hard, malleable, and ductile. It occurs combined with sulphur in millerite, with arsenic in the mineral niccolite, and with arsenic and sulphur in nickel glance. Symbol Ni. Atomic weight 58.6.

Name: Nickname
Definition: A name given in contempt, derision, or sportive familiarity; a familiar or an opprobrious appellation.

Name: Night
Definition: That part of the natural day when the sun is beneath the horizon, or the time from sunset to sunrise; esp., the time between dusk and dawn, when there is no light of the sun, but only moonlight, starlight, or artificial light.

Name: Nightmare
Definition: A fiend or incubus formerly supposed to cause trouble in sleep.

Name: Nine
Definition: Eight and one more; one less than ten; as, nine miles.

Name: Nirvana
Definition: In the Buddhist system of religion, the final emancipation of the soul from transmigration, and consequently a beatific enfrachisement from the evils of wordly existence, as by annihilation or absorption into the divine. See Buddhism.

Name: Nitrogen
Definition: A colorless nonmetallic element, tasteless and odorless, comprising four fifths of the atmosphere by volume. It is chemically very inert in the free state, and as such is incapable of supporting life (hence the name azote still used by French chemists); but it forms many important compounds, as ammonia, nitric acid, the cyanides, etc, and is a constituent of all organized living tissues, animal or vegetable. Symbol N. Atomic weight 14. It was formerly regarded as a permanent noncondensible gas, but was liquefied in 1877 by Cailletet of Paris, and Pictet of Geneva.

Name: Noble
Definition: Possessing eminence, elevation, dignity, etc.; above whatever is low, mean, degrading, or dishonorable; magnanimous; as, a noble nature or action; a noble heart.

Name: Nobody
Definition: No person; no one; not anybody.

Name: Node
Definition: A knot, a knob; a protuberance; a swelling.

Name: Noise
Definition: Sound of any kind.

Name: Nomination
Definition: The act of naming or nominating; designation of a person as a candidate for office; the power of nominating; the state of being nominated.

Name: None
Definition: No one; not one; not anything; -- frequently used also partitively, or as a plural, not any.

Name: Noon
Definition: No. See the Note under No.

Name: Norm
Definition: A rule or authoritative standard; a model; a type.

Name: Normal
Definition: According to an established norm, rule, or principle; conformed to a type, standard, or regular form; performing the proper functions; not abnormal; regular; natural; analogical.

Name: Normally
Definition: In a normal manner.

Name: Norman
Definition: A wooden bar, or iron pin.

Name: North
Definition: That one of the four cardinal points of the compass, at any place, which lies in the direction of the true meridian, and to the left hand of a person facing the east; the direction opposite to the south.

Name: Northeast
Definition: The point between the north and east, at an equal distance from each; the northeast part or region.

Name: Northern
Definition: Of or pertaining to the north; being in the north, or nearer to that point than to the east or west.

Name: Northwest
Definition: The point in the horizon between the north and west, and equally distant from each; the northwest part or region.

Name: Norwegian
Definition: Of or pertaining to Norway, its inhabitants, or its language.

Name: Nose
Definition: The prominent part of the face or anterior extremity of the head containing the nostrils and olfactory cavities; the olfactory organ. See Nostril, and Olfactory organ under Olfactory.

Name: Note
Definition: To butt; to push with the horns.

Name: Notebook
Definition: A book in which notes or memorandums are written.

Name: Noted
Definition: Well known by reputation or report; eminent; celebrated; as, a noted author, or traveler.

Name: Nothing
Definition: Not anything; no thing (in the widest sense of the word thing); -- opposed to anything and something.

Name: Notice
Definition: The act of noting, remarking, or observing; observation by the senses or intellect; cognizance; note.

Name: Notification
Definition: The act of notifying, or giving notice; the act of making known; especially, the act of giving official notice or information to the public or to individuals, corporations, companies, or societies, by words, by writing, or by other means.

Name: Notify
Definition: To make known; to declare; to publish; as, to notify a fact to a person.

Name: Notion
Definition: Mental apprehension of whatever may be known or imagined; an idea; a conception; more properly, a general or universal conception, as distinguishable or definable by marks or notae.

Name: Novel
Definition: Of recent origin or introduction; not ancient; new; hence, out of the ordinary course; unusual; strange; surprising.

Name: Novelty
Definition: The quality or state of being novel; newness; freshness; recentness of origin or introduction.

Name: November
Definition: The eleventh month of the year, containing thirty days.

Name: Nowhere
Definition: Not anywhere; not in any place or state; as, the book is nowhere to be found.

Name: Nuclear
Definition: Of or pertaining to a nucleus; as, the nuclear spindle (see Illust. of Karyokinesis) or the nuclear fibrils of a cell; the nuclear part of a comet, etc.

Name: Null
Definition: Of no legal or binding force or validity; of no efficacy; invalid; void; nugatory; useless.

Name: Number
Definition: That which admits of being counted or reckoned; a unit, or an aggregate of units; a numerable aggregate or collection of individuals; an assemblage made up of distinct things expressible by figures.

Name: Numbers
Definition: pl. of Number. The fourth book of the Pentateuch, containing the census of the Hebrews.

Name: Numeric
Definition: Alt. of Numerical

Name: Numerical
Definition: Belonging to number; denoting number; consisting in numbers; expressed by numbers, and not letters; as, numerical characters; a numerical equation; a numerical statement.

Name: Numeric
Definition: Any number, proper or improper fraction, or incommensurable ratio. The term also includes any imaginary expression like m + n-1, where m and n are real numerics.

Name: Numerous
Definition: Consisting of a great number of units or individual objects; being many; as, a numerous army.

Name: Nurse
Definition: One who nourishes; a person who supplies food, tends, or brings up; as: (a) A woman who has the care of young children; especially, one who suckles an infant not her own. (b) A person, especially a woman, who has the care of the sick or infirm.

Name: Nursery
Definition: The act of nursing.

Name: Nursing
Definition: Supplying or taking nourishment from, or as from, the breast; as, a nursing mother; a nursing infant.

Name: Nutrition
Definition: In the broadest sense, a process or series of processes by which the living organism as a whole (or its component parts or organs) is maintained in its normal condition of life and growth.

Name: Nutritional
Definition: Of or pertaining to nutrition; as, nutritional changes.

Name: Oasis
Definition: A fertile or green spot in a waste or desert, esp. in a sandy desert.

Name: Obesity
Definition: The state or quality of being obese; incumbrance of flesh.

Name: Object
Definition: To set before or against; to bring into opposition; to oppose.

Name: Objective
Definition: Of or pertaining to an object.

Name: Obligation
Definition: The act of obligating.

Name: Observation
Definition: The act or the faculty of observing or taking notice; the act of seeing, or of fixing the mind upon, anything.

Name: Observe
Definition: To take notice of by appropriate conduct; to conform one's action or practice to; to keep; to heed; to obey; to comply with; as, to observe rules or commands; to observe civility.

Name: Observer
Definition: One who observes, or pays attention to, anything; especially, one engaged in, or trained to habits of, close and exact observation; as, an astronomical observer.

Name: Obtain
Definition: To hold; to keep; to possess.

Name: Obvious
Definition: Opposing; fronting.

Name: Occasion
Definition: A falling out, happening, or coming to pass; hence, that which falls out or happens; occurrence; incident.

Name: Occasional
Definition: Of or pertaining to an occasion or to occasions; occuring at times, but not constant, regular, or systematic; made or happening as opportunity requires or admits; casual; incidental; as, occasional remarks, or efforts.

Name: Occasionally
Definition: In an occasional manner; on occasion; at times, as convenience requires or opportunity offers; not regularly.

Name: Occupation
Definition: The act or process of occupying or taking possession; actual possession and control; the state of being occupied; a holding or keeping; tenure; use; as, the occupation of lands by a tenant.

Name: Occur
Definition: To meet; to clash.

Name: Occurrence
Definition: A coming or happening; as, the occurence of a railway collision.

Name: Ocean
Definition: The whole body of salt water which covers more than three fifths of the surface of the globe; -- called also the sea, or great sea.

Name: October
Definition: The tenth month of the year, containing thirty-one days.

Name: Odds
Definition: Difference in favor of one and against another; excess of one of two things or numbers over the other; inequality; advantage; superiority; hence, excess of chances; probability.

Name: Offense
Definition: Alt. of Offence

Name: Offensive
Definition: Giving offense; causing displeasure or resentment; displeasing; annoying; as, offensive words.

Name: Offer
Definition: To present, as an act of worship; to immolate; to sacrifice; to present in prayer or devotion; -- often with up.

Name: Offering
Definition: The act of an offerer; a proffering.

Name: Office
Definition: That which a person does, either voluntarily or by appointment, for, or with reference to, others; customary duty, or a duty that arises from the relations of man to man; as, kind offices, pious offices.

Name: Officer
Definition: One who holds an office; a person lawfully invested with an office, whether civil, military, or ecclesiastical; as, a church officer; a police officer; a staff officer.

Name: Official
Definition: Of or pertaining to an office or public trust; as, official duties, or routine.

Name: Officially
Definition: By the proper officer; by virtue of the proper authority; in pursuance of the special powers vested in an officer or office; as, accounts or reports officially vertified or rendered; letters officially communicated; persons officially notified.

Name: Offset
Definition: In general, that which is set off, from, before, or against, something

Name: Offshore
Definition: From the shore; as, an offshore wind; an offshore signal.

Name: Often
Definition: Frequently; many times; not seldom.

Name: Olive
Definition: A tree (Olea Europaea) with small oblong or elliptical leaves, axillary clusters of flowers, and oval, one-seeded drupes. The tree has been cultivated for its fruit for thousands of years, and its branches are the emblems of peace. The wood is yellowish brown and beautifully variegated.

Name: Oliver
Definition: An olive grove.

Name: Olympic
Definition: Of or pertaining to Olympus, a mountain of Thessaly, fabled as the seat of the gods, or to Olympia, a small plain in Elis.

Name: Omega
Definition: The last letter of the Greek alphabet. See Alpha.

Name: Once
Definition: By limitation to the number one; for one time; not twice nor any number of times more than one.

Name: Ones
Definition: Once.

Name: Ongoing
Definition: The act of going forward; progress; (pl.) affairs; business; current events.

Name: Onion
Definition: A liliaceous plant of the genus Allium (A. cepa), having a strong-flavored bulb and long hollow leaves; also, its bulbous root, much used as an article of food. The name is often extended to other species of the genus.

Name: Only
Definition: One alone; single; as, the only man present; his only occupation.

Name: Onto
Definition: On the top of; upon; on. See On to, under On, prep.

Name: Open
Definition: Free of access; not shut up; not closed; affording unobstructed ingress or egress; not impeding or preventing passage; not locked up or covered over; -- applied to passageways; as, an open door, window, road, etc.; also, to inclosed structures or objects; as, open houses, boxes, baskets, bottles, etc.; also, to means of communication or approach by water or land; as, an open harbor or roadstead.

Name: Opening
Definition: The act or process of opening; a beginning; commencement; first appearance; as, the opening of a speech.

Name: Opera
Definition: A drama, either tragic or comic, of which music forms an essential part; a drama wholly or mostly sung, consisting of recitative, arials, choruses, duets, trios, etc., with orchestral accompaniment, preludes, and interludes, together with appropriate costumes, scenery, and action; a lyric drama.

Name: Operate
Definition: To perform a work or labor; to exert power or strengh, physical or mechanical; to act.

Name: Operation
Definition: The act or process of operating; agency; the exertion of power, physical, mechanical, or moral.

Name: Operator
Definition: One who, or that which, operates or produces an effect.

Name: Opinion
Definition: That which is opined; a notion or conviction founded on probable evidence; belief stronger than impression, less strong than positive knowledge; settled judgment in regard to any point of knowledge or action.

Name: Opponent
Definition: Situated in front; opposite; hence, opposing; adverse; antagonistic.

Name: Opportunity
Definition: Fit or convenient time; a time or place favorable for executing a purpose; a suitable combination of conditions; suitable occasion; chance.

Name: Opposite
Definition: Placed over against; standing or situated over against or in front; facing; -- often with to; as, a house opposite to the Exchange.

Name: Opposition
Definition: The act of opposing; an attempt to check, restrain, or defeat; resistance.

Name: Optical
Definition: Of or pertaining to vision or sight.

Name: Optics
Definition: That branch of physical science which treats of the nature and properties of light, the laws of its modification by opaque and transparent bodies, and the phenomena of vision.

Name: Option
Definition: The power of choosing; the right of choice or election; an alternative.

Name: Optional
Definition: Involving an option; depending on the exercise of an option; left to one's discretion or choice; not compulsory; as, optional studies; it is optional with you to go or stay.

Name: Oracle
Definition: The answer of a god, or some person reputed to be a god, to an inquiry respecting some affair or future event, as the success of an enterprise or battle.

Name: Oral
Definition: Uttered by the mouth, or in words; spoken, not written; verbal; as, oral traditions; oral testimony; oral law.

Name: Orange
Definition: The fruit of a tree of the genus Citrus (C. Aurantium). It is usually round, and consists of pulpy carpels, commonly ten in number, inclosed in a leathery rind, which is easily separable, and is reddish yellow when ripe.

Name: Orbit
Definition: The path described by a heavenly body in its periodical revolution around another body; as, the orbit of Jupiter, of the earth, of the moon.

Name: Orchestra
Definition: The space in a theater between the stage and the audience; -- originally appropriated by the Greeks to the chorus and its evolutions, afterward by the Romans to persons of distinction, and by the moderns to a band of instrumental musicians.

Name: Order
Definition: Regular arrangement; any methodical or established succession or harmonious relation; method; system

Name: Ordering
Definition: Disposition; distribution; management.

Name: Ordinance
Definition: Orderly arrangement; preparation; provision.

Name: Ordinary
Definition: According to established order; methodical; settled; regular.

Name: Organ
Definition: An instrument or medium by which some important action is performed, or an important end accomplished; as, legislatures, courts, armies, taxgatherers, etc., are organs of government.

Name: Organic
Definition: Of or pertaining to an organ or its functions, or to objects composed of organs; consisting of organs, or containing them; as, the organic structure of animals and plants; exhibiting characters peculiar to living organisms; as, organic bodies, organic life, organic remains.  Cf. Inorganic.

Name: Organization
Definition: The act of organizing; the act of arranging in a systematic way for use or action; as, the organization of an army, or of a deliberative body.

Name: Organize
Definition: To furnish with organs; to give an organic structure to; to endow with capacity for the functions of life; as, an organized being; organized matter; -- in this sense used chiefly in the past participle.

Name: Organizer
Definition: One who organizes.

Name: Oriental
Definition: Of or pertaining to the orient or east; eastern; concerned with the East or Orientalism; -- opposed to occidental; as, Oriental countries.

Name: Orientation
Definition: The act or process of orientating; determination of the points of the compass, or the east point, in taking bearings.

Name: Origin
Definition: The first existence or beginning of anything; the birth.

Name: Original
Definition: Pertaining to the origin or beginning; preceding all others; first in order; primitive; primary; pristine; as, the original state of man; the original laws of a country; the original inventor of a process.

Name: Originally
Definition: In the original time, or in an original manner; primarily; from the beginning or origin; not by derivation, or imitation.

Name: Orleans
Definition: A cloth made of worsted and cotton, -- used for wearing apparel.

Name: Other
Definition: Either; -- used with other or or for its correlative (as either . . . or are now used).

Name: Otherwise
Definition: In a different manner; in another way, or in other ways; differently; contrarily.

Name: Ought
Definition: Was or were under obligation to pay; owed.

Name: Ourselves
Definition: ; sing. Ourself (/). An emphasized form of the pronoun of the first person plural; -- used as a subject, usually with we; also, alone in the predicate, in the nominative or the objective case.

Name: Outcome
Definition: That which comes out of, or follows from, something else; issue; result; consequence; upshot.

Name: Outdoor
Definition: Being, or done, in the open air; being or done outside of certain buildings, as poorhouses, hospitals, etc.; as, outdoor exercise; outdoor relief; outdoor patients.

Name: Outdoors
Definition: Abread; out of the house; out of doors.

Name: Outer
Definition: Being on the outside; external; farthest or farther from the interior, from a given station, or from any space or position regarded as a center or starting place; -- opposed to inner; as, the outer wall; the outer court or gate; the outer stump in cricket; the outer world.

Name: Outlet
Definition: The place or opening by which anything is let out; a passage out; an exit; a vent.

Name: Outline
Definition: The line which marks the outer limits of an object or figure; the exterior line or edge; contour.

Name: Outlook
Definition: To face down; to outstare.

Name: Output
Definition: The amount of coal or ore put out from one or more mines, or the quantity of material produced by, or turned out from, one or more furnaces or mills, in a given time.

Name: Outreach
Definition: To reach beyond.

Name: Outside
Definition: The external part of a thing; the part, end, or side which forms the surface; that which appears, or is manifest; that which is superficial; the exterior.

Name: Outstanding
Definition: That stands out; undischarged; uncollected; not paid; as, outstanding obligations.

Name: Oval
Definition: Of or pertaining to eggs; done in the egg, or inception; as, oval conceptions.

Name: Oven
Definition: A place arched over with brick or stonework, and used for baking, heating, or drying; hence, any structure, whether fixed or portable, which may be heated for baking, drying, etc.; esp., now, a chamber in a stove, used for baking or roasting.

Name: Over
Definition: Above, or higher than, in place or position, with the idea of covering; -- opposed to under; as, clouds are over our heads; the smoke rises over the city.

Name: Overall
Definition: Everywhere.

Name: Overcome
Definition: To get the better of; to surmount; to conquer; to subdue; as, to overcome enemies in battle.

Name: Overhead
Definition: Aloft; above; in or attached to the ceiling or roof; in the story or upon the floor above; in the zenith.

Name: Overnight
Definition: The fore part of the night last past; the previous evening.

Name: Overseas
Definition: Over the sea; abroad.

Name: Overview
Definition: An inspection or overlooking.

Name: Owen
Definition: Own.

Name: Owner
Definition: One who owns; a rightful proprietor; one who has the legal or rightful title, whether he is the possessor or not.

Name: Ownership
Definition: The state of being an owner; the right to own; exclusive right of possession; legal or just claim or title; proprietorship.

Name: Oxford
Definition: Of or pertaining to the city or university of Oxford, England.

Name: Oxide
Definition: A binary compound of oxygen with an atom or radical, or a compound which is regarded as binary; as, iron oxide, ethyl oxide, nitrogen oxide, etc.

Name: Oxygen
Definition: A colorless, tasteless, odorless, gaseous element occurring in the free state in the atmosphere, of which it forms about 23 per cent by weight and about 21 per cent by volume, being slightly heavier than nitrogen. Symbol O. Atomic weight 15.96.

Name: Ozone
Definition: A colorless gaseous substance (O/) obtained (as by the silent discharge of electricity in oxygen) as an allotropic form of oxygen, containing three atoms in the molecule. It is a streng oxidizer, and probably exists in the air, though by he ordinary tests it is liable to be confused with certain other substances, as hydrogen dioxide, or certain oxides of nitrogen. It derives its name from its peculiar odor, which resembles that of weak chlorine.

Name: Pace
Definition: A single movement from one foot to the other in walking; a step.

Name: Pacific
Definition: Of or pertaining to peace; suited to make or restore peace; of a peaceful character; not warlike; not quarrelsome; conciliatory; as, pacific words or acts; a pacific nature or condition.

Name: Pack
Definition: A pact.

Name: Package
Definition: Act or process of packing.

Name: Packet
Definition: A small pack or package; a little bundle or parcel; as, a packet of letters.

Name: Packing
Definition: The act or process of one who packs.

Name: Page
Definition: A serving boy; formerly, a youth attending a person of high degree, especially at courts, as a position of honor and education; now commonly, in England, a youth employed for doing errands, waiting on the door, and similar service in households; in the United States, a boy employed to wait upon the members of a legislative body.

Name: Paid
Definition: Receiving pay; compensated; hired; as, a paid attorney.

Name: Pain
Definition: Punishment suffered or denounced; suffering or evil inflicted as a punishment for crime, or connected with the commission of a crime; penalty.

Name: Painful
Definition: Full of pain; causing uneasiness or distress, either physical or mental; afflictive; disquieting; distressing.

Name: Paint
Definition: To cover with coloring matter; to apply paint to; as, to paint a house, a signboard, etc.

Name: Painted
Definition: Covered or adorned with paint; portrayed in colors.

Name: Painting
Definition: The act or employment of laying on, or adorning with, paints or colors.

Name: Pair
Definition: A number of things resembling one another, or belonging together; a set; as, a pair or flight of stairs.

Name: Palace
Definition: The residence of a sovereign, including the lodgings of high officers of state, and rooms for business, as well as halls for ceremony and reception.

Name: Pale
Definition: Wanting in color; not ruddy; dusky white; pallid; wan; as, a pale face; a pale red; a pale blue.

Name: Palestinian
Definition: Alt. of Palestinean

Name: Palm
Definition: The inner and somewhat concave part of the hand between the bases of the fingers and the wrist.

Name: Palmer
Definition: One who palms or cheats, as at cards or dice.

Name: Panel
Definition: A sunken compartment with raised margins, molded or otherwise, as in ceilings, wainscotings, etc.

Name: Panic
Definition: A plant of the genus Panicum; panic grass; also, the edible grain of some species of panic grass.

Name: Paper
Definition: A substance in the form of thin sheets or leaves intended to be written or printed on, or to be used in wrapping. It is made of rags, straw, bark, wood, or other fibrous material, which is first reduced to pulp, then molded, pressed, and dried.

Name: Para
Definition: A piece of Turkish money, usually copper, the fortieth part of a piaster, or about one ninth of a cent.

Name: Parade
Definition: The ground where a military display is held, or where troops are drilled.

Name: Paradise
Definition: The garden of Eden, in which Adam and Eve were placed after their creation.

Name: Paragraph
Definition: Originally, a marginal mark or note, set in the margin to call attention to something in the text, e. g., a change of subject; now, the character /, commonly used in the text as a reference mark to a footnote, or to indicate the place of a division into sections.

Name: Parallel
Definition: Extended in the same direction, and in all parts equally distant; as, parallel lines; parallel planes.

Name: Parameter
Definition: A term applied to some characteristic magnitude whose value, invariable as long as one and the same function, curve, surface, etc., is considered, serves to distinguish that function, curve, surface, etc., from others of the same kind or family.

Name: Parcel
Definition: A portion of anything taken separately; a fragment of a whole; a part.

Name: Parent
Definition: One who begets, or brings forth, offspring; a father or a mother.

Name: Parental
Definition: Of or pertaining to a parent or to parents; as, parental authority; parental obligations.

Name: Paris
Definition: A plant common in Europe (Paris quadrifolia); herb Paris; truelove. It has been used as a narcotic.

Name: Parish
Definition: That circuit of ground committed to the charge of one parson or vicar, or other minister having cure of souls therein.

Name: Park
Definition: A piece of ground inclosed, and stored with beasts of the chase, which a man may have by prescription, or the king's grant.

Name: Parker
Definition: The keeper of a park.

Name: Parliament
Definition: A parleying; a discussion; a conference.

Name: Parliamentary
Definition: Of or pertaining to Parliament; as, parliamentary authority.

Name: Part
Definition: One of the portions, equal or unequal, into which anything is divided, or regarded as divided; something less than a whole; a number, quantity, mass, or the like, regarded as going to make up, with others, a larger number, quantity, mass, etc., whether actually separate or not; a piece; a fragment; a fraction; a division; a member; a constituent.

Name: Partial
Definition: Of, pertaining to, or affecting, a part only; not general or universal; not total or entire; as, a partial eclipse of the moon.

Name: Partially
Definition: In part; not totally; as, partially true; the sun partially eclipsed.

Name: Participant
Definition: Sharing; participating; having a share of part.

Name: Participate
Definition: Acting in common; participating.

Name: Participation
Definition: The act or state of participating, or sharing in common with others; as, a participation in joy or sorrows.

Name: Particle
Definition: A minute part or portion of matter; a morsel; a little bit; an atom; a jot; as, a particle of sand, of wood, of dust.

Name: Particular
Definition: Relating to a part or portion of anything; concerning a part separated from the whole or from others of the class; separate; sole; single; individual; specific; as, the particular stars of a constellation.

Name: Particularly
Definition: In a particular manner; expressly; with a specific reference or interest; in particular; distinctly.

Name: Partition
Definition: The act of parting or dividing; the state of being parted; separation; division; distribution; as, the partition of a kingdom.

Name: Partly
Definition: In part; in some measure of degree; not wholly.

Name: Partner
Definition: One who has a part in anything with an other; a partaker; an associate; a sharer.

Name: Partnership
Definition: The state or condition of being a partner; as, to be in partnership with another; to have partnership in the fortunes of a family or a state.

Name: Party
Definition: A part or portion.

Name: Pass
Definition: To go; to move; to proceed; to be moved or transferred from one point to another; to make a transit; -- usually with a following adverb or adverbal phrase defining the kind or manner of motion; as, to pass on, by, out, in, etc.; to pass swiftly, directly, smoothly, etc.; to pass to the rear, under the yoke, over the bridge, across the field, beyond the border, etc.

Name: Passage
Definition: The act of passing; transit from one place to another; movement from point to point; a going by, over, across, or through; as, the passage of a man or a carriage; the passage of a ship or a bird; the passage of light; the passage of fluids through the pores or channels of the body.

Name: Passenger
Definition: A passer or passer-by; a wayfarer.

Name: Passing
Definition: The act of one who, or that which, passes; the act of going by or away.

Name: Passion
Definition: A suffering or enduring of imposed or inflicted pain; any suffering or distress (as, a cardiac passion); specifically, the suffering of Christ between the time of the last supper and his death, esp. in the garden upon the cross.

Name: Passive
Definition: Not active, but acted upon; suffering or receiving impressions or influences; as, they were passive spectators, not actors in the scene.

Name: Passport
Definition: Permission to pass; a document given by the competent officer of a state, permitting the person therein named to pass or travel from place to place, without molestation, by land or by water.

Name: Password
Definition: A word to be given before a person is allowed to pass; a watchword; a countersign.

Name: Past
Definition: Of or pertaining to a former time or state; neither present nor future; gone by; elapsed; ended; spent; as, past troubles; past offences.

Name: Paste
Definition: A soft composition, as of flour moistened with water or milk, or of earth moistened to the consistence of dough, as in making potter's ware.

Name: Pastor
Definition: A shepherd; one who has the care of flocks and herds.

Name: Patch
Definition: A piece of cloth, or other suitable material, sewed or otherwise fixed upon a garment to repair or strengthen it, esp. upon an old garment to cover a hole.

Name: Patent
Definition: Open; expanded; evident; apparent; unconcealed; manifest; public; conspicuous.

Name: Path
Definition: A trodden way; a footway.

Name: Pathology
Definition: The science which treats of diseases, their nature, causes, progress, symptoms, etc.

Name: Patient
Definition: Having the quality of enduring; physically able to suffer or bear.

Name: Patio
Definition: A paved yard or floor where ores are cleaned and sorted, or where ore, salt, mercury, etc., are trampled by horses, to effect intermixture and amalgamation.

Name: Patrol
Definition: To go the rounds along a chain of sentinels; to traverse a police district or beat.

Name: Pattern
Definition: Anything proposed for imitation; an archetype; an exemplar; that which is to be, or is worthy to be, copied or imitated; as, a pattern of a machine.

Name: Paul
Definition: An Italian silver coin. See Paolo.

Name: Pavilion
Definition: A temporary movable habitation; a large tent; a marquee; esp., a tent raised on posts.

Name: Payable
Definition: That may, can, or should be paid; suitable to be paid; justly due.

Name: Payment
Definition: The act of paying, or giving compensation; the discharge of a debt or an obligation.

Name: Peace
Definition: A state of quiet or tranquillity; freedom from disturbance or agitation; calm; repose

Name: Peaceful
Definition: Possessing or enjoying peace; not disturbed by war, tumult, agitation, anxiety, or commotion; quiet; tranquil; as, a peaceful time; a peaceful country; a peaceful end.

Name: Peak
Definition: A point; the sharp end or top of anything that terminates in a point; as, the peak, or front, of a cap.

Name: Pearl
Definition: A fringe or border.

Name: Peer
Definition: To come in sight; to appear.

Name: Penalty
Definition: Penal retribution; punishment for crime or offense; the suffering in person or property which is annexed by law or judicial decision to the commission of a crime, offense, or trespass.

Name: Pencil
Definition: A small, fine brush of hair or bristles used by painters for laying on colors.

Name: Pendant
Definition: Something which hangs or depends; something suspended; a hanging appendage, especially one of an ornamental character; as to a chandelier or an eardrop; also, an appendix or addition, as to a book.

Name: Pending
Definition: Not yet decided; in continuance; in suspense; as, a pending suit.

Name: Penetration
Definition: The act or process of penetrating, piercing, or entering; also, the act of mentally penetrating into, or comprehending, anything difficult.

Name: Penguin
Definition: Any bird of the order Impennes, or Ptilopteri. They are covered with short, thick feathers, almost scalelike on the wings, which are without true quills. They are unable to fly, but use their wings to aid in diving, in which they are very expert. See King penguin, under Jackass.

Name: Peninsula
Definition: A portion of land nearly surrounded by water, and connected with a larger body by a neck, or isthmus.

Name: Penny
Definition: Denoting pound weight for one thousand; -- used in combination, with respect to nails; as, tenpenny nails, nails of which one thousand weight ten pounds.

Name: Pens
Definition: pl. of Penny.

Name: Pension
Definition: A payment; a tribute; something paid or given.

Name: People
Definition: The body of persons who compose a community, tribe, nation, or race; an aggregate of individuals forming a whole; a community; a nation.

Name: Pepper
Definition: A well-known, pungently aromatic condiment, the dried berry, either whole or powdered, of the Piper nigrum.

Name: Percentage
Definition: A certain rate per cent; the allowance, duty, rate of interest, discount, or commission, on a hundred.

Name: Perception
Definition: The act of perceiving; cognizance by the senses or intellect; apperhension by the bodily organs, or by the mind, of what is presented to them; discernment; apperhension; cognition.

Name: Perfect
Definition: Brought to consummation or completeness; completed; not defective nor redundant; having all the properties or qualities requisite to its nature and kind; without flaw, fault, or blemish; without error; mature; whole; pure; sound; right; correct.

Name: Perfectly
Definition: In a perfect manner or degree; in or to perfection; completely; wholly; throughly; faultlessly.

Name: Perform
Definition: To carry through; to bring to completion; to achieve; to accomplish; to execute; to do.

Name: Performance
Definition: The act of performing; the carrying into execution or action; execution; achievement; accomplishment; representation by action; as, the performance of an undertaking of a duty.

Name: Performer
Definition: One who performs, accomplishes, or fulfills; as, a good promiser, but a bad performer; especially, one who shows skill and training in any art; as, a performer of the drama; a performer on the harp.

Name: Perfume
Definition: To fill or impregnate with a perfume; to scent.

Name: Perhaps
Definition: By chance; peradventure; perchance; it may be.

Name: Period
Definition: A portion of time as limited and determined by some recurring phenomenon, as by the completion of a revolution of one of the heavenly bodies; a division of time, as a series of years, months, or days, in which something is completed, and ready to recommence and go on in the same order; as, the period of the sun, or the earth, or a comet.

Name: Periodic
Definition: Pertaining to, derived from, or designating, the highest oxygen acid (HIO/) of iodine.

Name: Periodically
Definition: In a periodical manner.

Name: Peripheral
Definition: Of or pertaining to a periphery; constituting a periphery; peripheric.

Name: Permanent
Definition: Continuing in the same state, or without any change that destroys form or character; remaining unaltered or unremoved; abiding; durable; fixed; stable; lasting; as, a permanent impression.

Name: Permission
Definition: The act of permitting or allowing; formal consent; authorization; leave; license or liberty granted.

Name: Permit
Definition: To consent to; to allow or suffer to be done; to tolerate; to put up with.

Name: Perry
Definition: A fermented liquor made from pears; pear cider.

Name: Persian
Definition: Of or pertaining to Persia, to the Persians, or to their language.

Name: Persistent
Definition: Inclined to persist; having staying qualities; tenacious of position or purpose.

Name: Person
Definition: A character or part, as in a play; a specific kind or manifestation of individual character, whether in real life, or in literary or dramatic representation; an assumed character.

Name: Personal
Definition: Pertaining to human beings as distinct from things.

Name: Personality
Definition: That which constitutes distinction of person; individuality.

Name: Personally
Definition: In a personal manner; by bodily presence; in person; not by representative or substitute; as, to deliver a letter personally.

Name: Personnel
Definition: The body of persons employed in some public service, as the army, navy, etc.; -- distinguished from materiel.

Name: Perspective
Definition: Of or pertaining to the science of vision; optical.

Name: Pest
Definition: A fatal epidemic disease; a pestilence; specif., the plague.

Name: Peter
Definition: A common baptismal name for a man. The name of one of the apostles,

Name: Petition
Definition: A prayer; a supplication; an imploration; an entreaty; especially, a request of a solemn or formal kind; a prayer to the Supreme Being, or to a person of superior power, rank, or authority; also, a single clause in such a prayer.

Name: Petroleum
Definition: Rock oil, mineral oil, or natural oil, a dark brown or greenish inflammable liquid, which, at certain points, exists in the upper strata of the earth, from whence it is pumped, or forced by pressure of the gas attending it. It consists of a complex mixture of various hydrocarbons, largely of the methane series, but may vary much in appearance, composition, and properties. It is refined by distillation, and the products include kerosene, benzine, gasoline, paraffin, etc.

Name: Phantom
Definition: That which has only an apparent existence; an apparition; a specter; a phantasm; a sprite; an airy spirit; an ideal image.

Name: Pharmaceutical
Definition: Of or pertaining to the knowledge or art of pharmacy, or to the art of preparing medicines according to the rules or formulas of pharmacy; as, pharmaceutical preparations.

Name: Pharmacology
Definition: Knowledge of drugs or medicines; the art of preparing medicines.

Name: Pharmacy
Definition: The art or practice of preparing and preserving drugs, and of compounding and dispensing medicines according to prescriptions of physicians; the occupation of an apothecary or a pharmaceutical chemist.

Name: Phase
Definition: That which is exhibited to the eye; the appearance which anything manifests, especially any one among different and varying appearances of the same object.

Name: Phenomenon
Definition: An appearance; anything visible; whatever, in matter or spirit, is apparent to, or is apprehended by, observation; as, the phenomena of heat, light, or electricity; phenomena of imagination or memory.

Name: Philip
Definition: The European hedge sparrow.

Name: Philosophy
Definition: Literally, the love of, including the search after, wisdom; in actual usage, the knowledge of phenomena as explained by, and resolved into, causes and reasons, powers and laws.

Name: Phoenix
Definition: Same as Phenix.

Name: Photo
Definition: A contraction of Photograph.

Name: Photograph
Definition: A picture or likeness obtained by photography.

Name: Photographer
Definition: One who practices, or is skilled in, photography.

Name: Photographic
Definition: Alt. of Photographical

Name: Photography
Definition: The science which relates to the action of light on sensitive bodies in the production of pictures, the fixation of images, and the like.

Name: Phrase
Definition: A brief expression, sometimes a single word, but usually two or more words forming an expression by themselves, or being a portion of a sentence; as, an adverbial phrase.

Name: Physical
Definition: Of or pertaining to nature (as including all created existences); in accordance with the laws of nature; also, of or relating to natural or material things, or to the bodily structure, as opposed to things mental, moral, spiritual, or imaginary; material; natural; as, armies and navies are the physical force of a nation; the body is the physical part of man.

Name: Physically
Definition: In a physical manner; according to the laws of nature or physics; by physical force; not morally.

Name: Physician
Definition: A person skilled in physic, or the art of healing; one duty authorized to prescribe remedies for, and treat, diseases; a doctor of medicine.

Name: Physics
Definition: The science of nature, or of natural objects; that branch of science which treats of the laws and properties of matter, and the forces acting upon it; especially, that department of natural science which treats of the causes (as gravitation, heat, light, magnetism, electricity, etc.) that modify the general properties of bodies; natural philosophy.

Name: Physiology
Definition: The science which treats of the phenomena of living organisms; the study of the processes incidental to, and characteristic of, life.

Name: Piano
Definition: Soft; -- a direction to the performer to execute a certain passage softly, and with diminished volume of tone. (Abbrev. p.)

Name: Pick
Definition: To throw; to pitch.

Name: Picked
Definition: Pointed; sharp.

Name: Picking
Definition: The act of digging or breaking up, as with a pick.

Name: Picnic
Definition: Formerly, an entertainment at which each person contributed some dish to a common table; now, an excursion or pleasure party in which the members partake of a collation or repast (usually in the open air, and from food carried by themselves).

Name: Picture
Definition: The art of painting; representation by painting.

Name: Piece
Definition: A fragment or part of anything separated from the whole, in any manner, as by cutting, splitting, breaking, or tearing; a part; a portion; as, a piece of sugar; to break in pieces.

Name: Pierce
Definition: To thrust into, penetrate, or transfix, with a pointed instrument.

Name: Pike
Definition: A foot soldier's weapon, consisting of a long wooden shaft or staff, with a pointed steel head. It is now superseded by the bayonet.

Name: Pill
Definition: The peel or skin.

Name: Pillow
Definition: Anything used to support the head of a person when reposing; especially, a sack or case filled with feathers, down, hair, or other soft material.

Name: Pilot
Definition: One employed to steer a vessel; a helmsman; a steersman.

Name: Pine
Definition: Woe; torment; pain.

Name: Ping
Definition: The sound made by a bullet in striking a solid object or in passing through the air.

Name: Pink
Definition: A vessel with a very narrow stern; -- called also pinky.

Name: Pioneer
Definition: A soldier detailed or employed to form roads, dig trenches, and make bridges, as an army advances.

Name: Pipe
Definition: A wind instrument of music, consisting of a tube or tubes of straw, reed, wood, or metal; any tube which produces musical sounds; as, a shepherd's pipe; the pipe of an organ.

Name: Pitch
Definition: A thick, black, lustrous, and sticky substance obtained by boiling down tar. It is used in calking the seams of ships; also in coating rope, canvas, wood, ironwork, etc., to preserve them.

Name: Place
Definition: Any portion of space regarded as measured off or distinct from all other space, or appropriated to some definite object or use; position; ground; site; spot; rarely, unbounded space.

Name: Placement
Definition: The act of placing, or the state of being placed.

Name: Plain
Definition: To lament; to bewail; to complain.

Name: Plaintiff
Definition: One who commences a personal action or suit to obtain a remedy for an injury to his rights; -- opposed to defendant.

Name: Plan
Definition: A draught or form; properly, a representation drawn on a plane, as a map or a chart; especially, a top view, as of a machine, or the representation or delineation of a horizontal section of anything, as of a building; a graphic representation; a diagram.

Name: Plane
Definition: Any tree of the genus Platanus.

Name: Planet
Definition: A celestial body which revolves about the sun in an orbit of a moderate degree of eccentricity. It is distinguished from a comet by the absence of a coma, and by having a less eccentric orbit. See Solar system.

Name: Planner
Definition: One who plans; a projector.

Name: Plant
Definition: A vegetable; an organized living being, generally without feeling and voluntary motion, and having, when complete, a root, stem, and leaves, though consisting sometimes only of a single leafy expansion, or a series of cellules, or even a single cellule.

Name: Plasma
Definition: A variety of quartz, of a color between grass green and leek green, which is found associated with common chalcedony. It was much esteemed by the ancients for making engraved ornaments.

Name: Plastic
Definition: Having the power to give form or fashion to a mass of matter; as, the plastic hand of the Creator.

Name: Plate
Definition: A flat, or nearly flat, piece of metal, the thickness of which is small in comparison with the other dimensions; a thick sheet of metal; as, a steel plate.

Name: Platform
Definition: A plat; a plan; a sketch; a model; a pattern. Used also figuratively.

Name: Platinum
Definition: A metallic element, intermediate in value between silver and gold, occurring native or alloyed with other metals, also as the platinum arsenide (sperrylite). It is heavy tin-white metal which is ductile and malleable, but very infusible, and characterized by its resistance to strong chemical reagents. It is used for crucibles, for stills for sulphuric acid, rarely for coin, and in the form of foil and wire for many purposes. Specific gravity 21.5. Atomic weight 194.3. Symbol Pt. Formerly called platina.

Name: Play
Definition: To engage in sport or lively recreation; to exercise for the sake of amusement; to frolic; to spot.

Name: Player
Definition: One who plays, or amuses himself; one without serious aims; an idler; a trifler.

Name: Playing
Definition: a. & vb. n. of Play.

Name: Plaza
Definition: A public square in a city or town.

Name: Pleasant
Definition: Pleasing; grateful to the mind or to the senses; agreeable; as, a pleasant journey; pleasant weather.

Name: Please
Definition: To give pleasure to; to excite agreeable sensations or emotions in; to make glad; to gratify; to content; to satisfy.

Name: Pleased
Definition: Experiencing pleasure.

Name: Pleasure
Definition: The gratification of the senses or of the mind; agreeable sensations or emotions; the excitement, relish, or happiness produced by the expectation or the enjoyment of something good, delightful, or satisfying; -- opposed to pain, sorrow, etc.

Name: Pledge
Definition: The transfer of possession of personal property from a debtor to a creditor as security for a debt or engagement; also, the contract created between the debtor and creditor by a thing being so delivered or deposited, forming a species of bailment; also, that which is so delivered or deposited; something put in pawn.

Name: Plenty
Definition: Full or adequate supply; enough and to spare; sufficiency; specifically, abundant productiveness of the earth; ample supply for human wants; abundance; copiousness.

Name: Plot
Definition: A small extent of ground; a plat; as, a garden plot.

Name: Plug
Definition: Any piece of wood, metal, or other substance used to stop or fill a hole; a stopple.

Name: Plumbing
Definition: The art of casting and working in lead, and applying it to building purposes; especially, the business of furnishing, fitting, and repairing pipes for conducting water, sewage, etc.

Name: Plus
Definition: More, required to be added; positive, as distinguished from negative; -- opposed to minus.

Name: Pocket
Definition: A bag or pouch; especially; a small bag inserted in a garment for carrying small articles, particularly money; hence, figuratively, money; wealth.

Name: Poem
Definition: A metrical composition; a composition in verse written in certain measures, whether in blank verse or in rhyme, and characterized by imagination and poetic diction; -- contradistinguished from prose; as, the poems of Homer or of Milton.

Name: Poet
Definition: One skilled in making poetry; one who has a particular genius for metrical composition; the author of a poem; an imaginative thinker or writer.

Name: Poetry
Definition: The art of apprehending and interpreting ideas by the faculty of imagination; the art of idealizing in thought and in expression.

Name: Point
Definition: To appoint.

Name: Pointed
Definition: Sharp; having a sharp point; as, a pointed rock.

Name: Pointer
Definition: One who, or that which, points.

Name: Pointing
Definition: The act of sharpening.

Name: Poison
Definition: Any agent which, when introduced into the animal organism, is capable of producing a morbid, noxious, or deadly effect upon it; as, morphine is a deadly poison; the poison of pestilential diseases.

Name: Poker
Definition: One who pokes.

Name: Polar
Definition: Of or pertaining to one of the poles of the earth, or of a sphere; situated near, or proceeding from, one of the poles; as, polar regions; polar seas; polar winds.

Name: Pole
Definition: A native or inhabitant of Poland; a Polander.

Name: Police
Definition: A judicial and executive system, for the government of a city, town, or district, for the preservation of rights, order, cleanliness, health, etc., and for the enforcement of the laws and prevention of crime; the administration of the laws and regulations of a city, incorporated town, or borough.

Name: Policy
Definition: Civil polity.

Name: Polish
Definition: Of or pertaining to Poland or its inhabitants.

Name: Polished
Definition: Made smooth and glossy, as by friction; hence, highly finished; refined; polite; as, polished plate; polished manners; polished verse.

Name: Political
Definition: Having, or conforming to, a settled system of administration.

Name: Politics
Definition: The science of government; that part of ethics which has to do with the regulation and government of a nation or state, the preservation of its safety, peace, and prosperity, the defense of its existence and rights against foreign control or conquest, the augmentation of its strength and resources, and the protection of its citizens in their rights, with the preservation and improvement of their morals.

Name: Poll
Definition: A parrot; -- familiarly so called.

Name: Pollution
Definition: The act of polluting, or the state of being polluted (in any sense of the verb); defilement; uncleanness; impurity.

Name: Polo
Definition: A game of ball of Eastern origin, resembling hockey, with the players on horseback.

Name: Poly
Definition: A whitish woolly plant (Teucrium Polium) of the order Labiatae, found throughout the Mediterranean region. The name, with sundry prefixes, is sometimes given to other related species of the same genus.

Name: Polymer
Definition: Any one of two or more substances related to each other by polymerism; specifically, a substance produced from another substance by chemical polymerization.

Name: Polyphonic
Definition: Having a multiplicity of sounds.

Name: Pond
Definition: A body of water, naturally or artificially confined, and usually of less extent than a lake.

Name: Pool
Definition: A small and rather deep collection of (usually) fresh water, as one supplied by a spring, or occurring in the course of a stream; a reservoir for water; as, the pools of Solomon.

Name: Poor
Definition: Destitute of property; wanting in material riches or goods; needy; indigent.

Name: Pope
Definition: Any ecclesiastic, esp. a bishop.

Name: Popular
Definition: Of or pertaining to the common people, or to the whole body of the people, as distinguished from a select portion; as, the popular voice; popular elections.

Name: Popularity
Definition: The quality or state of being popular; especially, the state of being esteemed by, or of being in favor with, the people at large; good will or favor proceeding from the people; as, the popularity of a law, statesman, or a book.

Name: Population
Definition: The act or process of populating; multiplication of inhabitants.

Name: Porcelain
Definition: Purslain.

Name: Pork
Definition: The flesh of swine, fresh or salted, used for food.

Name: Port
Definition: A dark red or purple astringent wine made in Portugal. It contains a large percentage of alcohol.

Name: Portable
Definition: Capable of being borne or carried; easily transported; conveyed without difficulty; as, a portable bed, desk, engine.

Name: Portal
Definition: A door or gate; hence, a way of entrance or exit, especially one that is grand and imposing.

Name: Porter
Definition: A man who has charge of a door or gate; a doorkeeper; one who waits at the door to receive messages.

Name: Portfolio
Definition: A portable case for holding loose papers, prints, drawings, etc.

Name: Portion
Definition: That which is divided off or separated, as a part from a whole; a separated part of anything.

Name: Portrait
Definition: The likeness of a person, painted, drawn, or engraved; commonly, a representation of the human face painted from real life.

Name: Portuguese
Definition: Of or pertaining to Portugal, or its inhabitants.

Name: Pose
Definition: Standing still, with all the feet on the ground; -- said of the attitude of a lion, horse, or other beast.

Name: Position
Definition: The state of being posited, or placed; the manner in which anything is placed; attitude; condition; as, a firm, an inclined, or an upright position.

Name: Positive
Definition: Having a real position, existence, or energy; existing in fact; real; actual; -- opposed to negative.

Name: Possess
Definition: To occupy in person; to hold or actually have in one's own keeping; to have and to hold.

Name: Possession
Definition: The act or state of possessing, or holding as one's own.

Name: Possibility
Definition: The quality or state of being possible; the power of happening, being, or existing.

Name: Possible
Definition: Capable of existing or occurring, or of being conceived or thought of; able to happen; capable of being done; not contrary to the nature of things; -- sometimes used to express extreme improbability; barely able to be, or to come to pass; as, possibly he is honest, as it is possible that Judas meant no wrong.

Name: Possibly
Definition: In a possible manner; by possible means; especially, by extreme, remote, or improbable intervention, change, or exercise of power; by a chance; perhaps; as, possibly he may recover.

Name: Post
Definition: Hired to do what is wrong; suborned.

Name: Postage
Definition: The price established by law to be paid for the conveyance of a letter or other mailable matter by a public post.

Name: Postal
Definition: Belonging to the post office or mail service; as, postal arrangements; postal authorities.

Name: Poster
Definition: A large bill or placard intended to be posted in public places.

Name: Posting
Definition: The act of traveling post.

Name: Potato
Definition: A plant (Solanum tuberosum) of the Nightshade family, and its esculent farinaceous tuber, of which there are numerous varieties used for food. It is native of South America, but a form of the species is found native as far north as New Mexico.

Name: Potential
Definition: Being potent; endowed with energy adequate to a result; efficacious; influential.

Name: Potentially
Definition: With power; potently.

Name: Potter
Definition: One whose occupation is to make earthen vessels.

Name: Pottery
Definition: The vessels or ware made by potters; earthenware, glazed and baked.

Name: Poultry
Definition: Domestic fowls reared for the table, or for their eggs or feathers, such as cocks and hens, capons, turkeys, ducks, and geese.

Name: Pound
Definition: To strike repeatedly with some heavy instrument; to beat.

Name: Pour
Definition: Poor.

Name: Poverty
Definition: The quality or state of being poor or indigent; want or scarcity of means of subsistence; indigence; need.

Name: Powder
Definition: The fine particles to which any dry substance is reduced by pounding, grinding, or triturating, or into which it falls by decay; dust.

Name: Power
Definition: Same as Poor, the fish.

Name: Powerful
Definition: Full of power; capable of producing great effects of any kind; potent; mighty; efficacious; intense; as, a powerful man or beast; a powerful engine; a powerful argument; a powerful light; a powerful vessel.

Name: Practical
Definition: Of or pertaining to practice or action.

Name: Practice
