Definition: Frequently repeated or customary action; habitual performance; a succession of acts of a similar kind; usage; habit; custom; as, the practice of rising early; the practice of making regular entries of accounts; the practice of daily exercise.

Name: Practitioner
Definition: One who is engaged in the actual use or exercise of any art or profession, particularly that of law or medicine.

Name: Prairie
Definition: An extensive tract of level or rolling land, destitute of trees, covered with coarse grass, and usually characterized by a deep, fertile soil. They abound throughout the Mississippi valley, between the Alleghanies and the Rocky mountains.

Name: Praise
Definition: To commend; to applaud; to express approbation of; to laud; -- applied to a person or his acts.

Name: Pray
Definition: To make request with earnestness or zeal, as for something desired; to make entreaty or supplication; to offer prayer to a deity or divine being as a religious act; specifically, to address the Supreme Being with adoration, confession, supplication, and thanksgiving.

Name: Prayer
Definition: One who prays; a supplicant.

Name: Preceding
Definition: Going before; -- opposed to following.

Name: Precious
Definition: Of great price; costly; as, a precious stone.

Name: Precipitation
Definition: The act of precipitating, or the state of being precipitated, or thrown headlong.

Name: Precise
Definition: Having determinate limitations; exactly or sharply defined or stated; definite; exact; nice; not vague or equivocal; as, precise rules of morality.

Name: Precision
Definition: The quality or state of being precise; exact limitation; exactness; accuracy; strict conformity to a rule or a standard; definiteness.

Name: Predict
Definition: To tell or declare beforehand; to foretell; to prophesy; to presage; as, to predict misfortune; to predict the return of a comet.

Name: Prediction
Definition: The act of foretelling; also, that which is foretold; prophecy.

Name: Prefer
Definition: To carry or bring (something) forward, or before one; hence, to bring for consideration, acceptance, judgment, etc.; to offer; to present; to proffer; to address; -- said especially of a request, prayer, petition, claim, charge, etc.

Name: Preference
Definition: The act of Preferring, or the state of being preferred; the setting of one thing before another; precedence; higher estimation; predilection; choice; also, the power or opportunity of choosing; as, to give him his preference.

Name: Prefix
Definition: To put or fix before, or at the beginning of, another thing; as, to prefix a syllable to a word, or a condition to an agreement.

Name: Pregnancy
Definition: The condition of being pregnant; the state of being with young.

Name: Pregnant
Definition: Being with young, as a female; having conceived; great with young; breeding; teeming; gravid; preparing to bring forth.

Name: Preliminary
Definition: Introductory; previous; preceding the main discourse or business; prefatory; as, preliminary observations to a discourse or book; preliminary articles to a treaty; preliminary measures; preliminary examinations.

Name: Premier
Definition: First; chief; principal; as, the premier place; premier minister.

Name: Premium
Definition: A reward or recompense; a prize to be won by being before another, or others, in a competition; reward or prize to be adjudged; a bounty; as, a premium for good behavior or scholarship, for discoveries, etc.

Name: Preparation
Definition: The act of preparing or fitting beforehand for a particular purpose, use, service, or condition; previous arrangement or adaptation; a making ready; as, the preparation of land for a crop of wheat; the preparation of troops for a campaign.

Name: Prepare
Definition: To fit, adapt, or qualify for a particular purpose or condition; to make ready; to put into a state for use or application; as, to prepare ground for seed; to prepare a lesson.

Name: Prepared
Definition: Made fit or suitable; adapted; ready; as, prepared food; prepared questions.

Name: Prerequisite
Definition: Previously required; necessary as a preliminary to any proposed effect or end; as, prerequisite conditions of success.

Name: Prescription
Definition: The act of prescribing, directing, or dictating; direction; precept; also, that which is prescribed.

Name: Presence
Definition: The state of being present, or of being within sight or call, or at hand; -- opposed to absence.

Name: Present
Definition: Being at hand, within reach or call, within certain contemplated limits; -- opposed to absent.

Name: Presentation
Definition: The act of presenting, or the state of being presented; a setting forth; an offering; bestowal.

Name: Presently
Definition: At present; at this time; now.

Name: Preservation
Definition: The act or process of preserving, or keeping safe; the state of being preserved, or kept from injury, destruction, or decay; security; safety; as, preservation of life, fruit, game, etc.; a picture in good preservation.

Name: Preserve
Definition: To keep or save from injury or destruction; to guard or defend from evil, harm, danger, etc.; to protect.

Name: President
Definition: Precedent.

Name: Presidential
Definition: Presiding or watching over.

Name: Press
Definition: An East Indian insectivore (Tupaia ferruginea). It is arboreal in its habits, and has a bushy tail. The fur is soft, and varies from rusty red to maroon and to brownish black.

Name: Pressing
Definition: Urgent; exacting; importunate; as, a pressing necessity.

Name: Pressure
Definition: The act of pressing, or the condition of being pressed; compression; a squeezing; a crushing; as, a pressure of the hand.

Name: Pretty
Definition: Pleasing by delicacy or grace; attracting, but not striking or impressing; of a pleasing and attractive form a color; having slight or diminutive beauty; neat or elegant without elevation or grandeur; pleasingly, but not grandly, conceived or expressed; as, a pretty face; a pretty flower; a pretty poem.

Name: Prevent
Definition: To go before; to precede; hence, to go before as a guide; to direct.

Name: Prevention
Definition: The act of going, or state of being, before.

Name: Previous
Definition: Going before in time; being or happening before something else; antecedent; prior; as, previous arrangements; a previous illness.

Name: Previously
Definition: Beforehand; antecedently; as, a plan previously formed.

Name: Price
Definition: The sum or amount of money at which a thing is valued, or the value which a seller sets on his goods in market; that for which something is bought or sold, or offered for sale; equivalent in money or other means of exchange; current value or rate paid or demanded in market or in barter; cost.

Name: Priced
Definition: Rated in price; valued; as, high-priced goods; low-priced labor.

Name: Pride
Definition: A small European lamprey (Petromyzon branchialis); -- called also prid, and sandpiper.

Name: Priest
Definition: A presbyter elder; a minister

Name: Primarily
Definition: In a primary manner; in the first place; in the first place; in the first intention; originally.

Name: Primary
Definition: First in order of time or development or in intention; primitive; fundamental; original.

Name: Prime
Definition: First in order of time; original; primeval; primitive; primary.

Name: Prince
Definition: The one of highest rank; one holding the highest place and authority; a sovereign; a monarch; -- originally applied to either sex, but now rarely applied to a female.

Name: Princess
Definition: A female prince; a woman having sovereign power, or the rank of a prince.

Name: Principal
Definition: Highest in rank, authority, character, importance, or degree; most considerable or important; chief; main; as, the principal officers of a Government; the principal men of a state; the principal productions of a country; the principal arguments in a case.

Name: Principle
Definition: Beginning; commencement.

Name: Print
Definition: To fix or impress, as a stamp, mark, character, idea, etc., into or upon something.

Name: Printer
Definition: One who prints; especially, one who prints books, newspapers, engravings, etc., a compositor; a typesetter; a pressman.

Name: Printing
Definition: The act, art, or practice of impressing letters, characters, or figures on paper, cloth, or other material; the business of a printer, including typesetting and presswork, with their adjuncts; typography; also, the act of producing photographic prints.

Name: Prior
Definition: Preceding in the order of time; former; antecedent; anterior; previous; as, a prior discovery; prior obligation; -- used elliptically in cases like the following: he lived alone [in the time] prior to his marriage.

Name: Priority
Definition: The quality or state of being prior or antecedent in time, or of preceding something else; as, priority of application.

Name: Prison
Definition: A place where persons are confined, or restrained of personal liberty; hence, a place or state o/ confinement, restraint, or safe custody.

Name: Prisoner
Definition: One who is confined in a prison.

Name: Privacy
Definition: The state of being in retirement from the company or observation of others; seclusion.

Name: Private
Definition: Belonging to, or concerning, an individual person, company, or interest; peculiar to one's self; unconnected with others; personal; one's own; not public; not general; separate; as, a man's private opinion; private property; a private purse; private expenses or interests; a private secretary.

Name: Privilege
Definition: A peculiar benefit, advantage, or favor; a right or immunity not enjoyed by others or by all; special enjoyment of a good, or exemption from an evil or burden; a prerogative; advantage; franchise.

Name: Prize
Definition: That which is taken from another; something captured; a thing seized by force, stratagem, or superior power.

Name: Probability
Definition: The quality or state of being probable; appearance of reality or truth; reasonable ground of presumption; likelihood.

Name: Probably
Definition: In a probable manner; in likelihood.

Name: Probe
Definition: To examine, as a wound, an ulcer, or some cavity of the body, with a probe.

Name: Problem
Definition: A question proposed for solution; a matter stated for examination or proof; hence, a matter difficult of solution or settlement; a doubtful case; a question involving doubt.

Name: Procedure
Definition: The act or manner of proceeding or moving forward; progress; process; operation; conduct.

Name: Proceed
Definition: To move, pass, or go forward or onward; to advance; to continue or renew motion begun; as, to proceed on a journey.

Name: Proceeding
Definition: The act of one who proceeds, or who prosecutes a design or transaction; progress or movement from one thing to another; a measure or step taken in a course of business; a transaction; as, an illegal proceeding; a cautious or a violent proceeding.

Name: Proceeds
Definition: That which comes forth or results; effect; yield; issue; product; sum accruing from a sale, etc.

Name: Process
Definition: The act of proceeding; continued forward movement; procedure; progress; advance.

Name: Procurement
Definition: The act of procuring or obtaining; obtainment; attainment.

Name: Produce
Definition: To bring forward; to lead forth; to offer to view or notice; to exhibit; to show; as, to produce a witness or evidence in court.

Name: Producer
Definition: One who produces, brings forth, or generates.

Name: Product
Definition: Anything that is produced, whether as the result of generation, growth, labor, or thought, or by the operation of involuntary causes; as, the products of the season, or of the farm; the products of manufactures; the products of the brain.

Name: Production
Definition: The act or process or producing, bringing forth, or exhibiting to view; as, the production of commodities, of a witness.

Name: Productive
Definition: Having the quality or power of producing; yielding or furnishing results; as, productive soil; productive enterprises; productive labor, that which increases the number or amount of products.

Name: Productivity
Definition: The quality or state of being productive; productiveness.

Name: Profession
Definition: The act of professing or claiming; open declaration; public avowal or acknowledgment; as, professions of friendship; a profession of faith.

Name: Professional
Definition: Of or pertaining to a profession, or calling; conforming to the rules or standards of a profession; following a profession; as, professional knowledge; professional conduct.

Name: Professor
Definition: One who professed, or makes open declaration of, his sentiments or opinions; especially, one who makes a public avowal of his belief in the Scriptures and his faith in Christ, and thus unites himself to the visible church.

Name: Profile
Definition: An outline, or contour; as, the profile of an apple.

Name: Profit
Definition: Acquisition beyond expenditure; excess of value received for producing, keeping, or selling, over cost; hence, pecuniary gain in any transaction or occupation; emolument; as, a profit on the sale of goods.

Name: Program
Definition: Same as Programme.

Name: Programme
Definition: That which is written or printed as a public notice or advertisement; a scheme; a prospectus; especially, a brief outline or explanation of the order to be pursued, or the subjects embraced, in any public exercise, performance, or entertainment; a preliminary sketch.

Name: Progress
Definition: A moving or going forward; a proceeding onward; an advance

Name: Progressive
Definition: Moving forward; proceeding onward; advancing; evincing progress; increasing; as, progressive motion or course; -- opposed to retrograde.

Name: Project
Definition: The place from which a thing projects, or starts forth.

Name: Projection
Definition: The act of throwing or shooting forward.

Name: Projector
Definition: One who projects a scheme or design; hence, one who forms fanciful or chimerical schemes.

Name: Prominent
Definition: Standing out, or projecting, beyond the line surface of something; jutting; protuberant; in high relief; as, a prominent figure on a vase.

Name: Promise
Definition: In general, a declaration, written or verbal, made by one person to another, which binds the person who makes it to do, or to forbear to do, a specified act; a declaration which gives to the person to whom it is made a right to expect or to claim the performance or forbearance of a specified act.

Name: Promising
Definition: Making a promise or promises; affording hope or assurance; as, promising person; a promising day.

Name: Promote
Definition: To contribute to the growth, enlargement, or prosperity of (any process or thing that is in course); to forward; to further; to encourage; to advance; to excite; as, to promote learning; to promote disorder; to promote a business venture.

Name: Prompt
Definition: A limit of time given for payment of an account for produce purchased, this limit varying with different goods. See Prompt-note.

Name: Promptly
Definition: In a prompt manner.

Name: Proof
Definition: Any effort, process, or operation designed to establish or discover a fact or truth; an act of testing; a test; a trial.

Name: Proper
Definition: Belonging to one; one's own; individual.

Name: Properly
Definition: In a proper manner; suitably; fitly; strictly; rightly; as, a word properly applied; a dress properly adjusted.

Name: Property
Definition: That which is proper to anything; a peculiar quality of a thing; that which is inherent in a subject, or naturally essential to it; an attribute; as, sweetness is a property of sugar.

Name: Prophet
Definition: One who prophesies, or foretells events; a predicter; a foreteller.

Name: Proportion
Definition: The relation or adaptation of one portion to another, or to the whole, as respect magnitude, quantity, or degree; comparative relation; ratio; as, the proportion of the parts of a building, or of the body.

Name: Proposal
Definition: That which is proposed, or propounded for consideration or acceptance; a scheme or design; terms or conditions proposed; offer; as, to make proposals for a treaty of peace; to offer proposals for erecting a building; to make proposals of marriage.

Name: Propose
Definition: To set forth.

Name: Proposition
Definition: The act of setting or placing before; the act of offering.

Name: Proprietary
Definition: A proprietor or owner; one who has exclusive title to a thing; one who possesses, or holds the title to, a thing in his own right.

Name: Prospect
Definition: That which is embraced by eye in vision; the region which the eye overlooks at one time; view; scene; outlook.

Name: Prospective
Definition: Of or pertaining to a prospect; furnishing a prospect; perspective.

Name: Prostate
Definition: Standing before; -- applied to a gland which is found in the males of most mammals, and is situated at the neck of the bladder where this joins the urethra.

Name: Protect
Definition: To cover or shield from danger or injury; to defend; to guard; to preserve in safety; as, a father protects his children.

Name: Protection
Definition: The act of protecting, or the state of being protected; preservation from loss, injury, or annoyance; defense; shelter; as, the weak need protection.

Name: Protective
Definition: Affording protection; sheltering; defensive.

Name: Protein
Definition: A body now known as alkali albumin, but originally considered to be the basis of all albuminous substances, whence its name.

Name: Protest
Definition: To affirm in a public or formal manner; to bear witness; to declare solemnly; to avow.

Name: Protocol
Definition: The original copy of any writing, as of a deed, treaty, dispatch, or other instrument.

Name: Prototype
Definition: An original or model after which anything is copied; the pattern of anything to be engraved, or otherwise copied, cast, or the like; a primary form; exemplar; archetype.

Name: Proud
Definition: Feeling or manifesting pride, in a good or bad sense

Name: Proudly
Definition: In a proud manner; with lofty airs or mien; haughtily; arrogantly; boastfully.

Name: Prove
Definition: To try or to ascertain by an experiment, or by a test or standard; to test; as, to prove the strength of gunpowder or of ordnance; to prove the contents of a vessel by a standard measure.

Name: Proven
Definition: Proved.

Name: Provide
Definition: To look out for in advance; to procure beforehand; to get, collect, or make ready for future use; to prepare.

Name: Provided
Definition: On condition; by stipulation; with the understanding; if; -- usually followed by that; as, provided that nothing in this act shall prejudice the rights of any person whatever.

Name: Providence
Definition: The act of providing or preparing for future use or application; a making ready; preparation.

Name: Provider
Definition: One who provides, furnishes, or supplies; one who procures what is wanted.

Name: Province
Definition: A country or region, more or less remote from the city of Rome, brought under the Roman government; a conquered country beyond the limits of Italy.

Name: Provincial
Definition: Of or pertaining to province; constituting a province; as, a provincial government; a provincial dialect.

Name: Provision
Definition: The act of providing, or making previous preparation.

Name: Proxy
Definition: The agency for another who acts through the agent; authority to act for another, esp. to vote in a legislative or corporate capacity.

Name: Psychiatry
Definition: The application of the healing art to mental diseases.

Name: Psychological
Definition: Of or pertaining to psychology. See Note under Psychic.

Name: Psychology
Definition: The science of the human soul; specifically, the systematic or scientific knowledge of the powers and functions of the human soul, so far as they are known by consciousness; a treatise on the human soul.

Name: Public
Definition: Of or pertaining to the people; belonging to the people; relating to, or affecting, a nation, state, or community; -- opposed to private; as, the public treasury.

Name: Publication
Definition: The act of publishing or making known; notification to the people at large, either by words, writing, or printing; proclamation; divulgation; promulgation; as, the publication of the law at Mount Sinai; the publication of the gospel; the publication of statutes or edicts.

Name: Publicity
Definition: The quality or state of being public, or open to the knowledge of a community; notoriety; publicness.

Name: Publicly
Definition: With exposure to popular view or notice; without concealment; openly; as, property publicly offered for sale; an opinion publicly avowed; a declaration publicly made.

Name: Publish
Definition: To make public; to make known to mankind, or to people in general; to divulge, as a private transaction; to promulgate or proclaim, as a law or an edict.

Name: Publisher
Definition: One who publishes; as, a publisher of a book or magazine.

Name: Pull
Definition: To draw, or attempt to draw, toward one; to draw forcibly.

Name: Pulled
Definition: Plucked; pilled; moulting.

Name: Pulse
Definition: Leguminous plants, or their seeds, as beans, pease, etc.

Name: Pump
Definition: A low shoe with a thin sole.

Name: Punch
Definition: A beverage composed of wine or distilled liquor, water (or milk), sugar, and the juice of lemon, with spice or mint; -- specifically named from the kind of spirit used; as rum punch, claret punch, champagne punch, etc.

Name: Punishment
Definition: The act of punishing.

Name: Punk
Definition: Wood so decayed as to be dry, crumbly, and useful for tinder; touchwood.

Name: Puppy
Definition: The young of a canine animal, esp. of the common dog; a whelp.

Name: Purchase
Definition: To pursue and obtain; to acquire by seeking; to gain, obtain, or acquire.

Name: Pure
Definition: Separate from all heterogeneous or extraneous matter; free from mixture or combination; clean; mere; simple; unmixed; as, pure water; pure clay; pure air; pure compassion.

Name: Purple
Definition: A color formed by, or resembling that formed by, a combination of the primary colors red and blue.

Name: Purpose
Definition: That which a person sets before himself as an object to be reached or accomplished; the end or aim to which the view is directed in any plan, measure, or exertion; view; aim; design; intention; plan.

Name: Purse
Definition: A small bag or pouch, the opening of which is made to draw together closely, used to carry money in; by extension, any receptacle for money carried on the person; a wallet; a pocketbook; a portemonnaie.

Name: Pursuant
Definition: Acting in consequence or in prosecution (of anything); hence, agreeable; conformable; following; according; -- with to or of.

Name: Pursue
Definition: To follow with a view to overtake; to follow eagerly, or with haste; to chase; as, to pursue a hare.

Name: Pursuit
Definition: The act of following or going after; esp., a following with haste, either for sport or in hostility; chase; prosecution; as, the pursuit of game; the pursuit of an enemy.

Name: Push
Definition: A pustule; a pimple.

Name: Pushing
Definition: Pressing forward in business; enterprising; driving; energetic; also, forward; officious, intrusive.

Name: Putting
Definition: The throwing of a heavy stone, shot, etc., with the hand raised or extended from the shoulder; -- originally, a Scottish game.

Name: Puzzle
Definition: Something which perplexes or embarrasses; especially, a toy or a problem contrived for testing ingenuity; also, something exhibiting marvelous skill in making.

Name: Python
Definition: Any species of very large snakes of the genus Python, and allied genera, of the family Pythonidae. They are nearly allied to the boas. Called also rock snake.

Name: Quad
Definition: Alt. of Quade

Name: Quad
Definition: A quadrat.

Name: Qualification
Definition: The act of qualifying, or the condition of being qualified.

Name: Qualified
Definition: Fitted by accomplishments or endowments.

Name: Qualify
Definition: To make such as is required; to give added or requisite qualities to; to fit, as for a place, office, occupation, or character; to furnish with the knowledge, skill, or other accomplishment necessary for a purpose; to make capable, as of an employment or privilege; to supply with legal power or capacity.

Name: Quality
Definition: The condition of being of such and such a sort as distinguished from others; nature or character relatively considered, as of goods; character; sort; rank.

Name: Quantity
Definition: To modify or qualify with respect to quantity; to fix or express the quantity of; to rate.

Name: Quantitative
Definition: Relating to quantity.

Name: Quantity
Definition: The attribute of being so much, and not more or less; the property of being measurable, or capable of increase and decrease, multiplication and division; greatness; and more concretely, that which answers the question

Name: Quantum
Definition: Quantity; amount.

Name: Quarter
Definition: One of four equal parts into which anything is divided, or is regarded as divided; a fourth part or portion; as, a quarter of a dollar, of a pound, of a yard, of an hour, etc.

Name: Quarter
Definition: To lodge; to have a temporary residence.

Name: Quarterly
Definition: Containing, or consisting of, a fourth part; as, quarterly seasons.

Name: Queen
Definition: The wife of a king.

Name: Query
Definition: A question; an inquiry to be answered or solved.

Name: Quest
Definition: The act of seeking, or looking after anything; attempt to find or obtain; search; pursuit; as, to rove in quest of game, of a lost child, of property, etc.

Name: Question
Definition: The act of asking; interrogation; inquiry; as, to examine by question and answer.

Name: Queue
Definition: A tail-like appendage of hair; a pigtail.

Name: Quick
Definition: Alive; living; animate; -- opposed to dead or inanimate.

Name: Quickly
Definition: Speedily; with haste or celerity; soon; without delay; quick.

Name: Quiet
Definition: In a state of rest or calm; without stir, motion, or agitation; still; as, a quiet sea; quiet air.

Name: Quilt
Definition: Anything that is quilted; esp., a quilted bed cover, or a skirt worn by women; any cover or garment made by putting wool, cotton, etc., between two cloths and stitching them together; also, any outer bed cover.

Name: Quit
Definition: Any one of numerous species of small passerine birds native of tropical America. See Banana quit, under Banana, and Guitguit.

Name: Quite
Definition: Completely; wholly; entirely; totally; perfectly; as, the work is not quite done; the object is quite accomplished; to be quite mistaken.

Name: Quiz
Definition: A riddle or obscure question; an enigma; a ridiculous hoax.

Name: Quote
Definition: To cite, as a passage from some author; to name, repeat, or adduce, as a passage from an author or speaker, by way of authority or illustration; as, to quote a passage from Homer.

Name: Rabbit
Definition: Any of the smaller species of the genus Lepus, especially the common European species (Lepus cuniculus), which is often kept as a pet, and has been introduced into many countries. It is remarkably prolific, and has become a pest in some parts of Australia and New Zealand.

Name: Race
Definition: To raze.

Name: Racial
Definition: Of or pertaining to a race or family of men; as, the racial complexion.

Name: Racing
Definition: a. & n. from Race, v. t. & i.

Name: Rack
Definition: Same as Arrack.

Name: Radiation
Definition: The act of radiating, or the state of being radiated; emission and diffusion of rays of light; beamy brightness.

Name: Radical
Definition: Of or pertaining to the root; proceeding directly from the root.

Name: Radius
Definition: A right line drawn or extending from the center of a circle to the periphery; the semidiameter of a circle or sphere.

Name: Rage
Definition: Violent excitement; eager passion; extreme vehemence of desire, emotion, or suffering, mastering the will.

Name: Raid
Definition: A hostile or predatory incursion; an inroad or incursion of mounted men; a sudden and rapid invasion by a cavalry force; a foray.

Name: Rail
Definition: An outer cloak or covering; a neckerchief for women.

Name: Railroad
Definition: Alt. of Railway

Name: Railway
Definition: A road or way consisting of one or more parallel series of iron or steel rails, patterned and adjusted to be tracks for the wheels of vehicles, and suitably supported on a bed or substructure.

Name: Rain
Definition: Reign.

Name: Rainbow
Definition: A bow or arch exhibiting, in concentric bands, the several colors of the spectrum, and formed in the part of the hemisphere opposite to the sun by the refraction and reflection of the sun's rays in drops of falling rain.

Name: Raise
Definition: To cause to rise; to bring from a lower to a higher place; to lift upward; to elevate; to heave; as, to raise a stone or weight.

Name: Raised
Definition: Lifted up; showing above the surroundings; as, raised or embossed metal work.

Name: Raising
Definition: The act of lifting, setting up, elevating, exalting, producing, or restoring to life.

Name: Rally
Definition: To collect, and reduce to order, as troops dispersed or thrown into confusion; to gather again; to reunite.

Name: Ralph
Definition: A name sometimes given to the raven.

Name: Ranch
Definition: To wrench; to tear; to sprain; to injure by violent straining or contortion.

Name: Rand
Definition: A border; edge; margin.

Name: Random
Definition: Force; violence.

Name: Range
Definition: To set in a row, or in rows; to place in a regular line or lines, or in ranks; to dispose in the proper order; to rank; as, to range soldiers in line.

Name: Ranger
Definition: One who ranges; a rover; sometimes, one who ranges for plunder; a roving robber.

Name: Rank
Definition: Luxuriant in growth; of vigorous growth; exuberant; grown to immoderate height; as, rank grass; rank weeds.

Name: Rapid
Definition: Very swift or quick; moving with celerity; fast; as, a rapid stream; a rapid flight; a rapid motion.

Name: Rapidly
Definition: In a rapid manner.

Name: Rare
Definition: Early.

Name: Rarely
Definition: In a rare manner or degree; seldom; not often; as, things rarely seen.

Name: Rate
Definition: To chide with vehemence; to scold; to censure violently.

Name: Rather
Definition: Prior; earlier; former.

Name: Ratio
Definition: The relation which one quantity or magnitude has to another of the same kind. It is expressed by the quotient of the division of the first by the second; thus, the ratio of 3 to 6 is expressed by / or /; of a to b by a/b; or (less commonly) the second term is made the dividend; as, a:b = b/a.

Name: Rational
Definition: Relating to the reason; not physical; mental.

Name: Reach
Definition: To retch.

Name: Reaction
Definition: Any action in resisting other action or force; counter tendency; movement in a contrary direction; reverse action.

Name: Read
Definition: Rennet. See 3d Reed.

Name: Reader
Definition: One who reads.

Name: Readily
Definition: In a ready manner; quickly; promptly.

Name: Reading
Definition: The act of one who reads; perusal; also, printed or written matter to be read.

Name: Ready
Definition: Prepared for what one is about to do or experience; equipped or supplied with what is needed for some act or event; prepared for immediate movement or action; as, the troops are ready to march; ready for the journey.

Name: Real
Definition: A small Spanish silver coin; also, a denomination of money of account, formerly the unit of the Spanish monetary system.

Name: Realistic
Definition: Of or pertaining to the realists; in the manner of the realists; characterized by realism rather than by imagination.

Name: Reality
Definition: The state or quality of being real; actual being or existence of anything, in distinction from mere appearance; fact.

Name: Realize
Definition: To make real; to convert from the imaginary or fictitious into the actual; to bring into concrete existence; to effectuate; to accomplish; as, to realize a scheme or project.

Name: Really
Definition: Royally.

Name: Realm
Definition: A royal jurisdiction or domain; a region which is under the dominion of a king; a kingdom.

Name: Realty
Definition: Royalty.

Name: Rear
Definition: Early; soon.

Name: Reason
Definition: A thought or a consideration offered in support of a determination or an opinion; a just ground for a conclusion or an action; that which is offered or accepted as an explanation; the efficient cause of an occurrence or a phenomenon; a motive for an action or a determination; proof, more or less decisive, for an opinion or a conclusion; principle; efficient cause; final cause; ground of argument.

Name: Reasonable
Definition: Having the faculty of reason; endued with reason; rational; as, a reasonable being.

Name: Reasonably
Definition: In a reasonable manner.

Name: Reasoning
Definition: The act or process of adducing a reason or reasons; manner of presenting one's reasons.

Name: Rebate
Definition: To beat to obtuseness; to deprive of keenness; to blunt; to turn back the point of, as a lance used for exercise.

Name: Rebel
Definition: Pertaining to rebels or rebellion; acting in revolt; rebellious; as, rebel troops.

Name: Rebound
Definition: To spring back; to start back; to be sent back or reverberated by elastic force on collision with another body; as, a rebounding echo.

Name: Recall
Definition: To call back; to summon to return; as, to recall troops; to recall an ambassador.

Name: Receipt
Definition: The act of receiving; reception.

Name: Receive
Definition: To take, as something that is offered, given, committed, sent, paid, or the like; to accept; as, to receive money offered in payment of a debt; to receive a gift, a message, or a letter.

Name: Receiver
Definition: One who takes or receives in any manner.

Name: Recent
Definition: Of late origin, existence, or occurrence; lately come; not of remote date, antiquated style, or the like; not already known, familiar, worn out, trite, etc.; fresh; novel; new; modern; as, recent news.

Name: Recently
Definition: Newly; lately; freshly; not long since; as, advices recently received.

Name: Reception
Definition: The act of receiving; receipt; admission; as, the reception of food into the stomach; the reception of a letter; the reception of sensation or ideas; reception of evidence.

Name: Recipe
Definition: A formulary or prescription for making some combination, mixture, or preparation of materials; a receipt; especially, a prescription for medicine.

Name: Recipient
Definition: A receiver; the person or thing that receives; one to whom, or that to which, anything is given or communicated; specifically, the receiver of a still.

Name: Recognition
Definition: The act of recognizing, or the state of being recognized; acknowledgment; formal avowal; knowledge confessed or avowed; notice.

Name: Recognize
Definition: To know again; to perceive the identity of, with a person or thing previously known; to recover or recall knowledge of.

Name: Recommend
Definition: To commend to the favorable notice of another; to commit to another's care, confidence, or acceptance, with favoring representations; to put in a favorable light before any one; to bestow commendation on; as, he recommended resting the mind and exercising the body.

Name: Recommendation
Definition: The act of recommending.

Name: Reconstruction
Definition: The act of constructing again; the state of being reconstructed.

Name: Record
Definition: To recall to mind; to recollect; to remember; to meditate.

Name: Recorder
Definition: One who records; specifically, a person whose official duty it is to make a record of writings or transactions.

Name: Recording
Definition: Keeping a record or a register; as, a recording secretary; -- applied to numerous instruments with an automatic appliance which makes a record of their action; as, a recording gauge or telegraph.

Name: Recover
Definition: To cover again.

Name: Recovery
Definition: The act of recovering, regaining, or retaking possession.

Name: Recreation
Definition: The act of recreating, or the state of being recreated; refreshment of the strength and spirits after toil; amusement; diversion; sport; pastime.

Name: Recruitment
Definition: The act or process of recruiting; especially, the enlistment of men for an army.

Name: Redeem
Definition: To purchase back; to regain possession of by payment of a stipulated price; to repurchase.

Name: Redhead
Definition: A person having red hair.

Name: Reduce
Definition: To bring or lead back to any former place or condition.

Name: Reducing
Definition: a & n. from Reduce.

Name: Reduction
Definition: The act of reducing, or state of being reduced; conversion to a given state or condition; diminution; conquest; as, the reduction of a body to powder; the reduction of things to order; the reduction of the expenses of government; the reduction of a rebellious province.

Name: Reed
Definition: Red.

Name: Reef
Definition: A chain or range of rocks lying at or near the surface of the water. See Coral reefs, under Coral.

Name: Reel
Definition: A lively dance of the Highlanders of Scotland; also, the music to the dance; -- often called Scotch reel.

Name: Refer
Definition: To carry or send back.

Name: Reference
Definition: The act of referring, or the state of being referred; as, reference to a chart for guidance.

Name: Refine
Definition: To reduce to a fine, unmixed, or pure state; to free from impurities; to free from dross or alloy; to separate from extraneous matter; to purify; to defecate; as, to refine gold or silver; to refine iron; to refine wine or sugar.

Name: Refined
Definition: Freed from impurities or alloy; purifed; polished; cultured; delicate; as; refined gold; refined language; refined sentiments.

Name: Reflect
Definition: To bend back; to give a backwa/d turn to; to throw back; especially, to cause to return after striking upon any surface; as, a mirror reflects rays of light; polished metals reflect heat.

Name: Reflected
Definition: Thrown back after striking a surface; as, reflected light, heat, sound, etc.

Name: Reflection
Definition: The act of reflecting, or turning or sending back, or the state of being reflected.

Name: Reform
Definition: To put into a new and improved form or condition; to restore to a former good state, or bring from bad to good; to change from worse to better; to amend; to correct; as, to reform a profligate man; to reform corrupt manners or morals.

Name: Refresh
Definition: To make fresh again; to restore strength, spirit, animation, or the like, to; to relieve from fatigue or depression; to reinvigorate; to enliven anew; to reanimate; as, sleep refreshes the body and the mind.

Name: Refrigerator
Definition: That which refrigerates or makes cold; that which keeps cool.

Name: Refund
Definition: To fund again or anew; to replace (a fund or loan) by a new fund; as, to refund a railroad loan.

Name: Refuse
Definition: To deny, as a request, demand, invitation, or command; to decline to do or grant.

Name: Regard
Definition: To keep in view; to behold; to look at; to view; to gaze upon.

Name: Regarding
Definition: Concerning; respecting.

Name: Regardless
Definition: Having no regard; heedless; careless; as, regardless of life, consequences, dignity.

Name: Regime
Definition: Mode or system of rule or management; character of government, or of the prevailing social system.

Name: Region
Definition: One of the grand districts or quarters into which any space or surface, as of the earth or the heavens, is conceived of as divided; hence, in general, a portion of space or territory of indefinite extent; country; province; district; tract.

Name: Regional
Definition: Of or pertaining to a particular region; sectional.

Name: Register
Definition: A written account or entry; an official or formal enumeration, description, or record; a memorial record; a list or roll; a schedule.

Name: Registrar
Definition: One who registers; a recorder; a keeper of records; as, a registrar of births, deaths, and marriages. See Register, n., 3.

Name: Registration
Definition: The act of registering; registry; enrollment.

Name: Registry
Definition: The act of recording or writing in a register; enrollment; registration.

Name: Regression
Definition: The act of passing back or returning; retrogression; retrogradation.

Name: Regular
Definition: Conformed to a rule; agreeable to an established rule, law, principle, or type, or to established customary forms; normal; symmetrical; as, a regular verse in poetry; a regular piece of music; a regular verb; regular practice of law or medicine; a regular building.

Name: Regularly
Definition: In a regular manner; in uniform order; methodically; in due order or time.

Name: Regulation
Definition: The act of regulating, or the state of being regulated.

Name: Rehabilitation
Definition: The act of rehabilitating, or the state of being rehabilitated.

Name: Reject
Definition: To cast from one; to throw away; to discard.

Name: Relate
Definition: To bring back; to restore.

Name: Related
Definition: Allied by kindred; connected by blood or alliance, particularly by consanguinity; as, persons related in the first or second degree.

Name: Relation
Definition: The act of relating or telling; also, that which is related; recital; account; narration; narrative; as, the relation of historical events.

Name: Relationship
Definition: The state of being related by kindred, affinity, or other alliance.

Name: Relative
Definition: Having relation or reference; referring; respecting; standing in connection; pertaining; as, arguments not relative to the subject.

Name: Relatively
Definition: In a relative manner; in relation or respect to something else; not absolutely.

Name: Relax
Definition: To make lax or loose; to make less close, firm, rigid, tense, or the like; to slacken; to loosen; to open; as, to relax a rope or cord; to relax the muscles or sinews.

Name: Relaxation
Definition: The act or process of relaxing, or the state of being relaxed; as, relaxation of the muscles; relaxation of a law.

Name: Relay
Definition: To lay again; to lay a second time; as, to relay a pavement.

Name: Release
Definition: To lease again; to grant a new lease of; to let back.

Name: Relevance
Definition: Alt. of Relevancy

Name: Relevant
Definition: Relieving; lending aid or support.

Name: Reliability
Definition: The state or quality of being reliable; reliableness.

Name: Reliable
Definition: Suitable or fit to be relied on; worthy of dependance or reliance; trustworthy.

Name: Reliance
Definition: The act of relying, or the condition or quality of being reliant; dependence; confidence; trust; repose of mind upon what is deemed sufficient support or authority.

Name: Relief
Definition: The act of relieving, or the state of being relieved; the removal, or partial removal, of any evil, or of anything oppressive or burdensome, by which some ease is obtained; succor; alleviation; comfort; ease; redress.

Name: Religion
Definition: The outward act or form by which men indicate their recognition of the existence of a god or of gods having power over their destiny, to whom obedience, service, and honor are due; the feeling or expression of human love, fear, or awe of some superhuman and overruling power, whether by profession of belief, by observance of rites and ceremonies, or by the conduct of life; a system of faith and worship; a manifestation of piety; as, ethical religions; monotheistic religions; natural religion; revealed religion; the religion of the Jews; the religion of idol worshipers.

Name: Religious
Definition: Of or pertaining to religion; concerned with religion; teaching, or setting forth, religion; set apart to religion; as, a religious society; a religious sect; a religious place; religious subjects, books, teachers, houses, wars.

Name: Reload
Definition: To load again, as a gun.

Name: Relocation
Definition: A second location.

Name: Rely
Definition: To rest with confidence, as when fully satisfied of the veracity, integrity, or ability of persons, or of the certainty of facts or of evidence; to have confidence; to trust; to depend; -- with on, formerly also with in.

Name: Remain
Definition: To stay behind while others withdraw; to be left after others have been removed or destroyed; to be left after a number or quantity has been subtracted or cut off; to be left as not included or comprised.

Name: Remainder
Definition: Anything that remains, or is left, after the separation and removal of a part; residue; remnant.

Name: Remark
Definition: To mark in a notable manner; to distinquish clearly; to make noticeable or conspicuous; to piont out.

Name: Remarkable
Definition: Worthy of being remarked or noticed; noticeable; conspicuous; hence, uncommon; extraordinary.

Name: Remedy
Definition: That which relieves or cures a disease; any medicine or application which puts an end to disease and restores health; -- with for; as, a remedy for the gout.

Name: Remember
Definition: To have ( a notion or idea) come into the mind again, as previously perceived, known, or felt; to have a renewed apprehension of; to bring to mind again; to think of again; to recollect; as, I remember the fact; he remembers the events of his childhood; I cannot remember dates.

Name: Remind
Definition: To put (one) in mind of something; to bring to the remembrance of; to bring to the notice or consideration of (a person).

Name: Reminder
Definition: One who, or that which, reminds; that which serves to awaken remembrance.

Name: Remix
Definition: To mix again or repeatedly.

Name: Remote
Definition: Removed to a distance; not near; far away; distant; -- said in respect to time or to place; as, remote ages; remote lands.

Name: Removable
Definition: Admitting of being removed.

Name: Removal
Definition: The act of removing, or the state of being removed.

Name: Remove
Definition: To move away from the position occupied; to cause to change place; to displace; as, to remove a building.

Name: Removed
Definition: Changed in place.

Name: Renaissance
Definition: A new birth, or revival.

Name: Render
Definition: One who rends.

Name: Rendering
Definition: The act of one who renders, or that which is rendered.

Name: Renew
Definition: To make new again; to restore to freshness, perfection, or vigor; to give new life to; to rejuvenate; to re/stablish; to recreate; to rebuild.

Name: Renewable
Definition: Capable of being renewed; as, a lease renewable at pleasure.

Name: Renewal
Definition: The act of renewing, or the state of being renewed; as, the renewal of a treaty.

Name: Rent
Definition: To rant.

Name: Rental
Definition: A schedule, account, or list of rents, with the names of the tenants, etc.; a rent roll.

Name: Repair
Definition: To return.

Name: Repeat
Definition: To go over again; to attempt, do, make, or utter again; to iterate; to recite; as, to repeat an effort, an order, or a poem.

Name: Replace
Definition: To place again; to restore to a former place, position, condition, or the like.

Name: Replacement
Definition: The act of replacing.

Name: Replica
Definition: A copy of a work of art, as of a picture or statue, made by the maker of the original.

Name: Replication
Definition: An answer; a reply.

Name: Reply
Definition: To make a return in words or writing; to respond; to answer.

Name: Report
Definition: To refer.

Name: Reporter
Definition: One who reports.

Name: Repository
Definition: A place where things are or may be reposited, or laid up, for safety or preservation; a depository.

Name: Represent
Definition: To present again or anew; to present by means of something standing in the place of; to exhibit the counterpart or image of; to typify.

Name: Representation
Definition: The act of representing, in any sense of the verb.

Name: Representative
Definition: Fitted to represent; exhibiting a similitude.

Name: Reprint
Definition: To print again; to print a second or a new edition of.

Name: Reproduce
Definition: To produce again.

Name: Reproduction
Definition: The act or process of reproducing; the state of being reproduced

Name: Reproductive
Definition: Tending, or pertaining, to reproduction; employed in reproduction.

Name: Republic
Definition: Common weal.

Name: Republican
Definition: Of or pertaining to a republic.

Name: Reputation
Definition: The estimation in which one is held; character in public opinion; the character attributed to a person, thing, or action; repute.

Name: Request
Definition: The act of asking for anything desired; expression of desire or demand; solicitation; prayer; petition; entreaty.

Name: Require
Definition: To demand; to insist upon having; to claim as by right and authority; to exact; as, to require the surrender of property.

Name: Requirement
Definition: The act of requiring; demand; requisition.

Name: Rescue
Definition: To free or deliver from any confinement, violence, danger, or evil; to liberate from actual restraint; to remove or withdraw from a state of exposure to evil; as, to rescue a prisoner from the enemy; to rescue seamen from destruction.

Name: Research
Definition: Diligent inquiry or examination in seeking facts or principles; laborious or continued search after truth; as, researches of human wisdom.

Name: Researcher
Definition: One who researches.

Name: Reservation
Definition: The act of reserving, or keeping back; concealment, or withholding from disclosure; reserve.

Name: Reserve
Definition: To keep back; to retain; not to deliver, make over, or disclose.

Name: Reserved
Definition: Kept for future or special use, or for an exigency; as, reserved troops; a reserved seat in a theater.

Name: Reservoir
Definition: A place where anything is kept in store; especially, a place where water is collected and kept for use when wanted, as to supply a fountain, a canal, or a city by means of aqueducts, or to drive a mill wheel, or the like.

Name: Reset
Definition: To set again; as, to reset type; to reset copy; to reset a diamond.

Name: Residence
Definition: The act or fact of residing, abiding, or dwelling in a place for some continuance of time; as, the residence of an American in France or Italy for a year.

Name: Resident
Definition: Dwelling, or having an abode, in a place for a continued length of time; residing on one's own estate; -- opposed to nonresident; as, resident in the city or in the country.

Name: Residential
Definition: Of or pertaining to a residence or residents; as, residential trade.

Name: Resist
Definition: To stand against; to withstand; to obstruct.

Name: Resistance
Definition: The act of resisting; opposition, passive or active.

Name: Resistant
Definition: Making resistance; resisting.

Name: Resolution
Definition: The act, operation, or process of resolving. Specifically: (a) The act of separating a compound into its elements or component parts. (b) The act of analyzing a complex notion, or solving a vexed question or difficult problem.

Name: Resolve
Definition: To separate the component parts of; to reduce to the constituent elements; -- said of compound substances; hence, sometimes, to melt, or dissolve.

Name: Resolved
Definition: Having a fixed purpose; determined; resolute; -- usually placed after its noun; as, a man resolved to be rich.

Name: Resort
Definition: Active power or movement; spring.

Name: Resource
Definition: That to which one resorts orr on which one depends for supply or support; means of overcoming a difficulty; resort; expedient.

Name: Respect
Definition: To take notice of; to regard with special attention; to regard as worthy of special consideration; hence, to care for; to heed.

Name: Respective
Definition: Noticing with attention; hence, careful; wary; considerate.

Name: Respectively
Definition: As relating to each; particularly; as each belongs to each; as each refers to each in order; as, let each man respectively perform his duty.

Name: Respiratory
Definition: Of or pertaining to respiration; serving for respiration; as, the respiratory organs; respiratory nerves; the respiratory function; respiratory changes.

Name: Respond
Definition: To say somethin in return; to answer; to reply; as, to respond to a question or an argument.

Name: Respondent
Definition: Disposed or expected to respond; answering; according; corresponding.

Name: Response
Definition: The act of responding.

Name: Responsibility
Definition: The state of being responsible, accountable, or answerable, as for a trust, debt, or obligation.

Name: Responsible
Definition: Liable to respond; likely to be called upon to answer; accountable; answerable; amenable; as, a guardian is responsible to the court for his conduct in the office.

Name: Rest
Definition: To arrest.

Name: Restaurant
Definition: An eating house.

Name: Restoration
Definition: The act of restoring or bringing back to a former place, station, or condition; the fact of being restored; renewal; reestablishment; as, the restoration of friendship between enemies; the restoration of peace after war.

Name: Restore
Definition: To bring back to its former state; to bring back from a state of ruin, decay, disease, or the like; to repair; to renew; to recover.

Name: Restrict
Definition: Restricted.

Name: Restriction
Definition: The act of restricting, or state of being restricted; confinement within limits or bounds.

Name: Result
Definition: To leap back; to rebound.

Name: Resume
Definition: A summing up; a condensed statement; an abridgment or brief recapitulation.

Name: Retail
Definition: The sale of commodities in small quantities or parcels; -- opposed to wholesale; sometimes, the sale of commodities at second hand.

Name: Retailer
Definition: One who retails anything; as, a retailer of merchandise; a retailer of gossip.

Name: Retain
Definition: To continue to hold; to keep in possession; not to lose, part with, or dismiss; to retrain from departure, escape, or the like.

Name: Retention
Definition: The act of retaining, or the state of being ratined.

Name: Retired
Definition: Private; secluded; quiet; as, a retired life; a person of retired habits.

Name: Retirement
Definition: The act of retiring, or the state of being retired; withdrawal; seclusion; as, the retirement of an officer.

Name: Retreat
Definition: The act of retiring or withdrawing one's self, especially from what is dangerous or disagreeable.

Name: Retrieval
Definition: The act retrieving.

Name: Retrieve
Definition: To find again; to recover; to regain; to restore from loss or injury; as, to retrieve one's character; to retrieve independence.

Name: Return
Definition: To turn back; to go or come again to the same place or condition.

Name: Reunion
Definition: A second union; union formed anew after separation, secession, or discord; as, a reunion of parts or particles of matter; a reunion of parties or sects.

Name: Reveal
Definition: To make known (that which has been concealed or kept secret); to unveil; to disclose; to show.

Name: Revelation
Definition: The act of revealing, disclosing, or discovering to others what was before unknown to them.

Name: Revenge
Definition: To inflict harm in return for, as an injury, insult, etc.; to exact satisfaction for, under a sense of injury; to avenge; -- followed either by the wrong received, or by the person or thing wronged, as the object, or by the reciprocal pronoun as direct object, and a preposition before the wrong done or the wrongdoer.

Name: Revenue
Definition: That which returns, or comes back, from an investment; the annual rents, profits, interest, or issues of any species of property, real or personal; income.

Name: Reverse
Definition: Turned backward; having a contrary or opposite direction; hence; opposite or contrary in kind; as, the reverse order or method.

Name: Review
Definition: To view or see again; to look back on.

Name: Reviewer
Definition: One who reviews or reexamines; an inspector; one who examines publications critically, and publishes his opinion upon their merits; a professional critic of books.

Name: Revision
Definition: The act of revising; reexamination for correction; review; as, the revision of a book or writing, or of a proof sheet; a revision of statutes.

Name: Revolution
Definition: The act of revolving, or turning round on an axis or a center; the motion of a body round a fixed point or line; rotation; as, the revolution of a wheel, of a top, of the earth on its axis, etc.

Name: Revolutionary
Definition: Of or pertaining to a revolution in government; tending to, or promoting, revolution; as, revolutionary war; revolutionary measures; revolutionary agitators.

Name: Reward
Definition: To give in return, whether good or evil; -- commonly in a good sense; to requite; to recompense; to repay; to compensate.

Name: Rhythm
Definition: In the widest sense, a dividing into short portions by a regular succession of motions, impulses, sounds, accents, etc., producing an agreeable effect, as in music poetry, the dance, or the like.

Name: Ribbon
Definition: A fillet or narrow woven fabric, commonly of silk, used for trimming some part of a woman's attire, for badges, and other decorative purposes.

Name: Rice
Definition: A well-known cereal grass (Oryza sativa) and its seed.  This plant is extensively cultivated in warm climates, and the grain forms a large portion of the food of the inhabitants. In America it grows chiefly on low, moist land, which can be overflowed.

Name: Rich
Definition: Having an abundance of material possessions; possessed of a large amount of property; well supplied with land, goods, or money; wealthy; opulent; affluent; -- opposed to poor.

Name: Rick
Definition: A stack or pile, as of grain, straw, or hay, in the open air, usually protected from wet with thatching.

Name: Ride
Definition: To be carried on the back of an animal, as a horse.

Name: Rider
Definition: One who, or that which, rides.

Name: Ridge
Definition: The back, or top of the back; a crest.

Name: Riding
Definition: One of the three jurisdictions into which the county of York, in England, is divided; -- formerly under the government of a reeve. They are called the North, the East, and the West, Riding.

Name: Right
Definition: Straight; direct; not crooked; as, a right line.

Name: Ring
Definition: To cause to sound, especially by striking, as a metallic body; as, to ring a bell.

Name: Ripe
Definition: The bank of a river.

Name: Rise
Definition: To move from a lower position to a higher; to ascend; to mount up. Specifically: -- (a) To go upward by walking, climbing, flying, or any other voluntary motion; as, a bird rises in the air; a fish rises to the bait.

Name: Rising
Definition: Attaining a higher place; taking, or moving in, an upward direction; appearing above the horizon; ascending; as, the rising moon.

Name: Risk
Definition: Hazard; danger; peril; exposure to loss, injury, or destruction.

Name: River
Definition: One who rives or splits.

Name: Riverside
Definition: The side or bank of a river.

Name: Road
Definition: A journey, or stage of a journey.

Name: Robin
Definition: A small European singing bird (Erythacus rubecula), having a reddish breast; -- called also robin redbreast, robinet, and ruddock.

Name: Robust
Definition: Evincing strength; indicating vigorous health; strong; sinewy; muscular; vigorous; sound; as, a robust body; robust youth; robust health.

Name: Rock
Definition: A distaff used in spinning; the staff or frame about which flax is arranged, and from which the thread is drawn in spinning.

Name: Rocket
Definition: A cruciferous plant (Eruca sativa) sometimes eaten in Europe as a salad.

Name: Rocky
Definition: Full of, or abounding in, rocks; consisting of rocks; as, a rocky mountain; a rocky shore.

Name: Role
Definition: A part, or character, performed by an actor in a drama; hence, a part of function taken or assumed by any one; as, he has now taken the role of philanthropist.

Name: Roll
Definition: To cause to revolve by turning over and over; to move by turning on an axis; to impel forward by causing to turn over and over on a supporting surface; as, to roll a wheel, a ball, or a barrel.

Name: Roller
Definition: One who, or that which, rolls; especially, a cylinder, sometimes grooved, of wood, stone, metal, etc., used in husbandry and the arts.

Name: Rolling
Definition: Rotating on an axis, or moving along a surface by rotation; turning over and over as if on an axis or a pivot; as, a rolling wheel or ball.

Name: Roman
Definition: Of or pertaining to Rome, or the Roman people; like or characteristic of Rome, the Roman people, or things done by Romans; as, Roman fortitude; a Roman aqueduct; Roman art.

Name: Romance
Definition: A species of fictitious writing, originally composed in meter in the Romance dialects, and afterward in prose, such as the tales of the court of Arthur, and of Amadis of Gaul; hence, any fictitious and wonderful tale; a sort of novel, especially one which treats of surprising adventures usually befalling a hero or a heroine; a tale of extravagant adventures, of love, and the like.

Name: Romantic
Definition: Of or pertaining to romance; involving or resembling romance; hence, fanciful; marvelous; extravagant; unreal; as, a romantic tale; a romantic notion; a romantic undertaking.

Name: Roof
Definition: The cover of any building, including the roofing (see Roofing) and all the materials and construction necessary to carry and maintain the same upon the walls or other uprights. In the case of a building with vaulted ceilings protected by an outer roof, some writers call the vault the roof, and the outer protection the roof mask. It is better, however, to consider the vault as the ceiling only, in cases where it has farther covering.

Name: Room
Definition: Unobstructed spase; space which may be occupied by or devoted to any object; compass; extent of place, great or small; as, there is not room for a house; the table takes up too much room.

Name: Roommate
Definition: One of twe or more occupying the same room or rooms; one who shares the occupancy of a room or rooms; a chum.

Name: Root
Definition: To turn up the earth with the snout, as swine.

Name: Rope
Definition: A large, stout cord, usually one not less than an inch in circumference, made of strands twisted or braided together. It differs from cord, line, and string, only in its size. See Cordage.

Name: Rose
Definition: imp. of Rise.

Name: Ross
Definition: The rough, scaly matter on the surface of the bark of trees.

Name: Roster
Definition: A register or roll showing the order in which officers, enlisted men, companies, or regiments are called on to serve.

Name: Rotary
Definition: Turning, as a wheel on its axis; pertaining to, or resembling, the motion of a wheel on its axis; rotatory; as, rotary motion.

Name: Rotation
Definition: The act of turning, as a wheel or a solid body on its axis, as distinguished from the progressive motion of a revolving round another body or a distant point; thus, the daily turning of the earth on its axis is a rotation; its annual motion round the sun is a revolution.

Name: Rouge
Definition: red.

Name: Rough
Definition: Having inequalities, small ridges, or points, on the surface; not smooth or plain; as, a rough board; a rough stone; rough cloth.

Name: Roughly
Definition: In a rough manner; unevenly; harshly; rudely; severely; austerely.

Name: Roulette
Definition: A game of chance, in which a small ball is made to move round rapidly on a circle divided off into numbered red and black spaces, the one on which it stops indicating the result of a variety of wagers permitted by the game.

Name: Round
Definition: To whisper.

Name: Route
Definition: The course or way which is traveled or passed, or is to be passed; a passing; a course; a road or path; a march.

Name: Router
Definition: A plane made like a spokeshave, for working the inside edges of circular sashes.

Name: Routine
Definition: A round of business, amusement, or pleasure, daily or frequently pursued; especially, a course of business or offical duties regularly or frequently returning.

Name: Rover
Definition: One who practices robbery on the seas; a pirate.

Name: Royal
Definition: Kingly; pertaining to the crown or the sovereign; suitable for a king or queen; regal; as, royal power or prerogative; royal domains; the royal family; royal state.

Name: Royalty
Definition: The state of being royal; the condition or quality of a royal person; kingship; kingly office; sovereignty.

Name: Rubber
Definition: One who, or that which, rubs.

Name: Ruby
Definition: A precious stone of a carmine red color, sometimes verging to violet, or intermediate between carmine and hyacinth red.  It is a red crystallized variety of corundum.

Name: Rule
Definition: That which is prescribed or laid down as a guide for conduct or action; a governing direction for a specific purpose; an authoritative enactment; a regulation; a prescription; a precept; as, the rules of various societies; the rules governing a school; a rule of etiquette or propriety; the rules of cricket.

Name: Ruling
Definition: Predominant; chief; reigning; controlling; as, a ruling passion; a ruling sovereign.

Name: Runner
Definition: One who, or that which, runs; a racer.

Name: Running
Definition: Moving or advancing by running.

Name: Rural
Definition: Of or pertaining to the country, as distinguished from a city or town; living in the country; suitable for, or resembling, the country; rustic; as, rural scenes; a rural prospect.

Name: Rush
Definition: A name given to many aquatic or marsh-growing endogenous plants with soft, slender stems, as the species of Juncus and Scirpus.

Name: Russia
Definition: A country of Europe and Asia.

Name: Russian
Definition: Of or pertaining to Russia, its inhabitants, or language.

Name: Ruth
Definition: Sorrow for the misery of another; pity; tenderness.

Name: Sacred
Definition: Set apart by solemn religious ceremony; especially, in a good sense, made holy; set apart to religious use; consecrated; not profane or common; as, a sacred place; a sacred day; sacred service.

Name: Sacrifice
Definition: The offering of anything to God, or to a god; consecratory rite.

Name: Safe
Definition: Free from harm, injury, or risk; untouched or unthreatened by danger or injury; unharmed; unhurt; secure; whole; as, safe from disease; safe from storms; safe from foes.

Name: Safely
Definition: In a safe manner; danger, injury, loss, or evil consequences.

Name: Safety
Definition: The condition or state of being safe; freedom from danger or hazard; exemption from hurt, injury, or loss.

Name: Sage
Definition: A suffruticose labiate plant (Salvia officinalis) with grayish green foliage, much used in flavoring meats, etc. The name is often extended to the whole genus, of which many species are cultivated for ornament, as the scarlet sage, and Mexican red and blue sage.

Name: Said
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Say.

Name: Sail
Definition: An extent of canvas or other fabric by means of which the wind is made serviceable as a power for propelling vessels through the water.

Name: Sailing
Definition: The act of one who, or that which, sails; the motion of a vessel on water, impelled by wind or steam; the act of starting on a voyage.

Name: Saint
Definition: A person sanctified; a holy or godly person; one eminent for piety and virtue; any true Christian, as being redeemed and consecrated to God.

Name: Sake
Definition: Final cause; end; purpose of obtaining; cause; motive; reason; interest; concern; account; regard or respect; -- used chiefly in such phrases as, for the sake of, for his sake, for man's sake, for mercy's sake, and the like; as, to commit crime for the sake of gain; to go abroad for the sake of one's health.

Name: Salad
Definition: A preparation of vegetables, as lettuce, celery, water cress, onions, etc., usually dressed with salt, vinegar, oil, and spice, and eaten for giving a relish to other food; as, lettuce salad; tomato salad, etc.

Name: Salary
Definition: Saline

Name: Sale
Definition: The act of selling; the transfer of property, or a contract to transfer the ownership of property, from one person to another for a valuable consideration, or for a price in money.

Name: Sally
Definition: To leap or rush out; to burst forth; to issue suddenly; as a body of troops from a fortified place to attack besiegers; to make a sally.

Name: Salmon
Definition: Any one of several species of fishes of the genus Salmo and allied genera. The common salmon (Salmo salar) of Northern Europe and Eastern North America, and the California salmon, or quinnat, are the most important species. They are extensively preserved for food. See Quinnat.

Name: Salon
Definition: An apartment for the reception of company; hence, in the plural, fashionable parties; circles of fashionable society.

Name: Salt
Definition: The chloride of sodium, a substance used for seasoning food, for the preservation of meat, etc. It is found native in the earth, and is also produced, by evaporation and crystallization, from sea water and other water impregnated with saline particles.

Name: Salvation
Definition: The act of saving; preservation or deliverance from destruction, danger, or great calamity.

Name: Same
Definition: Not different or other; not another or others; identical; unchanged.

Name: Sample
Definition: Example; pattern.

Name: Sand
Definition: Fine particles of stone, esp. of siliceous stone, but not reduced to dust; comminuted stone in the form of loose grains, which are not coherent when wet.

Name: Sandwich
Definition: Two pieces of bread and butter with a thin slice of meat, cheese, or the like, between them.

Name: Sandy
Definition: Consisting of, abounding with, or resembling, sand; full of sand; covered or sprinkled with sand; as, a sandy desert, road, or soil.

Name: Sans
Definition: Without; deprived or destitute of. Rarely used as an English word.

Name: Sapphire
Definition: Native alumina or aluminium sesquioxide, Al2O3; corundum; esp., the blue transparent variety of corundum, highly prized as a gem.

Name: Satellite
Definition: An attendant attached to a prince or other powerful person; hence, an obsequious dependent.

Name: Satin
Definition: A silk cloth, of a thick, close texture, and overshot woof, which has a glossy surface.

Name: Satisfaction
Definition: The act of satisfying, or the state of being satisfied; gratification of desire; contentment in possession and enjoyment; repose of mind resulting from compliance with its desires or demands.

Name: Satisfactory
Definition: Giving or producing satisfaction; yielding content; especially, relieving the mind from doubt or uncertainty, and enabling it to rest with confidence; sufficient; as, a satisfactory account or explanation.

Name: Satisfy
Definition: In general, to fill up the measure of a want of (a person or a thing); hence, to grafity fully the desire of; to make content; to supply to the full, or so far as to give contentment with what is wished for.

Name: Saturday
Definition: The seventh or last day of the week; the day following Friday and preceding Sunday.

Name: Saturn
Definition: One of the elder and principal deities, the son of Coelus and Terra (Heaven and Earth), and the father of Jupiter. The corresponding Greek divinity was Kro`nos, later CHro`nos, Time.

Name: Sauce
Definition: A composition of condiments and appetizing ingredients eaten with food as a relish; especially, a dressing for meat or fish or for puddings; as, mint sauce; sweet sauce, etc.

Name: Savage
Definition: Of or pertaining to the forest; remote from human abodes and cultivation; in a state of nature; wild; as, a savage wilderness.

Name: Save
Definition: The herb sage, or salvia.

Name: Saver
Definition: One who saves.

Name: Saving
Definition: Preserving; rescuing.

Name: Saying
Definition: That which is said; a declaration; a statement, especially a proverbial one; an aphorism; a proverb.

Name: Scale
Definition: The dish of a balance; hence, the balance itself; an instrument or machine for weighing; as, to turn the scale; -- chiefly used in the plural when applied to the whole instrument or apparatus for weighing. Also used figuratively.

Name: Scan
Definition: To mount by steps; to go through with step by step.

Name: Scary
Definition: Barren land having only a thin coat of grass.

Name: Scenario
Definition: A preliminary sketch of the plot, or main incidents, of an opera.

Name: Scene
Definition: The structure on which a spectacle or play is exhibited; the part of a theater in which the acting is done, with its adjuncts and decorations; the stage.

Name: Scenic
Definition: Alt. of Scenical

Name: Schedule
Definition: A written or printed scroll or sheet of paper; a document; especially, a formal list or inventory; a list or catalogue annexed to a larger document, as to a will, a lease, a statute, etc.

Name: Schema
Definition: An outline or image universally applicable to a general conception, under which it is likely to be presented to the mind; as, five dots in a line are a schema of the number five; a preceding and succeeding event are a schema of cause and effect.

Name: Scheme
Definition: A combination of things connected and adjusted by design; a system.

Name: Scholar
Definition: One who attends a school; one who learns of a teacher; one under the tuition of a preceptor; a pupil; a disciple; a learner; a student.

Name: Scholarship
Definition: The character and qualities of a scholar; attainments in science or literature; erudition; learning.

Name: School
Definition: A shoal; a multitude; as, a school of fish.

Name: Science
Definition: Knowledge; knowledge of principles and causes; ascertained truth of facts.

Name: Scientific
Definition: Of or pertaining to science; used in science; as, scientific principles; scientific apparatus; scientific observations.

Name: Scientist
Definition: One learned in science; a scientific investigator; one devoted to scientific study; a savant.

Name: Scoop
Definition: A large ladle; a vessel with a long handle, used for dipping liquids; a utensil for bailing boats.

Name: Scope
Definition: That at which one aims; the thing or end to which the mind directs its view; that which is purposed to be reached or accomplished; hence, ultimate design, aim, or purpose; intention; drift; object.

Name: Score
Definition: A notch or incision; especially, one that is made as a tally mark; hence, a mark, or line, made for the purpose of account.

Name: Scotia
Definition: A concave molding used especially in classical architecture.

Name: Scottish
Definition: Of or pertaining to the inhabitants of Scotland, their country, or their language; as, Scottish industry or economy; a Scottish chief; a Scottish dialect.

Name: Scout
Definition: A swift sailing boat.

Name: Scratch
Definition: To rub and tear or mark the surface of with something sharp or ragged; to scrape, roughen, or wound slightly by drawing something pointed or rough across, as the claws, the nails, a pin, or the like.

Name: Screen
Definition: Anything that separates or cuts off inconvenience, injury, or danger; that which shelters or conceals from view; a shield or protection; as, a fire screen.

Name: Screw
Definition: A cylinder, or a cylindrical perforation, having a continuous rib, called the thread, winding round it spirally at a constant inclination, so as to leave a continuous spiral groove between one turn and the next, -- used chiefly for producing, when revolved, motion or pressure in the direction of its axis, by the sliding of the threads of the cylinder in the grooves between the threads of the perforation adapted to it, the former being distinguished as the external, or male screw, or, more usually the screw; the latter as the internal, or female screw, or, more usually, the nut.

Name: Script
Definition: A writing; a written document.

Name: Scroll
Definition: A roll of paper or parchment; a writing formed into a roll; a schedule; a list.

Name: Sculpture
Definition: The art of carving, cutting, or hewing wood, stone, metal, etc., into statues, ornaments, etc., or into figures, as of men, or other things; hence, the art of producing figures and groups, whether in plastic or hard materials.

Name: Seal
Definition: Any aquatic carnivorous mammal of the families Phocidae and Otariidae.

Name: Sean
Definition: A seine. See Seine.

Name: Search
Definition: To look over or through, for the purpose of finding something; to examine; to explore; as, to search the city.

Name: Searching
Definition: Exploring thoroughly; scrutinizing; penetrating; trying; as, a searching discourse; a searching eye.

Name: Season
Definition: One of the divisions of the year, marked by alternations in the length of day and night, or by distinct conditions of temperature, moisture, etc., caused mainly by the relative position of the earth with respect to the sun. In the north temperate zone, four seasons, namely, spring, summer, autumn, and winter, are generally recognized. Some parts of the world have three seasons, -- the dry, the rainy, and the cold; other parts have but two, -- the dry and the rainy.

Name: Seasonal
Definition: Of or pertaining to the seasons.

Name: Seat
Definition: The place or thing upon which one sits; hence; anything made to be sat in or upon, as a chair, bench, stool, saddle, or the like.

Name: Seating
Definition: The act of providong with a seat or seats; as, the seating of an audience.

Name: Second
Definition: Immediately following the first; next to the first in order of place or time; hence, occuring again; another; other.

Name: Secondary
Definition: Suceeding next in order to the first; of second place, origin, rank, rank, etc.; not primary; subordinate; not of the first order or rate.

Name: Secret
Definition: Hidden; concealed; as, secret treasure; secret plans; a secret vow.

Name: Secretariat
Definition: Alt. of Secretariate

Name: Secretary
Definition: One who keeps, or is intrusted with, secrets.

Name: Section
Definition: The act of cutting, or separation by cutting; as, the section of bodies.

Name: Sector
Definition: A part of a circle comprehended between two radii and the included arc.

Name: Secure
Definition: Free from fear, care, or anxiety; easy in mind; not feeling suspicion or distrust; confident.

Name: Securely
Definition: In a secure manner; without fear or apprehension; without danger; safely.

Name: Security
Definition: The condition or quality of being secure; secureness.

Name: Seed
Definition: A ripened ovule, consisting of an embryo with one or more integuments, or coverings; as, an apple seed; a currant seed. By germination it produces a new plant.

Name: Seeing
Definition: /I>) In view of the fact (that); considering; taking into account (that); insmuch as; since; because; -- followed by a dependent clause; as, he did well, seeing that he was so young.

Name: Seek
Definition: Sick.

Name: Seeker
Definition: One who seeks; that which is used in seeking or searching.

Name: Seem
Definition: To appear, or to appear to be; to have a show or semblance; to present an appearance; to look; to strike one's apprehension or fancy as being; to be taken as.

Name: Seen
Definition: p. p. of See.

Name: Segment
Definition: One of the parts into which any body naturally separates or is divided; a part divided or cut off; a section; a portion; as, a segment of an orange; a segment of a compound or divided leaf.

Name: Select
Definition: Taken from a number by preferance; picked out as more valuable or exellent than others; of special value or exellence; nicely chosen; selected; choice.

Name: Selection
Definition: The act of selecting, or the state of being selected; choice, by preference.

Name: Selective
