Definition: Selecting; tending to select.

Name: Self
Definition: Same; particular; very; identical.

Name: Sell
Definition: Self.

Name: Seller
Definition: One who sells.

Name: Semester
Definition: A period of six months; especially, a term in a college or uneversity which divides the year into two terms.

Name: Senate
Definition: An assembly or council having the highest deliberative and legislative functions.

Name: Senator
Definition: A member of a senate.

Name: Send
Definition: To cause to go in any manner; to dispatch; to commission or direct to go; as, to send a messenger.

Name: Sender
Definition: One who sends.

Name: Senegal
Definition: Gum senegal. See under Gum.

Name: Senior
Definition: More advanced than another in age; prior in age; elder; hence, more advanced in dignity, rank, or office; superior; as, senior member; senior counsel.

Name: Sense
Definition: A faculty, possessed by animals, of perceiving external objects by means of impressions made upon certain organs (sensory or sense organs) of the body, or of perceiving changes in the condition of the body; as, the senses of sight, smell, hearing, taste, and touch. See Muscular sense, under Muscular, and Temperature sense, under Temperature.

Name: Sensitive
Definition: Having sense of feeling; possessing or exhibiting the capacity of receiving impressions from external objects; as, a sensitive soul.

Name: Sensitivity
Definition: The quality or state of being sensitive; -- used chiefly in science and the arts; as, the sensitivity of iodized silver.

Name: Sensor
Definition: Sensory; as, the sensor nerves.

Name: Sent
Definition: obs. 3d pers. sing. pres. of Send, for sendeth.

Name: Sentence
Definition: Sense; meaning; significance.

Name: Separate
Definition: To disunite; to divide; to disconnect; to sever; to part in any manner.

Name: Separation
Definition: The act of separating, or the state of being separated, or separate.

Name: Sept
Definition: A clan, tribe, or family, proceeding from a common progenitor; -- used especially of the ancient clans in Ireland.

Name: September
Definition: The ninth month of the year, containing thurty days.

Name: Sequence
Definition: The state of being sequent; succession; order of following; arrangement.

Name: Serial
Definition: Of or pertaining to a series; consisting of a series; appearing in successive parts or numbers; as, a serial work or publication.

Name: Series
Definition: A number of things or events standing or succeeding in order, and connected by a like relation; sequence; order; course; a succession of things; as, a continuous series of calamitous events.

Name: Serious
Definition: Grave in manner or disposition; earnest; thoughtful; solemn; not light, gay, or volatile.

Name: Serum
Definition: The watery portion of certain animal fluids, as blood, milk, etc.

Name: Serve
Definition: To work for; to labor in behalf of; to exert one's self continuously or statedly for the benefit of; to do service for; to be in the employment of, as an inferior, domestic, serf, slave, hired assistant, official helper, etc.; specifically, in a religious sense, to obey and worship.

Name: Server
Definition: One who serves.

Name: Service
Definition: Alt. of Service

Name: Serving
Definition: a. & n. from Serve.

Name: Session
Definition: The act of sitting, or the state of being seated.

Name: Setting
Definition: The act of one who, or that which, sets; as, the setting of type, or of gems; the setting of the sun; the setting (hardening) of moist plaster of Paris; the setting (set) of a current.

Name: Settle
Definition: A seat of any kind.

Name: Settlement
Definition: The act of setting, or the state of being settled.

Name: Seven
Definition: One more than six; six and one added; as, seven days make one week.

Name: Seventh
Definition: Next in order after the sixth;; coming after six others.

Name: Several
Definition: Separate; distinct; particular; single.

Name: Severe
Definition: Serious in feeeling or manner; sedate; grave; austere; not light, lively, or cheerful.

Name: Sewing
Definition: The act or occupation of one who sews.

Name: Sexual
Definition: Of or pertaining to sex, or the sexes; distinguishing sex; peculiar to the distinction and office of male or female; relating to the distinctive genital organs of the sexes; proceeding from, or based upon, sex; as, sexual characteristics; sexual intercourse, connection, or commerce; sexual desire; sexual diseases; sexual generation.

Name: Sexuality
Definition: The quality or state of being distinguished by sex.

Name: Sexually
Definition: In a sexual manner or relation.

Name: Shade
Definition: Comparative obscurity owing to interception or interruption of the rays of light; partial darkness caused by the intervention of something between the space contemplated and the source of light.

Name: Shadow
Definition: Shade within defined limits; obscurity or deprivation of light, apparent on a surface, and representing the form of the body which intercepts the rays of light; as, the shadow of a man, of a tree, or of a tower. See the Note under Shade, n., 1.

Name: Shaft
Definition: The slender, smooth stem of an arrow; hence, an arrow.

Name: Shake
Definition: obs. p. p. of Shake.

Name: Shall
Definition: To owe; to be under obligation for.

Name: Shame
Definition: A painful sensation excited by a consciousness of guilt or impropriety, or of having done something which injures reputation, or of the exposure of that which nature or modesty prompts us to conceal.

Name: Shanghai
Definition: To intoxicate and ship (a person) as a sailor while in this condition.

Name: Shape
Definition: To form or create; especially, to mold or make into a particular form; to give proper form or figure to.

Name: Share
Definition: The part (usually an iron or steel plate) of a plow which cuts the ground at the bottom of a furrow; a plowshare.

Name: Shark
Definition: Any one of numerous species of elasmobranch fishes of the order Plagiostomi, found in all seas.

Name: Sharp
Definition: Having a very thin edge or fine point; of a nature to cut or pierce easily; not blunt or dull; keen.

Name: Shaw
Definition: A thicket; a small wood or grove.

Name: Shed
Definition: A slight or temporary structure built to shade or shelter something; a structure usually open in front; an outbuilding; a hut; as, a wagon shed; a wood shed.

Name: Sheep
Definition: Any one of several species of ruminants of the genus Ovis, native of the higher mountains of both hemispheres, but most numerous in Asia.

Name: Sheer
Definition: Bright; clear; pure; unmixed.

Name: Sheet
Definition: In general, a large, broad piece of anything thin, as paper, cloth, etc.; a broad, thin portion of any substance; an expanded superficies.

Name: Shelf
Definition: A flat tablet or ledge of any material set horizontally at a distance from the floor, to hold objects of use or ornament.

Name: Shell
Definition: A hard outside covering, as of a fruit or an animal.

Name: Shelter
Definition: That which covers or defends from injury or annoyance; a protection; a screen.

Name: Shepherd
Definition: A man employed in tending, feeding, and guarding sheep, esp. a flock grazing at large.

Name: Sheriff
Definition: The chief officer of a shire or county, to whom is intrusted the execution of the laws, the serving of judicial writs and processes, and the preservation of the peace.

Name: Shield
Definition: A broad piece of defensive armor, carried on the arm, -- formerly in general use in war, for the protection of the body. See Buckler.

Name: Shift
Definition: To divide; to distribute; to apportion.

Name: Shift
Definition: The act of shifting.

Name: Shine
Definition: To emit rays of light; to give light; to beam with steady radiance; to exhibit brightness or splendor; as, the sun shines by day; the moon shines by night.

Name: Ship
Definition: Pay; reward.

Name: Shipment
Definition: The act or process of shipping; as, he was engaged in the shipment of coal for London; an active shipment of wheat from the West.

Name: Shipping
Definition: Relating to ships, their ownership, transfer, or employment; as, shiping concerns.

Name: Shirt
Definition: A loose under-garment for the upper part of the body, made of cotton, linen, or other material; -- formerly used of the under-garment of either sex, now commonly restricted to that worn by men and boys.

Name: Shock
Definition: A pile or assemblage of sheaves of grain, as wheat, rye, or the like, set up in a field, the sheaves varying in number from twelve to sixteen; a stook.

Name: Shoe
Definition: A covering for the human foot, usually made of leather, having a thick and somewhat stiff sole and a lighter top. It differs from a boot on not extending so far up the leg.

Name: Shoot
Definition: An inclined plane, either artificial or natural, down which timber, coal, etc., are caused to slide; also, a narrow passage, either natural or artificial, in a stream, where the water rushes rapidly; esp., a channel, having a swift current, connecting the ends of a bend in the stream, so as to shorten the course.

Name: Shooting
Definition: The act of one who, or that which, shoots; as, the shooting of an archery club; the shooting of rays of light.

Name: Shop
Definition: imp. of Shape. Shaped.

Name: Shopper
Definition: One who shops.

Name: Shore
Definition: imp. of Shear.

Name: Short
Definition: Not long; having brief length or linear extension; as, a short distance; a short piece of timber; a short flight.

Name: Shortly
Definition: In a short or brief time or manner; soon; quickly.

Name: Shot
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Shoot.

Name: Shots
Definition: The refuse of cattle taken from a drove.

Name: Should
Definition: Used as an auxiliary verb, to express a conditional or contingent act or state, or as a supposition of an actual fact; also, to express moral obligation (see Shall); e. g.: they should have come last week; if I should go; I should think you could go.

Name: Shoulder
Definition: The joint, or the region of the joint, by which the fore limb is connected with the body or with the shoulder girdle; the projection formed by the bones and muscles about that joint.

Name: Show
Definition: To exhibit or present to view; to place in sight; to display; -- the thing exhibited being the object, and often with an indirect object denoting the person or thing seeing or beholding; as, to show a house; show your colors; shopkeepers show customers goods (show goods to customers).

Name: Shower
Definition: One who shows or exhibits.

Name: Showing
Definition: Appearance; display; exhibition.

Name: Shown
Definition: p. p. of Show.

Name: Shut
Definition: To close so as to hinder ingress or egress; as, to shut a door or a gate; to shut one's eyes or mouth.

Name: Shuttle
Definition: An instrument used in weaving for passing or shooting the thread of the woof from one side of the cloth to the other between the threads of the warp.

Name: Sick
Definition: Affected with disease of any kind; ill; indisposed; not in health. See the Synonym under Illness.

Name: Side
Definition: The margin, edge, verge, or border of a surface; especially (when the thing spoken of is somewhat oblong in shape), one of the longer edges as distinguished from the shorter edges, called ends; a bounding line of a geometrical figure; as, the side of a field, of a square or triangle, of a river, of a road, etc.

Name: Sierra
Definition: A ridge of mountain and craggy rocks, with a serrated or irregular outline; as, the Sierra Nevada.

Name: Sight
Definition: The act of seeing; perception of objects by the eye; view; as, to gain sight of land.

Name: Sigma
Definition: The Greek letter /, /, or / (English S, or s). It originally had the form of the English C.

Name: Sign
Definition: That by which anything is made known or represented; that which furnishes evidence; a mark; a token; an indication; a proof.

Name: Signal
Definition: A sign made for the purpose of giving notice to a person of some occurence, command, or danger; also, a sign, event, or watchword, which has been agreed upon as the occasion of concerted action.

Name: Signal
Definition: To communicate by signals; as, to signal orders.

Name: Signature
Definition: A sign, stamp, or mark impressed, as by a seal.

Name: Significance
Definition: Alt. of Significancy

Name: Significant
Definition: Fitted or designed to signify or make known somethingl having a meaning; standing as a sign or token; expressive or suggestive; as, a significant word or sound; a significant look.

Name: Significantly
Definition: In a significant manner.

Name: Silence
Definition: The state of being silent; entire absence of sound or noise; absolute stillness.

Name: Silent
Definition: Free from sound or noise; absolutely still; perfectly quiet.

Name: Silicon
Definition: A nonmetalic element analogous to carbon. It always occurs combined in nature, and is artificially obtained in the free state, usually as a dark brown amorphous powder, or as a dark crystalline substance with a meetallic luster. Its oxide is silica, or common quartz, and in this form, or as silicates, it is, next to oxygen, the most abundant element of the earth's crust. Silicon is characteristically the element of the mineral kingdom, as carbon is of the organic world. Symbol Si. Atomic weight 28. Called also silicium.

Name: Silk
Definition: The fine, soft thread produced by various species of caterpillars in forming the cocoons within which the worm is inclosed during the pupa state, especially that produced by the larvae of Bombyx mori.

Name: Silly
Definition: Happy; fortunate; blessed.

Name: Silver
Definition: A soft white metallic element, sonorous, ductile, very malleable, and capable of a high degree of polish. It is found native, and also combined with sulphur, arsenic, antimony, chlorine, etc., in the minerals argentite, proustite, pyrargyrite, ceragyrite, etc.  Silver is one of the

Name: Similar
Definition: Exactly corresponding; resembling in all respects; precisely like.

Name: Similarly
Definition: In a similar manner.

Name: Simple
Definition: Single; not complex; not infolded or entangled; uncombined; not compounded; not blended with something else; not complicated; as, a simple substance; a simple idea; a simple sound; a simple machine; a simple problem; simple tasks.

Name: Simply
Definition: In a simple manner or state; considered in or by itself; without addition; along; merely; solely; barely.

Name: Simulation
Definition: The act of simulating, or assuming an appearance which is feigned, or not true; -- distinguished from dissimulation, which disguises or conceals what is true.

Name: Since
Definition: From a definite past time until now; as, he went a month ago, and I have not seen him since.

Name: Sing
Definition: To utter sounds with musical inflections or melodious modulations of voice, as fancy may dictate, or according to the notes of a song or tune, or of a given part (as alto, tenor, etc.) in a chorus or concerted piece.

Name: Singer
Definition: One who, or that which, singes.

Name: Singing
Definition: a. & n. from Sing, v.

Name: Single
Definition: One only, as distinguished from more than one; consisting of one alone; individual; separate; as, a single star.

Name: Sink
Definition: To fall by, or as by, the force of gravity; to descend lower and lower; to decline gradually; to subside; as, a stone sinks in water; waves rise and sink; the sun sinks in the west.

Name: Sister
Definition: A female who has the same parents with another person, or who has one of them only. In the latter case, she is more definitely called a half sister. The correlative of brother.

Name: Site
Definition: The place where anything is fixed; situation; local position; as, the site of a city or of a house.

Name: Sitting
Definition: Being in the state, or the position, of one who, or that which, sits.

Name: Situated
Definition: Having a site, situation, or location; being in a relative position; permanently fixed; placed; located; as, a town situated, or situate, on a hill or on the seashore.

Name: Situation
Definition: Manner in which an object is placed; location, esp. as related to something else; position; locality site; as, a house in a pleasant situation.

Name: Sixth
Definition: First after the fifth; next in order after the fifth.

Name: Size
Definition: Six.

Name: Sized
Definition: Adjusted according to size.

Name: Skill
Definition: Discrimination; judgment; propriety; reason; cause.

Name: Skilled
Definition: Having familiar knowledge united with readiness and dexterity in its application; familiarly acquainted with; expert; skillful; -- often followed by in; as, a person skilled in drawing or geometry.

Name: Skin
Definition: The external membranous integument of an animal.

Name: Skip
Definition: A basket. See Skep.

Name: Skirt
Definition: The lower and loose part of a coat, dress, or other like garment; the part below the waist; as, the skirt of a coat, a dress, or a mantle.

Name: Slave
Definition: A person who is held in bondage to another; one who is wholly subject to the will of another; one who is held as a chattel; one who has no freedom of action, but whose person and services are wholly under the control of another.

Name: Sleep
Definition: imp. of Sleep. Slept.

Name: Sleeping
Definition: a. & n. from Sleep.

Name: Sleeve
Definition: The part of a garment which covers the arm; as, the sleeve of a coat or a gown.

Name: Slide
Definition: To move along the surface of any body by slipping, or without walking or rolling; to slip; to glide; as, snow slides down the mountain's side.

Name: Slight
Definition: Sleight.

Name: Slightly
Definition: In a slight manner.

Name: Slim
Definition: Worthless; bad.

Name: Slip
Definition: To move along the surface of a thing without bounding, rolling, or stepping; to slide; to glide.

Name: Slope
Definition: An oblique direction; a line or direction including from a horizontal line or direction; also, sometimes, an inclination, as of one line or surface to another.

Name: Slot
Definition: A broad, flat, wooden bar; a slat or sloat.

Name: Slow
Definition: imp. of Slee, to slay. Slew.

Name: Slowly
Definition: In a slow manner; moderately; not rapidly; not early; not rashly; not readly; tardly.

Name: Small
Definition: Having little size, compared with other things of the same kind; little in quantity or degree; diminutive; not large or extended in dimension; not great; not much; inconsiderable; as, a small man; a small river.

Name: Smart
Definition: To feel a lively, pungent local pain; -- said of some part of the body as the seat of irritation; as, my finger smarts; these wounds smart.

Name: Smell
Definition: To perceive by the olfactory nerves, or organs of smell; to have a sensation of, excited through the nasal organs when affected by the appropriate materials or qualities; to obtain the scent of; as, to smell a rose; to smell perfumes.

Name: Smile
Definition: To express amusement, pleasure, moderate joy, or love and kindness, by the features of the face; to laugh silently.

Name: Smith
Definition: One who forges with the hammer; one who works in metals; as, a blacksmith, goldsmith, silversmith, and the like.

Name: Smithsonian
Definition: Of or pertaining to the Englishman J. L. M. Smithson, or to the national institution of learning which he endowed at Washington, D. C.; as, the Smithsonian Institution; Smithsonian Reports.

Name: Smoke
Definition: The visible exhalation, vapor, or substance that escapes, or expelled, from a burning body, especially from burning vegetable matter, as wood, coal, peat, or the like.

Name: Smoking
Definition: a. & n. from Smoke.

Name: Smooth
Definition: Having an even surface, or a surface so even that no roughness or points can be perceived by the touch; not rough; as, smooth glass; smooth porcelain.

Name: Snake
Definition: Any species of the order Ophidia; an ophidian; a serpent, whether harmless or venomous. See Ophidia, and Serpent.

Name: Snap
Definition: To break at once; to break short, as substances that are brittle.

Name: Snow
Definition: A square-rigged vessel, differing from a brig only in that she has a trysail mast close abaft the mainmast, on which a large trysail is hoisted.

Name: Soap
Definition: A substance which dissolves in water, thus forming a lather, and is used as a cleansing agent. Soap is produced by combining fats or oils with alkalies or alkaline earths, usually by boiling, and consists of salts of sodium, potassium, etc., with the fatty acids (oleic, stearic, palmitic, etc.). See the Note below, and cf. Saponification. By extension, any compound of similar composition or properties, whether used as a cleaning agent or not.

Name: Social
Definition: Of or pertaining to society; relating to men living in society, or to the public as an aggregate body; as, social interest or concerns; social pleasure; social benefits; social happiness; social duties.

Name: Society
Definition: The relationship of men to one another when associated in any way; companionship; fellowship; company.

Name: Sociology
Definition: That branch of philosophy which treats of the constitution, phenomena, and development of human society; social science.

Name: Socket
Definition: An opening into which anything is fitted; any hollow thing or place which receives and holds something else; as, the sockets of the teeth.

Name: Sodium
Definition: A common metallic element of the alkali group, in nature always occuring combined, as in common salt, in albite, etc. It is isolated as a soft, waxy, white, unstable metal, so readily oxidized that it combines violently with water, and to be preserved must be kept under petroleum or some similar liquid. Sodium is used combined in many salts, in the free state as a reducer, and as a means of obtaining other metals (as magnesium and aluminium) is an important commercial product. Symbol Na  (Natrium). Atomic weight 23. Specific gravity 0.97.

Name: Sofa
Definition: A long seat, usually with a cushioned bottom, back, and ends; -- much used as a comfortable piece of furniture.

Name: Soft
Definition: Easily yielding to pressure; easily impressed, molded, or cut; not firm in resisting; impressible; yielding; also, malleable; -- opposed to hard; as, a soft bed; a soft peach; soft earth; soft wood or metal.

Name: Soil
Definition: To feed, as cattle or horses, in the barn or an inclosure, with fresh grass or green food cut for them, instead of sending them out to pasture; hence (such food having the effect of purging them), to purge by feeding on green food; as, to soil a horse.

Name: Solar
Definition: A loft or upper chamber; a garret room.

Name: Sold
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Sell.

Name: Soldier
Definition: One who is engaged in military service as an officer or a private; one who serves in an army; one of an organized body of combatants.

Name: Sole
Definition: Any one of several species of flatfishes of the genus Solea and allied genera of the family Soleidae, especially the common European species (Solea vulgaris), which is a valuable food fish.

Name: Solely
Definition: Singly; alone; only; without another; as, to rest a cause solely one argument; to rely solelyn one's own strength.

Name: Solid
Definition: Having the constituent parts so compact, or so firmly adhering, as to resist the impression or penetration of other bodies; having a fixed form; hard; firm; compact; -- opposed to fluid and liquid or to plastic, like clay, or to incompact, like sand.

Name: Solo
Definition: A tune, air, strain, or a whole piece, played by a single person on an instrument, or sung by a single voice.

Name: Solomon
Definition: One of the kings of Israel, noted for his superior wisdom and magnificent reign; hence, a very wise man.

Name: Solution
Definition: The act of separating the parts of any body, or the condition of undergoing a separation of parts; disruption; breach.

Name: Solve
Definition: To explain; to resolve; to unfold; to clear up (what is obscure or difficult to be understood); to work out to a result or conclusion; as, to solve a doubt; to solve difficulties; to solve a problem.

Name: Soma
Definition: The whole axial portion of an animal, including the head, neck, trunk, and tail.

Name: Some
Definition: Consisting of a greater or less portion or sum; composed of a quantity or number which is not stated; -- used to express an indefinite quantity or number; as, some wine; some water; some persons.  Used also pronominally; as, I have some.

Name: Somebody
Definition: A person unknown or uncertain; a person indeterminate; some person.

Name: Somehow
Definition: In one way or another; in some way not yet known or designated; by some means; as, the thing must be done somehow; he lives somehow.

Name: Somerset
Definition: A leap in which a person turns his heels over his head and lights upon his feet; a turning end over end.

Name: Something
Definition: Anything unknown, undetermined, or not specifically designated; a certain indefinite thing; an indeterminate or unknown event; an unspecified task, work, or thing.

Name: Sometimes
Definition: Formerly; sometime.

Name: Somewhat
Definition: More or less; a certain quantity or degree; a part, more or less; something.

Name: Somewhere
Definition: In some place unknown or not specified; in one place or another.

Name: Song
Definition: That which is sung or uttered with musical modulations of the voice, whether of a human being or of a bird, insect, etc.

Name: Soon
Definition: In a short time; shortly after any time specified or supposed; as, soon after sunrise.

Name: Sophisticated
Definition: Adulterated; not pure; not genuine.

Name: Sorry
Definition: Grieved for the loss of some good; pained for some evil; feeling regret; -- now generally used to express light grief or affliction, but formerly often used to express deeper feeling.

Name: Sort
Definition: Chance; lot; destiny.

Name: Sought
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Seek.

Name: Soul
Definition: Sole.

Name: Sound
Definition: The air bladder of a fish; as, cod sounds are an esteemed article of food.

Name: Soup
Definition: A liquid food of many kinds, usually made by boiling meat and vegetables, or either of them, in water, -- commonly seasoned or flavored; strong broth.

Name: Source
Definition: The act of rising; a rise; an ascent.

Name: South
Definition: That one of the four cardinal points directly opposite to the north; the region or direction to the right or direction to the right of a person who faces the east.

Name: Southeast
Definition: The point of the compass equally distant from the south and the east; the southeast part or region.

Name: Southern
Definition: Of or pertaining to the south; situated in, or proceeding from, the south; situated or proceeding toward the south.

Name: Southwest
Definition: The point of the compass equally from the south and the west; the southwest part or region.

Name: Space
Definition: Extension, considered independently of anything which it may contain; that which makes extended objects conceivable and possible.

Name: Span
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Spin.

Name: Spanish
Definition: Of or pertaining to Spain or the Spaniards.

Name: Spank
Definition: To strike, as the breech, with the open hand; to slap.

Name: Spanking
Definition: Moving with a quick, lively pace, or capable of so doing; dashing.

Name: Spare
Definition: To use frugally or stintingly, as that which is scarce or valuable; to retain or keep unused; to save.

Name: Spatial
Definition: Of or pertaining to space.

Name: Speak
Definition: To utter words or articulate sounds, as human beings; to express thoughts by words; as, the organs may be so obstructed that a man may not be able to speak.

Name: Speaker
Definition: One who speaks.

Name: Speaking
Definition: Uttering speech; used for conveying speech; as, man is a speaking animal; a speaking tube.

Name: Special
Definition: Of or pertaining to a species; constituting a species or sort.

Name: Specialist
Definition: One who devotes himself to some specialty; as, a medical specialist, one who devotes himself to diseases of particular parts of the body, as the eye, the ear, the nerves, etc.

Name: Specially
Definition: In a special manner; particularly; especially.

Name: Specialty
Definition: Particularity.

Name: Species
Definition: Visible or sensible presentation; appearance; a sensible percept received by the imagination; an image.

Name: Specific
Definition: Of or pertaining to a species; characterizing or constituting a species; possessing the peculiar property or properties of a thing which constitute its species, and distinguish it from other things; as, the specific form of an animal or a plant; the specific qualities of a drug; the specific distinction between virtue and vice.

Name: Specifically
Definition: In a specific manner.

Name: Specification
Definition: The act of specifying or determining by a mark or limit; notation of limits.

Name: Specify
Definition: To mention or name, as a particular thing; to designate in words so as to distinguish from other things; as, to specify the uses of a plant; to specify articles purchased.

Name: Spectacular
Definition: Of or pertaining to a shows; of the nature of a show.

Name: Spectrum
Definition: An apparition; a specter.

Name: Speech
Definition: The faculty of uttering articulate sounds or words; the faculty of expressing thoughts by words or articulate sounds; the power of speaking.

Name: Speed
Definition: Prosperity in an undertaking; favorable issue; success.

Name: Spell
Definition: A spelk, or splinter.

Name: Spelling
Definition: The act of one who spells; formation of words by letters; orthography.

Name: Spencer
Definition: One who has the care of the spence, or buttery.

Name: Spend
Definition: To weigh or lay out; to dispose of; to part with; as, to spend money for clothing.

Name: Spending
Definition: The act of expending; expenditure.

Name: Spent
Definition: Exhausted; worn out; having lost energy or motive force.

Name: Sperm
Definition: The male fecundating fluid; semen. See Semen.

Name: Sphere
Definition: A body or space contained under a single surface, which in every part is equally distant from a point within called its center.

Name: Spice
Definition: Species; kind.

Name: Spider
Definition: Any one of numerous species of arachnids comprising the order Araneina. Spiders have the mandibles converted into poison fangs, or falcers. The abdomen is large and not segmented, with two or three pairs of spinnerets near the end, by means of which they spin threads of silk to form cocoons, or nests, to protect their eggs and young. Many species spin also complex webs to entrap the insects upon which they prey. The eyes are usually eight in number (rarely six), and are situated on the back of the cephalothorax. See Illust. under Araneina.

Name: Spin
Definition: To draw out, and twist into threads, either by the hand or machinery; as, to spin wool, cotton, or flax; to spin goat's hair; to produce by drawing out and twisting a fibrous material.

Name: Spine
Definition: A sharp appendage to any of a plant; a thorn.

Name: Spirit
Definition: Air set in motion by breathing; breath; hence, sometimes, life itself.

Name: Spiritual
Definition: Consisting of spirit; not material; incorporeal; as, a spiritual substance or being.

Name: Spirituality
Definition: The quality or state of being spiritual; incorporeality; heavenly-mindedness.

Name: Split
Definition: To divide lengthwise; to separate from end to end, esp. by force; to divide in the direction of the grain layers; to rive; to cleave; as, to split a piece of timber or a board; to split a gem; to split a sheepskin.

Name: Spoke
Definition: imp. of Speak.

Name: Spoken
Definition: Uttered in speech; delivered by word of mouth; oral; as, a spoken narrative; the spoken word.

Name: Spokesman
Definition: One who speaks for another.

Name: Sponsor
Definition: One who binds himself to answer for another, and is responsible for his default; a surety.

Name: Sponsorship
Definition: State of being a sponsor.

Name: Sport
Definition: That which diverts, and makes mirth; pastime; amusement.

Name: Sporting
Definition: Of pertaining to, or engaging in, sport or sporrts; exhibiting the character or conduct of one who, or that which, sports.

Name: Spot
Definition: A mark on a substance or body made by foreign matter; a blot; a place discolored.

Name: Spouse
Definition: A man or woman engaged or joined in wedlock; a married person, husband or wife.

Name: Spray
Definition: A small shoot or branch; a twig.

Name: Spread
Definition: To extend in length and breadth, or in breadth only; to stretch or expand to a broad or broader surface or extent; to open; to unfurl; as, to spread a carpet; to spread a tent or a sail.

Name: Spring
Definition: To leap; to bound; to jump.

Name: Springer
Definition: One who, or that which, springs; specifically, one who rouses game.

Name: Sprint
Definition: To run very rapidly; to run at full speed.

Name: Squad
Definition: A small party of men assembled for drill, inspection, or other purposes.

Name: Square
Definition: The corner, or angle, of a figure.

Name: Stability
Definition: The state or quality of being stable, or firm; steadiness; firmness; strength to stand without being moved or overthrown; as, the stability of a structure; the stability of a throne or a constitution.

Name: Stable
Definition: Firmly established; not easily moved, shaken, or overthrown; fixed; as, a stable government.

Name: Stack
Definition: A large pile of hay, grain, straw, or the like, usually of a nearly conical form, but sometimes rectangular or oblong, contracted at the top to a point or ridge, and sometimes covered with thatch.

Name: Stadium
Definition: A Greek measure of length, being the chief one used for itinerary distances, also adopted by the Romans for nautical and astronomical measurements. It was equal to 600 Greek or 625 Roman feet, or 125 Roman paces, or to 606 feet 9 inches English. This was also called the Olympic stadium, as being the exact length of the foot-race course at Olympia.

Name: Staff
Definition: A long piece of wood; a stick; the long handle of an instrument or weapon; a pole or srick, used for many purposes; as, a surveyor's staff; the staff of a spear or pike.

Name: Stage
Definition: A floor or story of a house.

Name: Stainless
Definition: Free from stain; immaculate.

Name: Stake
Definition: A piece of wood, usually long and slender, pointed at one end so as to be easily driven into the ground as a support or stay; as, a stake to support vines, fences, hedges, etc.

Name: Stamp
Definition: To strike beat, or press forcibly with the bottom of the foot, or by thrusting the foot downward.

Name: Stand
Definition: To be at rest in an erect position; to be fixed in an upright or firm position

Name: Standard
Definition: A flag; colors; a banner; especially, a national or other ensign.

Name: Standing
Definition: Remaining erect; not cut down; as, standing corn.

Name: Star
Definition: One of the innumerable luminous bodies seen in the heavens; any heavenly body other than the sun, moon, comets, and nebulae.

Name: Start
Definition: To leap; to jump.

Name: Starter
Definition: One who, or that which, starts; as, a starter on a journey; the starter of a race.

Name: Starting
Definition: a. & n. from Start, v.

Name: State
Definition: The circumstances or condition of a being or thing at any given time.

Name: Stated
Definition: Settled; established; fixed.

Name: Statement
Definition: The act of stating, reciting, or presenting, orally or in paper; as, to interrupt a speaker in the statement of his case.

Name: Static
Definition: Alt. of Statical

Name: Stating
Definition: The act of one who states anything; statement; as, the statingof one's opinions.

Name: Station
Definition: The act of standing; also, attitude or pose in standing; posture.

Name: Stationery
Definition: The articles usually sold by stationers, as paper, pens, ink, quills, blank books, etc.

Name: Statistical
Definition: Of or pertaining to statistics; as, statistical knowledge, statistical tabulation.

Name: Statistics
Definition: The science which has to do with the collection and classification of certain facts respecting the condition of the people in a state.

Name: Status
Definition: State; condition; position of affairs.

Name: Statute
Definition: An act of the legislature of a state or country, declaring, commanding, or prohibiting something; a positive law; the written will of the legislature expressed with all the requisite forms of legislation; -- used in distinction fraom common law. See Common law, under Common, a.

Name: Statutory
Definition: Enacted by statute; depending on statute for its authority; as, a statutory provision.

Name: Stay
Definition: A large, strong rope, employed to support a mast, by being extended from the head of one mast down to some other, or to some part of the vessel. Those which lead forward are called fore-and-aft stays; those which lead to the vessel's side are called backstays. See Illust. of Ship.

Name: Stayed
Definition: Staid; fixed; settled; sober; -- now written staid. See Staid.

Name: Steady
Definition: Firm in standing or position; not tottering or shaking; fixed; firm.

Name: Steal
Definition: A handle; a stale, or stele.

Name: Steam
Definition: The elastic, aeriform fluid into which water is converted when heated to the boiling points; water in the state of vapor.

Name: Steel
Definition: A variety of iron intermediate in composition and properties between wrought iron and cast iron (containing between one half of one per cent and one and a half per cent of carbon), and consisting of an alloy of iron with an iron carbide. Steel, unlike wrought iron, can be tempered, and retains magnetism. Its malleability decreases, and fusibility increases, with an increase in carbon.

Name: Steering
Definition: a. & n. from Steer, v.

Name: Stem
Definition: Alt. of Steem

Name: Stem
Definition: Alt. of Steem

Name: Stem
Definition: The principal body of a tree, shrub, or plant, of any kind; the main stock; the part which supports the branches or the head or top.

Name: Step
Definition: To move the foot in walking; to advance or recede by raising and moving one of the feet to another resting place, or by moving both feet in succession.

Name: Sterling
Definition: Same as Starling, 3.

Name: Steve
Definition: To pack or stow, as cargo in a ship's hold. See Steeve.

Name: Steven
Definition: Voice; speech; language.

Name: Stick
Definition: A small shoot, or branch, separated, as by a cutting, from a tree or shrub; also, any stem or branch of a tree, of any size, cut for fuel or timber.

Name: Sticker
Definition: One who, or that which, sticks; as, a bill sticker.

Name: Sticky
Definition: Having the quality of sticking to a surface; adhesive; gluey; viscous; viscid; glutinous; tenacious.

Name: Still
Definition: Motionless; at rest; quiet; as, to stand still; to lie or sit still.

Name: Stock
Definition: The stem, or main body, of a tree or plant; the fixed, strong, firm part; the trunk.

Name: Stolen
Definition: p. p. of Steal.

Name: Stomach
Definition: An enlargement, or series of enlargements, in the anterior part of the alimentary canal, in which food is digested; any cavity in which digestion takes place in an animal; a digestive cavity. See Digestion, and Gastric juice, under Gastric.

Name: Stone
Definition: Concreted earthy or mineral matter; also, any particular mass of such matter; as, a house built of stone; the boy threw a stone; pebbles are rounded stones.

Name: Stood
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Stand.

Name: Stop
Definition: To close, as an aperture, by filling or by obstructing; as, to stop the ears; hence, to stanch, as a wound.

Name: Stopped
Definition: Made by complete closure of the mouth organs; shut; -- said of certain consonants (p, b, t, d, etc.).

Name: Stopping
Definition: Material for filling a cavity.

Name: Storage
Definition: The act of depositing in a store or warehouse for safe keeping; also, the safe keeping of goods in a warehouse.

Name: Store
Definition: That which is accumulated, or massed together; a source from which supplies may be drawn; hence, an abundance; a great quantity, or a great number.

Name: Stored
Definition: Collected or accumulated as a reserve supply; as, stored electricity.

Name: Storm
Definition: A violent disturbance of the atmosphere, attended by wind, rain, snow, hail, or thunder and lightning; hence, often, a heavy fall of rain, snow, or hail, whether accompanied with wind or not.

Name: Story
Definition: A set of rooms on the same floor or level; a floor, or the space between two floors. Also, a horizontal division of a building's exterior considered architecturally, which need not correspond exactly with the stories within.

Name: Straight
Definition: A variant of Strait, a.

Name: Strain
Definition: Race; stock; generation; descent; family.

Name: Strand
Definition: One of the twists, or strings, as of fibers, wires, etc., of which a rope is composed.

Name: Strange
Definition: Belonging to another country; foreign.

Name: Stranger
Definition: One who is strange, foreign, or unknown.

Name: Strap
Definition: A long, narrow, pliable strip of leather, cloth, or the like; specifically, a strip of thick leather used in flogging.

Name: Strategic
Definition: Alt. of Strategical

Name: Strategy
Definition: The science of military command, or the science of projecting campaigns and directing great military movements; generalship.

Name: Stream
Definition: A current of water or other fluid; a liquid flowing continuously in a line or course, either on the earth, as a river, brook, etc., or from a vessel, reservoir, or fountain; specifically, any course of running water; as, many streams are blended in the Mississippi; gas and steam came from the earth in streams; a stream of molten lead from a furnace; a stream of lava from a volcano.

Name: Streaming
Definition: Sending forth streams.

Name: Street
Definition: Originally, a paved way or road; a public highway; now commonly, a thoroughfare in a city or village, bordered by dwellings or business houses.

Name: Strength
Definition: The quality or state of being strong; ability to do or to bear; capacity for exertion or endurance, whether physical, intellectual, or moral; force; vigor; power; as, strength of body or of the arm; strength of mind, of memory, or of judgment.

Name: Strengthen
Definition: To make strong or stronger; to add strength to; as, to strengthen a limb, a bridge, an army; to strengthen an obligation; to strengthen authority.

Name: Strengthening
Definition: That strengthens; giving or increasing strength.

Name: Stress
Definition: Distress.

Name: Stretch
Definition: To reach out; to extend; to put forth.

Name: Strict
Definition: Strained; drawn close; tight; as, a strict embrace; a strict ligature.

Name: Strictly
Definition: In a strict manner; closely; precisely.

Name: Strike
Definition: To touch or hit with some force, either with the hand or with an instrument; to smite; to give a blow to, either with the hand or with any instrument or missile.

Name: Striking
Definition: a. & n. from Strike, v.

Name: String
Definition: A small cord, a line, a twine, or a slender strip of leather, or other substance, used for binding together, fastening, or tying things; a cord, larger than a thread and smaller than a rope; as, a shoe string; a bonnet string; a silken string.

Name: Strip
Definition: To deprive; to bereave; to make destitute; to plunder; especially, to deprive of a covering; to skin; to peel; as, to strip a man of his possession, his rights, his privileges, his reputation; to strip one of his clothes; to strip a beast of his skin; to strip a tree of its bark.

Name: Stroke
Definition: Struck.

Name: Strong
Definition: Having active physical power, or great physical power to act; having a power of exerting great bodily force; vigorous.

Name: Strongly
Definition: In a strong manner; so as to be strong in action or in resistance; with strength; with great force; forcibly; powerfully; firmly; vehemently; as, a town strongly fortified; he objected strongly.

Name: Struck
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Strike.

Name: Structural
Definition: Of or pertaining to structure; affecting structure; as, a structural error.

Name: Structure
Definition: The act of building; the practice of erecting buildings; construction.

Name: Structured
Definition: Having a definite organic structure; showing differentiation of parts.

Name: Struggle
Definition: To strive, or to make efforts, with a twisting, or with contortions of the body.

Name: Stuck
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Stick.

Name: Stud
Definition: A collection of breeding horses and mares, or the place where they are kept; also, a number of horses kept for a racing, riding, etc.

Name: Student
Definition: A person engaged in study; one who is devoted to learning; a learner; a pupil; a scholar; especially, one who attends a school, or who seeks knowledge from professional teachers or from books; as, the students of an academy, a college, or a university; a medical student; a hard student.

Name: Studied
Definition: Closely examined; read with diligence and attention; made the subject of study; well considered; as, a studied lesson.

Name: Studio
Definition: The working room of an artist.

Name: Study
Definition: A setting of the mind or thoughts upon a subject; hence, application of mind to books, arts, or science, or to any subject, for the purpose of acquiring knowledge.

Name: Stuff
Definition: Material which is to be worked up in any process of manufacture.

Name: Stunning
Definition: Overpowering consciousness; overpowering the senses; especially, overpowering the sense of hearing; confounding with noise.

Name: Stupid
Definition: Very dull; insensible; senseless; wanting in understanding; heavy; sluggish; in a state of stupor; -- said of persons.

Name: Style
Definition: An instrument used by the ancients in writing on tablets covered with wax, having one of its ends sharp, and the other blunt, and somewhat expanded, for the purpose of making erasures by smoothing the wax.

Name: Stylish
Definition: Having style or artistic quality; given to, or fond of, the display of style; highly fashionable; modish; as, a stylish dress, house, manner.

Name: Stylus
Definition: An instrument for writing. See Style, n., 1.

Name: Subcommittee
Definition: An under committee; a part or division of a committee.

Name: Subdivision
Definition: The act of subdividing, or separating a part into smaller parts.

Name: Subject
Definition: Placed or situated under; lying below, or in a lower situation.

Name: Subjective
Definition: Of or pertaining to a subject.

Name: Sublime
Definition: Lifted up; high in place; exalted aloft; uplifted; lofty.

Name: Submission
Definition: The act of submitting; the act of yielding to power or authority; surrender of the person and power to the control or government of another; obedience; compliance.

Name: Submit
Definition: To let down; to lower.

Name: Subscribe
Definition: To write underneath, as one's name; to sign (one's name) to a document.

Name: Subscriber
Definition: One who subscribes; one who contributes to an undertaking by subscribing.

Name: Subscription
Definition: The act of subscribing.

Name: Subsequent
Definition: Following in time; coming or being after something else at any time, indefinitely; as, subsequent events; subsequent ages or years; a period long subsequent to the foundation of Rome.

Name: Subsequently
Definition: At a later time; afterwards.

Name: Subsidiary
Definition: Furnishing aid; assisting; auxiliary; helping; tributary; especially, aiding in an inferior position or capacity; as, a subsidiary stream.

Name: Substance
Definition: That which underlies all outward manifestations; substratum; the permanent subject or cause of phenomena, whether material or spiritual; that in which properties inhere; that which is real, in distinction from that which is apparent; the abiding part of any existence, in distinction from any accident; that which constitutes anything what it is; real or existing essence.

Name: Substantial
Definition: Belonging to substance; actually existing; real; as, substantial life.

Name: Substantially
Definition: In a substantial manner; in substance; essentially.

Name: Substitute
Definition: One who, or that which, is substituted or put in the place of another; one who acts for another; that which stands in lieu of something else

Name: Subtle
Definition: Sly in design; artful; cunning; insinuating; subtile; -- applied to persons; as, a subtle foe.

Name: Suburban
Definition: Of or pertaining to suburbs; inhabiting, or being in, the suburbs of a city.

Name: Succeed
Definition: To follow in order; to come next after; hence, to take the place of; as, the king's eldest son succeeds his father on the throne; autumn succeeds summer.

Name: Success
Definition: Act of succeeding; succession.

Name: Successful
Definition: Resulting in success; assuring, or promotive of, success; accomplishing what was proposed; having the desired effect; hence, prosperous; fortunate; happy; as, a successful use of medicine; a successful experiment; a successful enterprise.

Name: Such
Definition: Of that kind; of the like kind; like; resembling; similar; as, we never saw such a day; -- followed by that or as introducing the word or proposition which defines the similarity, or the standard of comparison; as, the books are not such that I can recommend them, or, not such as I can recommend; these apples are not such as those we saw yesterday; give your children such precepts as tend to make them better.

Name: Sucking
Definition: Drawing milk from the mother or dam; hence, colloquially, young, inexperienced, as, a sucking infant; a sucking calf.

Name: Sudden
Definition: Happening without previous notice or with very brief notice; coming unexpectedly, or without the common preparation; immediate; instant; speedy.

Name: Suffer
Definition: To feel, or endure, with pain, annoyance, etc.; to submit to with distress or grief; to undergo; as, to suffer pain of body, or grief of mind.

Name: Suffering
Definition: The bearing of pain, inconvenience, or loss; pain endured; distress, loss, or injury incurred; as, sufferings by pain or sorrow; sufferings by want or by wrongs.

Name: Sufficient
Definition: Equal to the end proposed; adequate to wants; enough; ample; competent; as, provision sufficient for the family; an army sufficient to defend the country.

Name: Sufficiently
Definition: To a sufficient degree; to a degree that answers the purpose, or gives content; enough; as, we are sufficiently supplied with food; a man sufficiently qualified for the discharge of his official duties.

Name: Sugar
Definition: A sweet white (or brownish yellow) crystalline substance, of a sandy or granular consistency, obtained by crystallizing the evaporated juice of certain plants, as the sugar cane, sorghum, beet root, sugar maple, etc. It is used for seasoning and preserving many kinds of food and drink. Ordinary sugar is essentially sucrose. See the Note below.

Name: Suggest
Definition: To introduce indirectly to the thoughts; to cause to be thought of, usually by the agency of other objects.

Name: Suggestion
Definition: The act of suggesting; presentation of an idea.

Name: Suicide
Definition: The act of taking one's own life voluntary and intentionally; self-murder; specifically (Law), the felonious killing of one's self; the deliberate and intentional destruction of one's own life by a person of years of discretion and of sound mind.

Name: Suit
Definition: The act of following or pursuing, as game; pursuit.

Name: Suitable
Definition: Capable of suiting; fitting; accordant; proper; becoming; agreeable; adapted; as, ornaments suitable to one's station; language suitable for the subject.

Name: Suite
Definition: A retinue or company of attendants, as of a distinguished personage; as, the suite of an ambassador. See Suit, n., 5.

Name: Summary
Definition: Formed into a sum; summed up; reduced into a narrow compass, or into few words; short; brief; concise; compendious; as, a summary statement of facts.

Name: Summer
Definition: One who sums; one who casts up an account.

Name: Summit
Definition: The top; the highest point.

Name: Sunday
Definition: The first day of the week, -- consecrated among Christians to rest from secular employments, and to religious worship; the Christian Sabbath; the Lord's Day.

Name: Sunny
Definition: Of or pertaining to the sun; proceeding from, or resembling the sun; hence, shining; bright; brilliant; radiant.

Name: Sunrise
Definition: Alt. of Sunrising

Name: Sunset
Definition: Alt. of Sunsetting

Name: Sunshine
Definition: The light of the sun, or the place where it shines; the direct rays of the sun, the place where they fall, or the warmth and light which they give.

Name: Super
Definition: A contraction of Supernumerary, in sense  2.

Name: Superb
Definition: Grand; magnificent; august; stately; as, a superb edifice; a superb colonnade.

Name: Superintendent
Definition: Overseeing; superintending.

Name: Superior
Definition: More elevated in place or position; higher; upper; as, the superior limb of the sun; the superior part of an image.

Name: Supervision
Definition: The act of overseeing; inspection; superintendence; oversight.

Name: Supervisor
Definition: One who supervises; an overseer; an inspector; a superintendent; as, a supervisor of schools.

Name: Supplement
Definition: That which supplies a deficiency, or meets a want; a store; a supply.

Name: Supplemental
Definition: Alt. of Supplementary

Name: Supplier
Definition: One who supplies.

Name: Supply
Definition: To fill up, or keep full; to furnish with what is wanted; to afford, or furnish with, a sufficiency; as, rivers are supplied by smaller streams; an aqueduct supplies an artificial lake; -- often followed by with before the thing furnished; as, to supply a furnace with fuel; to supply soldiers with ammunition.

Name: Support
Definition: To bear by being under; to keep from falling; to uphold; to sustain, in a literal or physical sense; to prop up; to bear the weight of; as, a pillar supports a structure; an abutment supports an arch; the trunk of a tree supports the branches.

Name: Suppose
Definition: To represent to one's self, or state to another, not as true or real, but as if so, and with a view to some consequence or application which the reality would involve or admit of; to imagine or admit to exist, for the sake of argument or illustration; to assume to be true; as, let us suppose the earth to be the center of the system, what would be the result?

Name: Supreme
Definition: Highest in authority; holding the highest place in authority, government, or power.

Name: Sure
Definition: Certainly knowing and believing; confident beyond doubt; implicity trusting; unquestioning; positive.

Name: Surely
Definition: In a sure or certain manner; certainly; infallibly; undoubtedly; assuredly.

Name: Surf
Definition: The swell of the sea which breaks upon the shore, esp. upon a sloping beach.

Name: Surface
Definition: The exterior part of anything that has length and breadth; one of the limits that bound a solid, esp. the upper face; superficies; the outside; as, the surface of the earth; the surface of a diamond; the surface of the body.

Name: Surge
Definition: A spring; a fountain.

Name: Surgeon
Definition: One whose profession or occupation is to cure diseases or injuries of the body by manual operation; one whose occupation is to cure local injuries or disorders (such as wounds, dislocations, tumors, etc.), whether by manual operation, or by medication and constitutional treatment.

Name: Surgery
Definition: The art of healing by manual operation; that branch of medical science which treats of manual operations for the healing of diseases or injuries of the body; that branch of medical science which has for its object the cure of local injuries or diseases, as wounds or fractures, tumors, etc., whether by manual operation or by medicines and constitutional treatment.

Name: Surgical
Definition: Of or pertaining to surgeons or surgery; done by means of surgery; used in surgery; as, a surgical operation; surgical instruments.

Name: Surname
Definition: A name or appellation which is added to, or over and above, the baptismal or Christian name, and becomes a family name.

Name: Surplus
Definition: That which remains when use or need is satisfied, or when a limit is reached; excess; overplus.

Name: Surprise
Definition: The act of coming upon, or taking, unawares; the act of seizing unexpectedly; surprisal; as, the fort was taken by surprise.

Name: Surprising
Definition: Exciting surprise; extraordinary; of a nature to excite wonder and astonishment; as, surprising bravery; a surprising escape from danger.

Name: Surrey
Definition: A four-wheeled pleasure carriage, (commonly two-seated) somewhat like a phaeton, but having a straight bottom.

Name: Surround
Definition: To inclose on all sides; to encompass; to environ.

Name: Surrounding
Definition: Inclosing; encircling.

Name: Surveillance
Definition: Oversight; watch; inspection; supervision.

Name: Survey
Definition: To inspect, or take a view of; to view with attention, as from a high place; to overlook; as, to stand on a hill, and survey the surrounding country.

Name: Survival
Definition: A living or continuing longer than, or beyond the existence of, another person, thing, or event; an outliving.

Name: Survive
Definition: To live beyond the life or existence of; to live longer than; to outlive; to outlast; as, to survive a person or an event.

Name: Survivor
Definition: One who survives or outlives another person, or any time, event, or thing.

Name: Suspect
Definition: Suspicious; inspiring distrust.

Name: Suspected
Definition: Distrusted; doubted.

Name: Suspension
Definition: The act of suspending, or the state of being suspended; pendency; as, suspension from a hook.

Name: Sustainable
Definition: Capable of being sustained or maintained; as, the action is not sustainable.

Name: Sustained
Definition: Held up to a certain pitch, degree, or level; uniform; as, sustained pasion; a sustained style of writing; a sustained note in music.

Name: Swap
Definition: To strike; -- with off.

Name: Swedish
Definition: Of or pertaining to Sweden or its inhabitants.

Name: Sweet
Definition: Having an agreeable taste or flavor such as that of sugar; saccharine; -- opposed to sour and bitter; as, a sweet beverage; sweet fruits; sweet oranges.

Name: Swift
Definition: Moving a great distance in a short time; moving with celerity or velocity; fleet; rapid; quick; speedy; prompt.

Name: Swim
Definition: To be supported by water or other fluid; not to sink; to float; as, any substance will swim, whose specific gravity is less than that of the fluid in which it is immersed.

Name: Swimming
Definition: That swims; capable of swimming; adapted to, or used in, swimming; as, a swimming bird; a swimming motion.

Name: Swing
Definition: To move to and fro, as a body suspended in the air; to wave; to vibrate; to oscillate.

Name: Swiss
Definition: A native or inhabitant of Switzerland; a Switzer; the people of Switzerland.

Name: Switch
Definition: A small, flexible twig or rod.

Name: Switching
Definition: a. & n. from Switch, v.

Name: Sword
Definition: An offensive weapon, having a long and usually sharp/pointed blade with a cutting edge or edges. It is the general term, including the small sword, rapier, saber, scimiter, and many other varieties.

Name: Symbol
Definition: A visible sign or representation of an idea; anything which suggests an idea or quality, or another thing, as by resemblance or by convention; an emblem; a representation; a type; a figure; as, the lion is the symbol of courage; the lamb is the symbol of meekness or patience.

Name: Sympathy
Definition: Feeling corresponding to that which another feels; the quality of being affected by the affection of another, with feelings correspondent in kind, if not in degree; fellow-feeling.

Name: Symphony
Definition: A consonance or harmony of sounds, agreeable to the ear, whether the sounds are vocal or instrumental, or both.

Name: Symposium
Definition: A drinking together; a merry feast.

Name: Syndicate
Definition: The office or jurisdiction of a syndic; a council, or body of syndics.

Name: Syndrome
Definition: Concurrence.

Name: Synopsis
Definition: A general view, or a collection of heads or parts so arranged as to exhibit a general view of the whole; an abstract or summary of a discourse; a syllabus; a conspectus.

Name: Syntax
Definition: Connected system or order; union of things; a number of things jointed together; organism.

Name: Synthesis
Definition: Composition, or the putting of two or more things together, as in compounding medicines.

Name: Synthetic
Definition: Alt. of Synthetical

Name: Syracuse
Definition: A red wine of Italy.

Name: System
Definition: An assemblage of objects arranged in regular subordination, or after some distinct method, usually logical or scientific; a complete whole of objects related by some common law, principle, or end; a complete exhibition of essential principles or facts, arranged in a rational dependence or connection; a regular union of principles or parts forming one entire thing; as, a system of philosophy; a system of government; a system of divinity; a system of botany or chemistry; a military system; the solar system.

Name: Systematic
Definition: Alt. of Systematical

Name: Table
Definition: A smooth, flat surface, like the side of a board; a thin, flat, smooth piece of anything; a slab.

Name: Tablet
Definition: A small table or flat surface.

Name: Tackle
Definition: Apparatus for raising or lowering heavy weights, consisting of a rope and pulley blocks; sometimes, the rope and attachments, as distinct from the block.

Name: Tactics
Definition: The science and art of disposing military and naval forces in order for battle, and performing military and naval evolutions. It is divided into grand tactics, or the tactics of battles, and elementary tactics, or the tactics of instruction.

Name: Tail
Definition: Limitation; abridgment.

Name: Take
Definition: Taken.

Name: Taken
Definition: p. p. of Take.

Name: Taking
Definition: Apt to take; alluring; attracting.

Name: Tale
Definition: That which is told; an oral relation or recital; any rehearsal of what has occured; narrative; discourse; statement; history; story.

Name: Talent
Definition: Among the ancient Greeks, a weight and a denomination of money equal to 60 minae or 6,000 drachmae. The Attic talent, as a weight, was about 57 lbs. avoirdupois; as a denomination of silver money, its value was 243 15s. sterling, or about $1,180.

Name: Talented
Definition: Furnished with talents; possessing skill or talent; mentally gifted.

Name: Tales
Definition: Persons added to a jury, commonly from those in or about the courthouse, to make up any deficiency in the number of jurors regularly summoned, being like, or such as, the latter.

Name: Talk
Definition: To utter words; esp., to converse familiarly; to speak, as in familiar discourse, when two or more persons interchange thoughts.

Name: Talking
Definition: That talks; able to utter words; as, a talking parrot.

Name: Tall
Definition: High in stature; having a considerable, or an unusual, extension upward; long and comparatively slender; having the diameter or lateral extent small in proportion to the height; as, a tall person, tree, or mast.

Name: Tamil
Definition: Of or pertaining to the Tamils, or to their language.

Name: Tank
Definition: A small Indian dry measure, averaging 240 grains in weight; also, a Bombay weight of 72 grains, for pearls.

Name: Tape
Definition: A narrow fillet or band of cotton or linen; a narrow woven fabric used for strings and the like; as, curtains tied with tape.

Name: Target
Definition: A kind of small shield or buckler, used as a defensive weapon in war.

Name: Targeted
Definition: Furnished, armed, or protected, with a target.

Name: Tariff
Definition: A schedule, system, or scheme of duties imposed by the government of a country upon goods imported or exported; as, a revenue tariff; a protective tariff; Clay's compromise tariff. (U. S. 1833).

Name: Task
Definition: Labor or study imposed by another, often in a definite quantity or amount.

Name: Taste
Definition: To try by the touch; to handle; as, to taste a bow.

Name: Tattoo
Definition: A beat of drum, or sound of a trumpet or bugle, at night, giving notice to soldiers to retreat, or to repair to their quarters in garrison, or to their tents in camp.

Name: Taught
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Teach.

Name: Taxation
Definition: The act of laying a tax, or of imposing taxes, as on the subjects of a state, by government, or on the members of a corporation or company, by the proper authority; the raising of revenue; also, a system of raising revenue.

Name: Teach
Definition: To impart the knowledge of; to give intelligence concerning; to impart, as knowledge before unknown, or rules for practice; to inculcate as true or important; to exhibit impressively; as, to teach arithmetic, dancing, music, or the like; to teach morals.

Name: Teacher
Definition: One who teaches or instructs; one whose business or occupation is to instruct others; an instructor; a tutor.

Name: Teaching
Definition: The act or business of instructing; also, that which is taught; instruction.

Name: Team
Definition: A group of young animals, especially of young ducks; a brood; a litter.

Name: Tear
Definition: A drop of the limpid, saline fluid secreted, normally in small amount, by the lachrymal gland, and diffused between the eye and the eyelids to moisten the parts and facilitate their motion. Ordinarily the secretion passes through the lachrymal duct into the nose, but when it is increased by emotion or other causes, it overflows the lids.

Name: Technical
Definition: Of or pertaining to the useful or mechanic arts, or to any science, business, or the like; specially appropriate to any art, science, or business; as, the words of an indictment must be technical.

Name: Technique
Definition: Same as Technic, n.

Name: Technological
Definition: Of or pertaining to technology.

Name: Technology
Definition: Industrial science; the science of systematic knowledge of the industrial arts, especially of the more important manufactures, as spinning, weaving, metallurgy, etc.

Name: Teen
Definition: Grief; sorrow; affiction; pain.

Name: Teenage
Definition: The longer wood for making or mending fences.

Name: Teens
Definition: The years of one's age having the termination -teen, beginning with thirteen and ending with nineteen; as, a girl in her teens.

Name: Teeth
Definition: pl. of Tooth.

Name: Telephone
Definition: An instrument for reproducing sounds, especially articulate speech, at a distance.

Name: Telephony
Definition: The art or process of reproducing sounds at a distance, as with the telephone.

Name: Telescope
Definition: An optical instrument used in viewing distant objects, as the heavenly bodies.

Name: Tell
Definition: To mention one by one, or piece by piece; to recount; to enumerate; to reckon; to number; to count; as, to tell money.

Name: Telling
Definition: Operating with great effect; effective; as, a telling speech.

Name: Temperature
Definition: Constitution; state; degree of any quality.

Name: Template
Definition: Same as Templet.

Name: Temple
Definition: A contrivence used in a loom for keeping the web stretched transversely.

Name: Temporal
Definition: Of or pertaining to the temple or temples; as, the temporal bone; a temporal artery.

Name: Temporarily
Definition: In a temporary manner; for a time.

Name: Temporary
Definition: Lasting for a time only; existing or continuing for a limited time; not permanent; as, the patient has obtained temporary relief.

Name: Tenant
Definition: One who holds or possesses lands, or other real estate, by any kind of right, whether in fee simple, in common, in severalty, for life, for years, or at will; also, one who has the occupation or temporary possession of lands or tenements the title of which is in another; -- correlative to landlord. See Citation from Blackstone, under Tenement, 2.

Name: Tend
Definition: To make a tender of; to offer or tender.

Name: Tender
Definition: One who tends; one who takes care of any person or thing; a nurse.

Name: Tennis
Definition: A play in which a ball is driven to and fro, or kept in motion by striking it with a racket or with the open hand.

Name: Tension
Definition: The act of stretching or straining; the state of being stretched or strained to stiffness; the state of being bent strained; as, the tension of the muscles, tension of the larynx.

Name: Tent
Definition: A kind of wine of a deep red color, chiefly from Galicia or Malaga in Spain; -- called also tent wine, and tinta.

Name: Term
Definition: That which limits the extent of anything; limit; extremity; bound; boundary.

Name: Terminal
Definition: Of or pertaining to the end or extremity; forming the extremity; as, a terminal edge.

Name: Termination
Definition: The act of terminating, or of limiting or setting bounds; the act of ending or concluding; as, a voluntary termination of hostilities.

Name: Terminology
Definition: The doctrine of terms; a theory of terms or appellations; a treatise on terms.

Name: Terrace
Definition: A raised level space, shelf, or platform of earth, supported on one or more sides by a wall, a bank of tuft, or the like, whether designed for use or pleasure.

Name: Terrible
Definition: Adapted or likely to excite terror, awe, or dread; dreadful; formidable.

Name: Territory
Definition: A large extent or tract of land; a region; a country; a district.

Name: Terror
Definition: Extreme fear; fear that agitates body and mind; violent dread; fright.

Name: Terrorism
Definition: The act of terrorizing, or state of being terrorized; a mode of government by terror or intimidation.

Name: Terrorist
Definition: One who governs by terrorism or intimidation; specifically, an agent or partisan of the revolutionary tribunal during the Reign of Terror in France.

Name: Terry
Definition: A kind of heavy colored fabric, either all silk, or silk and worsted, or silk and cotton, often called terry velvet, used for upholstery and trimmings.

Name: Test
Definition: A cupel or cupelling hearth in which precious metals are melted for trial and refinement.

Name: Testament
Definition: A solemn, authentic instrument in writing, by which a person declares his will as to disposal of his estate and effects after his death.

Name: Testimony
Definition: A solemn declaration or affirmation made for the purpose of establishing or proving some fact.

Name: Testing
Definition: The act of testing or proving; trial; proof.

Name: Texas
Definition: A structure on the hurricane deck of a steamer, containing the pilot house, officers' cabins, etc.

Name: Text
Definition: A discourse or composition on which a note or commentary is written; the original words of an author, in distinction from a paraphrase, annotation, or commentary.

Name: Textile
Definition: Pertaining to weaving or to woven fabrics; as, textile arts; woven, capable of being woven; formed by weaving; as, textile fabrics.

Name: Texture
Definition: The act or art of weaving.

Name: Than
Definition: A particle expressing comparison, used after certain adjectives and adverbs which express comparison or diversity, as more, better, other, otherwise, and the like. It is usually followed by the object compared in the nominative case. Sometimes, however, the object compared is placed in the objective case, and than is then considered by some grammarians as a preposition. Sometimes the object is expressed in a sentence, usually introduced by that; as, I would rather suffer than that you should want.

Name: Thank
Definition: A expression of gratitude; an acknowledgment expressive of a sense of favor or kindness received; obligation, claim, or desert, or gratitude; -- now generally used in the plural.

Name: Thanksgiving
Definition: The act of rending thanks, or expressing gratitude for favors or mercies.

Name: That
Definition: As a demonstrative pronoun (pl. Those), that usually points out, or refers to, a person or thing previously mentioned, or supposed to be understood. That, as a demonstrative, may precede the noun to which it refers; as, that which he has said is true; those in the basket are good apples.

Name: Theater
Definition: Alt. of Theatre

Name: Theatre
Definition: An edifice in which dramatic performances or spectacles are exhibited for the amusement of spectators; anciently uncovered, except the stage, but in modern times roofed.

Name: Thee
Definition: To thrive; to prosper.

Name: Theft
Definition: The act of stealing; specifically, the felonious taking and removing of personal property, with an intent to deprive the rightful owner of the same; larceny.

Name: Their
Definition: The possessive case of the personal pronoun they; as, their houses; their country.

Name: Them
Definition: The objective case of they. See They.

Name: Theme
Definition: A subject or topic on which a person writes or speaks; a proposition for discussion or argument; a text.

Name: Themselves
Definition: The plural of himself, herself, and itself. See Himself, Herself, Itself.

Name: Then
Definition: At that time (referring to a time specified, either past or future).

Name: Theology
Definition: The science of God or of religion; the science which treats of the existence, character, and attributes of God, his laws and government, the doctrines we are to believe, and the duties we are to practice; divinity; (as more commonly understood)

Name: Theorem
Definition: That which is considered and established as a principle; hence, sometimes, a rule.

Name: Theoretical
Definition: Pertaining to theory; depending on, or confined to, theory or speculation; speculative; terminating in theory or speculation: not practical; as, theoretical learning; theoretic sciences.

Name: Theory
Definition: A doctrine, or scheme of things, which terminates in speculation or contemplation, without a view to practice; hypothesis; speculation.

Name: Therapeutic
Definition: Alt. of Therapeutical

Name: Therapeutic
Definition: One of the Therapeutae.

Name: Therapy
Definition: Therapeutics.

Name: There
Definition: In or at that place.

Name: Thereafter
Definition: After that; afterward.

Name: Thereby
Definition: By that; by that means; in consequence of that.

Name: Therefore
Definition: For that or this reason, referring to something previously stated; for that.

Name: Thereof
Definition: Of that or this.

Name: Thermal
Definition: Of or pertaining to heat; warm; hot; as, the thermal unit; thermal waters.

Name: Thesaurus
Definition: A treasury or storehouse; hence, a repository, especially of knowledge; -- often applied to a comprehensive work, like a dictionary or cyclopedia.

Name: These
Definition: The plural of this. See This.

Name: Thesis
Definition: A position or proposition which a person advances and offers to maintain, or which is actually maintained by argument.

Name: Theta
Definition: A letter of the Greek alphabet corresponding to th in English; -- sometimes called the unlucky letter, from being used by the judges on their ballots in passing condemnation on a prisoner, it being the first letter of the Greek qa`natos, death.

Name: They
Definition: The plural of he, she, or it. They is never used adjectively, but always as a pronoun proper, and sometimes refers to persons without an antecedent expressed.

Name: Thick
Definition: Measuring in the third dimension other than length and breadth, or in general dimension other than length; -- said of a solid body; as, a timber seven inches thick.

Name: Thickness
Definition: The quality or state of being thick (in any of the senses of the adjective).

Name: Thin
Definition: Having little thickness or extent from one surface to its opposite; as, a thin plate of metal; thin paper; a thin board; a thin covering.

Name: Thing
Definition: Whatever exists, or is conceived to exist, as a separate entity, whether animate or inanimate; any separable or distinguishable object of thought.

Name: Think
Definition: To seem or appear; -- used chiefly in the expressions methinketh or methinks, and methought.

Name: Thinking
Definition: Having the faculty of thought; cogitative; capable of a regular train of ideas; as, man is a thinking being.

Name: Third
Definition: Next after the second; coming after two others; -- the ordinal of three; as, the third hour in the day.

Name: Thirty
Definition: Being three times ten; consisting of one more than twenty-nine; twenty and ten; as, the month of June consists of thirty days.

Name: This
Definition: As a demonstrative pronoun, this denotes something that is present or near in place or time, or something just mentioned, or that is just about to be mentioned.

Name: Thong
Definition: A strap of leather; especially, one used for fastening anything.

Name: Thorough
Definition: Through.

Name: Thoroughly
Definition: In a thorough manner; fully; entirely; completely.

Name: Those
Definition: The plural of that. See That.

Name: Thou
Definition: The second personal pronoun, in the singular number, denoting the person addressed; thyself; the pronoun which is used in addressing persons in the solemn or poetical style.

Name: Though
Definition: Granting, admitting, or supposing that; notwithstanding that; if.

Name: Thought
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Think.

Name: Thousand
Definition: The number of ten hundred; a collection or sum consisting of ten times one hundred units or objects.

Name: Thread
Definition: A very small twist of flax, wool, cotton, silk, or other fibrous substance, drawn out to considerable length; a compound cord consisting of two or more single yarns doubled, or joined together, and twisted.

Name: Threat
Definition: The expression of an intention to inflict evil or injury on another; the declaration of an evil, loss, or pain to come; menace; threatening; denunciation.

Name: Threatening
Definition: a. & n. from Threaten, v.

Name: Three
Definition: One more than two; two and one.

Name: Threshold
Definition: The plank, stone, or piece of timber, which lies under a door, especially of a dwelling house, church, temple, or the like; the doorsill; hence, entrance; gate; door.

Name: Throat
Definition: The part of the neck in front of, or ventral to, the vertebral column.

Name: Through
Definition: From end to end of, or from side to side of; from one surface or limit of, to the opposite; into and out of at the opposite, or at another, point; as, to bore through a piece of timber, or through a board; a ball passes through the side of a ship.

Name: Throughout
Definition: Quite through; from one extremity to the other of; also, every part of; as, to search throughout the house.

Name: Throw
Definition: Pain; especially, pain of travail; throe.

Name: Throwing
Definition: a. & n. from Throw, v.

Name: Thrown
Definition: a. & p. p. from Throw, v.

Name: Thru
Definition: Through.

Name: Thumb
Definition: The short, thick first digit of the human hand, differing from the other fingers in having but two phalanges; the pollex. See Pollex.

Name: Thunder
Definition: The sound which follows a flash of lightning; the report of a discharge of atmospheric electricity.

Name: Thursday
Definition: The fifth day of the week, following Wednesday and preceding Friday.

Name: Thus
Definition: The commoner kind of frankincense, or that obtained from the Norway spruce, the long-leaved pine, and other conifers.

Name: Ticket
