Definition: A small piece of paper, cardboard, or the like, serving as a notice, certificate, or distinguishing token of something.

Name: Tide
Definition: Time; period; season.

Name: Tier
Definition: One who, or that which, ties.

Name: Tiffany
Definition: A species of gause, or very silk.

Name: Tiger
Definition: A very large and powerful carnivore (Felis tigris) native of Southern Asia and the East Indies. Its back and sides are tawny or rufous yellow, transversely striped with black, the tail is ringed with black, the throat and belly are nearly white. When full grown, it equals or exceeds the lion in size and strength. Called also royal tiger, and Bengal tiger.

Name: Tight
Definition: p. p. of Tie.

Name: Tile
Definition: To protect from the intrusion of the uninitiated; as, to tile a Masonic lodge.

Name: Till
Definition: A vetch; a tare.

Name: Timber
Definition: A certain quantity of fur skins, as of martens, ermines, sables, etc., packed between boards; being in some cases forty skins, in others one hundred and twenty; -- called also timmer.

Name: Time
Definition: Duration, considered independently of any system of measurement or any employment of terms which designate limited portions thereof.

Name: Timely
Definition: Being or occurring in good time; sufficiently early; seasonable.

Name: Timer
Definition: A timekeeper; especially, a watch by which small intervals of time can be measured; a kind of stop watch. It is used for timing the speed of horses, machinery, etc.

Name: Timothy
Definition: Alt. of Timothy grass

Name: Tiny
Definition: Very small; little; puny.

Name: Tire
Definition: A tier, row, or rank. See Tier.

Name: Tired
Definition: Weary; fatigued; exhausted.

Name: Tissue
Definition: A woven fabric.

Name: Titanium
Definition: An elementary substance found combined in the minerals manaccanite, rutile, sphene, etc., and isolated as an infusible iron-gray amorphous powder, having a metallic luster. It burns when heated in the air. Symbol Ti. Atomic weight 48.1.

Name: Title
Definition: An inscription put over or upon anything as a name by which it is known.

Name: Titled
Definition: Having or bearing a title.

Name: Tobacco
Definition: An American plant (Nicotiana Tabacum) of the Nightshade family, much used for smoking and chewing, and as snuff. As a medicine, it is narcotic, emetic, and cathartic. Tobacco has a strong, peculiar smell, and an acrid taste.

Name: Toddler
Definition: One who toddles; especially, a young child.

Name: Together
Definition: In company or association with respect to place or time; as, to live together in one house; to live together in the same age; they walked together to the town.

Name: Toilet
Definition: A covering of linen, silk, or tapestry, spread over a table in a chamber or a dressing room.

Name: Token
Definition: Something intended or supposed to represent or indicate another thing or an event; a sign; a symbol; as, the rainbow is a token of God's covenant established with Noah.

Name: Told
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Tell.

Name: Tolerance
Definition: The power or capacity of enduring; the act of enduring; endurance.

Name: Toll
Definition: To take away; to vacate; to annul.

Name: Tomato
Definition: The fruit of a plant of the Nightshade family (Lycopersicum esculentun); also, the plant itself. The fruit, which is called also love apple, is usually of a rounded, flattened form, but often irregular in shape. It is of a bright red or yellow color, and is eaten either cooked or uncooked.

Name: Tommy
Definition: Bread, -- generally a penny roll; the supply of food carried by workmen as their daily allowance.

Name: Tomorrow
Definition: On the day after the present day; on the next day; on the morrow.

Name: Tone
Definition: Sound, or the character of a sound, or a sound considered as of this or that character; as, a low, high, loud, grave, acute, sweet, or harsh tone.

Name: Tongue
Definition: an organ situated in the floor of the mouth of most vertebrates and connected with the hyoid arch.

Name: Tonight
Definition: On this present or coming night.

Name: Tony
Definition: A simpleton.

Name: Took
Definition: imp. of Take.

Name: Tool
Definition: An instrument such as a hammer, saw, plane, file, and the like, used in the manual arts, to facilitate mechanical operations; any instrument used by a craftsman or laborer at his work; an implement; as, the tools of a joiner, smith, shoe-maker, etc.; also, a cutter, chisel, or other part of an instrument or machine that dresses work.

Name: Tooth
Definition: One of the hard, bony appendages which are borne on the jaws, or on other bones in the walls of the mouth or pharynx of most vertebrates, and which usually aid in the prehension and mastication of food.

Name: Topic
Definition: One of the various general forms of argument employed in probable as distinguished from demonstrative reasoning, -- denominated by Aristotle to`poi (literally, places), as being the places or sources from which arguments may be derived, or to which they may be referred; also, a prepared form of argument, applicable to a great variety of cases, with a supply of which the ancient rhetoricians and orators provided themselves; a commonplace of argument or oratory.

Name: Torture
Definition: Extreme pain; anguish of body or mind; pang; agony; torment; as, torture of mind.

Name: Total
Definition: Whole; not divided; entire; full; complete; absolute; as, a total departure from the evidence; a total loss.

Name: Totally
Definition: In a total manner; wholly; entirely.

Name: Touch
Definition: To come in contact with; to hit or strike lightly against; to extend the hand, foot, or the like, so as to reach or rest on.

Name: Tough
Definition: Having the quality of flexibility without brittleness; yielding to force without breaking; capable of resisting great strain; as, the ligaments of animals are remarkably tough.

Name: Tour
Definition: A tower.

Name: Tourist
Definition: One who makes a tour, or performs a journey in a circuit.

Name: Tournament
Definition: A mock fight, or warlike game, formerly in great favor, in which a number of combatants were engaged, as an exhibition of their address and bravery; hence, figuratively, a real battle.

Name: Toward
Definition: Alt. of Towards

Name: Towards
Definition: In the direction of; to.

Name: Toward
Definition: Alt. of Towards

Name: Towards
Definition: Near; at hand; in state of preparation.

Name: Toward
Definition: Approaching; coming near.

Name: Tower
Definition: A mass of building standing alone and insulated, usually higher than its diameter, but when of great size not always of that proportion.

Name: Town
Definition: Formerly: (a) An inclosure which surrounded the mere homestead or dwelling of the lord of the manor. [Obs.] (b) The whole of the land which constituted the domain. [Obs.] (c) A collection of houses inclosed by fences or walls.

Name: Township
Definition: The district or territory of a town.

Name: Toxic
Definition: Alt. of Toxical

Name: Trace
Definition: One of two straps, chains, or ropes of a harness, extending from the collar or breastplate to a whiffletree attached to a vehicle or thing to be drawn; a tug.

Name: Track
Definition: A mark left by something that has passed along; as, the track, or wake, of a ship; the track of a meteor; the track of a sled or a wheel.

Name: Tracker
Definition: One who, or that which, tracks or pursues, as a man or dog that follows game.

Name: Tract
Definition: A written discourse or dissertation, generally of short extent; a short treatise, especially on practical religion.

Name: Tractor
Definition: That which draws, or is used for drawing.

Name: Trade
Definition: A track; a trail; a way; a path; also, passage; travel; resort.

Name: Trader
Definition: One engaged in trade or commerce; one who makes a business of buying and selling or of barter; a merchant; a trafficker; as, a trader to the East Indies; a country trader.

Name: Trading
Definition: Carrying on trade or commerce; engaged in trade; as, a trading company.

Name: Tradition
Definition: The act of delivering into the hands of another; delivery.

Name: Traditional
Definition: Of or pertaining to tradition; derived from tradition; communicated from ancestors to descendants by word only; transmitted from age to age without writing; as, traditional opinions; traditional customs; traditional expositions of the Scriptures.

Name: Traffic
Definition: To pass goods and commodities from one person to another for an equivalent in goods or money; to buy or sell goods; to barter; to trade.

Name: Tragedy
Definition: A dramatic poem, composed in elevated style, representing a signal action performed by some person or persons, and having a fatal issue; that species of drama which represents the sad or terrible phases of character and life.

Name: Trail
Definition: To hunt by the track; to track.

Name: Trailer
Definition: One who, or that which, trails.

Name: Train
Definition: To draw along; to trail; to drag.

Name: Trainer
Definition: One who trains; an instructor; especially, one who trains or prepares men, horses, etc., for exercises requiring physical agility and strength.

Name: Training
Definition: The act of one who trains; the act or process of exercising, disciplining, etc.; education.

Name: Trance
Definition: A tedious journey.

Name: Transaction
Definition: The doing or performing of any business; management of any affair; performance.

Name: Transcript
Definition: That which has been transcribed; a writing or composition consisting of the same words as the original; a written copy.

Name: Transcription
Definition: The act or process of transcribing, or copying; as, corruptions creep into books by repeated transcriptions.

Name: Transfer
Definition: To convey from one place or person another; to transport, remove, or cause to pass, to another place or person; as, to transfer the laws of one country to another; to transfer suspicion.

Name: Transform
Definition: To change the form of; to change in shape or appearance; to metamorphose; as, a caterpillar is ultimately transformed into a butterfly.

Name: Transformation
Definition: The act of transforming, or the state of being transformed; change of form or condition.

Name: Transit
Definition: The act of passing; passage through or over.

Name: Transition
Definition: Passage from one place or state to another; charge; as, the transition of the weather from hot to cold.

Name: Translate
Definition: To bear, carry, or remove, from one place to another; to transfer; as, to translate a tree.

Name: Translation
Definition: The act of translating, removing, or transferring; removal; also, the state of being translated or removed; as, the translation of Enoch; the translation of a bishop.

Name: Translator
Definition: One who translates; esp., one who renders into another language; one who expresses the sense of words in one language by equivalent words in another.

Name: Transmission
Definition: The act of transmitting, or the state of being transmitted; as, the transmission of letters, writings, papers, news, and the like, from one country to another; the transmission of rights, titles, or privileges, from father to son, or from one generation to another.

Name: Transmit
Definition: To cause to pass over or through; to communicate by sending; to send from one person or place to another; to pass on or down as by inheritance; as, to transmit a memorial; to transmit dispatches; to transmit money, or bills of exchange, from one country to another.

Name: Transparency
Definition: The quality or condition of being transparent; transparence.

Name: Transparent
Definition: Having the property of transmitting rays of light, so that bodies can be distinctly seen through; pervious to light; diaphanous; pellucid; as, transparent glass; a transparent diamond; -- opposed to opaque.

Name: Transport
Definition: To carry or bear from one place to another; to remove; to convey; as, to transport goods; to transport troops.

Name: Transportation
Definition: The act of transporting, or the state of being transported; carriage from one place to another; removal; conveyance.

Name: Trap
Definition: To dress with ornaments; to adorn; -- said especially of horses.

Name: Trash
Definition: That which is worthless or useless; rubbish; refuse.

Name: Travel
Definition: To labor; to travail.

Name: Traveler
Definition: One who travels; one who has traveled much.

Name: Tray
Definition: To betray; to deceive.

Name: Treasure
Definition: Wealth accumulated; especially, a stock, or store of money in reserve.

Name: Treasurer
Definition: One who has the care of a treasure or treasure or treasury; an officer who receives the public money arising from taxes and duties, or other sources of revenue, takes charge of the same, and disburses it upon orders made by the proper authority; one who has charge of collected funds; as, the treasurer of a society or corporation.

Name: Treasury
Definition: A place or building in which stores of wealth are deposited; especially, a place where public revenues are deposited and kept, and where money is disbursed to defray the expenses of government; hence, also, the place of deposit and disbursement of any collected funds.

Name: Treat
Definition: To handle; to manage; to use; to bear one's self toward; as, to treat prisoners cruelly; to treat children kindly.

Name: Treatment
Definition: The act or manner of treating; management; manipulation; handling; usage; as, unkind treatment; medical treatment.

Name: Treaty
Definition: The act of treating for the adjustment of differences, as for forming an agreement; negotiation.

Name: Tree
Definition: Any perennial woody plant of considerable size (usually over twenty feet high) and growing with a single trunk.

Name: Tremendous
Definition: Fitted to excite fear or terror; such as may astonish or terrify by its magnitude, force, or violence; terrible; dreadful; as, a tremendous wind; a tremendous shower; a tremendous shock or fall.

Name: Trend
Definition: To have a particular direction; to run; to stretch; to tend; as, the shore of the sea trends to the southwest.

Name: Trial
Definition: The act of trying or testing in any manner.

Name: Triangle
Definition: A figure bounded by three lines, and containing three angles.

Name: Tribal
Definition: Of or pertaining to a tribe or tribes; as, a tribal scepter.

Name: Tribe
Definition: A family, race, or series of generations, descending from the same progenitor, and kept distinct, as in the case of the twelve tribes of Israel, descended from the twelve sons of Jacob.

Name: Tribunal
Definition: The seat of a judge; the bench on which a judge and his associates sit for administering justice.

Name: Tribune
Definition: An officer or magistrate chosen by the people, to protect them from the oppression of the patricians, or nobles, and to defend their liberties against any attempts that might be made upon them by the senate and consuls.

Name: Tribute
Definition: An annual or stated sum of money or other valuable thing, paid by one ruler or nation to another, either as an acknowledgment of submission, or as the price of peace and protection, or by virtue of some treaty; as, the Romans made their conquered countries pay tribute.

Name: Trick
Definition: An artifice or stratagem; a cunning contrivance; a sly procedure, usually with a dishonest intent; as, a trick in trade.

Name: Tried
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Try.

Name: Trigger
Definition: A catch to hold the wheel of a carriage on a declivity.

Name: Trim
Definition: To make trim; to put in due order for any purpose; to make right, neat, or pleasing; to adjust.

Name: Trinity
Definition: The union of three persons (the Father, the Son, and the Holy Ghost) in one Godhead, so that all the three are one God as to substance, but three persons as to individuality.

Name: Trio
Definition: Three, considered collectively; three in company or acting together; a set of three; three united.

Name: Trip
Definition: To move with light, quick steps; to walk or move lightly; to skip; to move the feet nimbly; -- sometimes followed by it. See It, 5.

Name: Triple
Definition: Consisting of three united; multiplied by three; threefold; as, a triple knot; a triple tie.

Name: Triumph
Definition: A magnificent and imposing ceremonial performed in honor of a general who had gained a decisive victory over a foreign enemy.

Name: Tropical
Definition: Of or pertaining to the tropics; characteristic of, or incident to, the tropics; being within the tropics; as, tropical climate; tropical latitudes; tropical heat; tropical diseases.

Name: Trouble
Definition: To put into confused motion; to disturb; to agitate.

Name: Trout
Definition: Any one of numerous species of fishes belonging to Salmo, Salvelinus, and allied genera of the family Salmonidae. They are highly esteemed as game fishes and for the quality of their flesh. All the species breed in fresh water, but after spawning many of them descend to the sea if they have an opportunity.

Name: Troy
Definition: Troy weight.

Name: Truck
Definition: A small wheel, as of a vehicle; specifically (Ord.), a small strong wheel, as of wood or iron, for a gun carriage.

Name: True
Definition: Conformable to fact; in accordance with the actual state of things; correct; not false, erroneous, inaccurate, or the like; as, a true relation or narration; a true history; a declaration is true when it states the facts.

Name: Truly
Definition: In a true manner; according to truth; in agreement with fact; as, to state things truly; the facts are truly represented.

Name: Trunk
Definition: The stem, or body, of a tree, apart from its limbs and roots; the main stem, without the branches; stock; stalk.

Name: Trust
Definition: Assured resting of the mind on the integrity, veracity, justice, friendship, or other sound principle, of another person; confidence; reliance; reliance.

Name: Trustee
Definition: A person to whom property is legally committed in trust, to be applied either for the benefit of specified individuals, or for public uses; one who is intrusted with property for the benefit of another; also, a person in whose hands the effects of another are attached in a trustee process.

Name: Truth
Definition: The quality or being true; as: -- (a) Conformity to fact or reality; exact accordance with that which is, or has been; or shall be.

Name: Trying
Definition: Adapted to try, or put to severe trial; severe; afflictive; as, a trying occasion or position.

Name: Tube
Definition: A hollow cylinder, of any material, used for the conveyance of fluids, and for various other purposes; a pipe.

Name: Tuesday
Definition: The third day of the week, following Monday and preceding Wednesday.

Name: Tuition
Definition: Superintending care over a young person; the particular watch and care of a tutor or guardian over his pupil or ward; guardianship.

Name: Tumor
Definition: A morbid swelling, prominence, or growth, on any part of the body; especially, a growth produced by deposition of new tissue; a neoplasm.

Name: Tune
Definition: A sound; a note; a tone.

Name: Tuner
Definition: One who tunes; especially, one whose occupation is to tune musical instruments.

Name: Tuning
Definition: a. & n. from Tune, v.

Name: Tunnel
Definition: A vessel with a broad mouth at one end, a pipe or tube at the other, for conveying liquor, fluids, etc., into casks, bottles, or other vessels; a funnel.

Name: Turbo
Definition: Any one of numerous marine gastropods of the genus Turbo or family Turbinidae, usually having a turbinate shell, pearly on the inside, and a calcareous operculum.

Name: Turkey
Definition: An empire in the southeast of Europe and southwest of Asia.

Name: Turkish
Definition: Of or pertaining to Turkey or the Turks.

Name: Turn
Definition: To cause to move upon a center, or as if upon a center; to give circular motion to; to cause to revolve; to cause to move round, either partially, wholly, or repeatedly; to make to change position so as to present other sides in given directions; to make to face otherwise; as, to turn a wheel or a spindle; to turn the body or the head.

Name: Turner
Definition: One who turns; especially, one whose occupation is to form articles with a lathe.

Name: Turning
Definition: The act of one who, or that which, turns; also, a winding; a bending course; a fiexure; a meander.

Name: Turtle
Definition: The turtledove.

Name: Tutorial
Definition: Of or pertaining to a tutor; belonging to, or exercised by, a tutor.

Name: Twelve
Definition: One more that eleven; two and ten; twice six; a dozen.

Name: Twenty
Definition: One more that nineteen; twice; as, twenty men.

Name: Twice
Definition: Two times; once and again.

Name: Twin
Definition: Being one of two born at a birth; as, a twin brother or sister.

Name: Twist
Definition: To contort; to writhe; to complicate; to crook spirally; to convolve.

Name: Twisted
Definition: Contorted; crooked spirally; subjected to torsion; hence, perverted.

Name: Type
Definition: The mark or impression of something; stamp; impressed sign; emblem.

Name: Typical
Definition: Of the nature of a type; representing something by a form, model, or resemblance; emblematic; prefigurative.

Name: Ugly
Definition: Offensive to the sight; contrary to beauty; being of disagreeable or loathsome aspect; unsightly; repulsive; deformed.

Name: Ultimate
Definition: Farthest; most remote in space or time; extreme; last; final.

Name: Ultimately
Definition: As a final consequence; at last; in the end; as, afflictions often tend to correct immoral habits, and ultimately prove blessings.

Name: Ultra
Definition: Going beyond others, or beyond due limit; extreme; fanatical; uncompromising; as, an ultra reformer; ultra measures.

Name: Unable
Definition: Not able; not having sufficient strength, means, knowledge, skill, or the like; impotent' weak; helpless; incapable; -- now usually followed by an infinitive or an adverbial phrase; as, unable for work; unable to bear fatigue.

Name: Uncertainty
Definition: The quality or state of being uncertain.

Name: Uncle
Definition: The brother of one's father or mother; also applied to an aunt's husband; -- the correlative of aunt in sex, and of nephew and niece in relationship.

Name: Under
Definition: Below or lower, in place or position, with the idea of being covered; lower than; beneath; -- opposed to over; as, he stood under a tree; the carriage is under cover; a cellar extends under the whole house.

Name: Undergraduate
Definition: A member of a university or a college who has not taken his first degree; a student in any school who has not completed his course.

Name: Underground
Definition: The place or space beneath the surface of the ground; subterranean space.

Name: Underlying
Definition: Lying under or beneath; hence, fundamental; as, the underlying strata of a locality; underlying principles.

Name: Understand
Definition: To have just and adequate ideas of; to apprehended the meaning or intention of; to have knowledge of; to comprehend; to know; as, to understand a problem in Euclid; to understand a proposition or a declaration; the court understands the advocate or his argument; to understand the sacred oracles; to understand a nod or a wink.

Name: Understanding
Definition: Knowing; intelligent; skillful; as, he is an understanding man.

Name: Understood
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Understand.

Name: Undertake
Definition: To take upon one's self; to engage in; to enter upon; to take in hand; to begin to perform; to set about; to attempt.

Name: Underwear
Definition: That which is worn under the outside clothing; underclothes.

Name: Undo
Definition: To reverse, as what has been done; to annul; to bring to naught.

Name: Unexpected
Definition: Not expected; coming without warning; sudden.

Name: Uniform
Definition: Having always the same form, manner, or degree; not varying or variable; unchanging; consistent; equable; homogenous; as, the dress of the Asiatics has been uniform from early ages; the temperature is uniform; a stratum of uniform clay.

Name: Union
Definition: The act of uniting or joining two or more things into one, or the state of being united or joined; junction; coalition; combination.

Name: Unique
Definition: Being without a like or equal; unmatched; unequaled; unparalleled; single in kind or excellence; sole.

Name: Unit
Definition: A single thing or person.

Name: United
Definition: Combined; joined; made one.

Name: Unity
Definition: The state of being one; oneness.

Name: Universal
Definition: Of or pertaining to the universe; extending to, including, or affecting, the whole number, quantity, or space; unlimited; general; all-reaching; all-pervading; as, universal ruin; universal good; universal benevolence or benefice.

Name: Universe
Definition: All created things viewed as constituting one system or whole; the whole body of things, or of phenomena; the / / of the Greeks, the mundus of the Latins; the world; creation.

Name: University
Definition: The universe; the whole.

Name: Unknown
Definition: Not known; not apprehended.

Name: Unless
Definition: Upon any less condition than (the fact or thing stated in the sentence or clause which follows); if not; supposing that not; if it be not; were it not that; except; as, we shall fail unless we are industrious.

Name: Unlike
Definition: Not like; dissimilar; diverse; having no resemblance; as, the cases are unlike.

Name: Unlikely
Definition: Not likely; improbable; not to be reasonably expected; as, an unlikely event; the thing you mention is very unlikely.

Name: Unlimited
Definition: Not limited; having no bounds; boundless; as, an unlimited expanse of ocean.

Name: Unlock
Definition: To unfasten, as what is locked; as, to unlock a door or a chest.

Name: Until
Definition: To; unto; towards; -- used of material objects.

Name: Untitled
Definition: Not titled; having no title, or appellation of dignity or distinction.

Name: Unto
Definition: To; -- now used only in antiquated, formal, or scriptural style. See To.

Name: Unusual
Definition: Not usual; uncommon; rare; as, an unusual season; a person of unusual grace or erudition.

Name: Unwrap
Definition: To open or undo, as what is wrapped or folded.

Name: Upon
Definition: On; -- used in all the senses of that word, with which it is interchangeable.

Name: Upper
Definition: Being further up, literally or figuratively; higher in place, position, rank, dignity, or the like; superior; as, the upper lip; the upper side of a thing; the upper house of a legislature.

Name: Upset
Definition: To set up; to put upright.

Name: Urban
Definition: Of or belonging to a city or town; as, an urban population.

Name: Urge
Definition: To press; to push; to drive; to impel; to force onward.

Name: Urgent
Definition: Urging; pressing; besetting; plying, with importunity; calling for immediate attention; instantly important.

Name: Usage
Definition: The act of using; mode of using or treating; treatment; conduct with respect to a person or a thing; as, good usage; ill usage; hard usage.

Name: Useful
Definition: Full of use, advantage, or profit; producing, or having power to produce, good; serviceable for any end or object; helpful toward advancing any purpose; beneficial; profitable; advantageous; as, vessels and instruments useful in a family; books useful for improvement; useful knowledge; useful arts.

Name: User
Definition: One who uses.

Name: Usual
Definition: Such as is in common use; such as occurs in ordinary practice, or in the ordinary course of events; customary; ordinary; habitual; common.

Name: Utility
Definition: The quality or state of being useful; usefulness; production of good; profitableness to some valuable end; as, the utility of manure upon land; the utility of the sciences; the utility of medicines.

Name: Utilization
Definition: The act of utilizing, or the state of being utilized.

Name: Utilize
Definition: To make useful; to turn to profitable account or use; to make use of; as, to utilize the whole power of a machine; to utilize one's opportunities.

Name: Vacation
Definition: The act of vacating; a making void or of no force; as, the vacation of an office or a charter.

Name: Vaccine
Definition: Of or pertaining to cows; pertaining to, derived from, or caused by, vaccinia; as, vaccine virus; the vaccine disease.

Name: Vacuum
Definition: A space entirely devoid of matter (called also, by way of distinction, absolute vacuum); hence, in a more general sense, a space, as the interior of a closed vessel, which has been exhausted to a high or the highest degree by an air pump or other artificial means; as, water boils at a reduced temperature in a vacuum.

Name: Valentine
Definition: A sweetheart chosen on St. Valentine's Day.

Name: Valid
Definition: Strong; powerful; efficient.

Name: Validation
Definition: The act of giving validity.

Name: Validity
Definition: The quality or state of being valid; strength; force; especially, power to convince; justness; soundness; as, the validity of an argument or proof; the validity of an objection.

Name: Valley
Definition: The space inclosed between ranges of hills or mountains; the strip of land at the bottom of the depressions intersecting a country, including usually the bed of a stream, with frequently broad alluvial plains on one or both sides of the stream. Also used figuratively.

Name: Valuable
Definition: Having value or worth; possessing qualities which are useful and esteemed; precious; costly; as, a valuable horse; valuable land; a valuable cargo.

Name: Valuation
Definition: The act of valuing, or of estimating value or worth; the act of setting a price; estimation; appraisement; as, a valuation of lands for the purpose of taxation.

Name: Value
Definition: The property or aggregate properties of a thing by which it is rendered useful or desirable, or the degree of such property or sum of properties; worth; excellence; utility; importance.

Name: Valued
Definition: Highly regarded; esteemed; prized; as, a valued contributor; a valued friend.

Name: Valve
Definition: A door; especially, one of a pair of folding doors, or one of the leaves of such a door.

Name: Vampire
Definition: A blood-sucking ghost; a soul of a dead person superstitiously believed to come from the grave and wander about by night sucking the blood of persons asleep, thus causing their death. This superstition is now prevalent in parts of Eastern Europe, and was especially current in Hungary about the year 1730.

Name: Vanilla
Definition: A genus of climbing orchidaceous plants, natives of tropical America.

Name: Variable
Definition: Having the capacity of varying or changing; capable of alternation in any manner; changeable; as, variable winds or seasons; a variable quantity.

Name: Variance
Definition: The quality or state of being variant; change of condition; variation.

Name: Variation
Definition: The act of varying; a partial change in the form, position, state, or qualities of a thing; modification; alternation; mutation; diversity; deviation; as, a variation of color in different lights; a variation in size; variation of language.

Name: Varied
Definition: Changed; altered; various; diversified; as, a varied experience; varied interests; varied scenery.

Name: Variety
Definition: The quality or state of being various; intermixture or succession of different things; diversity; multifariousness.

Name: Various
Definition: Different; diverse; several; manifold; as, men of various names; various occupations; various colors.

Name: Vary
Definition: To change the aspect of; to alter in form, appearance, substance, position, or the like; to make different by a partial change; to modify; as, to vary the properties, proportions, or nature of a thing; to vary a posture or an attitude; to vary one's dress or opinions.

Name: Varying
Definition: a. & n. from Vary.

Name: Vast
Definition: Waste; desert; desolate; lonely.

Name: Vatican
Definition: A magnificent assemblage of buildings at Rome, near the church of St. Peter, including the pope's palace, a museum, a library, a famous chapel, etc.

Name: Vault
Definition: An arched structure of masonry, forming a ceiling or canopy.

Name: Vector
Definition: Same as Radius vector.

Name: Vegetable
Definition: Of or pertaining to plants; having the nature of, or produced by, plants; as, a vegetable nature; vegetable growths, juices, etc.

Name: Vegetarian
Definition: One who holds that vegetables and fruits are the only proper food for man.  Strict vegetarians eat no meat, eggs, or milk.

Name: Vegetation
Definition: The act or process of vegetating, or growing as a plant does; vegetable growth.

Name: Vehicle
Definition: That in or on which any person or thing is, or may be, carried, as a coach, carriage, wagon, cart, car, sleigh, bicycle, etc.; a means of conveyance; specifically, a means of conveyance upon land.

Name: Velocity
Definition: Quickness of motion; swiftness; speed; celerity; rapidity; as, the velocity of wind; the velocity of a planet or comet in its orbit or course; the velocity of a cannon ball; the velocity of light.

Name: Velvet
Definition: A silk fabric, having a short, close nap of erect threads. Inferior qualities are made with a silk pile on a cotton or linen back.

Name: Vendor
Definition: A vender; a seller; the correlative of vendee.

Name: Venture
Definition: An undertaking of chance or danger; the risking of something upon an event which can not be foreseen with certainty; a hazard; a risk; a speculation.

Name: Venue
Definition: A neighborhood or near place; the place or county in which anything is alleged to have happened; also, the place where an action is laid.

Name: Verbal
Definition: Expressed in words, whether spoken or written, but commonly in spoken words; hence, spoken; oral; not written; as, a verbal contract; verbal testimony.

Name: Verify
Definition: To make into a verb; to use as a verb; to verbalize.

Name: Verify
Definition: To prove to be true or correct; to establish the truth of; to confirm; to substantiate.

Name: Verse
Definition: A line consisting of a certain number of metrical feet (see Foot, n., 9) disposed according to metrical rules.

Name: Version
Definition: A change of form, direction, or the like; transformation; conversion; turning.

Name: Versus
Definition: Against; as, John Doe versus Richard Roe; -- chiefly used in legal language, and abbreviated to v. or vs.

Name: Vertex
Definition: A turning point; the principal or highest point; top; summit; crown; apex.

Name: Vertical
Definition: Of or pertaining to the vertex; situated at the vertex, or highest point; directly overhead, or in the zenith; perpendicularly above one.

Name: Very
Definition: True; real; actual; veritable.

Name: Vessel
Definition: A hollow or concave utensil for holding anything; a hollow receptacle of any kind, as a hogshead, a barrel, a firkin, a bottle, a kettle, a cup, a bowl, etc.

Name: Veteran
Definition: Long exercised in anything, especially in military life and the duties of a soldier; long practiced or experienced; as, a veteran officer or soldier; veteran skill.

Name: Veterinary
Definition: Of or pertaining to the art of healing or treating the diseases of domestic animals, as oxen, horses, sheep, etc.; as, a veterinary writer or school.

Name: Vice
Definition: A defect; a fault; an error; a blemish; an imperfection; as, the vices of a political constitution; the vices of a horse.

Name: Victim
Definition: A living being sacrificed to some deity, or in the performance of a religious rite; a creature immolated, or made an offering of.

Name: Victor
Definition: The winner in a contest; one who gets the better of another in any struggle; esp., one who defeats an enemy in battle; a vanquisher; a conqueror; -- often followed by art, rarely by of.

Name: Victoria
Definition: A genus of aquatic plants named in honor of Queen Victoria.  The Victoria regia is a native of Guiana and Brazil. Its large, spreading leaves are often over five feet in diameter, and have a rim from three to five inches high; its immense rose-white flowers sometimes attain a diameter of nearly two feet.

Name: Victorian
Definition: Of or pertaining to the reign of Queen Victoria of England; as, the Victorian poets.

Name: Victory
Definition: The defeat of an enemy in battle, or of an antagonist in any contest; a gaining of the superiority in any struggle or competition; conquest; triumph; -- the opposite of defeat.

Name: View
Definition: The act of seeing or beholding; sight; look; survey; examination by the eye; inspection.

Name: Viewer
Definition: One who views or examines.

Name: Viking
Definition: One belonging to the pirate crews from among the Northmen, who plundered the coasts of Europe in the eighth, ninth, and tenth centuries.

Name: Villa
Definition: A country seat; a country or suburban residence of some pretensions to elegance.

Name: Village
Definition: A small assemblage of houses in the country, less than a town or city.

Name: Vintage
Definition: The produce of the vine for one season, in grapes or in wine; as, the vintage is abundant; the vintage of 1840.

Name: Vinyl
Definition: The hypothetical radical C2H3, regarded as the characteristic residue of ethylene and that related series of unsaturated hydrocarbons with which the allyl compounds are homologous.

Name: Violation
Definition: The act of violating, treating with violence, or injuring; the state of being violated.

Name: Violence
Definition: The quality or state of being violent; highly excited action, whether physical or moral; vehemence; impetuosity; force.

Name: Violent
Definition: Moving or acting with physical strength; urged or impelled with force; excited by strong feeling or passion; forcible; vehement; impetuous; fierce; furious; severe; as, a violent blow; the violent attack of a disease.

Name: Violin
Definition: A small instrument with four strings, played with a bow; a fiddle.

Name: Virgin
Definition: A woman who has had no carnal knowledge of man; a maid.

Name: Virginia
Definition: One of the States of the United States of America.

Name: Virtual
Definition: Having the power of acting or of invisible efficacy without the agency of the material or sensible part; potential; energizing.

Name: Virtually
Definition: In a virtual manner; in efficacy or effect only, and not actually; to all intents and purposes; practically.

Name: Virtue
Definition: Manly strength or courage; bravery; daring; spirit; valor.

Name: Virus
Definition: Contagious or poisonous matter, as of specific ulcers, the bite of snakes, etc.; -- applied to organic poisons.

Name: Visa
Definition: To indorse, after examination, with the word vise, as a passport; to vise.

Name: Visibility
Definition: The quality or state of being visible.

Name: Visible
Definition: Perceivable by the eye; capable of being seen; perceptible; in view; as, a visible star; the least spot is visible on white paper.

Name: Vision
Definition: The act of seeing external objects; actual sight.

Name: Visit
Definition: To go or come to see, as for the purpose of friendship, business, curiosity, etc.; to attend; to call upon; as, the physician visits his patient.

Name: Visiting
Definition: a. & vb. n. from Visit.

Name: Visitor
Definition: One who visits; one who comes or goes to see another, as in civility or friendship.

Name: Vista
Definition: A view; especially, a view through or between intervening objects, as trees; a view or prospect through an avenue, or the like; hence, the trees or other objects that form the avenue.

Name: Visual
Definition: Of or pertaining to sight; used in sight; serving as the instrument of seeing; as, the visual nerve.

Name: Vital
Definition: Belonging or relating to life, either animal or vegetable; as, vital energies; vital functions; vital actions.

Name: Vocabulary
Definition: A list or collection of words arranged in alphabetical order and explained; a dictionary or lexicon, either of a whole language, a single work or author, a branch of science, or the like; a word-book.

Name: Vocal
Definition: Of or pertaining to the voice or speech; having voice; endowed with utterance; full of voice, or voices.

Name: Voice
Definition: Sound uttered by the mouth, especially that uttered by human beings in speech or song; sound thus uttered considered as possessing some special quality or character; as, the human voice; a pleasant voice; a low voice.

Name: Void
Definition: Containing nothing; empty; vacant; not occupied; not filled.

Name: Volt
Definition: A circular tread; a gait by which a horse going sideways round a center makes two concentric tracks.

Name: Voltage
Definition: Electric potential or potential difference, expressed in volts.

Name: Volume
Definition: A roll; a scroll; a written document rolled up for keeping or for use, after the manner of the ancients.

Name: Voluntary
Definition: Proceeding from the will; produced in or by an act of choice.

Name: Volunteer
Definition: One who enters into, or offers for, any service of his own free will.

Name: Vote
Definition: An ardent wish or desire; a vow; a prayer.

Name: Voting
Definition: a. & n. from Vote, v.

Name: Vulnerability
Definition: The quality or state of being vulnerable; vulnerableness.

Name: Vulnerable
Definition: Capable of being wounded; susceptible of wounds or external injuries; as, a vulnerable body.

Name: Wage
Definition: To pledge; to hazard on the event of a contest; to stake; to bet, to lay; to wager; as, to wage a dollar.

Name: Wages
Definition: A compensation given to a hired person for services; price paid for labor; recompense; hire.  See Wage, n., 2.

Name: Wagon
Definition: A wheeled carriage; a vehicle on four wheels, and usually drawn by horses; especially, one used for carrying freight or merchandise.

Name: Wait
Definition: To watch; to observe; to take notice.

Name: Waiting
Definition: a. & n. from Wait, v.

Name: Waiver
Definition: The act of waiving, or not insisting on, some right, claim, or privilege.

Name: Wake
Definition: The track left by a vessel in the water; by extension, any track; as, the wake of an army.

Name: Walk
Definition: To move along on foot; to advance by steps; to go on at a moderate pace; specifically, of two-legged creatures, to proceed at a slower or faster rate, but without running, or lifting one foot entirely before the other touches the ground.

Name: Walker
Definition: One who walks; a pedestrian.

Name: Walking
Definition: a. & n. from Walk, v.

Name: Wall
Definition: A kind of knot often used at the end of a rope; a wall knot; a wale.

Name: Wallet
Definition: A bag or sack for carrying about the person, as a bag for carrying the necessaries for a journey; a knapsack; a beggar's receptacle for charity; a peddler's pack.

Name: Walnut
Definition: The fruit or nut of any tree of the genus Juglans; also, the tree, and its timber. The seven or eight known species are all natives of the north temperate zone.

Name: Walter
Definition: To roll or wallow; to welter.

Name: Want
Definition: The state of not having; the condition of being without anything; absence or scarcity of what is needed or desired; deficiency; lack; as, a want of power or knowledge for any purpose; want of food and clothing.

Name: Wanting
Definition: Absent; lacking; missing; also, deficient; destitute; needy; as, one of the twelve is wanting; I shall not be wanting in exertion.

Name: Ward
Definition: The act of guarding; watch; guard; guardianship; specifically, a guarding during the day.  See the Note under Watch, n., 1.

Name: Ware
Definition: Wore.

Name: Warehouse
Definition: A storehouse for wares, or goods.

Name: Warm
Definition: Having heat in a moderate degree; not cold as, warm milk.

Name: Warming
Definition: a. & n. from Warm, v.

Name: Warner
Definition: One who warns; an admonisher.

Name: Warning
Definition: Giving previous notice; cautioning; admonishing; as, a warning voice.

Name: Warrant
Definition: That which warrants or authorizes; a commission giving authority, or justifying the doing of anything; an act, instrument, or obligation, by which one person authorizes another to do something which he has not otherwise a right to do; an act or instrument investing one with a right or authority, and thus securing him from loss or damage; commission; authority.

Name: Warranty
Definition: A covenant real, whereby the grantor of an estate of freehold and his heirs were bound to warrant and defend the title, and, in case of eviction by title paramount, to yield other lands of equal value in recompense. This warranty has long singe become obsolete, and its place supplied by personal covenants for title. Among these is the covenant of warranty, which runs with the land, and is in the nature of a real covenant.

Name: Warren
Definition: A place privileged, by prescription or grant the king, for keeping certain animals (as hares, conies, partridges, pheasants, etc.) called beasts and fowls of warren.

Name: Warrior
Definition: A man engaged or experienced in war, or in the military life; a soldier; a champion.

Name: Wash
Definition: To cleanse by ablution, or dipping or rubbing in water; to apply water or other liquid to for the purpose of cleansing; to scrub with water, etc., or as with water; as, to wash the hands or body; to wash garments; to wash sheep or wool; to wash the pavement or floor; to wash the bark of trees.

Name: Washer
Definition: One who, or that which, washes.

Name: Washing
Definition: The act of one who washes; the act of cleansing with water; ablution.

Name: Waste
Definition: Desolate; devastated; stripped; bare; hence, dreary; dismal; gloomy; cheerless.

Name: Watch
Definition: The act of watching; forbearance of sleep; vigil; wakeful, vigilant, or constantly observant attention; close observation; guard; preservative or preventive vigilance; formerly, a watching or guarding by night.

Name: Watches
Definition: The leaves of Saracenia flava.  See Trumpets.

Name: Water
Definition: The fluid which descends from the clouds in rain, and which forms rivers, lakes, seas, etc.

Name: Waterproof
Definition: Proof against penetration or permeation by water; impervious to water; as, a waterproof garment; a waterproof roof.

Name: Watershed
Definition: The whole region or extent of country which contributes to the supply of a river or lake.

Name: Watt
Definition: A unit of power or activity equal to 107 C.G.S. units of power, or to work done at the rate of one joule a second.  An English horse power is approximately equal to 746 watts.

Name: Wave
Definition: To play loosely; to move like a wave, one way and the other; to float; to flutter; to undulate.

Name: Wave
Definition: Woe.

Name: Weak
Definition: Wanting physical strength.

Name: Wealth
Definition: Weal; welfare; prosperity; good.

Name: Weapon
Definition: An instrument of offensive of defensive combat; something to fight with; anything used, or designed to be used, in destroying, defeating, or injuring an enemy, as a gun, a sword, etc.

Name: Wear
Definition: Same as Weir.

Name: Wearing
Definition: The act of one who wears; the manner in which a thing wears; use; conduct; consumption.

Name: Weather
Definition: The state of the air or atmosphere with respect to heat or cold, wetness or dryness, calm or storm, clearness or cloudiness, or any other meteorological phenomena; meteorological condition of the atmosphere; as, warm weather; cold weather; wet weather; dry weather, etc.

Name: Webster
Definition: A weaver; originally, a female weaver.

Name: Wedding
Definition: Nuptial ceremony; nuptial festivities; marriage; nuptials.

Name: Wednesday
Definition: The fourth day of the week; the next day after Tuesday.

Name: Weed
Definition: A garment; clothing; especially, an upper or outer garment.

Name: Week
Definition: A period of seven days, usually that reckoned from one Sabbath or Sunday to the next.

Name: Weekly
Definition: Of or pertaining to a week, or week days; as, weekly labor.

Name: Weight
Definition: The quality of being heavy; that property of bodies by which they tend toward the center of the earth; the effect of gravitative force, especially when expressed in certain units or standards, as pounds, grams, etc.

Name: Wear
Definition: A dam in a river to stop and raise the water, for the purpose of conducting it to a mill, forming a fish pond, or the like.

Name: Weird
Definition: Fate; destiny; one of the Fates, or Norns; also, a prediction.

Name: Welcome
Definition: Received with gladness; admitted willingly to the house, entertainment, or company; as, a welcome visitor.

Name: Welfare
Definition: Well-doing or well-being in any respect; the enjoyment of health and the common blessings of life; exemption from any evil or calamity; prosperity; happiness.

Name: Well
Definition: An issue of water from the earth; a spring; a fountain.

Name: Welsh
Definition: Of or pertaining to Wales, or its inhabitants.

Name: Went
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Wend; -- now obsolete except as the imperfect of go, with which it has no etymological connection.  See Go.

Name: Were
Definition: To wear.  See 3d Wear.

Name: West
Definition: The point in the heavens where the sun is seen to set at the equinox; or, the corresponding point on the earth; that one of the four cardinal points of the compass which is in a direction at right angles to that of north and south, and on the left hand of a person facing north; the point directly opposite to east.

Name: Western
Definition: Of or pertaining to the west; situated in the west, or in the region nearly in the direction of west; being in that quarter where the sun sets; as, the western shore of France; the western ocean.

Name: Whale
Definition: Any aquatic mammal of the order Cetacea, especially any one of the large species, some of which become nearly one hundred feet long. Whales are hunted chiefly for their oil and baleen, or whalebone.

Name: What
Definition: As an interrogative pronoun, used in asking questions regarding either persons or things; as, what is this? what did you say? what poem is this? what child is lost?

Name: Whatever
Definition: Anything soever which; the thing or things of any kind; being this or that; of one nature or another; one thing or another; anything that may be; all that; the whole that; all particulars that; -- used both substantively and adjectively.

Name: Wheat
Definition: A cereal grass (Triticum vulgare) and its grain, which furnishes a white flour for bread, and, next to rice, is the grain most largely used by the human race.

Name: Wheel
Definition: A circular frame turning about an axis; a rotating disk, whether solid, or a frame composed of an outer rim, spokes or radii, and a central hub or nave, in which is inserted the axle, -- used for supporting and conveying vehicles, in machinery, and for various purposes; as, the wheel of a wagon, of a locomotive, of a mill, of a watch, etc.

Name: When
Definition: At what time; -- used interrogatively.

Name: Whenever
Definition: At whatever time.

Name: Where
Definition: Whether.

Name: Whereas
Definition: At which place; where.

Name: Wherever
Definition: At or in whatever place; wheresoever.

Name: Whether
Definition: Which (of two); which one (of two); -- used interrogatively and relatively.

Name: Which
Definition: Of what sort or kind; what; what a; who.

Name: While
Definition: Space of time, or continued duration, esp. when short; a time; as, one while we thought him innocent.

Name: Whilst
Definition: While.

Name: White
Definition: Reflecting to the eye all the rays of the spectrum combined; not tinted with any of the proper colors or their mixtures; having the color of pure snow; snowy; -- the opposite of black or dark; as, white paper; a white skin.

Name: Whole
Definition: Containing the total amount, number, etc.; comprising all the parts; free from deficiency; all; total; entire; as, the whole earth; the whole solar system; the whole army; the whole nation.

Name: Wholesale
Definition: Sale of goods by the piece or large quantity, as distinguished from retail.

Name: Whom
Definition: The objective case of who.  See Who.

Name: Whose
Definition: The possessive case of who or which.  See Who, and Which.

Name: Wicked
Definition: Having a wick; -- used chiefly in composition; as, a two-wicked lamp.

Name: Wide
Definition: Having considerable distance or extent between the sides; spacious across; much extended in a direction at right angles to that of length; not narrow; broad; as, wide cloth; a wide table; a wide highway; a wide bed; a wide hall or entry.

Name: Widely
Definition: In a wide manner; to a wide degree or extent; far; extensively; as, the gospel was widely disseminated by the apostles.

Name: Widespread
Definition: Spread to a great distance; widely extended; extending far and wide; as, widespread wings; a widespread movement.

Name: Width
Definition: The quality of being wide; extent from side to side; breadth; wideness; as, the width of cloth; the width of a door.

Name: Wife
Definition: A woman; an adult female; -- now used in literature only in certain compounds and phrases, as alewife, fishwife, goodwife, and the like.

Name: Wild
Definition: Living in a state of nature; inhabiting natural haunts, as the forest or open field; not familiar with, or not easily approached by, man; not tamed or domesticated; as, a wild boar; a wild ox; a wild cat.

Name: Wilderness
Definition: A tract of land, or a region, uncultivated and uninhabited by human beings, whether a forest or a wide, barren plain; a wild; a waste; a desert; a pathless waste of any kind.

Name: Will
Definition: The power of choosing; the faculty or endowment of the soul by which it is capable of choosing; the faculty or power of the mind by which we decide to do or not to do; the power or faculty of preferring or selecting one of two or more objects.

Name: Willing
Definition: Free to do or to grant; having the mind inclined; not opposed in mind; not choosing to refuse; disposed; not averse; desirous; consenting; complying; ready.

Name: Willow
Definition: Any tree or shrub of the genus Salix, including many species, most of which are characterized often used as an emblem of sorrow, desolation, or desertion.

Name: Wind
Definition: To turn completely, or with repeated turns; especially, to turn about something fixed; to cause to form convolutions about anything; to coil; to twine; to twist; to wreathe; as, to wind thread on a spool or into a ball.

Name: Window
Definition: An opening in the wall of a building for the admission of light and air, usually closed by casements or sashes containing some transparent material, as glass, and capable of being opened and shut at pleasure.

Name: Windsor
Definition: A town in Berkshire, England.

Name: Wine
Definition: The expressed juice of grapes, esp. when fermented; a beverage or liquor prepared from grapes by squeezing out their juice, and (usually) allowing it to ferment.

Name: Wing
Definition: One of the two anterior limbs of a bird, pterodactyl, or bat. They correspond to the arms of man, and are usually modified for flight, but in the case of a few species of birds, as the ostrich, auk, etc., the wings are used only as an assistance in running or swimming.

Name: Winner
Definition: One who wins, or gains by success in competition, contest, or gaming.

Name: Winning
Definition: Attracting; adapted to gain favor; charming; as, a winning address.

Name: Winter
Definition: The season of the year in which the sun shines most obliquely upon any region; the coldest season of the year.

Name: Wire
Definition: A thread or slender rod of metal; a metallic substance formed to an even thread by being passed between grooved rollers, or drawn through holes in a plate of steel.

Name: Wisdom
Definition: The quality of being wise; knowledge, and the capacity to make due use of it; knowledge of the best ends and the best means; discernment and judgment; discretion; sagacity; skill; dexterity.

Name: Wise
Definition: Having knowledge; knowing; enlightened; of extensive information; erudite; learned.

Name: Wish
Definition: To have a desire or yearning; to long; to hanker.

Name: Wishing
Definition: a. & n. from Wish, v. t.

Name: Witch
Definition: A cone of paper which is placed in a vessel of lard or other fat, and used as a taper.

Name: With
Definition: With denotes or expresses some situation or relation of nearness, proximity, association, connection, or the like.

Name: Withdrawal
Definition: The act of withdrawing; withdrawment; retreat; retraction.

Name: Within
Definition: In the inner or interior part of; inside of; not without; as, within doors.

Name: Without
Definition: On or at the outside of; out of; not within; as, without doors.

Name: Witness
Definition: Attestation of a fact or an event; testimony.

Name: Wives
Definition: pl. of Wife.

Name: Wizard
Definition: A wise man; a sage.

Name: Wolf
Definition: Any one of several species of wild and savage carnivores belonging to the genus Canis and closely allied to the common dog. The best-known and most destructive species are the European wolf (Canis lupus), the American gray, or timber, wolf (C. occidentalis), and the prairie wolf, or coyote. Wolves often hunt in packs, and may thus attack large animals and even man.

Name: Woman
Definition: An adult female person; a grown-up female person, as distinguished from a man or a child; sometimes, any female person.

Name: Women
Definition: pl. of Woman.

Name: Wonder
Definition: That emotion which is excited by novelty, or the presentation to the sight or mind of something new, unusual, strange, great, extraordinary, or not well understood; surprise; astonishment; admiration; amazement.

Name: Wonderful
Definition: Adapted to excite wonder or admiration; surprising; strange; astonishing.

Name: Wood
Definition: Mad; insane; possessed; rabid; furious; frantic.

Name: Wooden
Definition: Made or consisting of wood; pertaining to, or resembling, wood; as, a wooden box; a wooden leg; a wooden wedding.

Name: Wool
Definition: The soft and curled, or crisped, species of hair which grows on sheep and some other animals, and which in fineness sometimes approaches to fur; -- chiefly applied to the fleecy coat of the sheep, which constitutes a most essential material of clothing in all cold and temperate climates.

Name: Word
Definition: The spoken sign of a conception or an idea; an articulate or vocal sound, or a combination of articulate and vocal sounds, uttered by the human voice, and by custom expressing an idea or ideas; a single component part of human speech or language; a constituent part of a sentence; a term; a vocable.

Name: Work
Definition: Exertion of strength or faculties; physical or intellectual effort directed to an end; industrial activity; toil; employment; sometimes, specifically, physically labor.

Name: Worker
Definition: One who, or that which, works; a laborer; a performer; as, a worker in brass.

Name: Working
Definition: a & n. from Work.

Name: Workshop
Definition: A shop where any manufacture or handiwork is carried on.

Name: World
Definition: The earth and the surrounding heavens; the creation; the system of created things; existent creation; the universe.

Name: Worm
Definition: A creeping or a crawling animal of any kind or size, as a serpent, caterpillar, snail, or the like.

Name: Worn
Definition: p. p. of Wear.

Name: Worry
Definition: To harass by pursuit and barking; to attack repeatedly; also, to tear or mangle with the teeth.

Name: Worse
Definition: Bad, ill, evil, or corrupt, in a greater degree; more bad or evil; less good; specifically, in poorer health; more sick; -- used both in a physical and moral sense.

Name: Worship
Definition: Excellence of character; dignity; worth; worthiness.

Name: Worst
Definition: Bad, evil, or pernicious, in the highest degree, whether in a physical or moral sense.  See Worse.

Name: Worth
Definition: To be; to become; to betide; -- now used only in the phrases, woe worth the day, woe worth the man, etc., in which the verb is in the imperative, and the nouns day, man, etc., are in the dative. Woe be to the day, woe be to the man, etc., are equivalent phrases.

Name: Worthy
Definition: Having worth or excellence; possessing merit; valuable; deserving; estimable; excellent; virtuous.

Name: Would
Definition: Commonly used as an auxiliary verb, either in the past tense or in the conditional or optative present.  See 2d & 3d Will.

Name: Wound
Definition: imp. & p. p. of Wind to twist, and Wind to sound by blowing.

Name: Wrap
Definition: To snatch up; transport; -- chiefly used in the p. p. wrapt.

Name: Wright
Definition: One who is engaged in a mechanical or manufacturing business; an artificer; a workman; a manufacturer; a mechanic; esp., a worker in wood; -- now chiefly used in compounds, as in millwright, wheelwright, etc.

Name: Wrist
Definition: The joint, or the region of the joint, between the hand and the arm; the carpus.  See Carpus.

Name: Write
Definition: To set down, as legible characters; to form the conveyance of meaning; to inscribe on any material by a suitable instrument; as, to write the characters called letters; to write figures.

Name: Writer
Definition: One who writes, or has written; a scribe; a clerk.

Name: Writing
Definition: The act or art of forming letters and characters on paper, wood, stone, or other material, for the purpose of recording the ideas which characters and words express, or of communicating them to others by visible signs.

Name: Written
Definition: p. p. of Write, v.

Name: Wrong
Definition: imp. of Wring. Wrung.

Name: Wrote
Definition: To root with the snout.  See 1st Root.

Name: Yacht
Definition: A light and elegantly furnished vessel, used either for private parties of pleasure, or as a vessel of state to convey distinguished persons from one place to another; a seagoing vessel used only for pleasure trips, racing, etc.

Name: Yang
Definition: The cry of the wild goose; a honk.

Name: Yard
Definition: A rod; a stick; a staff.

Name: Yarn
Definition: Spun wool; woolen thread; also, thread of other material, as of cotton, flax, hemp, or silk; material spun and prepared for use in weaving, knitting, manufacturing sewing thread, or the like.

Name: Year
Definition: The time of the apparent revolution of the sun trough the ecliptic; the period occupied by the earth in making its revolution around the sun, called the astronomical year; also, a period more or less nearly agreeing with this, adopted by various nations as a measure of time, and called the civil year; as, the common lunar year of 354 days, still in use among the Mohammedans; the year of 360 days, etc. In common usage, the year consists of 365 days, and every fourth year (called bissextile, or leap year) of 366 days, a day being added to February on that year, on account of the excess above 365 days (see Bissextile).

Name: Yearly
Definition: Happening, accruing, or coming every year; annual; as, a yearly income; a yearly feast.

Name: Yeast
Definition: The foam, or troth (top yeast), or the sediment (bottom yeast), of beer or other in fermentation, which contains the yeast plant or its spores, and under certain conditions produces fermentation in saccharine or farinaceous substances; a preparation used for raising dough for bread or cakes, and making it light and puffy; barm; ferment.

Name: Yellow
Definition: Being of a bright saffronlike color; of the color of gold or brass; having the hue of that part of the rainbow, or of the solar spectrum, which is between the orange and the green.

Name: Yesterday
Definition: The day last past; the day next before the present.

Name: Yield
Definition: To give in return for labor expended; to produce, as payment or interest on what is expended or invested; to pay; as, money at interest yields six or seven per cent.

Name: Yoga
Definition: A species of asceticism among the Hindoos, which consists in a complete abstraction from all worldly objects, by which the votary expects to obtain union with the universal spirit, and to acquire superhuman faculties.

Name: Yorkshire
Definition: A county in the north of England.

Name: Young
Definition: Not long born; still in the first part of life; not yet arrived at adolescence, maturity, or age; not old; juvenile; -- said of animals; as, a young child; a young man; a young fawn.

Name: Your
Definition: The form of the possessive case of the personal pronoun you.

Name: Yourself
Definition: An emphasized or reflexive form of the pronoun of the second person; -- used as a subject commonly with you; as, you yourself shall see it; also, alone in the predicate, either in the nominative or objective case; as, you have injured yourself.

Name: Youth
Definition: The quality or state of being young; youthfulness; juvenility.

Name: Zero
Definition: A cipher; nothing; naught.

Name: Zinc
Definition: An abundant element of the magnesium-cadmium group, extracted principally from the minerals zinc blende, smithsonite, calamine, and franklinite, as an easily fusible bluish white metal, which is malleable, especially when heated. It is not easily oxidized in moist air, and hence is used for sheeting, coating galvanized iron, etc. It is used in making brass, britannia, and other alloys, and is also largely consumed in electric batteries. Symbol Zn. Atomic weight 64.9.

Name: Zone
Definition: A girdle; a cincture.

Name: Zope
Definition: A European fresh-water bream (Abramis ballerus).
